story:
OGarden Smart can grow up to 90 fruits and veggies at once, so you can enjoy an abundance of super fresh food. Automatic watering makes using OGarden Smart virtually effortless, and the automatic low energy consumption LEDs simulate the perfect amount of sunlight, offering optimal year round growth.

Enjoy home grown produce whenever you need it. Be ready for simple, beautiful, and sustainable indoor gardening at its finest.

Most indoor gardening systems lack the size and ability to grow a substantial amount of produce. Or they are difficult to set up, and leave even the most experienced gardener frustrated.

By being able to grow a great amount of veggies and fruits easily from your living room, OGarden Smart is a way to eat produce sustainably that’s never been done before.  Effortless, easy and pleasant, the OGarden Smart easily upgrades your home and your grocery basket!

 

No more worrying about which seasons to grow your produce in. No matter the conditions outside, OGarden Smart will grow up to 90 fruits and veggies at once, with 20 different kinds to choose from. 

Is your favorite vegetable or fruit not on the list? No problem! With the Bag of Virgin Earth, you can sprout your own seeds. Have fun and grow your own original plants. We'd love to see what you grow! Take photos of your harvest and share them with the Ogarden Smart community.

 All you need to do is plant a seed, make sure there is enough water in the tank (only once a week), and you can harvest your produce 30 to 40 days later, that’s it.

There are 90 available spots, so with a good rotation, you can have 2-4 large vegetables a day, every day. 

Alternatively, you can have a bouquet of various garnishes to top off any meal, any time.

 

According to the U.S. Department of Agriculture, it costs a family of four an average of $850 per month for groceries*. OGarden Smart can save you up to 80% on your veggie expenses - allowing you to cut down your grocery bill.

*Official USDA Food Plans: U.S. Average, November 2017

With OGarden, you can get fully grown, pesticide-free veggies for as low as $0.45 cents!

OGarden is truly the best way to eat produce grown in a 100% organic environment at a fraction of the cost.

Also, you’ll be eliminating food waste by being able to harvest food when you need it.

By producing your vegetables, fruits, and herbs directly at home, you know the quality of the air, the water and environment they grow in. Have peace of mind knowing that all of your fresh produce is grown in a 100% organic environment. 

Our seed pods are made with organic soil and feeds your plants with organic fertilizer, so you only get the best for your plants and for your body.

And of course, harvesting your produce only moments before eating it almost guarantees a better tasting product.

 

The beauty of OGarden (aside from the way it looks) is how it’s incredibly simple to use. Whether you’re an expert gardener or new to your green thumb, OGarden is the perfect system to grow beautiful produce. Gardening has never been easier.

 

Our unique system allows you to have 3 rotations of produce simultaneously. Germinate a batch of seeds, grow another batch to size, and have a third batch ready to harvest all at the same time!

Take pride in your food by producing your own veggies at home, in a fully automatic way.

OGarden Smart will automatically adjust watering for you to optimize growth. Just check your tank once a week and watch your garden grow.

If you do forget to check the water for a quick five minutes per week, don’t worry. OGarden Smart has a water warning system that will alert you when the water level becomes too low over time.

The rotating wheel keeps the roots and soil constantly moist with just the right amount of water, while keeping the the plants growing in an even manner.

OGarden Smart’s LEDs simulate the perfect amount of sunlight that your produce needs to thrive, and will automatically turn on and off for convenience and energy conservation. 

Best of all, they only take 120 watts of power! In comparison, that’s about 2 incandescent light bulbs.

Why is OGarden’s growth so efficient? And why is it so easy?

The key is in the cup of seeds. Made with organic soil and fed with all the organic fertilizer it needs, our seed cups create the perfect environment for the plant to grow.

They’re also super clean! No spilled dirt or fuss. With a 100% biodegradable membrane, the seed cups stay in place without any mess.

The OGarden Smart is so much more than a production machine - it’s a garden, bringing joy and beauty into your home.

We gave it a clean minimalist design that not only compliments, but enhances any space. 

The circular shape creates room for produce to grow larger and fuller while keeping small footprint in your living space. The cabinet underneath the wheel creates a perfect space to germinate your seeds. Grow a full garden indoors without using too much precious wall space, living space, or window light!

Plus, the rotating wheel creates a beautiful, moving aesthetic that brings life to your home.

OGarden teaches us how to grow our own food and gives us a better understanding of where our food comes from and how it affects us.

We see it as a way improve our health and quality of life through education and connection with food. 

We made OGarden effortless to use because we want the concept of growing food to be easily past down for generations. With OGarden, parents can teach their children the importance of growing their own food and pass down the pride and health benefits that come along with it. 

Eating healthy, fresh, and delicious foods will make an incredible difference in our lives. Growing our own food makes us mindful of what we’re putting in our bodies and connects us closer with our planet and with each other.

With OGarden, we are working towards bringing more autonomy to people through a solution that can have a significant impact on ecology. Our mission is to bring our humanity to a new level, with more responsibility for ourselves and our planet.

We are committed to creating true sustainable solutions that positively affect our world and our lives. Join us. Bring your life to a new level and let’s change the world together. 

 

 

We created the OGarden Smart to work towards a better, healthier, ecological and responsible world. Our mission, through the OGarden, is to create a real positive ecological impact on Earth, while bringing more autonomy to individuals.

We decided to work on a solution that could bring us fresh and healthy food for cheaper than the store and as well creating a great and positive impact on Earth. We felt it would be our contribution to the improvement of Earth and humanity.

How can we get fresh, healthy, non-gmo vegetables, for cheaper than the store? That was THE question. We looked into other hydroponic solutions, but they only allowed us to grow a few herbs in the kitchen and did not really made a difference in our food expense. Everything we grew was gone in 1 to 2 meals.

So we started developing our own system that would make a REAL difference in our plate and food budget, and the OGarden was born. We created a super optimized device that grows up to 90 veggies, fruits, and herbs at the same time for about 5 times less expensive than in grocery store. 

Sustainable, autonomous, and affordable - welcome to the future of gardening!

OGarden is a young company based in Quebec, Canada. It was founded in 2016 after our first highly successful crowdfunding campaign. Lead by the vision of a more beautiful world that is ecologically closer to nature, the OGarden team has worked hard to find an innovative solution. We believe we've found it. Our goal is to bring more autonomy to you and your loved ones.

story:
Alphabet Corner AR provides 26 flash cards and a mobile app, it can help your kids to learn the alphabets via a 3D interface, introducing to alphabet pronunciation, card games, listening exercises and much more.

Colorful and engaging, Alphabet Corner AR is the fun and interactive way to get your kids learning, strengthening their memory and help to learn with their own initiative as the process is more Fun!

Each card features a cute animal with the first letter of the animal’s name, perfect for capturing your child’s attention as he or she embarks on the Alphabet Corner AR educational journey.

           

        

Alphabet Corner AR can make learning fun for kids; we make learning process much easier. There is no reason to view learning the alphabet as a strict and boring process: just as we can enjoy learning in adulthood, kids can also enjoy learning their very first alphabet skills with much fun.

Alphabet corner has 26 flash colorful cards, each card front side has capital, small letter and one cute animal picture and animal’s name.  

         

 

The card is waterproof and uses green ink, which is Eco-friendly and comes with rounded corners for kid friendly usage.

Alphabet Corner AR application, it includes Learn and Game sections, children can learn the capital and small alphabet letters through 4D Visual and real human pronunciation, which stimulates auditory exercises to memorize the alphabet.

Game:

-> Pronunciation Mode: Listen to the pronunciation and find the correct alphabet card

-> Alphabet Order Mode:  Find alphabets and scan it in alphabetical order

Kids after learning alphabets can practice their skillset using this game mode, it will be more interactive and stress free test based system

Alphabet Corner AR emphasizes this worldview, communicating the idea that education can be fun. Moreover, with Alphabet Corner AR, children will learn faster than they would otherwise, giving them a leg up as they head off into school for the first time.

We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $2,000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of publishing, marketing, and distributing the Alphabet Corner AR deck of cards and the app. The app will be available in both the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store in order to maximize access. As a big thank-you to all contributors, we have some excellent rewards planned, including copies of the Alphabet AR flash cards and app.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help out by sharing this campaign on Facebook or any other social media platform you may use. The more people knows about Alphabet Corner AR, the smoother our launch period will go. We appreciate everything you do for us greatly, and we thank you for your time.

story:
About Me

My name is Alex and I have been working the Internet for a long time now. I am 41 years old and I come from the Netherlands. I am a father of 2 girls 16 and 9 and live in
Schiedam.(near Rotterdam)

This software has been like my 3rd child since 2012 when we managed to get the first version finished. The further development and re-coding of this software is very important to me as we are still early stages of the Internet and it's development potential. 

Accessing the Internet with through mobile devices continues to grow year on year reaching  unprecedented levels. One result was the development of the revolutionary software  producing QR Codes, a square black box - resembling a jigsaw which contains many different types of information.

I have developed software that takes the QR code to the next stage of the evolution..  No longer does the QR Code have to be that plain, boring black cube sitting on the page  - often un noticed or  worse yet, ignored. 

The features built into my software allow you to create your own QR Code, not only that, you can brand it as well.  
Version 1 was designed so that you can produce your own QR Code - Place your own logo within it & change the settings to appear 3D and include a background.

Even options to produce the QR Code with both textured and coloured background were not enough to satisfy my desire to make this the No. 1 software in it's field. I will continue to support and enhance the software. Though now it is good, I want to ensure that it is the best.

Major companies are using QR code marketing in their business and the end users, those who are scanning the QR code, experience the ease of reaching specific places on the Internet without typing those tedious long urls and change of misspelling them.

 Business's experience the ease and profit from getting the visitor  to the place they want with the minimum of time and fuss. Other benefits are the ease with which they can be used for the delivery of coupons - leading to a suburb ROI on the cost of the software.


Mobile users can now send/receive:-

SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter, Goggle Map, Telephone No. etc. etc. Just through scanning the QR Code into their mobile device. In this day and age of immediate action/results  is it any wonder this simple but highly effective little square produces such excellent returns.


Re-coding the software and expanding the features even more, will make this software a one of a kind! I aim to make it the market leader as there isn't software like this out there!

That's also the reason I am here, seeking those who see this bigger picture.
I want to keep the head start we have since there isn't a stand alone version of QR generator software doing what this software does.


Features I would like to add in the re-coded version are :

  • Make it run on a MAC computer
  • Integrate monitoring, tracking and having dynamic 3D Qr Codes(we have this but it's separate from the software now)

  •  Create a web based version
  • Instant WordPress connected so software shows batch 3D QR codes on every page or post created inside your WordPress
  • Having it connect with all social network out there using API (youtube, facebook, linkedin and so on....) so that it show content on the fly.
  • Be able to Import PSD, PDF and other files inside the background, that way we can export printable business cards, flyers, reports and other marketing materials.
  • Adding as many layers into the back or foreground of the QR code as you want.
  • Being able to drag the background added like a PDF, Image or any other file or text.
  • Adding an instant mobile landing page creator with tab to call,tap to email, tap to sms and more.
  • Having different niche templates available that connect straight away with the generated 3D QR Code
  • Being able editing text and images and the position inside the complete picture and landing pages through drag and drop.
  • Working the security against hacking it and using it for free!(costs a arm and a leg)
  • Putting it on disc and create a hard cover box so it can be sold in stores.

And there will be even more ........ as we are working on re-coding this software.

Getting the funds for this can be the difference between finishing last, as others with more money will drive on this concept. Keep your eyes open, you could be seeing these "awesome" looking QR Code's in a place near you very soon.

This software has all the potential  to have it picked up by the Major Million-Dollar Companies like: Coca Cola, Pepsi, Mac Donalds, Walmarkt,  and many many more huge brand names.


Examples of major brands using QR Code marketing:



You can be part of this "3D QR Code Revolution" as of today!

Using QR Codes to get where we want to go on tablets and mobile devices will be a standard in browsing over the mobile Internet! The effectiveness is expected to lead to more companies addopting them within them marketing stratagies.

I have put up the 3D QR Code for "The Voice of Holland" for a purpose.

Last week I noticed the producers of that show used a QR Code on the television with a warning for people to get their mobile devices or tablet ready, after 60 sec there would be a QR Code shown on the TV Screen that they could scan!


These producers are using the "OLD" ugly looking QR Code -  this must prove something right? We are not talking about a local TV station barely making it! This is "The voice of Holland" who have sold the TV show to almost every country in the world!


Fund my project and have the 3D QR Codes show up around you, replacing the old black and white ones! Seeing them pop up around you must be a hell of a feeling "knowing" you participated in making that happen.

In fact.. build your own client base and produce their "Personalised" 3D QR Codes giving you a chance at owning your own business!

Be part of this and get stunned by the power of 3D QR Codes Generated under 60 seconds!


What do we need?

We have set the funding amount at $30.000 to re-code and add the extra features to the software, that will enable enough money left over to be used for a for a decent marketing campaign.

All money raised above our goal, will be used for the same purposes, marketing, research and development! Keeping the 3D QR Generator Pro a strong and healthy product.


Why do you need this funding in this small amount of time?

To come up with this first version of the software took us almost 2 years. Now we have taken the 3D Generator Pro to the market, we want to continue it's success and to re-code Version 2 in the shortest possible time.

We all know the Internet is a constantly changing medium, sometimes it even gets to fast for itself. Missing out exploiting this "awesome" software would be a real loss.


What's in it for me?

I have thought about that and will be starting with the first one " EVERYBODY" will be getting this first version copy of our software, no restrictions full working 3D QR Generator Pro Licensed! Also those copies will be updated for 'FREE" as long as we are releasing new updates!

The software is already designed so it can run as a "Whitelabel Version" the banner inside the software can be altered so there is room for advertising your own company.

This will be the first perk and will be effective for all who participate in funding the release of 3D QR Generator Pro V2!


Note! These will be single machine licenses! and run only on windows based machines.


What if you do not reach the desired amount?  Then we would take whatever we raised and make the best of it, as we are determined to release that second version as soon as possible!


This software can really make a difference in using the mobile Internet. Making sites using "our" 3D QR Codes a much more attractive alternative  for their marketing campaigns.

Reviews we received  from buyer's of our first version speak for themselves, below are a few of them:

  • "This is an wonderful software with excellent features, I've other qr code softwares but none meets this standard, i can use this for my biz as well as offer qr code service to other offline biz's! This could've easily be priced 5x more!"
  • "Alright guys this software is a must have, i can't lie, if you do anything mobile, or anything in offline marketing, or online marketing, its a must have, it's the future, everyone has these things..."
  • "CMC you are a pain I'm supposed to be NOT buying anything but I saw this on WF and its a little beauty. Thanks for the special price."
  • "WOW this is a true all in one qr solution now that we can create > redirect at will > and track. So will we have within the tool like individual qr codes or can we create a folder for each site of ours and also create individual folders for each local clients so we can easily manage all codes this would be great please add feature for next update. I will quickly buy now thanks for great product no more need to ever buy any other qr code product in future as long as it is maintained thanks again off to buy now."
  • "Ok I have to say that the QR Generator pro is fast and easy to work with. It allows to to add a background image and a Logo to the QR Code. It also allows you to use Gradient style coloring to the QR Code."
  • "I have had a chance to test this software and it is very good and you can produce good looking QR codes with various options one of the best options I have seen for QR codes. Simple to use and to change backgrounds and add logos etc for quality QR codes. Best I have seen."
  • "I usually just float around in the background and buy a couple of things if they interest me but this was something that I have been interested in for a while now. I have sold a few QR codes to businesses before and used different methods to make them a little bit more unusual and stand out from the crowd. This would take me slightly longer to do that make the simple black and white ones you normally see. I tried this as I thought the price was just too darn good to refuse and it was backed up with a lifetime update. Seriously $14.95 would be spent on a low worse and what I actually can make in the space of a few minutes is unbelievable. The logo and colours make this VERY easy to sell to businesses and it looks so professional. Thanks for this Alex and I certainly am going to play some more with this."

Some 3D QR Code our clients have made:




If you cannot help us with funding but can help making this funding request a success, by advertising this fundraiser and getting at least 3 contributers(please use the tools provided by Indiegogo) will get a Full Version of the 3D QR Generator Pro Copy - Licenced Software with all future updates!

You will be able to view all our effort regarding this funding request as we will respond inside this request dailly!

Let's make this a truly "winning" piece of software just because it's "worth" it!

Alex van Eck
Schiedam - Netherlands

ps. We will built the FAQ section inside Indiegogo as soon as these questions come in!
 
Q: When will I receive my copy of the software!
A: You will receive your copy straight away after funding!

Having different niche templates available that connect straight away with the generated 3D QR CodeBeing able editing text and images and the position inside the complete picture and landing pages through drag and drop.Working the security against hacking it and using it for free!(costs a arm and a leg)Putting it on disc and create a hard cover box so it can be sold in stores.And there will be even more ........ as we are working on re-coding this software.Getting the funds for this can be the difference between finishing last, as others with more money will drive on this concept. Keep your eyes open, you could be seeing these "awesome" looking QR Code's in a place near you very soon. This software has all the potential  to have it picked up by the Major Million-Dollar Companies like: Coca Cola, Pepsi, Mac Donalds, Walmarkt,  and many many more huge brand names.Examples of major brands using QR Code marketing:You can be part of this "3D QR Code Revolution" as of today!Using QR Codes to get where we want to go on tablets and mobile devices will be a standard in browsing over the mobile Internet! The effectiveness is expected to lead to more companies addopting them within them marketing stratagies.I have put up the 3D QR Code for "The Voice of Holland" for a purpose.Last week I noticed the producers of that show used a QR Code on the television with a warning for people to get their mobile devices or tablet ready, after 60 sec there would be a QR Code shown on the TV Screen that they could scan!These producers are using the "OLD" ugly looking QR Code -  this must prove something right? We are not talking about a local TV station barely making it! This is "The voice of Holland" who have sold the TV show to almost every country in the world!Fund my project and have the 3D QR Codes show up around you, replacing the old black and white ones! Seeing them pop up around you must be a hell of a feeling "knowing" you participated in making that happen.In fact.. build your own client base and produce their "Personalised" 3D QR Codes giving you a chance at owning your own business!Be part of this and get stunned by the power of 3D QR Codes Generated under 60 seconds!What do we need?We have set the funding amount at $30.000 to re-code and add the extra features to the software, that will enable enough money left over to be used for a for a decent marketing campaign. All money raised above our goal, will be used for the same purposes, marketing, research and development! Keeping the 3D QR Generator Pro a strong and healthy product.Why do you need this funding in this small amount of time?To come up with this first version of the software took us almost 2 years. Now we have taken the 3D Generator Pro to the market, we want to continue it's success and to re-code Version 2 in the shortest possible time.We all know the Internet is a constantly changing medium, sometimes it even gets to fast for itself. Missing out exploiting this "awesome" software would be a real loss.What's in it for me?I have thought about that and will be starting with the first one " EVERYBODY" will be getting this first version copy of our software, no restrictions full working 3D QR Generator Pro Licensed! Also those copies will be updated for 'FREE" as long as we are releasing new updates!The software is already designed so it can run as a "Whitelabel Version" the banner inside the software can be altered so there is room for advertising your own company.This will be the first perk and will be effective for all who participate in funding the release of 3D QR Generator Pro V2!Note! These will be single machine licenses! and run only on windows based machines.What if you do not reach the desired amount?  Then we would take whatever we raised and make the best of it, as we are determined to release that second version as soon as possible!This software can really make a difference in using the mobile Internet. Making sites using "our" 3D QR Codes a much more attractive alternative  for their marketing campaigns.Reviews we received  from buyer's of our first version speak for themselves, below are a few of them:"This is an wonderful software with excellent features, I've other qr code softwares but none meets this standard, i can use this for my biz as well as offer qr code service to other offline biz's! This could've easily be priced 5x more!""Alright guys this software is a must have, i can't lie, if you do anything mobile, or anything in offline marketing, or online marketing, its a must have, it's the future, everyone has these things...""CMC you are a pain I'm supposed to be NOT buying anything but I saw this on WF and its a little beauty. Thanks for the special price.""WOW this is a true all in one qr solution now that we can create > redirect at will > and track. So will we have within the tool like individual qr codes or can we create a folder for each site of ours and also create individual folders for each local clients so we can easily manage all codes this would be great please add feature for next update. I will quickly buy now thanks for great product no more need to ever buy any other qr code product in future as long as it is maintained thanks again off to buy now.""Ok I have to say that the QR Generator pro is fast and easy to work with. It allows to to add a background image and a Logo to the QR Code. It also allows you to use Gradient style coloring to the QR Code.""I have had a chance to test this software and it is very good and you can produce good looking QR codes with various options one of the best options I have seen for QR codes. Simple to use and to change backgrounds and add logos etc for quality QR codes. Best I have seen.""I usually just float around in the background and buy a couple of things if they interest me but this was something that I have been interested in for a while now. I have sold a few QR codes to businesses before and used different methods to make them a little bit more unusual and stand out from the crowd. This would take me slightly longer to do that make the simple black and white ones you normally see. I tried this as I thought the price was just too darn good to refuse and it was backed up with a lifetime update. Seriously $14.95 would be spent on a low worse and what I actually can make in the space of a few minutes is unbelievable. The logo and colours make this VERY easy to sell to businesses and it looks so professional. Thanks for this Alex and I certainly am going to play some more with this."Some 3D QR Code our clients have made:If you cannot help us with funding but can help making this funding request a success, by advertising this fundraiser and getting at least 3 contributers(please use the tools provided by Indiegogo) will get a Full Version of the 3D QR Generator Pro Copy - Licenced Software with all future updates!You will be able to view all our effort regarding this funding request as we will respond inside this request dailly!Let's make this a truly "winning" piece of software just because it's "worth" it!Alex van EckSchiedam - Netherlands ps. We will built the FAQ section inside Indiegogo as soon as these questions come in!  Q: When will I receive my copy of the software!A: You will receive your copy straight away after funding!

story:
Check our latest review!

 

Nooie redefines the next generation smart video doorbell with intelligent human detection and elegant minimalist design. Monitor visitors, interact with guests remotely, anytime, anywhere. Nooie is your 24/7 home security guard.

How fast can you install a doorbell? 5 minutes? 10 or more? Forget the old methods, with Nooie total doorstep visibility, is possible in just 30 seconds.

Nooie’s battery-powered doorbell requires no wiring or professionals. Simply use the included wall mount and tamper-proof screws to put it on any wall surfaces.

Nooie pursues harmony in design — a balance between technology integration and art. Nooie introduced a softened design language to the smart home industry with subtle color pallets and ceramic-like finishing. We tested dozens of hues, materials, and finishes, searching for those that would spark a sense of warmth. Add a modern touch to your home with the stylish, intuitive, and affordable Nooie Cam Doorbell.

Nooie Cam Doorbell comes with a flat wall mount and a 15° wall mount if you need an angled view. Capture the best view of your entrance with zero blind spots.

Nooie uses an advanced PIR (Passive Infrared) sensor and Human Detection algorithm to achieve accurate person alert. This means, when a motion is detected, Nooie Cam Doorbell is able to tell whether it’s from a person or not. It maximizes not only the accuracy of alerts but also the battery life. You can customize the sensitivity settings as well to get the best result based on your surroundings.

When a person approaches your home, you’ll be the first to know! You can see the visitor clearly and talk with them thanks to the camera’s 2K resolution and two-way audio feature. If you’re too busy to answer the ring, you can also send a pre-recorded message to the visitor. Customize and record your own messages in the Nooie app. 

Unlike the other HD video doorbells, Nooie utilizes a 2K resolution camera to provide you with a perfectly clear view of what’s happening in front of your house. The 2K video contains twice the pixels of the typical 1080P cameras, resulting in enhanced imaging that captures every detail.  

Nooie sees things clearly in pitch black with its superior infrared night vision and motion sensors, providing reliable 24/7 security that you can trust.

Nooie is made to be reliable and low maintenance. Equipped with the largest battery capacity 

on the market. Never miss a moment with long-lasting battery life.

Nooie Cam Doorbell is rated IP65 weatherproof. It can take the heat, the cold, and everything in between. Nooie Cam Doorbell delivers flawless pictures, whatever the weather.

No need to worry if your Wi-Fi router is too far away from the doorbell. Nooie’s Base Station with Chime also works as a Wi-Fi amplifier to ensure that you can always hear the ring and communicate with visitors clearly.

Nooie is compatible with 2.4GHz & 5GHz networks, Alexa and Google Assistant.

Nooie provides fast, reliable and secure cloud services, starting at $1 per month or $10 per year exclusively on Indiegogo. Nooie cloud allows you to scan through your video history and replay the moments that matter. Choose your plan and get a 7-day free trial. 

 

 

*Please remember to choose the right type of plug while checking out

 

 

 

Nooie was created by a team of smart home experts who are motivated to create stylish, intuitive, and affordable products to improve everyday life. Our solutions bring safety, convenience, and peace of mind to you and your family. Nooie products are available for purchase at the Nooie Store. Please visit www.nooie.com to check out our other products. Nooie is trusted and loved by over 120K+ customers worldwide. Nooie — always be there.

*Previous Nooie line products reviews:

 

Nooie redefines the smart home industry by introducing the concept of Warm Tech, intuitive technology that cares for people, and applying a softened design language to products with organic curves, subtle color pallets and interior-complimentary finishing that would spark a sense of warmth at home.

Nooie Cam Doorbell and Base Station with Chime represent Nooie’s aesthetics and design philosophy perfectly. The forms were created to follow the function of the products and the experience of the users. Our designers tested and hand-picked the earthy tones and intriguing textures that make the duo a stand-out from the often rigid and cold security camera market. 

*Let's take a look at the production line

story:
LooLoo is the world's first and only automatic toilet freshener--addressing smells where the action happens: in the toilet. LooLoo represents a complete revolution in how toilets are used and ensures a fresh experience with every flush. 

          

LooLoo's patent-pending technology uses multiple infrared sensors that rest on the inside of the toilet. As you sit down, LooLoo senses your body heat and sprays a blend of essential oils onto the water, trapping unwanted scents beneath the surface water. 

          

The LooLoo chemists have worked hard to create a refreshing and effective formula. The goal was to create a formula that was not overpowering and was effective in trapping the odor. The result is a blend that contains proprietary elements, which not only help seal in the odors but also absorb nitrate odors. 

Fun Fact: the average person poops approximately once a day--about 1 ounce of stool for every 12 pounds of her or his body weight. (Don’t ask how we figured out that math. We’d rather not get into it.)

With LooLoo, odors from ALL bathroom guests will be taken care of, which comes in very handy when grandpa refuses to use the “new-fangled” toilet spray in the bathroom at family reunions.   

Or, if you’d prefer to use a conventional odor trapping spray, just pick up a germy bottle, stick your hand in a toilet, and struggle with spraying upside down. In many instances, you don’t have that kind of time.

 

          

After handfuls of prototypes, we've tweaked every last detail to arrive at the LooLoo you see today. We've got a number of working units, but in order to make enough for you to have one as well, we need to place a substantial minimum order for the first production run of LooLoo. That's why we're offering LooLoo to this awesome community first.   

Manufacturing

We have developed our first proprietary citrus essential oil blend with a liquid manufacturer here in Utah. Members of our team have extensive experience with the manufacture and have worked with them for more than 8 years while at a former consumer packaged goods company.  

Part of our product is going to be built and assembled in Asia. We have partnered with a fantastic manufacturing facility that has manufactured products for Sony, Philips, and Panasonic, and we are very confident in their capabilities. All that is left is to put in the purchase order for our first production run, which we will do with your support. Thank you! 

We have been eager to bring LooLoo to the world for a long time and we are very close to realizing our dream. The product you're seeing in this project is the result of innumerable hours of iterating and reiterating. We're perfectionists, and we wanted to make sure the formula, size, durability, and reliability are all dialed in before we ship.  

Below, you'll see a brief outline of the journey we're on with LooLoo, starting from the first time Taylor experienced the bathroom. 

We are insanely excited to get LooLoo onto your toilets. Rest assured that we're going to continue to work day and night until the very last LooLoo has shipped.

Thanks for all of your support!

Help Out By Sharing LooLoo With Your Friends! (#LooLoo) 

Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing LooLoo with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just hit one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page). The more people who know about LooLoo, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make LooLoo a reality. We can't do this without you!

 
 

 

Here at LooLoo, we know we have benefited greatly from the circumstances we were born into and recognize that LooLoo solves first-world problems. We feel passionate about making this world better for not just those who buy LooLoo, but a better place for everyone. To this end, we are donating a percentage of our revenue to solving the problematic sanitary issues in developing countries. 

The inventor and co-founder of the LooLoo, Taylor, has already spent three months building toilets for schools and villages in rural areas of Uganda. With the passion of our team and the help of our customers, we are excited to help resolve sanitation problems throughout the world. 

International Backers

This project isn't just for backers in the United States. We'll be shipping LooLoo worldwide! LooLoo cannot mark orders as gifts. This is illegal, so we will not be able to do this. Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes. As many of you know, our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter. 

We found this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a... . For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from GFS Gateway, First Mile, or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. 

Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker, your order will be processed for final delivery.  

Shipping Procedure

You will receive a tracking link with your shipping details within 24 hours of your order being shipped. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. Your order will ship out from our shipping facility in Salt Lake City, UT with a major shipping company or with a tracking link. Your order will be handled by UPS, USPS, RRDonnelley, or DHL up to entry of your country. Once your order enters your country, your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. 

International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. U.S Domestic shipments will take 3-5 business days.

Shipping Policy

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, it's the wrong address, or you moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

Behind the scenes 

Fun behind the scenes footage of our product video shoot.

story:
Smart Spot a workstation for you!

Over engineered yes, solid as a rock yes! Worthy of you yes!

 

Made in America!

 

Smart Spot is a work station for your smart phone. Whether you are an iPhone junky, or Droid fan, you will find Smart Spot to be ideally suited for uses on your desk, at home in the kitchen, and on your night stand.

 

What does Smart Spot Do?

It gives you a platform for texting, email, twitter...here is what our beta group had to say;

Greg T (Sales Representive)

"Now my desk is hands free love it."

 

Robin (college student)

"It's unexpectedly handy."

 

Amy (pre-school teacher)

"It is perfect for face time."

 

Colin (Aviation Executive)

"Now a fixture on my desk."

 

Leah (my daughter)

"I need one for every room in my house."

 

Kelly (Randy's Keeper lol)

"I love it."

 

 Funds from this soft launch will allow us to complete automation of our assembly line, create point of sale packaging, and allow us to attend several trade shows so we can get Smart Spot to your local stores. There is so much to be done, we will need to hire more employees to make all this happen. Please support us. I have already invested over $20,000.00 dollars to get Smart Spot ready for this launch.  Let's put some people to work!

We need your support!

  

Smart Spot comes is two types, Injection molded plastic and CNC Machining.

 

CNC Machining out of billet aluminum makes a superior product, but cost quite a bit more.

 

Visit our Gallery to watch us machine Smart Spots.

Our Injection molded units are in production now, and offer a great looking product at real value price.

Visit our Gallery to watch us Mold Smart Spots.

 

 

 

The Story


The honest story of how Smart Spot came to me began on a stormy Monday morning. I set off to work, stopped off at a local coffee shop for my coffee, and proceeded into the office. Like always, I started my day by placing my phone on my desk, my keys followed, then I spilled my coffee on my phone!


So being a product designer, by noon I had a design of a platform on which I could safely set my phone -- so it would not get dunked again! Like always, I emailed my initial design to my favorite critic, my daughter. Her response was not very positive: “Dad all the phone accessories are so over done! There is literally an accessory for everything. Try something else!”

Call me stubborn, but by the end of the day I had machined a prototype of Smart Spot. I personally fell in love with it, but what do I know? So, I showed it to my secretary. She laughed, and said, "What have you invented today?" It was time to close out my day -- I had literally done nothing on my to-do list.

Spilling my coffee had turned out to consume my entire day.


After a few modifications to Smart Spot, by Friday that week I had in my hand a product I felt was worthy of showing to my biggest critic, my wife. You have to understand that for 26 years of marriage I have been bringing home inventions. Here's how it usually goes: I walk in the door with my prototype in my hand and say, "Honey, look at this!" Her normal response is, "Yea, that’s great, the trash needs to be taken out!" This time it was different, she set her phone on it and went back to texting. We were sitting at our kitchen counter, and then she moved into the kitchen and took it with her. Moving from there to the patio to enjoy some wine, I noticed she took it with her again. At this point, I still had not got much of a review from her. Joking around I said, "You know, I have to take that back to work on Monday right?" She responded, "You will bring it home Monday night, right?" --- I guess she likes it after all.


That next week I made a few more prototypes, and made the decision to send one to my daughter and see what response I would get when she had one in her hand. A few days later her response came in a text message. “Okay, I got your Smart Spot in the mail. I need one for each room in my house and one for my office.” Ha! Now that both my critics have seen the light, the work begins!


Colors, material for the face, non skid for the base… these projects always seem so simple in the beginning -- and then everyone has an opinion. It gets overwhelming at times. Staying focused, I made the decision to carry my prototype with me and showed it to as many people as possible. When I ran out of friends, I went to Starbucks and sat at a table near the line of caffeine depleted people. In 45 minutes I had 22 people ask about Smart Spot. Normal response was, "Hey, that’s very cool! Where can I get one?"


Now I am all in! I ordered mold bases and made a prototype mold. Wow, that sounded so simple, didn’t it? Well, I spent an entire week, plus the weekend making that mold, a sum of 60+ hours. Not kidding, ask my wife, when I get consumed by something not much else in my life gets much attention. Sorry honey, I love you!


Now all this may sound crazy, but I truly love this product!

My goal is simple: get it launched in time for holiday sales. Impossible you might say! Well, if this were a huge company we would still be in meetings discussing designs, colors ….etc. This is NOT a big company, and I am the big cheese, head honcho, and chief. Now with my prototype tool in place I can manufacture a limited number of units and promise delivery for the holidays.

Smart Spot comes in two different materials. The lest expensive Smart Spots are injection molded bodies, filled with sand for weight. The more expensive Smart Spots are CNC Machined hand polished and sent out for decorating.

There is a Smart Spot for everyone.

story_txt:
Smart Spot a workstation for you!
Over engineered yes, solid as a rock yes! Worthy of you yes!
 
Made in America!
 
Smart Spot is a work station for your smart phone. Whether you are an iPhone junky, or Droid fan, you will find Smart Spot to be ideally suited for uses on your desk, at home in the kitchen, and on your night stand.
 
What does Smart Spot Do?
It gives you a platform for texting, email, twitter...here is what our beta group had to say;
Greg T (Sales Representive)
"Now my desk is hands free love it."
 
Robin (college student)
"It's unexpectedly handy."
 
Amy (pre-school teacher)
"It is perfect for face time."
 
Colin (Aviation Executive)
"Now a fixture on my desk."
 
Leah (my daughter)
"I need one for every room in my house."
 
Kelly (Randy's Keeper lol)
"I love it."
 
 Funds from this soft launch will allow us to complete automation of our assembly line, create point of sale packaging, and allow us to attend several trade shows so we can get Smart Spot to your local stores. There is so much to be done, we will need to hire more employees to make all this happen. Please support us. I have already invested over $20,000.00 dollars to get Smart Spot ready for this launch.  Let's put some people to work!
We need your support!
  
Smart Spot comes is two types, Injection molded plastic and CNC Machining.
 
CNC Machining out of billet aluminum makes a superior product, but cost quite a bit more.
 
Visit our Gallery to watch us machine Smart Spots.

Our Injection molded units are in production now, and offer a great looking product at real value price.
Visit our Gallery to watch us Mold Smart Spots.

 
 
 
The Story
 The honest story of how Smart Spot came to me began on a stormy Monday morning. I set off to work, stopped off at a local coffee shop for my coffee, and proceeded into the office. Like always, I started my day by placing my phone on my desk, my keys followed, then I spilled my coffee on my phone!
 So being a product designer, by noon I had a design of a platform on which I could safely set my phone -- so it would not get dunked again! Like always, I emailed my initial design to my favorite critic, my daughter. Her response was not very positive: “Dad all the phone accessories are so over done! There is literally an accessory for everything. Try something else!” 
Call me stubborn, but by the end of the day I had machined a prototype of Smart Spot. I personally fell in love with it, but what do I know? So, I showed it to my secretary. She laughed, and said, "What have you invented today?" It was time to close out my day -- I had literally done nothing on my to-do list. 
Spilling my coffee had turned out to consume my entire day. 
 After a few modifications to Smart Spot, by Friday that week I had in my hand a product I felt was worthy of showing to my biggest critic, my wife. You have to understand that for 26 years of marriage I have been bringing home inventions. Here's how it usually goes: I walk in the door with my prototype in my hand and say, "Honey, look at this!" Her normal response is, "Yea, that’s great, the trash needs to be taken out!" This time it was different, she set her phone on it and went back to texting. We were sitting at our kitchen counter, and then she moved into the kitchen and took it with her. Moving from there to the patio to enjoy some wine, I noticed she took it with her again. At this point, I still had not got much of a review from her. Joking around I said, "You know, I have to take that back to work on Monday right?" She responded, "You will bring it home Monday night, right?" --- I guess she likes it after all.
 That next week I made a few more prototypes, and made the decision to send one to my daughter and see what response I would get when she had one in her hand. A few days later her response came in a text message. “Okay, I got your Smart Spot in the mail. I need one for each room in my house and one for my office.” Ha! Now that both my critics have seen the light, the work begins! 
 Colors, material for the face, non skid for the base… these projects always seem so simple in the beginning -- and then everyone has an opinion. It gets overwhelming at times. Staying focused, I made the decision to carry my prototype with me and showed it to as many people as possible. When I ran out of friends, I went to Starbucks and sat at a table near the line of caffeine depleted people. In 45 minutes I had 22 people ask about Smart Spot. Normal response was, "Hey, that’s very cool! Where can I get one?" 
 Now I am all in! I ordered mold bases and made a prototype mold. Wow, that sounded so simple, didn’t it? Well, I spent an entire week, plus the weekend making that mold, a sum of 60+ hours. Not kidding, ask my wife, when I get consumed by something not much else in my life gets much attention. Sorry honey, I love you! 
 Now all this may sound crazy, but I truly love this product! 
My goal is simple: get it launched in time for holiday sales. Impossible you might say! Well, if this were a huge company we would still be in meetings discussing designs, colors ….etc. This is NOT a big company, and I am the big cheese, head honcho, and chief. Now with my prototype tool in place I can manufacture a limited number of units and promise delivery for the holidays. 
Smart Spot comes in two different materials. The lest expensive Smart Spots are injection molded bodies, filled with sand for weight. The more expensive Smart Spots are CNC Machined hand polished and sent out for decorating. 
There is a Smart Spot for everyone.

story: We are raising funds to build 2 test boats, 1 kayak and 1 canoe, from FSC certified bamboo plywood vaneers, bamboo cloth, and bio resins.  As longtime small boat enthusists and builders, we realize the need for more eco-friendly solutions in the marine industry to try and reduce our carbon footprint.  We are advocates of paddle power and hope to raise awareness of alternative construction methods, by producing a new line of eco-friendly canoes and kayaks.  Our small shop in NC is excited about the project and now all we need is a little extra funding from you to get it done!
story_txt: We are raising funds to build 2 test boats, 1 kayak and 1 canoe, from FSC certified bamboo plywood vaneers, bamboo cloth, and bio resins.  As longtime small boat enthusists and builders, we realize the need for more eco-friendly solutions in the marine industry to try and reduce our carbon footprint.  We are advocates of paddle power and hope to raise awareness of alternative construction methods, by producing a new line of eco-friendly canoes and kayaks.  Our small shop in NC is excited about the project and now all we need is a little extra funding from you to get it done!

story:
On New Year's Day 2013, three massive fires ripped through South Africa's largest slum, Khayelitsha, displacing over 5 000 people. From the smoke and ashes, Lumkani was born.


Lumkani is a tech start-up and social enterprise with one vision: to minimize the loss of life and property caused by fires in slums in South Africa and across the globe. 


We have engineered the world's first networked heat-detector designed specifically for a slum/informal settlement environment. 


With your contribution, we will distribute 3 000 of our detectors to some of South Africa's most high fire-risk households. Your funds will make 3 000 informal homes a safer place to live - the positive spill-over effects of this protection on individuals, community and our society, are profound.



And this is just the beginning!

Your contribution will be a significant step on our journey to be in every fire-risk home in our country, our continent and the WORLD! 

Slum fires are a global challenge. Below we have included infographics that highlight the scale of this challenge.



Within two weeks of distributing our first detectors in December 2014, we prevented two dangerous fires from spreading which would have ended in significant damage to the community. To date we have sold and distributed 1 200 devices to households across Cape Town.


Listen to Thamara Hela's story below. She is a leader of the UT Gardens community in Khayelitsha, the first neighbourhood to buy Lumkani detectors. She reflects on the day a fire broke out in her community which was detected by the Lumkani device.







Fires are a frequent and devastating occurrence in all informal settlements/slums across the globe. Burgeoning economic centers cannot accommodate the rate of influx of people, resulting in rapid densification of informal settlements. Slum fires spread as a result of:

  • The density of households
  • The use of high fire-risk cooking, lighting and heating methods
  • Flammable materials with which homes are built
The combination of these factors enable shack fires to spread rapidly - easily destroying hundreds of homes and displacing thousands of people in a single blaze. Watch the changing infographics below that paint a picture of the scale of the challenge.

IN SOUTH AFRICA:


Our detectors have been designed specifically for a slum/informal settlement environment. Given the smoke produced by cooking, lighting and heating in these areas, we use the rate-of-rise of temperature to detect fire and NOT smoke.

To address the speed at which fires spread in densely populated communities, our detectors are all connected through radio frequency (RF). When a fire starts in a home, the fire detector will ring alerting the family to the presence of the fire so they can contain it before it becomes unmanageable.

Within 20 seconds, the detector will trigger all devices within the community up to a 60-metre radius from the fire. This creates a community-wide alert to the spread of fires.

We have taken our system a step further...

We have developed a smart device which integrates with the mesh network of in-home fire detectors. This device sends text messages to community members with the location of the fire. Simultaneously, it stores GPS coordinates of the fire which we will send to the fire department in future, giving them accurate location information of fires in real-time. This information will enable fire personnel to be more proactive in dealing with disasters to mitigate societal risk and costs.

Through swift, networked early-warning we can make a significant impact on the number of spreading fires in the world's poorest communities.



                           

We are raising $45 000, which we will use to distribute 3 000 fire detectors to households across South Africa. Your contribution will go towards:

  • Manufacturing the fire detector
  • Getting each fire detector to 3 000 households
  • End-user education & training to maximize the benefits of the system
  • Installation and maintenance of the smart device (which covers 100 homes) in selected communities
  • Operational costs of making this happen

If we exceed our target, we will use the extra funds to get more detectors to more households, increasing the impact we hope to make. If we don't reach our target, we will use all of the contributions to get as many detectors as possible to our communities in South Africa.



                                

                                       

  • BDLive
  • Disrupt Africa
  • Co.EXIST
  • Venture Burn
  • Design Indaba



Please expect the delivery of perks by November 2015. The Chief Fire Officer! will travel in December 2015 or otherwise arranged.



We have a multi-disciplinary team consisting of 3 mechatronic engineers, an industrial designer, a social scientist and an entrepreneur/economist – with years of experience in our respective fields. We have diverse perspectives, backgrounds, training and experience which come together to tackle a very significant yet avoidable social challenge. We are all driven to contribute to positive social change.


Your support for our product and organization is immensely appreciated.


For all questions or comments, please email us on info@lumkani.com or visit www.lumkani.com


FAQ


1) I want this product in my community/country, is that possible?

Yes, please email us: info@lumkani.com for more information.


2) I want distribution rights to your product in my country/region, are you open to such agreements?
Yes, please email us: info@lumkani.com for more information.


3) How long does the battery on the device last?
The detector has a single AA battery and will last between 1 and 2 years. Replacement is simple after which the device will continue working as per usual.


4) Do all of your perks include shipping?
Yes, shipping costs are all included already.


5) What payment methods do you accept:
Indiegogo accepts Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express. We are also enabled to accept PayPal payments. For any queries, please contact info@lumkani.com 


6) I have more questions, who can I contact?
Please contact us and we'll get back to you within 24 hours: info@lumkani.com

story:
Hi everybody!

My name is Darkhan Amantayev. I do believe that I am one of those architects and engineers who are trying to make this world more sustainable.

Affordable housing has been a big problem since very long time for billions of people all over the world. Governments and organizatons are trying to solve this problem using a variety of financial tools and social programs. And often, the majority of people are left out of these programs.
For a last few weeks I have been developing a concept of contemporary affordable housing. It was not meant to be just the cheapest house designed ever. The main idea was to make it sustainable, energy-efficient, eco-friendy, easily transportable, durable, secure and self-contained - all in one. As a result, I have designed a very comfortable 26 sq. m. (280 sq. feet) minimalist, low-cost, sustainable house with a living room, kitchen, dining area, bathroom, bedroom, office area, hallway and technical room.
Please, find more details about this concept below:

Floor plan


Interior


Features

  • Used 40' HC shipping container will be used as a building structure. It is cheap (only 1000$-1500$ for building floor, walls and ceiling), fast (no need to build the walls from scratch), ideal for transportation (standard ISO shipping size), recycling (used), durable (hard metal) and seismic resistant (single rigid frame).

       

  • Insulation consists of a 50 mm polyurethane foam which gives an R-value of 2,8 which is sufficient for most climate regions. R-value of 3.5 (for very cold regions) can be easily obtained by increasing the thickness of foam to 60 mm. The polyurethane foam also perfectly serves as waterproofing for the metal parts (walls, ceiling, floor) of shipping container. Spraying of polyurethane foam is the most expensive cost item of the project, but has lots of advantages as compared with traditional rockwool insulation. Those are: low thermal conductivity (gives more clear width), life cycle (50 years), no additional works (vapor barrier) required.

         

  • The building can be installed on any flat surface with a help of 4 light concrete blocks that will serve as a foundation (permanent or temporary) and protect the floor beams of a shipping container from ground soil and water.
  • Internal partitions will be erected according to the KNAUF system (steel frame, insulation and gypsumboard) and painted white mat.
                                        

  • Wood siding will be installed on facade. Besides an architectural view it also gives a feeling of natural and will protect a shipping container from direct sun lights which may cause overheating.

         

  • Ready to install IKEA furniture 
  • Fully equipped kitchen (full size oven, sink, fridge, dish-washer, countertop from artificial stone)
  • Underfloor heating (gas boiler/LPG)

           

  • LED lights instead of CFL (fluorescent)

  • Additional (not included in budget): solar photovoltaic panels, solar water heating system, composting toilet, rainwater harvesting system.


What I Need & What You Get

I do need your support in building of the first Home C1 sample. The total cost of project is below 25000$. You can see the detail bill of quantities below:

The construction period will take 3 weeks. Extra week is needed for the furniture supply. All works will be managed and controlled by myself in order to track the building process (for tutorials) and achieve the best construction quality.
All backers by the end of campaign will get the most important - design data (SketchUp model, CAD drawings, specifications, images and detail bill of quantities), construction tutorial videos and tips produced as a result of campaign so that everyone will be able to build their own Home C1.
If I don't reach my goal you will automatically get a full refund.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would appreciate if you could make some noise about this campaign using share tools.
Your support is very important for me. In case of success, by your help, a small production company will be established. It will produce more Home C1s for people all over the world and more smart concepts will be offered.

FAQ

1. Do you sell these kind of houses?
- No, I don't. My goal is to raise a funding here in order to get this concept into the real and help people in building their own;
2. What is your profit from this campaign?
- I will not have any financial profit from this campaing. The bill of quantities and prices are given as they are, without a value added. It is a prime cost;
3. If I fund the whole campaign at once, will you be able to ship it to EU or US?
- The Home C1 is designed so that I can ship it to the most countries of the world;
4. Is it cold in winter and hot in summer?
- No, it is not. As described above, the whole container inside (walls, ceiling, floor) will be sprayed with a 50 mm polyurethane foam which gives an R-value of 2,8 which is sufficient for most climate regions. R-value of 3.5 (for very cold regions) can be easily obtained by increasing the thickness of foam to 60 mm. It will give an affect of thermos with a minimum energy loss;
5. Can it be registered as a permanent house?
- No, it can not, since it is installed on a temporary foundation. In some countires, it can be registered as a permanent house if it is installed on a permanent foundation.

Those are: low thermal conductivity (gives more clear width), life cycle (50 years), no additional works (vapor barrier) required.
         


The building can be installed on any flat surface with a help of 4 light concrete blocks that will serve as a foundation (permanent or temporary) and protect the floor beams of a shipping container from ground soil and water.


Internal partitions will be erected according to the KNAUF system (steel frame, insulation and gypsumboard) and painted white mat.

                                        



Wood siding will be installed on facade. Besides an architectural view it also gives a feeling of natural and will protect a shipping container from direct sun lights which may cause overheating.





         


Ready to install IKEA furniture 

Fully equipped kitchen (full size oven, sink, fridge, dish-washer, countertop from artificial stone)
Underfloor heating (gas boiler/LPG)
        

LED lights instead of CFL (fluorescent)
Additional (not included in budget): solar photovoltaic panels, solar water heating system, composting toilet, rainwater harvesting system.



  What I Need & What You Get I do need your support in building of the first Home C1 sample. The total cost of project is below 25000$. You can see the detail bill of quantities below:


The construction period will take 3 weeks. Extra week is needed for the furniture supply. All works will be managed and controlled by myself in order to track the building process (for tutorials) and achieve the best construction quality.
All backers by the end of campaign will get the most important - design data (SketchUp model, CAD drawings, specifications, images and detail bill of quantities), construction tutorial videos and tips produced as a result of campaign so that everyone will be able to build their own Home C1.
If I don't reach my goal you will automatically get a full refund.


 
  Other Ways You Can Help I would appreciate if you could make some noise about this campaign using share tools.
Your support is very important for me. In case of success, by your help, a small production company will be established. It will produce more Home C1s for people all over the world and more smart concepts will be offered.FAQ
1. Do you sell these kind of houses?
- No, I don't. My goal is to raise a funding here in order to get this concept into the real and help people in building their own;
2. What is your profit from this campaign?
- I will not have any financial profit from this campaing. The bill of quantities and prices are given as they are, without a value added. It is a prime cost;
3. If I fund the whole campaign at once, will you be able to ship it to EU or US?
- The Home C1 is designed so that I can ship it to the most countries of the world;
4. Is it cold in winter and hot in summer?
- No, it is not. As described above, the whole container inside (walls, ceiling, floor) will be sprayed with a 50 mm polyurethane foam which gives an R-value of 2,8 which is sufficient for most climate regions. R-value of 3.5 (for very cold regions) can be easily obtained by increasing the thickness of foam to 60 mm. It will give an affect of thermos with a minimum energy loss;

5. Can it be registered as a permanent house?
- No, it can not, since it is installed on a temporary foundation. In some countires, it can be registered as a permanent house if it is installed on a permanent foundation.

story:
An American Family Desperately Needs Your Help!

There’s No Work for an Over-Qualified Mature Engineer

Please Help to Save our Lives

ALuminary.us

Link to our Information Portal

To view videos Full Screen 1080p: play video, click on the gear at the bottom right of the viewer and select 1080p







THE ILLUMINATOR

 Terminates Pesky Shadows and Places Light where you need it when you need it.
The Illuminator is an all-purpose, LED work lamp created by ALuminary. This light destroys pesky shadows that intrude upon whatever work you may be doing. Metal work, electronic assembly, woodwork, automotive maintenance, gun cleaning and reloading, sewing, arts and crafts, and reading are all subject to being invaded by shadows that harsh lights tend to cast. The Illuminator obliterates shadows to the largest degree, so that you don’t even notice their presence. Typical task lights, and work lights can get in the way, create nasty glare, or create large shadows that force you to constantly be moving the light, or get so hot that they burn you when you bump into them. The Illuminator uses LEDs that will never get hot, no matter how long you leave them on, and the light head is crafted of fine materials that are easy on the hands and the eyes. The modern design makes The Illuminator versatile in function and appearance. The Illuminator is lightweight and collapsible for easy relocation and travel. It can fit anywhere in your shop or home, and it’s infinitely adjustable for your convenience. Kick those irritating shadows out of your workspace for good with The Illuminator!



How much we need, and where it is going

$6500 is the total amount that we are trying to raise. Firstly, the materials needed for the rewards of this project will be attended to. Secondly, with your help, we’ll be able to use the remainder of the money to fuel a marketing campaign that will get our product seen, at which point we will be able to start working again as orders come in.

Value of Your Contribution

Your contribution means absolutely everything to us. Your contribution translates directly to you helping to save our lives. Succeeding in a marketing campaign will allow us to work hard to realize our dreams, and give us the ability to generate enough sales to keep our home and workshop, as well as allowing us to return to being productive members of society.

URGENCY

Edi Murway is an over-qualified, senior engineer that has been unemployed for almost two years to date. His resume is impressive, but he cannot find work. Without a steady income for such a long period of time the situation has become very urgent. Having no insurance or ability to obtain insurance, Edi has begun to run out of insulin that he needs to survive, and other medications that he was placed on as of 2010. No medicine, no home, no workshop, no food. This project needs to be successful, as soon as possible.

PHILOSOPHY

The Murway family philosophy, and by relation, the ALuminary philosophy is to be loyal to the customer, as well as devotion to the creation of a reliable, durable, and quality final product.


Risks and Challenges

Our risks and challenges are relative to time. We don’t have much time left before we lose our home and workshop, and we cannot afford marketing today. However, we have a product that has been through R&D, and beta testing. We have developed our design process, our vendor list, and our bill of materials. We have the facility, machines, and tooling that we need to create the product, but nobody knows we exist! All developmental challenges have been confronted. We just need time, and professional help with marketing. That’s where you come in! As we approach our goal, every risk and challenge we face becomes smaller.


Ways You Can Help

Our needs are simply stated. Nobody knows who we are! We need professional help with marketing. For those who wish to purchase, or even those who cannot purchase, but are interested in our designs, we would love to hear your opinions. We love to hear feedback from you! Furthermore, liking and sharing on social media is a HUGE help! Getting the word out on Facebook and Twitter makes an enormous difference! So please, get the word out, tell your friends, send us messages! Thank you all so very much.

Where funds go if we don’t reach our goal

If we do not reach our goal, we will still push every penny that we get into the marketing venture.


Letters of Recommendation

 Edi’s extensive resume features a wide array of skill-sets and qualifications. The letters of recommendation that are attached were written by a two of Edi’s peers that are very formidable engineers. They respect Edi highly, and that fact is made evident by their letters.
Jim M.
Dave G.

Link to our List of Contributors
Link to our Information Portal


Reward Images & Descriptions:

Tier 1
Donating through tier one will get your name included on a “contributions to success” page on our website forever!

Tier 2
This tier includes the perk from tier one, and a pack of 2 original stickers designed by us!


Tier 3
T-Shirt and Sticker Pack
This tier features a selection between two shirt types, and a pack of two original stickers. These items will only be available to Contributors.
Choose between the Geek-Tastic, Player One, Legend of Zelda inspired design, or the Team Player design with included Pun!
Please let us know which design you are interested in, and what size you would like.
Edi@ALuminary.us
Tier one will be included unless you specify otherwise.


Tier 4

This tier features a selection between two Hoodie types, and a pack of two original stickers. These items will only be available to Contributors.
Choose between the Geek-Tastic, Player One, Legend of Zelda inspired design, or the Team Player design with included Pun!
This black hoodie has a built-in feature that allows the garment to more efficiently warm you up in the winter, generating more heat in direct sunlight.
Please let us know which design you are interested in, and what size you would like.
Edi@ALuminary.us
Tier one will be included unless you specify otherwise.


Tier 5-8
These tiers are inclusive of one to four Illuminator lighting packages, with your choice of T-shirt, and a pack of two original stickers. Tier one will be included unless you specify otherwise.

Table Not Included.
Please feel free to contact us for any reason.
www.ALuminary.us
Edi@ALuminary.us
775.849.2632
10am - 6pm PST

story:
Please fill the form on donate page for your add-ons, and be sure to fill in the correct price, we'll handle your requests after campaign.

 

Naval mines made a big difference during the Asymmetric Warfare. They are easy to deploy, inexpensive to manufacture, hard to remove, and can paralyze whole enemy fleet. Naval mine versus battleship is like David versus Goliath. By sinking numerous large battleships and advanced submarines, little things – naval mines – really made a big difference.

 


Chill Jimmy is a brand dedicated to making you smile.

Our designs are unique, inspired by a combination of life experiences, a love for quality craftsmanship, and of course, my dog Jimmy! Our goal is to guide you out of everyday boredom with the oneness of our products.

It all started with my dog, Jimmy. One day, after a long day of work, I came home. I saw my dog Jimmy chilling like always. So simple yet so captivated by the little things in life, and so unchanging in his happy demeanor.

I said to myself : "I want to step outside the monotony of everyday life. I want to see the joy in the little details, like Jimmy.”

When I gathered my partners and created Chill Jimmy, we truly embodied the spirit of the brand. Spending time enjoying one another and enjoying the small things. Hopefully our designs and passion will show through our products and have you saying, “I want to be like Jimmy!”
