story:
JUST ONE BEAK REMOTE, CONTROLS EVERYTHING
____

Take control of every connected device in your home and throw away all your current remotes – BEAK is your ultimate, truly universal remote control. 

BEAK: Making the Future of IoT Happen


If you are ready to take a step forward, then BEAK is the right option for you and your home. The BEAK interface is designed to be simple and easy to pick up, connecting with all sorts of smart devices so that you can run your home in a centralized way from any mobile device or computer.


A True Leader

Like a leader who takes command to lead, ControlAny’s smart home automation product BEAK redefines the concept of intelligent living with its tremendous adaptability and potential to seamlessly integrate with an array of devices. By controlling home lighting, color hue, temperature, blinds, projector and entertainment devices, BEAK emerges as a TRUE LEADER in home automation segment. Explore our highly innovative product that obeys over 65000+ commands from 2000+ models and 500+ brands.

BEAK is the smartest device on the block… no doubt it has garnered the media attention that it deserves, like any smart thing.


Our wireless Communications 

BEAK Supports trending RF protocols, (Bluetooth integration along with selection between ZigBee, WiFi, ZWave), these protocols are mainly used for Automation.(Home, Building, Industrial). These protocols also help to communicate with other 3rd party hubs & devices.


Explore the BEAK Skill Set

The BEAK’s indicative feature is that it integrates with devices such as the Philips Hue - to control home mood lighting, the Nest - to keep the house at optimum temperature, the Wink - for safeguard and security, the Sonos - for the best audio experience, the virtual assistant Amazon Echo, Flic, Samsung SmartThings and the list continues because of range of communication protocols used to cover all other major devices.


Brands - BEAK works with 

Control appliances including air conditions of all major brands with easy to use remote interfaces.

 


The Conception

A germ of the idea in the brain gives birth to a concept, and the journey begins. Given below are the various stages of the journey that BEAK underwent before it actually materialized into its present shape & form.


Design Elegance

Designed with elegance and aesthetics in mind, BEAK is shaped perfectly for traditional, contemporary and the modern homes of today, taking smart living one step ahead. The device is rich in looks and no bigger than an average router in size

 


The elegance is not restricted to a sleek device but also the richness of user interface. It comes with intelligent integration to IoT platforms, multiple user management, and superb learning skills.

 

ADVANCED FEATURES 

Unmatched Feature offering by BEAK.

BEAK's capabilities are not limited to current brands only, its One Key command feature helps configure a remote control with any current and future brand devices without any complex updates.

IoT device cloud integration makes BEAK connect with a completely new range of devices and continuously grows its capabilities without complex updates and take control by limiting user access as you like.


Skeleton view

BEAK™ syncs smoothly with all wireless protocols including Zigbee, Zwave, and BLE. It’s also enabled temperature and humidity detection, it can identify proximity when a person is nearby and it can ambient light sensors and also a built-in USB charging facility.

  • Capacitive Touch and the proximity sensor is merged completely with the main body to provide smart sensing controls.
  • Light, temperature, and humidity sensors are placed in such a way that its omnipresence provides correct environmental sensing data and easy access for users.
  • High-quality ABS parts are made with injection moulding and have sufficient draft to the demould plastic piece.
  • Transparent polycarbonate with IR pigment is having 100% of transmission because of good optical performance and self-extinguishing properties.
  • Aluminium metal ring at the centre of the main housing provides strength to complete monologue design and its multi-color display gets aligned with any interior theme.
  • Top Surface - Scratch resistant to withstand heavy use and include IR pigments to ensure 360 degrees’ long-range signal without interference.


A True Virtuoso

BEAK has the capability to wrest controls of appliances from their respective remotes and transfer them to you through an app on the mobile device of your choice. It works through ControlAny - an IoT platform.


Smart Features

The capability to learn and other smart feature like Schedule Engine, Recipe Engine, Advanced Sharing, Facebook ChatBOT & Voice control helps a consumer to sit back and relax.  

Schedule Engine

Plan and schedule all the tasks. Leave the execution to BEAK. All your things will be done on time, as you planned. When you have BEAK as a trusted assistant, you can afford to sit back and relax.

 

Recipe Engine

BEAK allows to create different set of recipes as per user’s routine and lifestyle. Which covers predefined set of rules for operating devices in sequence or parallel mechanism. Recipe sets up a perfect ecosystem for user to act as a virtual assistant.

 

 

Advance Sharing

The buck doesn't stop there. Once you have the controls, you can also share them with your near and dear ones.

 

Facebook Chat

Facebook ChatBot is your personal assistant available all the time and ready to perform tasks directed by you.

 

Voice Control

If you are occupied, just speak and it does what you say.


Future Ready

BEAK is future-ready - A brighter future is possible only if we all come together to build it. With the ConrolAny IoT platform, we can achieve something that more closely resembles the optimistic vision that we see in science fiction. Your home can become a wonderland of technology; we can help you to make it happen!


 

Demo Impact- BEAK early user feedback

BEAK in the Making

The first glimpse when we have got our prototype completed and hold it in our hand first time.

The BEAK Experience

Technical Specification


The Story of Evolution

From Idea to Execution. BEAK Evolution in terms of quality, offerings, technology etc over time to better serve its purpose. 


Product Timeline

Our Journey of Success
The start-off to take-off of as BEAK hurtles forward to fly unrestrained

Team

The Impact

A brighter future is possible only if we all come together to build it. With the BEAK platform, we can achieve something that more closely resembles the optimistic vision that we see in science fiction. Your home can become a wonderland of technology; we can help you to make it happen!

FAQs

Q: How do I get started with BEAK?

A: Get a BEAK, Unbox the package, Put the batteries, Switch on the device. You will see a glowing indication of start, download the app and you are ready."

Q: How many appliances can be controlled by BEAK?

A: BEAK is having the support of almost unlimited appliances, but it will limit on the mobile phone."

Q: How does the BEAK connect to my devices?

A: BEAK Only Connects to your Mobile Phone, Via ControlAny App.

Q: What is the range of the BEAK?

A: 30 meters. 

Q: What should I do, if not able to operate my TV with the app?

A: Maybe you're we are not supporting your appliance, but you can learn BEAK your remote. Just follow the instruction to Learn remote. Still not able to control write to us with TV model."

Q: How to connect it with my SmartThings or Wink Hub?

A: Start to add a procedure to your Hub and touch 3 times on the front of the BEAK. On successful connection, it will blink Green otherwise blink Red.

Q: How it works with SmartThing Hub?

A: BEAK will act as a multi-sensor device, and it will connect to the Hub as a smart sensor. It supports Temperature, Humidity, Heat index and ALS sensors.


Q: What is Refund & Return Policy?

A: You may return our product for a full refund for any reason within 7 days of receiving it. It must be returned in the original packaging. If the product is defective or damaged while delivery, we will pay for return shipping.

 

Q: How will I know if the BEAK is connected to my phone or my hub?

A: There is a unique color indication, mention in Manual, when BEAK connects to any Device.

Q: I’ve found a software bug (something is not working/functioning strangely), how can I report this?

A: support@controlany.com

 

Other ways you can Support-us

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of BEAK, especially people who are into smart home building and smart living already, the smoother this campaign will go. We appreciate all contributions, monetary and otherwise, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing!

You will see a glowing indication of start, download the app and you are ready."Q: How many appliances can be controlled by BEAK?A: BEAK is having the support of almost unlimited appliances, but it will limit on the mobile phone."Q: How does the BEAK connect to my devices?A: BEAK Only Connects to your Mobile Phone, Via ControlAny App.Q: What is the range of the BEAK?A: 30 meters. Q: What should I do, if not able to operate my TV with the app?A: Maybe you're we are not supporting your appliance, but you can learn BEAK your remote. Just follow the instruction to Learn remote. Still not able to control write to us with TV model."Q: How to connect it with my SmartThings or Wink Hub?A: Start to add a procedure to your Hub and touch 3 times on the front of the BEAK. On successful connection, it will blink Green otherwise blink Red.Q: How it works with SmartThing Hub?A: BEAK will act as a multi-sensor device, and it will connect to the Hub as a smart sensor. It supports Temperature, Humidity, Heat index and ALS sensors.Q: What is Refund & Return Policy?A: You may return our product for a full refund for any reason within 7 days of receiving it. It must be returned in the original packaging. If the product is defective or damaged while delivery, we will pay for return shipping. Q: How will I know if the BEAK is connected to my phone or my hub?A: There is a unique color indication, mention in Manual, when BEAK connects to any Device.Q: I’ve found a software bug (something is not working/functioning strangely), how can I report this?A: support@controlany.com Other ways you can Support-usBeyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of BEAK, especially people who are into smart home building and smart living already, the smoother this campaign will go. We appreciate all contributions, monetary and otherwise, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing!

story:
The "MyView Mirror" is the vision of Geneva Simmons and the late Dr. Jerome Alan Lechlak for...building character, confidence and charisma through capturing pictures.

The "MyView mirror" is a device that allows you to capture a view of yourself with no one else but you!  MyView is a patent protected technical combination of a mirror and an optical device/camera. 

It’s easy to operate because its hands free...which also makes it convenient.  It allows you to capture your subject in pictures from a front, back,  or side view. The MyView mirror relieves many of the typical selfie frustrations like:

1. holding your smartphone at odd angles

2. asking someone else to take numerous pics until you get the right one; and 

3. hoping they care enough to ensure the camera is in focus 

Initially, the MyView Mirror is 24" by 36" and can be hung anywhere.  With Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, the MyView Mirror and Smart App is secure!  Taking, sharing, and storing your selfie pictures has never been easier. 

You might be asking, what does this have to do with building character, charisma and confidence. Well it turns out that a mirror can actually work its magic in a positive direction, if you know how to use it. In research studies, obese adults and adolescents were told to look in a mirror and discuss their bodies in a positive way. After six mirror sessions, the subjects shifted their focus from what they thought was wrong, to what was right with their bodies. In other words, their self-talk changed. As a result, these obese people had an increase in their body satisfaction, and experienced less disgust and anxiety about their appearance. This was true even for those who were depressed!! Additionally, many clinical studies have shown that shifting to more positive self-talk, reduces anxiety and stress, especially in social situations.

So you see, the MyView Mirror is more than just a mirror that takes pictures, It’s also a great way to encourage young girls and women to be self-confident, strong, and believe in themselves no matter what their flaws are. The MyView mirror is a way to remind them that eating right, and maintaining a healthy lifestyle, is what keeps them looking fabulous for years to come!

As Yoko Ono said, "Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you’ll start to see a big difference in your life." 

Geneva didn't start this journey alone. When she first came up with the idea for MyView, she shared it with a dear friend of hers, Dr. Jerry Lechlak. He immediately went to work helping Geneva to my realize her vision, despite the fact he was battling stage 4 esophagus cancer. Dr. L provided the technical, physical and emotional support needed to finish the first working prototype. And as a result, Geneva was able to use the prototype for an interview to be a contestant on ABC's 'Shark Tank', as well as for the 2014 Black Enterprise Elevator Pitch contest. Unfortunately, the thrill and excitement of pitching her idea was overshadowed by the passing of Dr. L, one week earlier.

Jerome Alan Lechlak October 4, 1959 - May 9, 2014

Since that time, Geneva has been more committed than ever to finish what she and Dr. L started. With the assistance of an industrial engineering firm and optical manufacturer, significant improvements have been made in design and functionality, working out many of the early problems experienced as related to camera specifications and the placement of the optics on/in the mirror and frame.

story:
SugarCube was created to solve a very basic issue in many peoples lives around the world.  The availability of light allows people to study, be more productive and give a sense of security.  We are asking you to "Awaken the Light" for many people by contributing to this campaign. 

The SugarCube is a simple yet effective solar based product.  On a full charge it can provide up to 8 hours of light at 30 lumen of brightness.   It is designed to be very light and compact with only two modes of operation, charging and lighting.  To change between modes the user simply needs to just rotate the SugarCube.

Just Rotate


Available in 4 Fun Colours !


Specs: 

  • Dimensions: 11 x 11 x 11 cm
  • Solar Panel: 50 mA
  • Light: 5W, 30 Lumen LED
  • Weight: Aprox 250 gr
  • Battery: Fully circuit protected, Lipo 2200 mAh
  • Body: water resistant, Polpropylene
  • 100% Designed, and Assembled in Indonesia


We are a small Indonesian based start-up focusing on developing solar based products for people who have limited or no access to light.  All of our products are designed, manufactured and assembled in Indonesia with the intention of servicing people with our products world-wide, while creating jobs in Indonesia.
Currently we have partnered up with organizations who directly work with individuals who have limited or no access to light.  Your contributions will allow us to provide SugarCubes to these organizations and in turn they will distribute them to people who are need of light for free. As well, part of the proceeds will be used to continue developing more innovated solar based products.

Contribute to: "Buy 1 Give 1", Malawi

Malawi is an east African country that has been named the "poorest country in the world" by the World Bank in 2015. It is in desperate need for many basics including lighting. We have partnered with Ideologie International and African Bible Colleges, both of which operate in Malawi, to distribute SugarCubes in Malawi.  Your contribution to the PERK "Buy 1 Give 1 Malawi" will go directly to producing the SugarCube in Indonesia, creating much needed local jobs, AND sending a free SugarCube to people and families in Malawi via our partners Ideologie International and African Bible Colleges.

   

If you feel that you are unable to contribute to one our PERKS and you still what to help us out please contribute by sharing this campaign link https://www.indiegogo.com/at/sugar-cube  to your friends and family.


Apabila anda ingin melakukan transaksi dengan cara transfer, kirim email permintaan anda ke info@solarbank.xyz. Anda akan mendapat balasan bagaimana cara melakukannya.

Terima kasih.


Sugarcube Program Referral crowdfundingBantu KAMI untuk membantu ANDA!

Dapatkan Hadiah dan Uang tunai untuk setiap kali anda mempromosikan network Anda untuk berkontribusi pada kampanye crowdfunding kami

kontribusihanyaberlakuuntukSugarcubes , TidaktermasukTerimakasih Card , atau T -shirt

story:
25.02.2015
shipping will start approx. 20th of march as the production will be finish wih a delay of 3 weeks
   

Thanks a lot for all donaters. We did not reach the aim, but we started a small production anyway, as we have promised it during this campaign.

The production should be finish by the end of February. Shipping should start by beginning of March as everyting is going smooth in the production.

Sorry for  the delayed reply, but after a turbulent year 2014 we both needed a few days off



Get it once, use it forever!        

The reusable coffee capsule DELTA from mycoffeestar.com is made of stainless steel. You can refill this capsule as many times you want. You can save a lot of money by that and do something good for the environment. You don‘t produce any waste like you do with the aluminium capsules from Nespresso®. The capsule is healthy because no aluminium particles will get into your body.

Compatible with

Nespresso machines: Nespresso® U / Nespresso® UMilk / CitiZ / CitiZ&Milk / Pixie / Latissima / Latissima Plus / Cube / Essenza / Maestria / Grand Maestria / Capri / Inissia Produced by: Krups, Koenig, Turmix, DeLonghi, Magimix, Jura, Siemens, Miele

Optimized for economic
low shipping costs

The capsule is made of 3 parts to fit into an envelope and be shipped as a letter – which is more ecologic and costs five times less than a parcel!

Good for the environment

In 2013, Nespresso® sold over 8 billion coffee capsules and produced more than 7800 tons of aluminium waste. Lined up in a row the aluminium waste would encompass planet earth 6.5 times every year!

Good for your health

With disposable capsules aluminium and plastic particles get into your body. Our capsule is made of stainless steel which does not cause any health issues.

Save money
(approx. 100$ per kilo coffee)

With 1 kilo high quality coffee (approx. 20$) you can refill your reusable coffee capsule over 200 times (200 Nespresso® capsule cost approx. 120$).

Choose your own coffee

There are so many good coffees out there. With the reusable coffee capsule you can use any coffee you like.

   
GreenTec awards 2015

We are nominated for Europe‘s largest environmental and business prize. We are in the top 10! You can help us to win one of the most sought-after green awards in Europe.

>> Your vote for our idea:
greentec-awards.com/en/competition/online-voting-2015.html

>> Deine Stimme für unsere Idee:
greentec-awards.com/de/wettbewerb/online-voting-2015.html

About us

Three years ago, we developed the first reusable coffee capsule ALPHA made of medical stainless steel. We wanted to provide an alternative to the disposable capsules. Then, Nespresso® changed some machine parts in response to the increasing number of competitors. So we made the BETA capsule that fits for these new models of Nespresso® machines as well. In October 2013, the capsule became eco-champion in Germany! That was of course very encouraging and reassuring! But there were still tow limiting factors: the high shipping costs and ecological concerns. For many interested people from all over the world the shipping is too expensive and shipping a parcel from Switzerland to people in Europe and overseas is not very ecologic either. Beginning of 2014, we started working on a “technical” solution for these two problems and redesigned the capsule to get it shipped less costly and more eco-friendly. The result is the new capsule DELTA, made of stainless steel in three parts instead of two in order to fit it in a small envelope only 19mm high! This new design required a different production method (drilled with CNC instead of moulding with MIM) which makes the capsule more expensive but shipping costs are now five times cheaper!

Alpha capsule

The ALPHA capsule was the first one we developed 2 years ago. The capsule became ecotest winner in germany in october 2013

Beta Capsule

After Nespresso® made some changes to the machines we developed our second capsule BETA that fits into the new machines.

Erwin Meier Zürich, Sitzerland

Position: Inventor of the capsule, Packaging design, Photos and texts, Media work Professional background: Product Designer, Photographer, Watch designer

Sonja Eugen Innsbruck, Austria

Position: Multi-tasking fairy, Sales and distribution, customer care, website Professional background: Project manager for Human Resource Development and trainer for child safe guarding with a globally active child-care organisation, HRD Coordinator

What you get for your donation

Our goal for this crowd funding campaign is to raise USD 15 000 (which is for example 380 donations of USD 39). These funds will be invested in the tooling costs and to immediately start the first production series of DELTA capsules. If we reach this goal every donor will receive the selected set by end of February, at the latest. Please do not forget to indicate your shipping address and email address! (The coffee sample is to enjoy your first coffee and check the right grinding)

Set 1

For 39$ you get:
One reusable coffee capsule DELTA and one coffee sample.

Set 2

For 49$ you get:
One reusable coffee capsule DELTA a filling device and one coffee sample.

Set 3

For 79$ you get:
Two reusable coffee capsules DELTA a filling device and two coffee samples.

Set 4

For 99$ you get:
Three reusable coffee capsules DELTA a filling device and three coffee samples.

See how the capsule works
See how the capsule works
with filling device
Investment into our new project

One of our biggest concerns for the future is drinking water supplies. More than 700 million people on this planet do not have access to clean drinking water, most of them living in so called developing countries. Already now, we are working on an affordable water filter and we will invest 30% of the gains from this crowd funding campaign into this new project. The more people participate in this campaign, the more we can invest in the water filter project!

Help us spreading the message!

A lot of people are not aware of the ecological problem they are contributing to by using disposable coffee capsules. Only a few know that they ingest aluminium and plastic particles with every coffee from disposable capsules. Please, forward this link as well to your friends and people who are using a Nespresso® machine. With your help this message will make its way around the world! Thank you for your interest and please, feel free to contact us with your questions and ideas.

Important: Nespresso® is a third-party brand that is not in connection with mycoffeestar

story:
Product Review

Review by TheCooknShare 
 

Unboxing Video by Yasmin's Cooking

 

The Gold Chef infrared gas grill reaches temperatures of up to 800˚C/1472˚F within 2 minutes and enables you to easily and quickly grill the perfect steakhouse level steaks at home.Through the high temperatures your steak gets a delicious caramelized crust from the outside while its center stays juicy and tender.

Steak in the grill basket, bread in the thermo box, vegetables in the grill tray and sauce in the flavor tray. Prepare foods for 4 in 20 minutes. 

Temperature is critical for the perfect steak. With the Gold Chef thermometer, you could easily grill the Michelin level dishes.

Gold Chef has an original vertical grilling design and the grill basket with folding mechanism. With the vertical design, the dripping juices won’t flare up, creating hazardous fumes (PAHs), neither will them block in the grill, which makes it easier for cleaning. Meanwhile the flavor tray collects the meat juices so that you can use them for seasoning. 

Gold Chef is an effective device with an elegant design that will satisfy the demanding chefs. To further bolster the longevity of the appliance, Gold Chef is made entirely of 304 stainless steel that resists to high temperatures. More importantly, all the parts are dishwasher safe, easy to clean. 

 

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

What is the advantage of grilling with heat from the side?

Grilling ‘in front of an open fire’ is a very natural feeling. Gold Chef “enables you” to grill completely intuitively as you can watch what you’re doing and adjust things with just a slight twist of your wrist. Grilling with a side-burner is definitely healthier too as the dripping juices are collected for delicate sauces and don't flare up, creating hazardous fumes.

 

How can I use the 4 different grilling/temperature zones? And what are the benefits?

Grilling on the telescopic wave-rack with the Gold Chef grill-basket is safe and convenient. You can roast your beef in different heat-zones by changing positions as needed by simply turning and twisting the grill-basket. Use the bottom flavor-tray to collect sauces and for gratinated meet, veggies or bread. 
You can also use the Gold Chef -grill-tray on the top level just like a BBQ for roasting vegetables and hamburger buns while the rear zone is ideal for keeping food warm or simply letting your steaks relax.

 

How long does the Gold Chef need to be ready for use?

The Gold Chef gets fired-up by its built-in piezo ignition and reaches an insane 800°C or 1472 °F in about 2 minutes! On the other hand, due to its outside burner, the Gold Chef is thoroughly cooled down for transport in less than 15 minutes.

 

So what is the secret of perfect meat preparation?

Most BBQ grills reach temperatures of 400°C or 750°F whereas famous steakhouses grill at ultra-high temperatures of more than 1472°F(800°C) so as to seal the steaks by form of caramelization. This means the surface of the beef is roasted in less than 90 seconds each side without the inside being overcooked. The caramelized top crust retains the moisture to achieve a perfect, juicy and tender steakhouse taste. Plus four grilling zones mean you can perfectly prepare vegetables, bread or fish too, giving you a whole meal in just a few minutes.

 

How much does Gold Chef weigh?

The entire body weighs only 8 kg/17.5 pounds and is made of high quality stainless steel. This material is durable and light for ultimate portability. You can fire up your Gold Chef wherever you want to: at a picnic party, on a boat or on a caravan trip, to name but a few examples.

 

Which complementary products do you offer?

We are planning to optimize your grilling experience even further by offering the following complementary products: 
a) The Gold Chef core temp meter. This accessory can be inserted directly through the grill-basket and in to the meat when grilling to ensure the steak is cooked to perfection. 
b) The Gold Chef HEF grill tray. It offers a griddle-zone on top of the burner for roasting buns, potatoes, corn-on-the-cob and other vegetables 
c) The insulated thermo box with its built-in thermometer fits neatly in the Gold Chef resting-zone. It warms up to 120°C (250°F) with indirect heat – the ideal temperature to allow your steak to relax. It’s stylish design will also look great on your table.

 

How long can I use the gas cartridge for?

The inserted gas-cartridge offers approximately 2 hours of operation. With an average grilling time of 5 minutes for a large steak, one cartridge will last for 20 grilling-sessions (based on a large steak taking 5 minutes).

 

Can I also connect a large gas cartridge?

Yes. You can connect any large gas bottle via a hose and standard valve.

 

Why there are Beefchef and Goldchef?

Both Beefchef and Goldchef are legally owned, designed, manufactured and sold by Higold group. As the the brand Beefchef has been registered already in some countries, we decided to update our brand from Beefchef to Goldchef to keep our brand consistency globally!

 

Do you ship internationally? Are shipping prices higher?

Yes, we will ship internationally and shipping costs will be added on top. Gold Chefs will be shipped from a China base all over the US and the same applies for shipping to EU countries at no extra charge.

 

What if there is an issue with my Gold Chef? Does it come with a warranty?

Yes. The purchase price includes a one year international warranty for the Gold Chef, which will be extended to two years’ warranty if you register your Gold Chef directly after purchase. If you have any enquiries please contact us directly via our website at http://www.higold.com.cn/en/index.asp
story_txt:
Product Review
Review by TheCooknShare 
 


Unboxing Video by Yasmin's Cooking
 
The Gold Chef infrared gas grill reaches temperatures of up to 800˚C/1472˚F within 2 minutes and enables you to easily and quickly grill the perfect steakhouse level steaks at home.Through the high temperatures your steak gets a delicious caramelized crust from the outside while its center stays juicy and tender.Steak in the grill basket, bread in the thermo box, vegetables in the grill tray and sauce in the flavor tray. Prepare foods for 4 in 20 minutes. Temperature is critical for the perfect steak. With the Gold Chef thermometer, you could easily grill the Michelin level dishes.Gold Chef has an original vertical grilling design and the grill basket with folding mechanism. With the vertical design, the dripping juices won’t flare up, creating hazardous fumes (PAHs), neither will them block in the grill, which makes it easier for cleaning. Meanwhile the flavor tray collects the meat juices so that you can use them for seasoning. Gold Chef is an effective device with an elegant design that will satisfy the demanding chefs. To further bolster the longevity of the appliance, Gold Chef is made entirely of 304 stainless steel that resists to high temperatures. More importantly, all the parts are dishwasher safe, easy to clean.      Frequently Asked Questions What is the advantage of grilling with heat from the side?Grilling ‘in front of an open fire’ is a very natural feeling. Gold Chef “enables you” to grill completely intuitively as you can watch what you’re doing and adjust things with just a slight twist of your wrist. Grilling with a side-burner is definitely healthier too as the dripping juices are collected for delicate sauces and don't flare up, creating hazardous fumes. How can I use the 4 different grilling/temperature zones? And what are the benefits?Grilling on the telescopic wave-rack with the Gold Chef grill-basket is safe and convenient. You can roast your beef in different heat-zones by changing positions as needed by simply turning and twisting the grill-basket. Use the bottom flavor-tray to collect sauces and for gratinated meet, veggies or bread. You can also use the Gold Chef -grill-tray on the top level just like a BBQ for roasting vegetables and hamburger buns while the rear zone is ideal for keeping food warm or simply letting your steaks relax. How long does the Gold Chef need to be ready for use?The Gold Chef gets fired-up by its built-in piezo ignition and reaches an insane 800°C or 1472 °F in about 2 minutes! On the other hand, due to its outside burner, the Gold Chef is thoroughly cooled down for transport in less than 15 minutes. So what is the secret of perfect meat preparation?Most BBQ grills reach temperatures of 400°C or 750°F whereas famous steakhouses grill at ultra-high temperatures of more than 1472°F(800°C) so as to seal the steaks by form of caramelization. This means the surface of the beef is roasted in less than 90 seconds each side without the inside being overcooked. The caramelized top crust retains the moisture to achieve a perfect, juicy and tender steakhouse taste. Plus four grilling zones mean you can perfectly prepare vegetables, bread or fish too, giving you a whole meal in just a few minutes. How much does Gold Chef weigh?The entire body weighs only 8 kg/17.5 pounds and is made of high quality stainless steel. This material is durable and light for ultimate portability. You can fire up your Gold Chef wherever you want to: at a picnic party, on a boat or on a caravan trip, to name but a few examples. Which complementary products do you offer?We are planning to optimize your grilling experience even further by offering the following complementary products: a) The Gold Chef core temp meter. This accessory can be inserted directly through the grill-basket and in to the meat when grilling to ensure the steak is cooked to perfection. b) The Gold Chef HEF grill tray. It offers a griddle-zone on top of the burner for roasting buns, potatoes, corn-on-the-cob and other vegetables c) The insulated thermo box with its built-in thermometer fits neatly in the Gold Chef resting-zone. It warms up to 120°C (250°F) with indirect heat – the ideal temperature to allow your steak to relax. It’s stylish design will also look great on your table. How long can I use the gas cartridge for?The inserted gas-cartridge offers approximately 2 hours of operation. With an average grilling time of 5 minutes for a large steak, one cartridge will last for 20 grilling-sessions (based on a large steak taking 5 minutes). Can I also connect a large gas cartridge?Yes. You can connect any large gas bottle via a hose and standard valve. Why there are Beefchef and Goldchef?Both Beefchef and Goldchef are legally owned, designed, manufactured and sold by Higold group. As the the brand Beefchef has been registered already in some countries, we decided to update our brand from Beefchef to Goldchef to keep our brand consistency globally! Do you ship internationally? Are shipping prices higher?Yes, we will ship internationally and shipping costs will be added on top. Gold Chefs will be shipped from a China base all over the US and the same applies for shipping to EU countries at no extra charge. What if there is an issue with my Gold Chef? Does it come with a warranty?Yes. The purchase price includes a one year international warranty for the Gold Chef, which will be extended to two years’ warranty if you register your Gold Chef directly after purchase. If you have any enquiries please contact us directly via our website at http://www.higold.com.cn/en/index.asp

story:
The Very Serious Button is a big red button for your computer, with industrial flavor and a versatile USB interface.

The Very Serious Button works with any application that accepts input from a USB game controller or keyboard. Map it to a keyboard key or joystick button, or have it send a predefined keystroke sequence every time it's pressed (or slapped, or fist-pounded).

The button stores its configuration internally, so after the button is configured using the included utility, it needs no software or special drivers to run on any (modern) operating system.

What you get

(All amounts below include shipping within the US)

A $30 contribution gets you one Very Serious Button. Select a CNC-engraved label plate from these choices:

...or add $5 and specify your own text. 

Early bird special: five units will be available at $24. (SOLD OUT)

All Very Serious Buttons will ship by July 26th, with "early bird" backers receiving their units first.

Other perks

Want to help out, but not looking to blow $30 on a novelty input device? Consider these alternative options starting at a few bucks.

Very Serious Button sticker

A full-color, die-cut, only-ever-so-slightly-offensive vinyl sticker to slap on a binder, laptop lid, or other flat surface.  About 3" high.

A $3 contribution gets you one sticker. Additional stickers can be had for $1.50 each. Stickers will ship within 3 weeks of campaign close.

Dummy button

Fully wireless, unlimited range, no USB port required, never needs sharpening!

A "display model" with no cable or internal electronics. All the visual gag value of a normal Very Serious Button, but without any useful functionality whatsoever. 
(DIYers take note: dummy units do have working switch contacts inside...)

An $16 contribution gets you one dummy button. Add $5 for custom text. Ships by July 12th.

Q&A

  • Q: Who are you and what are your qualifications?
    A: I'm Greg, I have a degree in physics, and I make a living developing hardware and software for physics research, including some parts for a certain rather large science machine.
  • Q: Why are you doing this?
    A: As a stepping stone to more ambitious projects. The Very Serious Button won't change the world or revolutionize a product category, but it is a means of building relevant experience so as to be better-prepared once an opportunity comes to do so comes along. This project is a sampler plate of marketing, DFM, sourcing, manufacturing and distribution tasks at the right scale to be appropriate to my resources yet still present a challenge. I get experience points, you get a unique and functional gadget -- win-win, right?
  • Q: What operating systems will be supported?
    A: The configuration software will work with current versions of Windows, Linux and OS X. Once Very Serious Button is configured, no special software or drivers are required to use it, and it will function with any computer that supports a USB keyboard or game controller.
  • Q: What about backers outside the US?
    A: Perks can be shipped to any country in the Universal Postal Union other than Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan or Syria. For up to 10 stickers, add US$2 to your pledge to cover additional postage. For a Very Serious Button, add US$10.
  • Q: How do I specify my choice of label plate or my text for custom engraving?
    A: At the end of the campaign, backers will receive a link to a web form for this purpose. The form will also provide the opportunity for non-US backers to confirm proper formatting of their shipping addresses.
  • Q: Is this thing hackable?
    A: Naturally! For those who like to tinker, the source code for the Very Serious Button firmware as well as the configuration utility will be released under open-source licenses, and it will be possible to re-flash the firmware over the USB interface.
  • Q: What if I want more than one perk?
    A: You can hit the "Contribute Now" button again and make a separate contribution (yes, it's a little clumsy).

story:
Community-Wide Shoe Box Packing Party Will Hit Goal of 100,000 Boxes on October 3-4,2014

Millions of kids around the world lack the most basic necessities--like a simple bar of soap.  Millions have never owned their own toothbrush.  Millions can't go to school because they lack a pencil--A PENCIL!

My name is Kathy Schriefer and back in 1995 when I put three teddy bears into three shoe boxes to be sent to needy children through Operation Christmas Child I never dreamed what God would do in my life through this simple project.   I packed five boxes in 1996 and in 1997 I decided to gather items all year with the goal of packing 40 boxes.  Instead, God blessed me with 80 boxes that year, 125 the next, 200 the next....

And before I knew it God was allowing me to pack thousands of boxes.

In 2009 we hosted our first Community-Wide Shoe Box Packing Party and were thrilled to see several hundred volunteers turn out to pack 5,577 boxes in under 5 hours.  Each of these boxes contains paper, pencils, pens, crayons, a toothbrush, soap, washcloth, a stuffed animal, a clothing item, and a few simple toys.  But these are real treasures to the children who receive them--many of whom have never had a gift of their own.

The video on this site shows the 2010 packing party where we packed 12,670 boxes.  In 2011 we were blessed with 16,145 and were amazed with 21,106 in 2012.  

At our 5th annual packing party in 2013 we were blessed to watch nearly 700 volunteers from our community come together to pack 22,491 boxes.

From 2009-2013 we blessed 77,989 children and...if God allows us to pack at least 22,011 boxes this year...we will hit the 100,000 mark.  

We need you to join with us and TOGETHER we will ROCK each BOX.

(you can learn more about Operation Christmas Child at www.samaritanspurse.org/occ )

The Problem

Over the years some donors have helped with this project--mostly with the donation of stuffed animals for the boxes--but I have personally funded most of the items.
This year I am retiring from my job as a school nurse and we need to find a broader source of funding.  If 200 people would each donate $20.00 we would have all the soap and toothbrushes for 23,000 children.

What We Need 

  • We will purchase 3 oz. bars of recycled soap from a non-profit organization at a cost of 7 cents each.  
  • Nice individually wrapped toothbrushes with 43 tufts can be obtained in bulk for about 11 cents each.
  • TOGETHER we can make a difference
  • If this campaign is blessed to raise funds beyond our $4000 goal, we will use them toward the purchase of other items needed for our packing party.  We hope to launch future funding campaigns to finance those items also.

What It Means

These boxes bring hope and love to children who are victims of war and poverty in the most desperate circumstances around the world.  Each box affects not only the child who receives it but their family and their entire community.

  • Having a simple bar of soap can prevent disease transmission.
  • In a country where HIV affects up to 50% of the population, being able to own your own toothbrush instead of sharing one with others can be lifesaving.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially at this time--

  • Share this page with your friends or on social media.
  • Pray for this project as we trust God to provide all the needed items.

TOGETHER--watch God's blessing as this community ROCKS the BOXES

story:
CONTRIBUTION INSTRUCTIONS: When contributing on Indiegogo and one of the PERKS asks you to give a delivery address, simply insert our address so we know it is a donation: STRAND Energy Corporation, 8985 Beachwood Road, Wasaga Beach, Ontario L9Z 2X9    THANK YOU!


Click below & have a listen to our Campaign on Classical 102.9 FM


Check Us Out On Rogers TV Community Georgian Bay Life!

http://rogerstv.com/page.aspx?lid=237&rid=7...

 

   

   

     Choose Any One of These Beautiful  E-Cards to                       Send, To That Special Someone! 


          

   

      

 

 

        

    

   

    

         

    

    

    

    

    

    


         GET THE ALL NEW 5 HOUR EMERGENCY LED LIGHT BULB

                                AHEAD OF OUR RETAIL LAUNCH !!!

The New 5 Hour Emergency LED light bulb is not only a energy saving long life (40,000 hours) LED light bulb , but it also still works when the power goes out.

When the power fails, just walk over to the light switch and switch it the other way, 5 Hour Emergency Light Comes on and can be turned on and off like a normal light without power, The light will last between 4 to 8 Hours , and is recharged by normal use.

The Retail Price is $19.95 individually.

Pack of 10 Price is $149.50. 

Pack of 20 Price is $265.00        

 

     TWO Like Minded Partners, ONE Great Cause!  

We are working with Elephant Thoughts who started out with a mission to set up schools which they soon learned to transform into community hubs. STRAND, with your help, hopes to contribute to Elephant Thought's sustainable communities by replacing their kerosene lamps and stoves with our Solar Charging Kits that run a low-power LED lighting system and an Enviro-Fit clean burning stove. As an added bonus, our Solar Charging Kits will also charge smart phones, generating much needed income that can double their quality of life.

                                         

                                         

The Negative Impact of Kerosene Lamps Around   The World & Our Planet: 

  • Kerosene lamps produce inferior light (typically 2 lumens as compared to 90 lumens in a typical 60 watt bulb), creates black carbon which is 270 times worse then CO2 and dramatically affects health (especially for women who need to cook meals and children who need to study). 
  • There are 780 Million women & children still today who rely on kerosene lamps, and 4.3 million deaths reported from the effects of inhaling kerosene. 
  • Just having 4 hours of exposure to kerosene lamps is equivalent to smoking 2 packs of cigarettes. 

     

DID YOU KNOW THAT ELIMINATING KEROSENE WOULD REMOVE 58% OF                              CO2 EMISSIONS FROM RESIDENTIAL LIGHTING?


Who We Are?

We are Strand Energy Corporation as social entrepreneurs who specializes in the sales and service of solar power systems and other renewable sources (wind+solar). 

No matter what side of the climate change science argument you agree with, STRAND Energy believes it is always prudent to look after our planet and we have made renewable sources of energy our business. Our Mission is to bring affordable, clean energy to the world- one home at a time and in a manner that is responsible, sustainable and affordable. In honour of the upcoming UN Climate Change Conference and the world religious Festivals, including our own allegiance to Christmas, we feel it is important  to give back to the people of OUR WORLD.   


      There Are Simple Ways You Can Contribute Today To Make A Positive Impact On Many Lives In                                  Our World! 

  1. Share the News!  Email your network of contacts with our information. 
  2. Like us on Facebook and Twitter account.
  3. Make a Donation. (Every Dollar Counts)

                 

       SO REACH OUT & SHARE THE GIFT OF LIGHT THIS HOLIDAY SEASON
       

5 Donation Price Points For Gifts   You May Chose To Contribute:  

                                      #1.       JUST $2                                        

                    

                                              I NEED A NAME SUGGEST ONE
                      

          #2 .    $10.OO GETS YOU A 5-HOUR EMERGENCY LED LIGHT BULB

                       

                                                  

                           

                    #3.     $12.00 BUYS A INFLATABLE SOLAR LED LIGHT


                                                           

   REPLACES ONE KEROSENE LAMP IMPROVING BREATHING CONDITIONS


       #4.  $85.00 FOR A MICRO SOLAR LED LIGHTING & CHARGING KIT  

    The Strand Micro Solar Kit will supply emergency LED lighting, camp lighting, cell     phone & tablet charging, built-in FM radio mp3

                                            The Micro Solar Kit consists of

                                          - 10 watt, 17.5 Volt Solar Charging Panel

                           - 12Volt, 7 Amp Hour, maintenance-free lead acid battery

               - Built-in controller 3Amp / 12Volt with 3 DC output ports 1 Amp / 12Volt

                                         - 2 USB charging ports DC 5Volt / 1Amp

                                       - Multi-port cell phone charging accessory

                        - Mutifunction, 1-Speaker FM Radio (with MP3 / SD card slot)

                                                       - 3 X 3Watt light, cable & bulb

                                       

                

#5.  $145.00 FOR A MINI SOLAR LED LIGHTING AND CHARGING KITS

The STRAND Mini Solar Kit will supply emergency lighting, camp lighting, extra   reading light or general home illumination, cell or tablet charging built-in FM radio.

                                                The Mini Solar Kit consists of:

                                       - 18 watt, 18Volt Solar Charging Panel

                 - 12Volt, 18Amp Hour, maintenance-free lead acid battery

       - Built-in controller 12Volt / 3Amp & 6 DC output ports 12Volt / 1Amp

                                                   - 2 DC equipment ports

                      - 2 USB charging ports 5Volt / 1Amp (can charge iPhone)

- Mutifunction 2-Speaker FM Radio (with MP3 / SD card slot / Headphone Jack)

                              - 1 AC cigarette lighter port (to use AC devices)

                 - 3 X 3Watt light, cable & bulb, 3 X 5Watt light, cable and bulb


                                           

  • Any donation under $10, not specifically allocated, will go toward buying extra LED  bulbs to keep a ready stock for the local school's community needs. 

  • Lastly, For Every 10 units of Solar Charging kits we sell, STRAND Will Donate 1 Unit to Nepal.                                                


                                   DONATE A SOLAR CHARGING KIT TODAY! 

To Support STRAND ENERGY’s Conservation Efforts In Nepal, & We Will Send An E-Card To Announce The Gift! You May Choose To Send The E-Card On Any                 Date. On Christmas or Your Own Special  Holiday Festival!


CORPORATE VALUE PACKAGES

           BEHIND THE SCENE WITH 

                       OUR TEAM! 
Together We work hard as a Team. We inspire and guide one another towards a common goal for everyone’s benefit. We Build our team up here at  STRAND Energy. There is a saying that states “Be the change that you want to see”!

    SHARE THE GIFT OF LIGHT AROUND                   OUR WORLD TODAY! 

 



  • STRAND Energy Corporation Would Like To Thank All Are AMAZING Supporters Throughout Our Campaign,  They Have Truly Shared The Gift of Light In Our Hearts This Holiday Season,                                    Thank You To All!

         GET THE ALL NEW 5 HOUR EMERGENCY LED LIGHT BULB



                                AHEAD OF OUR RETAIL LAUNCH !!!








The New 5 Hour Emergency LED light bulb is not only a energy saving long life (40,000 hours) LED light bulb , but it also still works when the power goes out.


When the power fails, just walk over to the light switch and switch it the other way, 5 Hour Emergency Light Comes on and can be turned on and off like a normal light without power, The light will last between 4 to 8 Hours , and is recharged by normal use.


The Retail Price is $19.95 individually.


Pack of 10 Price is $149.50. 


Pack of 20 Price is $265.00        
 

     TWO Like Minded Partners, ONE Great Cause!  









We are working with Elephant Thoughts who started out with a mission to set up schools which they soon learned to transform into community hubs. STRAND, with your help, hopes to contribute to Elephant Thought's sustainable communities by replacing their kerosene lamps and stoves with our Solar Charging Kits that run a low-power LED lighting system and an Enviro-Fit clean burning stove. As an added bonus, our Solar Charging Kits will also charge smart phones, generating much needed income that can double their quality of life.
                                         
                                         

 


The Negative Impact of Kerosene Lamps Around   The World & Our Planet: 










Kerosene lamps produce inferior light (typically 2 lumens as compared to 90 lumens in a typical 60 watt bulb), creates black carbon which is 270 times worse then CO2 and dramatically affects health (especially for women who need to cook meals and children who need to study). 
There are 780 Million women & children still today who rely on kerosene lamps, and 4.3 million deaths reported from the effects of inhaling kerosene. 
Just having 4 hours of exposure to kerosene lamps is equivalent to smoking 2 packs of cigarettes. 




     
DID YOU KNOW THAT ELIMINATING KEROSENE WOULD REMOVE 58% OF                              CO2 EMISSIONS FROM RESIDENTIAL LIGHTING?







Who We Are?






We are Strand Energy Corporation as social entrepreneurs who specializes in the sales and service of solar power systems and other renewable sources (wind+solar). 




No matter what side of the climate change science argument you agree with, STRAND Energy believes it is always prudent to look after our planet and we have made renewable sources of energy our business. Our Mission is to bring affordable, clean energy to the world- one home at a time and in a manner that is responsible, sustainable and
affordable. In honour of the upcoming UN Climate Change Conference and the world religious Festivals, including
our own allegiance to Christmas, we feel it is important  to give back to the people of OUR WORLD.   








      There Are Simple Ways You Can Contribute Today To Make A Positive Impact On Many Lives In                                  Our World! 






Share the News!  Email your network of contacts with our information. 
Like us on Facebook and Twitter account.
Make a Donation. (Every Dollar Counts)


                 


       SO REACH OUT & SHARE THE GIFT OF LIGHT THIS HOLIDAY SEASON


       





5 Donation Price Points For Gifts   You May Chose To Contribute:  

                                      #1.       JUST $2                                        

                    

                                              I NEED A NAME SUGGEST ONE

                    #3.     $12.00 BUYS A INFLATABLE SOLAR LED LIGHT

ONE KEROSENE LAMP IMPROVING BREATHING CONDITIONS

story:
​

An interactive home monitoring owl.

 

Today more and more objects are connected, but none of them truly connects with you.

Ulo creates a unique bond, like no other device.

It redefines the way you interact with objects: an organic communication.

Evidence shows that a number of facial expressions are related to similar emotions across cultures. The language of our eyes is one of the most powerful and effective tools of non-verbal communication.

Eye expressions are an efficient, natural and universal way to connect instantly with Ulo.

 

  • Height: 9cm / 3,5inch

  • Diameter: 9cm / 3,5inch

  • Weight: 165g / 0.36 lbs (without batteries) 

  • Body material:  ABS-PC plastics

  • Screens: 2x round LCD, 220x220 resolution

  • High resolution camera: 2 Mega Pixel

  • Inbuilt microphone

  • Processor: Qualcomm Snapdragon 212 Series (APQ8009)

  • 2.4GHz Wi-Fi (IEEE 802.11 b/g/n)

  • Bluetooth BLE 4.1 (only for mobile configuration)

  • RAM: 1GB

  • Internal memory: 8GB EMMC + microSD card slot

  • Charging: standard micro USB charger 5V-2A (not included)

  • Batteries: 3 rechargeable NiMH batteries LR06 minimum 1900 mA (not included)

  • Ulo services are accessible on a secure webpage and dedicated mobile apps for iOS & Android, so it is compatible with every device with a web browser.

Ulo communicates through eye expressions. A webpage and mobile apps allows you to customize eyes color, shape and size to match your interior and your taste. No logos or icons are displayed on the screens, but you instantly know what Ulo has in mind. 

For instance, when the battery is low (under 10%) Ulo is tired, 

Ulo blinks when you take a snapshot, 

its eyes follow your movements and Ulo squints when someone is watching live video. 

Random animations add that extra spark of life which makes Ulo unique.

Eye expressions are possible thanks to new round LCD screens originally manufactured for next-generation smartwatches.

This is an example of the default tap system. You can configure custom (and secret) sequences to trigger On/Off & Alert Mode functions.

 

 

A double tap on Ulo forehead will activate the Alert Mode.

Once your smartphone leaves your wifi network, every movement will be recorded in an animated gif and sent via email.

Eye expressions are not displayed.

When your smartphone (and thus yourself) reconnects to your wifi network, the alert mode is disengaged.

 

 

It is a very simple way to check what is going on in another room or when you’re away. Ulo streams directly (video & audio) on a secure webpage or mobile apps. This feature is perfect to use Ulo as a baby cam.

Ulo only stores a few minutes of video locally.

With Direct Access, think of Ulo as your own personal server, so there are no extra fees.

The owl only sends data to your secure devices when needed. Each device has its own password.

Ulo is easy to set up, a detailed user guide is included in the box and video tutorials are available on our website. 

 

In everyday use, with eye expressions, Ulo needs to be recharged every 2 days. Of course, you can also leave Ulo plugged in all the time on a USB port.

On a full charge, Ulo can last 2 days in Alert Mode and 4 hours in Live-Stream.

Ulo works with 3 rechargeable NimH batteries (LR06) minimum 1900 mA. These rechargeable batteries are not provided but can easily be found in any supermarket.
You don't need to remove the NimH batteries to recharge them. Only plug Ulo to a power source.

 

 

Ulo can lay on a flat surface or be hanged on a wall. A set of discrete adhesive neodymium magnet allows you to stick Ulo on every surface effortlessly.

 

 

Ulo services are accessible on a webpage, so it is compatible with every device with an internet connection and a browser.

Dedicated mobile apps for iOS & Android:

 

CLOUD ACCESS

It is extremely simple to use and only one registration on a cloud server is needed. Then your Ulo will keep in touch with you wherever you go with an easier authentication for the next uses. Cloud Access is compatible with all routers.

DIRECT ACCESS

When you are connected on the same Wi-Fi network, Direct Access is the best way to discover the full potential of Ulo. With the new “access from everywhere” option, you are able to see what's going on in your home from the other side of earth or from your favorite supermarket!

This configuration needs Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) enabled on your router, most of them can use it.

With the new “access from everywhere” option, you are able to see what's going on in your home from the other side of earth or from your favorite supermarket!This configuration needs Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) enabled on your router, most of them can use it.
Refund and Return Policy
Our refund policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately, we can’t offer you a refund. To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase. For returns that are not affiliated with warranty cases we will require you to ship the unit back.

story:
Allie and Paul need your help to fix structural issues in their home and get their apartment rented again.  Paul's back is injured, their wallets are empty and they need help. Our goal is really $10,000 as that is the amount needed to get to the next step.  We thought we would start with $5000 and see what happens!

 

Here's where the money will go

  • support beams in basement and first floor to make the building safe
  • roof re-inforced and sealed
  • apartment re-wired
  • apartment bathroom finished
  • kitchen completed in their unit
  • sound proofing and drywall celing between units

 

The Impact

Allie and Paul have been living in renovations for four years and the news just keeps getting worse in their house.  The impact of your help is indescribable.  It gives them a future:

  • Allie gives a trememndous amount to her community and friends.  She is running out of energy from living in a home that is not a home.  She needs your help.
  • So many people have asked how they can help, and so a community build will occur, however, without money for materials there can be no community build.
  • This campaign will give them the ability to move forward, renting out their apartment again and being able to focus on smaller projects in the house.
  • Due to Paul's back injury, he cannot work and now has to re-train in a new field.  Living on one self-employed income is straining them and they have no extra for renovations.

Other Ways You Can Help

If money is not your contribution, please spread the word about the campaign and let us know if you would like to be involved in the build.

A Note from Allie's friends, Sarah, Lisa and Sandra:

This campaign: If you are visiting this site, you’ve likely heard through the grapevine that Allie and Paul need some help. Friends are initiating a fundraising campaign to help them get their house into a livable state and their rental apartment to a rentable level again. Until recently, many of us were not aware of the stress these two have been under. It has become clear to a few of us that their living situation is very difficult, and we no longer want either of them to be living like this.

The situation: It’s been over 5 years of working to re-build a home that should not have been sold as ‘safe’ or ‘livable’. When Allie bought her house on Duncan St., like most prudent homeowners she had a an inspection done. Little did she know that that the house was unsafe and unfortunately the inspector did not bring this to her attention either. The beams supporting both the first -and second floors were inadequately supported,there were major problems with defective roofing, and faults in the foundation have led to a basement full of water (you can actually see through the foundation to the backyard viaa hole in the basement wall). Most of these very serious problems were not revealed until Paul (Allie’s partner and a carpenter) started some simple home improvements.

After four years of trying to do damage control, and living in a house virtually crumbling around them, Allie and Paul are exhausted. They have run out of energy and money. For those of you who are devotees of Allie’s healing yoga practice you know that she is self-employed and Paul has recently had a setback and has had to stop his carpentry work due to a very serious recurring back injury.

Please take a look at the video above and you’ll get a personal sense of what this terrible situation has done to these very good people. You can see for yourself that the sale of this home involved a very bad bill of goods. Many of us are concerned that they are not living in a safe situation. Even more so, we are concerned about their health.

As many of you know Allie and Paul are not those who would call out to ask for help. They have been struggling with this in relative silence. When a few of us noticed that this situation was sliding from bad to worse, we decided to start this campaign.

The Goal: We are launching a 60 day fundraising campaign to try and raise $ 5, 000 before the end of the summer to help Allie and Paul get the disaster zone they call home into a safe, dry and sound place to live before the snow flies.

What can you do? At the moment what is needed most is to collect enough money for Allie and Paul to buy the materials to do basic repairs.

Anything you can donate will help!

Anything you can donate will help!

story:
The Kodiak Solar Generator System is composed of 2 major components: the Kodiak Solar Generator , and the Solar Storm 135 GL solar panels. The solar panels collect solar energy and the Kodiak Solar Generator stores that power inside a lithium-ion battery bank.

 

 
 

 

The Kodiak can be charged 3 different ways: via solar panels, wall charger, or even a car charger.

 

Below are some of the many tools and devices the Kodiak powers:

 

 

The Kodiak is the world’s first solar generator that expands to fit your needs without requiring you to purchase another entire system. It’s simple – if you want more battery storage, just connect deep cycle batteries to the external battery connection on the side of the Kodiak. Any connected batteries will charge and discharge at the same rate as the internal batteries. Thus acting as one fully-integrated system.

Each Solar Storm 135 GL panel has an extra connection on the back enabling additional panels to be connected.  Connect up to 4 panels to minimize the charge time for your off-grid system.

 

Your Kodiak System purchase may save you over $300 off of your federal income tax!  When purchased with the Predator 50 Panels, your Kodiak System may qualify you for the Federal Residential Energy Tax Credit. Please consult your tax professional.

 

 

- There are 10x more major power outages now than there were in the 80's & 90's.

- An average of 15 million households experience extended blackouts annually in the US

- Weather conditions are responsible for 80% of all power outages.

- The Unites States experiences more blackouts than any other developed nation.

- Blackouts cost American businesses about $150 billion per year.

- The American power grid was largely built after World War II from designs dating back to Thomas Edison.  This aging infrastructure is the root cause of blackouts.

Source: http://insideenergy.org & http://www.ibtimes.com

 

 

  

 

 

The lithium-ion batteries used inside the Kodiak are the same type of batteries used in today's electric cars & hybrids.  This ensures a significantly longer life span than any other solar generator on the market - up to 4x longer.

 

  
 

Q: How do I get a free Kodiak Solar Generator System?
A: When logged in on Indiegogo and viewing our campaign page, clicking the "link" icon to the left of our main video will generate a link to our project.  This link is unique to you.  Simply send this link to your friends and family, or share the project by clicking on any of the social media icons.  If 5 of your referred friends or family follow the link and make a purchase, you will get a refund for the purchase price of whichever perk you have selected.  Make sure they use the link so we can track it back to you!  For more information click here.

Q: How much do the Kodiak & Solar Storm 135 GL Panels weigh?
A: The Kodiak weighs 20 lbs & (1) Solar Storm 135 GL weighs 24 lbs.

Q: What type of AC Inverter is built into the Kodiak?
A: 1,500 Watt Pure Sine Wave.  Max output of 3,000 Watts.

Q: What is the expected lifespan of the Kodiak battery?
A: 2,000 cycles or 10 years.

Q: What is the warranty for the Kodiak?
A: The warranty is one year limited.

Q: Is the internal lithium battery user replaceable?
A: No.  Any battery service must be rendered by Inergy.

Q: How long will the battery hold its charge?
A: About 3 months.  We recommend leaving it plugged into a wall outlet during storage or recharging it every 3 months.

Q: Can I use the Kodiak while it is charging?
A: Yes.  It's capable of outputting power while charging.

Q: Can I fly on an airplane with the Kodiak?
A: No.  The Kodiak needs to be either ground shipped to your destination, or air shipped via a shipping carrier, not a passenger airplane.

Q: How well do the Solar Storm 135 GL Solar Panels work on cloudy days?
A: Panel angle & cloud cover can have up to a 60% effect on performance, but they still generate power!

Q: Can the Kodiak power my entire home?
A: No.  The Kodiak system is designed to power individual appliances and devices rather than plugging into the home's breaker panel directly.  For instance, electric dryers, ovens, stoves, and water heaters all exceed the Kodiak's ability.  However, gas ovens, stoves, dryers, and water heaters can be powered using the Kodiak - provided they have a standard 110 VAC wall plug.
