- The Unites States experiences more blackouts than any other developed nation.
- Blackouts cost American businesses about $150 billion per year.
- The American power grid was largely built after World War II from designs dating back to Thomas Edison.  This aging infrastructure is the root cause of blackouts.
Source: http://insideenergy.org & http://www.ibtimes.com
 




 
  
 

 
The lithium-ion batteries used inside the Kodiak are the same type of batteries used in today's electric cars & hybrids.  This ensures a significantly longer life span than any other solar generator on the market - up to 4x longer.
 
   
Q: How do I get a free Kodiak Solar Generator System?A: When logged in on Indiegogo and viewing our campaign page, clicking the "link" icon to the left of our main video will generate a link to our project.  This link is unique to you.  Simply send this link to your friends and family, or share the project by clicking on any of the social media icons.  If 5 of your referred friends or family follow the link and make a purchase, you will get a refund for the purchase price of whichever perk you have selected.  Make sure they use the link so we can track it back to you!  For more information click here.
Q: How much do the Kodiak & Solar Storm 135 GL Panels weigh?A: The Kodiak weighs 20 lbs & (1) Solar Storm 135 GL weighs 24 lbs.
Q: What type of AC Inverter is built into the Kodiak?A: 1,500 Watt Pure Sine Wave.  Max output of 3,000 Watts.
Q: What is the expected lifespan of the Kodiak battery?A: 2,000 cycles or 10 years.
Q: What is the warranty for the Kodiak?A: The warranty is one year limited.
Q: Is the internal lithium battery user replaceable?A: No.  Any battery service must be rendered by Inergy.
Q: How long will the battery hold its charge?A: About 3 months.  We recommend leaving it plugged into a wall outlet during storage or recharging it every 3 months.
Q: Can I use the Kodiak while it is charging?A: Yes.  It's capable of outputting power while charging.
Q: Can I fly on an airplane with the Kodiak?A: No.  The Kodiak needs to be either ground shipped to your destination, or air shipped via a shipping carrier, not a passenger airplane.
Q: How well do the Solar Storm 135 GL Solar Panels work on cloudy days?A: Panel angle & cloud cover can have up to a 60% effect on performance, but they still generate power!
Q: Can the Kodiak power my entire home?A: No.  The Kodiak system is designed to power individual appliances and devices rather than plugging into the home's breaker panel directly.  For instance, electric dryers, ovens, stoves, and water heaters all exceed the Kodiak's ability.  However, gas ovens, stoves, dryers, and water heaters can be powered using the Kodiak - provided they have a standard 110 VAC wall plug.

story:
Start enjoying eco-friendly and energy efficient evaporative climate technology right now with Evapolar! Create your personal microclimate and enjoy ultimate comfort exactly when you need it and where you need it!

Evapolar works on power of water evaporation — the simplest and most efficient cooling technology since ancient times. Evaporative coolers already exist but you may have never heard about them - they are all very bulky and if your hot season is short they are not presented on your market at all. But Evapolar is not just another evaporative cooler. It received a number of upgrades that make it truly unique. And the main one is that we managed to make it both powerful and compact so you could put it on your table.

You ask why do we call Evapolar an air conditioner while such devices are more known as air coolers? Well, the common opinion is that small air coolers are absolutely inefficient in general and almost useless when humidity is more than 55%-60%. Actually, this is true for all of them except Evapolar. In Evapolar we utilize the most advanced cooling technology taking literally 100% of what laws of physics allows us. So Evapolar has a really impressive cooling effect for a personal device of this size. So, we prefer to call it an evaporative air conditioner. That is why.

 

 

 

With the help of our early backers we've managed to make Evapolar a reality. It was a hard but exciting journey and now Evapolar's manufacturing facilities are all set up and running. We are fulfilling new orders in 7 days. We will send you a survey to specify your desired color, plug type and any additional information that might help us to prepare your order in a speedy way.

 

Evapolar allows you to create your own personal climate. Now you can adjust temperature to your needs, not the needs of everyone using one shared air cooler. This is a real revolution in air cooling!

 

Evaporative cooling technology is very energy efficient itself.However we managed to improve it even more. Evapolar saves energyand thus, your money.

 

 

 

Evapolar automatically creates the most comfortable climate for a person. It spreads coolness smoothly the same way air is cooled in nature.

Actually, Evapolar works like your personal small lake that createsa natural breeze.

 

 

The main goal for us was to develop a device that is not just safe to use but absolutely eco-friendly.  Evapolar doesn't need Freon or any other toxic coolant. Our evaporative materials are easily recyclable and don't deal any harm to the environment. Moreover, we managed to make it totally organic-free, so you don’t need to worry about any bacteria that usually spread in existing evaporative cooler 

 

Nowadays the world is divided into two parts: simple things and high-tech. We’d like to combine them. We believe that technologies should serve in simple things every day. Evapolar is based on unique technology, but we would like you to enjoy it every day instead of thinking about its complexity.

 

 

The Evapolar team is just beginning and we have a lot to explore! We are very grateful to you for your help, because this project could have never gotten here without you. Now you’re a part of our team!

 

A Special Thanks to...

Anton Jabin & Alexander Bodykin of Film52, Konstantin Solomonov, Tonwagen sound studio for producing, shooting and editing the film. Jane Smorodnikova and CoffeeLab.vc for support, business incubator QD, FabLab IFMO.

 

FAQ

 

 

1. How does Evapolar work?

 

Evapolar is a portable personal device which not only chills but also humidifies and purifies the air around you. The working principle is very simple: you need to fill the removable water tank and plug Evapolar in. Within 2-3 minutes Evapolar cartridge absorbs a huge amount of water. The water then spreads evenly on the surface of the cooling pads. When the air goes through the pads, the water evaporates, which makes the air cool down while getting saturated with water. The in-built fan helps the cool air spread on the area of 3-4 sq m around you. The power control enables you to adjust the cooling effect, creating most comfortable thermal conditions for you.

2) What is the difference between Evapolar and other cooling devices?

Evapolar surpasses other cooling devices in many aspects. First of all, Evapolar is a personal device. It can help you create the most comfortable microclimate without invading the personal space of the people around you. Secondly, we call Evapolar “air conditioner” rather than “air cooler” due to its efficiency in comparison with “traditional” conditioners. Evapolar remains within the range of low-price tabletop devices, does not require any costs on installation and maintenance, and is ready to use right out of the box. Thirdly, Evapolar cools the air by evaporating water, which makes the device an efficient humidifier. You won’t have to buy a separate conditioner, humidifier, or purifier. Our technologies allow combining the three functions in one device. This is how it creates a so-called “personal microclimate”. The last but not the least, Evapolar consumes 100 times less power than standard split systems – only 10W – which will clearly have a positive effect on your electricity bills.

3. What does the cooling degree depend on?

The cooling degree depends on three factors: the outside air temperature, air humidity, and the power of the device that you choose yourself. The working principle of Evapolar is based on evaporation process. The higher the temperature and the lower the humidity is, the more actively the evaporation happens, and therefore the cooling effect is stronger.

The last factor that influences the temperature change is the power of the device. By adjusting it, you can choose the most comfortable thermal conditions for you.

4. How much does Evapolar reduce the temperature and what area can it cool down?

The maximum temperature drop is 15C. It is worth mentioning that the change in temperature depends on external conditions and the device power. In regions of high humidity the difference may be 5 degrees, in dry and hot ones it may get up to 15C. We have tested the device all over the world and came to the conclusion that the comfortable temperature drop in people’s perception and in reality is different. Your body will always be the best indicator, since its needs vary just as dramatically depending on the native climate and current season. Classic conditioners do not take this fact into account. Singapore may be a vivid example: you can achieve necessary comfort there with the temperature loss of 5C, and the one of 10C is already unpleasant for your skin.

The cooling zone of Evapolar is 3-4 sq m. Evapolar is a personal device developed specifically for small areas. It will help you create most comfortable conditions at your workplace or recreational space. 

5. How much noise does Evapolar make?

Evapolar is no louder than the cooling fan of your computer! The noise level depends on the power you set yourself. The normal noise level is 28-35 dB.

6. What do you mean by “eco-friendliness” of the device?

We care about your health as well as the health of our planet. The evaporative materials used in the device consist of completely organic-free fibers. It makes Evapolar different from conventional air conditioners that have evaporative pads and filters made of cellulose, a nutritional environment for microorganisms. Due to its materials, after half a year in the ground Evapolar will fully degrade without any harm to nature. The second important thing is that we do not use any chemically aggressive liquids, which can damage one’s health, for cooling. And finally, Evapolar consumes only 10W, which equals to the power of a simple light bulb. In this day and age, energy saving not only has economic benefits, but also enables us to reduce consumption of natural resources as well as emission of harmful substances into the atmosphere.

7. Does Evapolar work without power supply?

While using Evapolar, it should be plugged into the power supply. But it doesn’t have to be a power socket. You can plug Evapolar into a power bank, usb-port of your car or laptop, a solar battery. The only condition is that the power supply must have the output of 5V and 2A.

8. How do I know it’s time to replace the cartridge? Do I need to buy an extra cartridge right now?

You need to replace the cartridge every 8-12 months provided that you constantly use it during that period. At the moment there is no indication system which notifies you that the cartridge has expired. If you use clean water and wipe the working camera of the device from time to time, its lifecycle can be significantly increased.

9. Does Evapolar need extra installation and maintenance? What should I do if it is out of order?

Evapolar is very easy to use and ready to work right out of the box. All you need to do is fill the water tank and plug in the device. The water tank needs to be refilled every 6-8 hours as the water evaporates. You can find more detailed rules on Evapolar usage in the manual attached. All in all, it is only important to keep the device from turning over and wipe the working camera once a month.

In case of a breakdown you need to contact our support service support@evapolar.com or your local distributor (if you bought the device not on our website).

Evapolar warranty is 1 year.

If your Evapolar requires to be repaired you need ship the unit to us or to your local distributor if any available. In case the defect is covered by warranty your shipping costs will be refunded.

10. Where can I find more detailed information about the product, its developers, and the project itself?

Our project is quite young and began its way on a crowd funding platform Indiegogo, where we were supported by thousands of people. You can find all information about Evapolar itself and our team on this page. Soon we will tell you about our next products and technologies which are under development and will see the light in the near future.

For more information on any topic you can always contact our support service support@evapolar.com. The guys will be glad to answer all of your questions.

 

 

CONTACT

If you have questions during or after the campaigns have closed, you can always reach us at support@evapolar.com. We receive a lot of special requests, and respond as fast as possible!

For press inquiries please contact press@evapolar.com

For questions related to the Indiegogo, you can contact Indiegogo.

story:
Are you concerned that your conventional, run-of-the-mill toothbrush isn’t doing the most thorough cleaning possible to keep your oral health in tip-top shape?

We all want to do our best to avoid plaque buildup, cavities, and gum disease – but we found that conventional toothbrushes and other electric brushes just aren’t up to the task for an effective brushing technique, and total area coverage.

So, we came up with the Giggo Pro, an elegantly designed toothbrush with an advanced 360° rotating head that allows you to reach even the most difficult of spots, while always ensuring proper technique. Giggo Pro has been carefully iterated upon and refined to truly deliver the perfect clean!

Through numerous iterations and product testing’s we combined all the key features and specifications that you might want in a smart toothbrush, that also answer all of the most pressing issues with other toothbrushes; a truly Pro experience.

Giggo Pro is carefully crafted to accommodate the universally recommended Bass Brushing Technique – which is endorsed by the American Dental Association (ADA) as well as dentists worldwide. This brushing method starts near the intersection of the teeth and gums and brushes vertically up and down to eliminate and prevent plaque build-up.

 

Giggp Pro is uniquely designed for comprehensive oral care by including a simple way to rotate the brush 360° from both top to bottom and bottom to top. It’s the most effective device for applying the Bass Brushing Technique! 

 

The Giggo Pro allows you to use this technique with the utmost ease, just hit the button and it’ll do the rest.

 

 

Enhance your oral care with the knowledge that your teeth are receiving the most thorough and convenient cleaning possible. 

Giggo Pro is well equipped to thoroughly clean all areas of the mouth. 

Make sure to check out the 'About Bass Brushing 'section for further information into the benefits , why's, and how-to's of Bass Brushing.

Keep your Giggo Pro feeling fresh with ease of mind thanks to its IPX7 Waterproof rating. Giggo Pro is convenient to clean and maintain – waterproof for up to 1 meter of submersion for 30 minutes, you can make sure that its as clean as your teeth and gums will be.

The synthetic rubber handle is smooth and allows you to maintain a firm grip while brushing 

We recommend changing Giggo Pro’s detachable brush head every three months to ensure optimal cleanliness and hygiene of the toothbrush.  

 

 

The streamlined power button is conveniently located to always be at the tip of your fingers, and with the anti-slip materials; you'll always be in control. Avoid the pitfalls of common electric toothbrushes that are so powerful they actually remove the enamel on your teeth. 

 

Take full control of your Giggo Pro brushing experience with a simple press of the power button.  

Press the power button once to switch between the two rotational directions, start with your top teeth and then simply press the button once to start cleaning your bottom teeth, and when you’re done it’s as simple as holding the power button for 2 seconds and the Giggo Pro will turn itself off.

Keep your Giggo Pro topped off at full power with the wireless charging dock – 

Charging the toothbrush via USB for 6 hours stores enough battery life to last up to 8 weeks! We want the Giggo Pro to be your go-to toothbrush, at home or away. The long-lasting battery life was a must for us, and you can rest assured that your favorite toothbrush will always be charged and ready to go!

Giggo Pro introduces a new generation of gentle oral care with its 0.1mm rounded brush fibers. The rounded, soothing bristles deeply clean between all areas of the teeth and softly massages the gums in order to prevent bleeding, efficiently removing bacteria, and giving you the best cleaning experience. 

At the age of 65, most people would shy away from starting up their own company. And yet, it’s at that age that Sam Liu chose to set out and develop the answer to his chronic toothaches. Ever since he was a child he had suffered from recurring dental issues, and no matter the toothbrushes he tried, none of them helped. He found mild reprieve when he first heard of the Bass Brushing Technique, and yet as the years went out it wasn’t enough. No matter the habit and technique, conventional toothbrushes simply weren’t up to par.

 

It’s for this reason that, in 2013, Sam created Giggo. After years of extensive research and development, multiple product iterations and more than a few sleepless nights, Giggo launched its first product, and after 4 generations we're happy to announce our finest achievement yet: the Giggo Pro. 

With a number of patents under Giggo's belt, a previously successful campaign, and the teams capabilities, the Giggo Pro will provide you with the ultimate experience! don't just take our word for it though, here's how we've already helped out some of our previous backers!

HOW-TO:

Not sure how to implement the Bass Brushing technique? Check out the .gifs below to see exactly what to do! 

WHY?

Many people suffer from plaque related diseases and gingivitis, even people who clean their teeth regularly.  The most common cause for these issues: the brushing technique! 

Originally created by Dr. Bass, his rigorous testing of brushing techniques started once he received the terrible news that he would be losing all his teeth! Naturally, he wanted to enjoy life to the fullest, the pain of the gum disease was already enough for him to work on saving his teeth. Taking swabs from his own mouth he would constantly test different techniques to figure out how to best remove and kill the bacteria that loves to get stuck in gums. Throughout his experimentation he found out two key things: 

  • Bad bacteria like to hang out on the gum line, 
  • Regular toothbrushes weren't up to the task! 

The solution he had before Giggo Pro was to remove bristles from a regular toothbrush and use his own unique technique for brushing. Once he was able to really get stuck in there and consistently remove the bacteria, his teeth started aching less and he was able to die a happy man with all of his teeth attached! 

The Giggo Pro provides the best cleaning experience and overall area coverage for all parts of the mouth. 

We'll reveal what's underneath the ? when we hit US$50,000 in backing!

 

We are good to go! Start shipping now!

 

 

 

 

Have more questions? Want to say hi? Let's talk !

Ever since he was a child he had suffered from recurring dental issues, and no matter the toothbrushes he tried, none of them helped. He found mild reprieve when he first heard of the Bass Brushing Technique, and yet as the years went out it wasn’t enough. No matter the habit and technique, conventional toothbrushes simply weren’t up to par. It’s for this reason that, in 2013, Sam created Giggo. After years of extensive research and development, multiple product iterations and more than a few sleepless nights, Giggo launched its first product, and after 4 generations we're happy to announce our finest achievement yet: the Giggo Pro. With a number of patents under Giggo's belt, a previously successful campaign, and the teams capabilities, the Giggo Pro will provide you with the ultimate experience! don't just take our word for it though, here's how we've already helped out some of our previous backers!HOW-TO:Not sure how to implement the Bass Brushing technique? Check out the .gifs below to see exactly what to do! 
WHY?
Many people suffer from plaque related diseases and gingivitis, even people who clean their teeth regularly.  The most common cause for these issues: the brushing technique! 

Originally created by Dr. Bass, his rigorous testing of brushing techniques started once he received the terrible news that he would be losing all his teeth! Naturally, he wanted to enjoy life to the fullest, the pain of the gum disease was already enough for him to work on saving his teeth. Taking swabs from his own mouth he would constantly test different techniques to figure out how to best remove and kill the bacteria that loves to get stuck in gums. Throughout his experimentation he found out two key things: 

Bad bacteria like to hang out on the gum line, 
Regular toothbrushes weren't up to the task! 

The solution he had before Giggo Pro was to remove bristles from a regular toothbrush and use his own unique technique for brushing. Once he was able to really get stuck in there and consistently remove the bacteria, his teeth started aching less and he was able to die a happy man with all of his teeth attached! 
The Giggo Pro provides the best cleaning experience and overall area coverage for all parts of the mouth. 
We'll reveal what's underneath the ? when we hit US$50,000 in backing! We are good to go! Start shipping now!    Have more questions? Want to say hi? Let's talk !

story:
Who We Are

FinderCodes is a simple yet revolutionary lost and found system created for today’s hectic lifestyles. We’re a society that’s truly on the “gogo,” so it’s all too easy to lose track of the things we value most—from our smartphones, to sports equipment, to our beloved pets. 

Too often those things we love the most are gone for good. Lack of identification tags, outdated tags, and dead batteries on phones make it practically impossible for even the most determined of Good Samaritans out there to return a found item.

And that’s the thing. Most people, like you, are Good Samaritans and will gladly return a lost item, especially if it’s easy to do so.

That’s where FinderCodes comes in. Using powerful, QR-encoded smart identification tags that will attach to almost anything, FinderCodes enable that Good Samaritan finder of your lost item to quickly, easily, and—get this—anonymously connect with you. 

So now imagine that sinking, lost-forever feeling interrupted when you hear your phone chime. It's an alert from FinderCodes that your item has been found, and it even shows you its location on a map! The wheels are set in motion for a safe and easy return. How cool is that?

 

 

How it Works

  1. The finder simply scans the tag with a smartphone, or enters its code online, triggering an instant alert to the owner that the item has been found, even locating it on a map.

  2. Meanwhile, the finder is shown important and compelling information from the owner, such as a reward amount or in the case of a pet, emergency medical information. (Think of it as a med-alert bracelet for your four-legged family member.)

  3. The finder can then contact the owner with the simple tap of a button. Around the corner? Meet in person. Across the country? The finder can bring your item to FedEx Office® and have it shipped home to you, using our exclusive Re-Turnit™ shipping service we created in alliance with FedEx®. Doesn’t get much easier than that!

 

 

What makes our Smart Tags smart for you?

  • Guard against identity theft — User identities are protected when communicating with one another.
  • Instant loss alert messages sent to owner — immediately when the tag is scanned. The alert may even include a map of the item's location.
  • Built-in GPS feature — makes return logistics a snap!
  • Smart Tags are evergreen — Unlike regular ID tags, these never become obsolete, even if you move or change phone numbers.
  • Lost items shipped home automatically —via FedEx Office®, using our exclusive Re-Turnit™ system.
  • No annual subscription fees — 'nuf said.
  • System works with any smartphone or computer — an internet connection is all that's needed.

  • Rewards to a finder via PayPal® — can be paid in a few easy clicks right from our free app.
  • Personal Asset Management tool — Your insurance agent may start salivating at this one.
  • Provides peace of mind — knowing your item has the best chance on earth of being returned.

 

 

A look at our Smart Tags:

FinderCode Smart Tags come in 4 different formats: plastic, adhesive, fabric adhesive, & power cord tags. There are even some fun ones for kids (but we like them too!).

 

 

 

What can you FinderCode? 

Just about anything! FinderCode Smart Tags will attach to almost anything you’d like to track or protect. Here are some popular choices:

 

 

8 Kits Designed for Your Lifestyle!

We’ve packaged just the right combination of our FinderCode Smart Tags into 8 convenient Lost & Found Kits designed for your lifestyle. Each kit contains between 6-8 various smart tags.

 

 

 

Lost and Found is Only the Beginning!

Our Smart Tags can help you AND your business:

    • Commercial Use/Inventory Management
      FinderCode Smart Tags are ideal for tracking inventory. A quick scan of the code can tell you important details relative to the items being tracked, such as date of acquisition, expiration dates, required maintenance dates and the like. The possibilities are endless!

    • Personal Asset Management
      In these days of easily lost or stolen smartphones, tablets, laptops and other devices, it’s more important than ever to keep track of their details. For example, the serial numbers, IMEI numbers, and photos that may be needed to prove ownership. FinderCodes is set up to store all this information for your eyes only. Store it now in the cloud where it’s always quickly accessible to you.

     

    We’ve come a long way!  We’re so close, but we need your help to make it to the finish line!

    Having been in business a short 18 months, you could say we’re off to a running start.

    We’ve developed key relationships with AT&T, who has co-branded our kits, and FedEx, with whom we created Re-Turnit™, our exclusive return shipping solution.

    We're very proud that with Re-Turnit, FinderCodes will go down in FedEx history as the first company to whom FedEx has EVER licensed the use of its logo!

    So far we’ve received enthusiastic reviews from the press and the tech industry, have won innovation awards, and limited production runs have gone to the shelves at Target® and Office Depot®!

    We’re thrilled about our progress, but we know it’s only just the beginning. The finish line is still a long way off! Some of the hurdles we need to clear are listed below:

      • Continued and improved marketing & media campaigns to spread the word and sell kits
      • Manufacturing product
      • Research & development to provide the most durable tags and the most innovative product possible

      The path is laid out before us. Several other large retailers in the US and Canada have expressed interest in carrying FinderCodes. We’re gaining traction, so if we can build it, chances are, they will buy it!

       

      How you can help

      Buy a Perk: Whether you’re a frequent traveler, a pet owner, sports enthusiast, or business owner, FinderCodes has something to offer at a level of funding that’s right for you. All proceeds from the pre-orders will be used to help clear the above hurdles, including marketing, manufacturing, and further developing our product. We’re constantly looking for and testing new materials to improve our tags, and this gets expensive. With sufficient orders, we can take advantage of economies of scale to bring costs down and manufacture the best product possible.

      Tell a Friend: Like what you see, but maybe don’t have the spare cash right now? No problem! Please tell your friends about FinderCodes! We’d really appreciate your spreading the word. We need our kits to not only hit the store shelves, but to then fly off them! We truly believe this product can improve people’s lives by helping lost pets and favorite items find their way home faster. And who knows, thanks to the speed and ease of FinderCodes, maybe lost and found departments will soon be a thing of the past!

      Thank You! Most of all, THANK YOU! Thank you for your interest in FinderCodes and for helping us in any way you can! We really appreciate your efforts, no matter how great or small!

       

      Download our Free FinderCodes App

       

      Screenshots

      Owner Experience:

               

       

      Finder experience:

         

       

       

      Press & Awards

      Click here to read our news and reviews

      Click here to read our blog

      Learn more at www.findercodes.com

       

      Have a comment, question, or suggestion?
      Contact us at info@findercodes.com

story:
The Side Scoop!


We know you absolutely love your cat or kitten but you undeniably despise scooping the litter box, but unfortunately it comes along with caring for your little furry friend.

Problems:

  • You know it’s a job you have to do but it needs to be a bit easier and more sanitary.

  • Having to scoop too close to the poop is dirty and unpleasant.

  • As far as ease, most scoops are not designed to go easy on your back, wrists and shoulders.

  • And what about those of you who may need to sit and scoop or who may be in wheelchairs? There should be a way you don’t have to bend over too far and push the scoop out in front of you, away from your seat.

Solution:

  • A better scoop…a great new cat litter scoop coming to the market.

  • Be a part of its history and be one of the first to own one from its first-run manufacturing pre-sale - here.

What is it?

It’s called The Side Scoop and it is a long-handle scoop, with walls, that scoops and sifts cat litter sideways like a ladle, instead of front ways like a shovel. It is the first of its kind.


Benefits:

  • The longer handle allows for ergonomic handling, which is better on the back, wrists and shoulders.

  • The sideways scooping motion makes it less likely to over-scoop litter out of the box, because it scoops sideways like a ladle, instead of front ways like a shovel.

  • Sideways scooping is a more natural movement direction. Think about it. We use eating utensils, toothbrushes, combs/brushes, brooms, pencils, etc. in similar positions with sideways motions.

  • The walls and slightly dipped bottom prevents scooped waste from falling back into the box; flat shovel-like scoops with no walls are like trying to balance a ball on a paddle. Ever try that?

  • The scoop also has slits on the floor and walls for easy sifting, and the scoop design makes it easier to discard waste with a sideways dumping motion, which cuts down on dust. 

  • The scoop can also be used to scrape and clean around the inside of the box.

  • Definitely a better scoop for everybody – adults, children, seniors, people who need to sit – everybody!

  • The scoop will be available in both right-handed and left-handed versions because we all love our cats!

  • The scoop will be available in four colors: periwinkle blue, ivory white, hunter green and black.

  • The scoop is light-weight but durable.


We Need Your Help!

  • We have the prototype and now we need to raise the funding for the first manufacturing run, which includes packaging, shipping and distribution.This is where you come in, because we cannot do this with YOU.


  • Realistically, we want to raise $15,000-$20,000 for the first run. We believe in this product that much because we know there are so many cat lovers out there who will appreciate a better way to keep their cat or cats (for super cat lovers) litter box cleaner.
  • We need to raise enough funds to cover the costs of your perks, Indiegogo and Credit Card Processor fees, manufacturing, packaging, shipping and handling.

  • We set the goal lower because we are able to use whatever amount you, the backers, fund us. Our first run production will be on a small, medium or large scale, depending on how you choose to fund this project. So, we are counting on you!


PERKS!

For your backing, you receive these great perks.

  • First of all, you will be one of the first to receive your very own pre-sale Side Scoop and be part of the history of launching this unique, new product into the market!

Custom-designed Cat Lovers Pendant

Get your cat's name (or any name) custom-engraved
on the pendant below!
  • These pendants were custom-designed by us!

  • Choose your own precious metal material for your pendant (see below).

    NOTE: $10 added for pendants with custom names.



Please help us by sharing this page.

 Thank You!


WE APPRECIATE YOU!!!

story:
House fire destroys family's home

Our neighbour's townhouse in Mississauga Ontario was gutted by a fire on the morning of Saturday, October 12th.  The father suffered 2nd and 3rd degree burns.  The fire destroyed their home and most of their belongings, and they will not be able to move back in due to the extent of the damage caused by the fire.

As a neighbour living in the same complex, I wanted to try to do something to help them, so I've set up this campaign in the hope that people will come together to pitch in whatever they can to help the Moyles family recover from the fire.

All donations will go to a trust fund that has been set up for them.

Please see the links below for the news releases and video about the fire:

MIssissauga townhouse fire

http://www.citynews.ca/2013/10/12/father-son-in-hospital-after-mississauga-fire/

http://www.680news.com/2013/10/13/fire-causes-200k-in-damage-to-mississauga-townhouse/

http://www.citynews.ca/2013/10/15/family-returns-to-scene-of-life-altering-fire-in-malton/

No donation is too small.  Please imagine how much you would appreciate the help if this happened to you or a family member.

If you can't make a donation, please encourage your friends by posting this link to your facebook page.

http://igg.me/at/MoylesFamily/x/5071283

Thank you!

story:
ARE YOU SOMEONE WHO LOVES EATING DELICIOUS MEALS? 

How often has a lack of time (or even experience) gotten in the way of making your own? 

Making high-quality food at home is tedious… and eating out gets expensive fast!

Wouldn’t it be amazing if you could come home to perfectly cooked meals like tender pesto chicken, juicy duck breast, asparagus, cheesecake, perfect crème brûlée and hundreds more…?

  

Sous Vide Cooking That Adapts To You

Chefs around the world trust the sous vide cooking method, known for it’s ability to cook food perfectly to your desired doneness, with no risk of under- or over-cooking.

The Nise Wave takes sous vide a step further. It is the ONLY sous vide cooker that lets you have your meal not only how you want, but exactly when you want

Imagine - leaving the house for hours, knowing your meal will be taken care of, cooked to be ready when you want it.

While you are away, the patented adaptive temperature system automatically controls the cooking process. It creates a unique temperature curve for the recipe you select in the Nise mobile app, based on your desired doneness, ideal tenderness, and exactly when you want your food to finish cooking.

 

 

 

 The Nise Ecosystem combines the tech of silicon valley and the precision of sous-vide cooking.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Food is put into any food-grade bag and placed into a pot of water. Then the Nise Wave circulates and heats water to a precise temperature, which is defined by your chosen doneness. 

For example: a medium-rare steak needs to heat to 135°F; for a chicken breast to be juicy and tender it needs to reach 144°F.  

Over time, your food will be perfectly cooked from edge-to-edge, and will never be over- or under- cooked. 

Sous Vide Fact: Starbucks has added sous vide eggs and steaks to their menus. 

Cooking with the Adaptive Temperature System (ATS)

Traditional sous vide cooking heats to one precise temperature to optimize for one variable, doneness. 

Since the patented ATS heats to different temperatures throughout the cooking cycle, it can control for multiple variables, including doneness, tenderness and scheduled finish time while maintaining protein quality. (Patent - PCT/CN2016/075744)

Would you like more information on how the ATS works or the science behind it? Please visit the FAQ section

Clarification - The ATS is optional. You can still use the Wave to cook sous vide the traditional way.

We didn’t just want to create a great ecosystem, but also a great physical product.
 
We set out to create a product that doesn’t compromise on what matters to sous vide enthusiasts ... at the price point of an entry level sous vide solution.
 

 

How We Stack Up Against The Competition

1200W of Power in a Compact Size

Higher power means you can heat larger pots of water very quickly, and easily maintain the temperature to pin-point precision.    
 
Bonus - This combined with our recommended maximum volume of 10 Gallons (38L) means you can cook at least 15 regular sized meals simultaneously or a large rack of lamb!
 
 

Control The Way You Want To Cook - WiFi Or Manual

While the Wave’s WiFi control is simple and intuitive, we appreciate that sometimes you want to physically control your sous-vide. 
 
Clarification -
WiFi doesn't mean your phone and the Wave need to be on the same WiFi. As long as the Wave is connected to your home wireless network, you can control it from anywhere. 
 
Bonus - Our display screen shows target temperature, current temperature, and remaining time all at a glance. (Also we're Canadian so we had to add in the option to switch to °C)    
 
 
 

Water-Resistance Because Accidents Happen

 

Water-Resistance to IP67 specifications means, you can comfortably rinse your Wave or submerge it for 30 minutes without fear of failure. 
 
Bonus - Because more of the product is submersible, the Wave has a larger effective cooking area than much bigger sous-vide cookers. 
 
 
 
 
More than just a recipe book, or a means to control the Wave.
 
The mobile app has something for everyone to love; whether you just want to cook sous-vide for precision or the convenience, find cool recipes, learn how to create culinary masterpieces, show off your cooking abilities, or make friends. 
 
 

Amazing Recipes - Easy Steps

Simple or complex, every recipe is broken down into easy to follow steps.
 
 

Of course, we are going to put out our own recipes. But we want you in on the fun too! 

Users will be able to rate, like, and follow your unique profile to see your cooks and creations!

 

 

 
We wanted to provide the base Nise Wave at the lowest price possible -while providing you with everything you need to sous vide! 
 
Do you need these kits to start sous viding? No. 
Do we think you'll love using them with your new Nise Wave? 100%

 Vacuum Kit -   

By vacuum sealing these bags - heated water is able to more precisely cook your food due to the lack of air between your food and the water. HDPE bags are food-grade, perfect for sous-vide cooking.

Kitchen Essentials Kit -  

The kitchen essentials kits comes with a searing torch adapter which converts any butane canister into a pro-chef torch, an anti bacterial cutting board, and a ceramic knife (9.5 hardness on Mohs scale, vs. 6.5 for steel knives),  

All of these items are deeply discounted and prices will never be this low again! So show us some support and get a few kits :)

 

 

Video - How The Vacuum Sealer Works

 

LOOKING TO THE FUTURE - NISE PACKS

While we won’t be shipping these out at launch, we will be releasing a series of spice and marinade packs so you can add a bit more convenience to your life.  
 
 
Never worry about finding the ingredients you need at the grocery store, or prepping complex meals for hours. Just …. 

Save Money By Cooking The Nise Way

The average American eats out approximately 20 times per month...
 
Home-cooked meals are actually less expensive than most fast food, but its not convenient for many people to cook for themselves... 
 
Think you are saving time by eating out? You still have to wait to be seated at a table, or get stuck waiting in a drive-thru during your commute home!
 
If you cook using the Nise Wave and cut down on your eating-out frequency, then you would save $2000+ and with Nise Packs up to 102 hours every single year.
 
 
 

 

 

 

SHIPPING, CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Cost of shipping/freight will be paid for by us for the continental USA.

Reduced Shipping for International Backers -

For our international backers - we cover the cost of shipping from our manufacturing facility to a nearby distribution center. The location of the distribution center is based by regional demand. 

Our prices do not include VAT, country, or sales tax.    

It is impossible to build in the various duties into our price for every country we are selling to.

All international backers will be delivered their rewards FOB destination; that means you pay freight/shipping from our distribution site, duties, and taxes. 

It is illegal to mark a shipment as a gift. 

 

THANKS TO FRESCAFILMS - VIDEO AND GRAPHIC DESIGN
story_txt:
Please Note - Free Shipping is included for US Backers only. International Backers will be charged prior to final shipment date. (For full detail - scroll to the bottom of the page)
Our current estimated delivery is September '18 for 110V Units, and October '18 for 220V units.ARE YOU SOMEONE WHO LOVES EATING DELICIOUS MEALS? How often has a lack of time (or even experience) gotten in the way of making your own? Making high-quality food at home is tedious… and eating out gets expensive fast!Wouldn’t it be amazing if you could come home to perfectly cooked meals like tender pesto chicken, juicy duck breast, asparagus, cheesecake, perfect crème brûlée and hundreds more…?  Sous Vide Cooking That Adapts To YouChefs around the world trust the sous vide cooking method, known for it’s ability to cook food perfectly to your desired doneness, with no risk of under- or over-cooking.The Nise Wave takes sous vide a step further. It is the ONLY sous vide cooker that lets you have your meal not only how you want, but exactly when you wantImagine - leaving the house for hours, knowing your meal will be taken care of, cooked to be ready when you want it.While you are away, the patented adaptive temperature system automatically controls the cooking process. It creates a unique temperature curve for the recipe you select in the Nise mobile app, based on your desired doneness, ideal tenderness, and exactly when you want your food to finish cooking.    The Nise Ecosystem combines the tech of silicon valley and the precision of sous-vide cooking.       Food is put into any food-grade bag and placed into a pot of water. Then the Nise Wave circulates and heats water to a precise temperature, which is defined by your chosen doneness. For example: a medium-rare steak needs to heat to 135°F; for a chicken breast to be juicy and tender it needs to reach 144°F.  Over time, your food will be perfectly cooked from edge-to-edge, and will never be over- or under- cooked. Sous Vide Fact: Starbucks has added sous vide eggs and steaks to their menus. 
Cooking with the Adaptive Temperature System (ATS)

Traditional sous vide cooking heats to one precise temperature to optimize for one variable, doneness. 
Since the patented ATS heats to different temperatures throughout the cooking cycle, it can control for multiple variables, including doneness, tenderness and scheduled finish time while maintaining protein quality. (Patent - PCT/CN2016/075744) 
Would you like more information on how the ATS works or the science behind it? Please visit the FAQ section
Clarification - The ATS is optional. You can still use the Wave to cook sous vide the traditional way.


We didn’t just want to create a great ecosystem, but also a great physical product.

 
We set out to create a product that doesn’t compromise on what matters to sous vide enthusiasts ... at the price point of an entry level sous vide solution.
 

 
How We Stack Up Against The Competition
Information sourced from respective company websites
 
1200W of Power in a Compact Size
Higher power means you can heat larger pots of water very quickly, and easily maintain the temperature to pin-point precision.    
 

Bonus - This combined with our recommended maximum volume of 10 Gallons (38L) means you can cook at least 15 regular sized meals simultaneously or a large rack of lamb!
 

 
Control The Way You Want To Cook - WiFi Or Manual
While the Wave’s WiFi control is simple and intuitive, we appreciate that sometimes you want to physically control your sous-vide. 
 

Clarification - WiFi doesn't mean your phone and the Wave need to be on the same WiFi. As long as the Wave is connected to your home wireless network, you can control it from anywhere. 
 

Bonus - Our display screen shows target temperature, current temperature, and remaining time all at a glance. (Also we're Canadian so we had to add in the option to switch to °C)    
 

 
 
Water-Resistance Because Accidents Happen
 
Water-Resistance to IP67 specifications means, you can comfortably rinse your Wave or submerge it for 30 minutes without fear of failure. 
 

Bonus - Because more of the product is submersible, the Wave has a larger effective cooking area than much bigger sous-vide cookers. 
 

 
 
 

More than just a recipe book, or a means to control the Wave.
 
The mobile app has something for everyone to love; whether you just want to cook sous-vide for precision or the convenience, find cool recipes, learn how to create culinary masterpieces, show off your cooking abilities, or make friends. 
 
 
Amazing Recipes - Easy Steps
Simple or complex, every recipe is broken down into easy to follow steps.
 

 
Of course, we are going to put out our own recipes. But we want you in on the fun too! 
Users will be able to rate, like, and follow your unique profile to see your cooks and creations!

 

 
 

We wanted to provide the base Nise Wave at the lowest price possible -while providing you with everything you need to sous vide! 
 
Do you need these kits to start sous viding? No. 
Do we think you'll love using them with your new Nise Wave? 100%

 Vacuum Kit -   
By vacuum sealing these bags - heated water is able to more precisely cook your food due to the lack of air between your food and the water. HDPE bags are food-grade, perfect for sous-vide cooking.Kitchen Essentials Kit -  
The kitchen essentials kits comes with a searing torch adapter which converts any butane canister into a pro-chef torch, an anti bacterial cutting board, and a ceramic knife (9.5 hardness on Mohs scale, vs. 6.5 for steel knives),  
All of these items are deeply discounted and prices will never be this low again! So show us some support and get a few kits :)


 
 
 
Video - How The Vacuum Sealer Works

 
 
LOOKING TO THE FUTURE - NISE PACKS
While we won’t be shipping these out at launch, we will be releasing a series of spice and marinade packs so you can add a bit more convenience to your life.  
 

 
Never worry about finding the ingredients you need at the grocery store, or prepping complex meals for hours. Just …. 


Save Money By Cooking The Nise Way
The average American eats out approximately 20 times per month...
 
Home-cooked meals are actually less expensive than most fast food, but its not convenient for many people to cook for themselves... 
 

Think you are saving time by eating out? You still have to wait to be seated at a table, or get stuck waiting in a drive-thru during your commute home!
 
If you cook using the Nise Wave and cut down on your eating-out frequency, then you would save $2000+ and with Nise Packs up to 102 hours every single year.

story:
We want to bring dinosaur into daily life & create a functional home decoration suitable for kids & adults. After 2 years of development, Raptor Lamp 2.0 is here to light up your home environment.

Top Features

Features

 

● Slim & chic raptor comes to life
Inspired by his favorite animal in childhood, the designer brings velociraptor to life with this original LED table lamp. With continuous drafting, shaping, trialing and tuning over 2 years, the Jurassic dream is now ready with a simple yet multi-functional design.

● Adjustable neck & limbs
With the intensive study on raptor habit & biological structure, the final model of Raptor Lamp 2.0 recreates the vivid image of the dinosaur. To further infuse the raptor with spirt & vigor, the lamp is equipped with 7 rotational axis. You can enjoy a multitude of unique dinosaur poses with its adjustable neck & limbs.


● Dimmable LED light on jaw & tongue
When opening the mouth of the Raptor Lamp 2.0, you can find two-way LED light source from its jaw and tongue. Light could be controlled with dimmer based on environment, which allows this dino companion a proper desk lamp for kids or a decoration at home. This cute fellow won’t bite, only glow!

● More than a lamp: phone holder as well
This dinosaur lamp is created with passion at first place, yet the designer also focuses on the actual functions. At its base, an adjustable silicone claw is able to grasp mobile device firmly for you. Both a desk lamp & phone holder, Raptor Lamp 2.0 is definitely one of the must-have item at home.

As seen in

More on designer stories:

 

FAQ：

1. How do I select colors if I claim the perk of 10 dinosaurs or 20 dinosaurs?
We would reach out to you by e-mail after receiving the order. Or, you can tell us the combination you like at cf.indiegogo@udnfunlife.com.

2. What make champagne gold special?
We want to design a new color for the brand-new edition - Raptor Lamp 2.0. Instead of gaudy and sparkling glazed surface, this special edition is designed with matte gold, a color representing luxury & fashion that makes the raptor perfect for every household.

3. Can I use it for reading?
Of course. Our raptor provides sufficient light illuminance (1500 lux) for reading.

4. What material is this dinosaur made of?
Raptor Lamp 2.0 is made of aluminum and ABS.

5. Does it come with a warranty?
Yes, this is a raptor with 1 year warranty. 

6. My question isn’t listed here, what should I do?
Send it to us at cf.indiegogo@udnfunlife.com

story:
I bet you are thinking "Wow, that was really metal!"? You know what else is metal? The  light fixtures I need in order to grow more plants! With your help, I can raise money to purchase light fixtures. More light equals healthier and stronger plants. With these additional fixtures, I will be able to increase the amount of plants I can grow from seed every season. Below is drawing that demonstrates the difference.


      Who is this strange man?

Hello Everyone. My name is Jake Wells and I am a plant growing addict. For the past eight years, I have been germinating plants from seed. Over this coarse of time, I have been successful in growing hundreds of plants ranging from common annuals to more difficult perennials. I mostly grow unusual perennials and heirloom garden plants including Alpine Strawberries, Constoluto Genovese tomatoes, and even cotton. Cotton in Illinois? You're darn tootin'!






Goal: $500.  This would allow me to purchase 3 additional Hydrofarm brand grow light fixtures at $156 each plus tax. It's really pretty simple.



  x   3  =



                                                                       Happy plant time!







Why do I need light fixtures?

Plants are a tenacious bunch. They grow in some very unlikely and downright inhospitable places. Many start off precariously as seedlings and only the hardiest survive. This initial life stage is one of the most difficult for them to get through. Having a system that provides steady illumination and warmer temperatures greatly increases seedlings ability to survive and thrive.  Seedlings can be grown by windows with sunlight but they become spindly and weak because of low light conditions  especially during winter and spring months.  Plants grown under artificial light are sturdier and stronger because of more intense light conditions. The amazing drawing below demonstrates the difference.


                      Sunlight from window                             Artificial light from above


How many plants can be grown with the additional light fixtures?

With only one light I have enough space on my rack to store 4 plastic grow trays. Up to 72 plants can be grown per tray. That means that 288 plants can be grown per shelf. So if I added 3  lights it would give me the ability to grow 864 more plants! Or a total of 1,152 plants! That would be a whole lot of heirloom tomatoes, peppers, strawberries, etc. that people could enjoy. Imagine the amount of new plants I could introduce the public to every season. The drawing below gives an idea what my set up would look like.


            Current  Set Up                                                   Future Set Up


Long Term Goals

The addition of more light fixtures would greatly aid me in my long term goal of bringing unusual and hard to find plants to the public. My plan is to start off selling my plants at local farmers markets and then eventually stores. Maybe I'll even open my own store and call it Jake's Plant Addiction. Who knows? Any additional money over my goal will go towards additional plant growing supplies like timers, watering supplies, soil, seeds, etc. And if I go far enough over, I will buy a small greenhouse. This would aid me in acclimatizing the plants from an indoor to outdoor lifestyle.


Diversity is the spice of life and plants are one thing that exemplifies a wealth of diversity in nature. Being able to spread the joy of growing a multitude of botanical wonders and curiosities is my passion and with your help I can achieve it! Thank you and I appreciate any and all support you can give!

story:
Möchtest auch du dein Bad in einer randgefüllten Badewanne komplett mit Wasser bedeckt geniessen können?

Hast du dich auch schon über die Tatsache geärgert, dass einfach zu wenig Wasser in die Badewanne gefüllt werden kann? Kaum ist die Wanne halbvoll läuft es beim Überlauf schon wieder raus und die Hälfte des Körpers ist an der kalten Luft... Dies war der Impuls um die Idee von waitoo. Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen :-)

Funktionsweise

waitoo. ist ein neuartiges Badaccessoire aus PU-Schaumstoff und versetzt den Überlauf deiner Badewanne weiter nach oben. Die Befestigung an der Badewanne erfolgt mittels Saugnäpfen.

Du profitierst somit von einem höheren Wasserspiegel und kannst dein Vollbad noch entspannter geniessen :-)

Unsere Ziele und was du von uns bekommst

  • Die ersten waitoo's wurden bereits produziert; der Erlös dieser Kampagne fliesst in eine weitere, grössere Produktion, sowie ins Marketing um den Vertrieb weiter auszubauen.
  • Kaufe ein einzelnes waitoo. oder zwei :-) oder werde einer der ersten waitoo. Distributoren mit einem Starterpaket!

Deinen Peark bekommst du so oder so - ob das Funding Ziel erreicht wird oder auch nicht.

Beachte, dass die ersten 500Stk. produziert und an Lager gelegt sind! D.h. dass dein waitoo. noch während diese Kampagne läuft, versendet wird :-) Grössere Mengen müssen erst wieder produziert werden.

 

Ist deine Badewanne für die Verwendung von waitoo. geeignet?

Bitte überprüfe vor dem Kauf die Rundung deiner Badewanne wie unten ersichtlich:

 

In einem Paket ist folgendes enthalten

  • Ein waitoo. mit Anleitung, verpackt in einer ansprechenden weissen Box. Diese ist wiederum in einem Schutzkarton - ideal für den Einzelversand - verpackt.
  • Grössere Mengen werden in 20er Verpackungen (1 Karton) geliefert.
  • Mehr Informationen zur Verpackung findest du bei den Dokumenten.

 

Du kannst uns auch unterstützen ohne waitoo. zu kaufen! Sprich mit deiner Familie, mit deinen Freunden darüber, "like it" auf Facebook und teile es auf indiegogo :-)

 

English summary:

Have you ever been annoyed by the fact that just too little water can be filled into the bath tub? As soon as the bath tub is half full the water already runs back out of the spillover and half of the body is out to the cold air... This was the beginning of bringing the idea of waitoo. into reality :-) 

Waitoo. is an innovative bathroom accessory made of polyurethane foam. It puts the spillover of your bath tub higher. The spillover is not locked or blocked, mounting is via suction cups.

Thus, you benefit from a higher water level and can enjoy your bath even more relaxing.

 

Does waitoo. fit onto your bath tub?

Please check before ordering if waitoo. fits onto your bath tub as you see below:

The following is included in a package:

  • One waitoo. with instructions, packed in an attractive white box. This is packed in a protective box - ideal for shipping.
  • Larger quantities will be delivered in 20pcs boxes.
  • You'll find more information about packing in the documents.


 

You'll get your peark either way - if the funding goal is reached or not.

Please note that the first 500pcs already have been produced and are on stock now! This means, that your waitoo is sent out during this campaign :-) Bigger quantities need to be produced first.

You also can help us without buying waitoo! Tell it to your family, your friends, "like it" on facebook and share it on indiegogo :-)

story:
Hi, our Indiegogo campaign is now over, but THANK YOU again for your support.

However you can still order directly with us, at:
www.dumbags.com  you will be re-direcfted to our sister company, (Fitwell)
or go directly to Fitwell at
www.fitwell.com.au
THANKS!!!!




UPDATE: Just confirming that, due to the positive response to date, we have decided to commit to a full production run - which is underway now - and we will be fulfilling all orders, regardless of whether or not we reach our target, Thanks! 

Chase, Blaine, & Michael.

Hi, my name is Michael Coates, from Melbourne Australia, and with my two sons, Chase and Blaine, we have designed a smarter, safer product for the health and fitness industry.

Introducing DUMBAGS: a sand-filled, material-based alternative to the common dumbbells and kettlebells used in weight and personal training.

Smart weights

In simple terms, Dumbags are sandbags of various sizes and weights, purpose-designed for the fitness and personal training industry.

Dumbbells and Kettlebells are great, and have helped millions of people get in to shape, however in many circumstances there can be serious problems associated with their use. That's why we created Dumbags - to solve the many problems associated with metal bells, particularly personal injury and property damage. Kettlebells and dumbbells are great and have their place, its just that Dumbags are better! Why? See our 9 main reasons below:

 -      Personal Safety: Dumbags' soft design means dropping or banging a weight on any part of your body will not cause serious injury.

-       Less Noise: Because they are filled with sand, our weights won't make a huge amount of noise when dropped.

-       Avoid Property Damage: Unlike dropping a metal weight, dropping a Dumbag on a timber or tiled floor will not damage the surface - meaning you can work out wherever you want.

-       More Options: Their flexible design allows you to hold more than one Dumbag at a time - rather than just one kettlebell or dumbbell.

-       Easily Change Sizes: To change sizes with traditional weights, you needs lots of weights on hand, or you need to adjust clips, screw on nuts and clamps etc. Just 3 Dumbags weights give you the equivalent of 7 different weight sizes.

-       Cost Effective: Dumbags won't cost hundreds or even thousands of dollars like metal weight sets; they are extremely cost-effective.

-       Unlimited exercises: Because of their innovative design features, you are only limited by your imagination as to the type and number of exercises you can do with Dumbags.

-       Easy to Transport: Dumbags are lightweight and easily transportable, unlike metal weights which are heavy and cumbersome, and impossible to transport safely.

-       Innovative Design: The design of dumbbells and kettlebells has stayed the same for hundreds of years. It's time for something New!

 

These are some of the original prototype bags we have been using in our Personal Training business over the last 12 months


How It Works

This is how the Dumbags weight system works:

Note: Bag sizes are all based on using dry sand filling. Fill the inner bag to the mark on the spout and your bag will be in line with the weight indicated on the bag.

- HEAVY (Standard): Fill with sand. 

- EXTRA HEAVY: Fill with metal shot/shavings. 

- MEDIUM: Fill with a combination of sand and light padding.

- LIGHT: Fill with light padding.


Unique Inner Bags

Their simple design means that bags can be filled with material of any weight. They can be filled, emptied, refilled, packed, transported - whatever suits you! Having an extra inner bag for each weight size (offered in our Perks) is extremely useful as you can: 

1. Have a different type of filling (or weight) for each bag size, and/or

2. Take your weights away with you when travelling, leaving one filled inner bag at home, and taking the empty one away with you to fill at your destination.

Referral Reward!!

We are offering a geat reward for anyone that refers a friend to our Dumbags Campaign (& they order something) we will double your order - regardless of how big your order is.

if you have already aheived this feat, then just let us know and we will double your order!

 

Weight Combinations

Just 3 Dumbags weights give you the equivalent of 7 standard weights!

Even better, the basic range of 7 sizes gives you more than 40 weight combinations, making them far more cost-effective than kettlebells or dumbbells. 

  

More Great Benefits

 -       Flexible Handle: Comfortably hold 2, 3, or more at a time. We have also developed some handles/hand protectors for extreme exercises such as Crossfit style training and/or intensive prolonged sessions where they might be needed.

  -      More weights, more workouts: The action of gripping more bags can actually assist in the workout. By being able to hold more than 1 weight at a time anyone can quickly and easily change weights by simply adding another bag or changing the mix of sizes.

 -       More Uses: Dumbags are designed to be multi-purpose equipment. You can just grip the bag itself, without holding the handles - this is similar to squeezing spring-loaded hand grippers. They can also be used like medicine balls - and can be thrown and caught safely.

We know they work because we have been using them for years in our own fitness businesses. Part of the reason we have decided to produce them commercially is that our clients have kept asking to buy them!

They are not only practical and functional, but they look fantastic and can be done in any colour combination.

Developing Dumbags

With no other product like it on the market, my sons and I felt it was time to take matters into our own hands and develop a safer, smarter product for the industry.

The problem we noticed was that for outdoor Personal Trainers, it was very difficult to be able to provide a wide variety of weights for a group. Unless you brought a truck load of weights with you, most people had to compromise and workout with a weight that was either too light or too heavy.

After trying many different design concepts, we looked at simple sandbags. Developing the product further, we added both an inner and outer bag, and a clever sealing system to ensure no sand could escape. 

Now, with the product perfected and in use in our own businesses, we want to share it with the Indiegogo community to greatly improve the safety and quality of weight training in every corner of the world. 

That's our story - now over to you, Indiegogo 

We believe we have created a fantastic product; a smart product that makes sense. We want to share our creation with the world by raising enough money to produce the first commercial run of Dumbags, the Smart Weights that will transform the weight training industry!

Perks/Opening Specials

Perks?

Perks are basically your way of supporting us, by pre-oredering one of our products. Not only do you get to help us, but you also know you were one of the first people in the world to discover and support this product!  OK, enough waffle - these products are awesome and by ordering them now, you get them at a discounted price and/or with an added bonus.

We are offering great value with our perks. ALL include free shipping, free additional inner bags, and free exercise DVDs - check them out in the Perks section above.

We will re-confirm with you before shipping exactly which size bag you would like.

Thank you for supporting our campaign.

We can't wait to get our Dumbags to you! 

Michael, Chase, and Blaine Coates.
story_txt:
Hi, our Indiegogo campaign is now over, but THANK YOU again for your support.
However you can still order directly with us, at:www.dumbags.com  you will be re-direcfted to our sister company, (Fitwell)or go directly to Fitwell atwww.fitwell.com.auTHANKS!!!!






UPDATE: Just confirming that, due to the positive response to date, we have decided to commit to a full production run - which is underway now - and we will be fulfilling all orders, regardless of whether or not we reach our target, Thanks! 

Chase, Blaine, & Michael.

Hi, my name is Michael Coates, from Melbourne Australia, and with my two sons, Chase and Blaine, we have designed a smarter, safer product for the health and fitness industry. 
Introducing DUMBAGS: a sand-filled, material-based alternative to the common dumbbells and kettlebells used in weight and personal training.
Smart weights
In simple terms, Dumbags are sandbags of various sizes and weights, purpose-designed for the fitness and personal training industry. 
Dumbbells and Kettlebells are great, and have helped millions of people get in to shape, however in many circumstances there can be serious problems associated with their use. That's why we created Dumbags - to solve the many problems associated with metal bells, particularly personal injury and property damage. Kettlebells and dumbbells are great and have their place, its just that Dumbags are better! Why? See our 9 main reasons below:

 -      Personal Safety: Dumbags' soft design means dropping or banging a weight on any part of your body will not cause serious injury.
-       Less Noise: Because they are filled with sand, our weights won't make a huge amount of noise when dropped.
-       Avoid Property Damage: Unlike dropping a metal weight, dropping a Dumbag on a timber or tiled floor will not damage the surface - meaning you can work out wherever you want.
-       More Options: Their flexible design allows you to hold more than one Dumbag at a time - rather than just one kettlebell or dumbbell.
-       Easily Change Sizes: To change sizes with traditional weights, you needs lots of weights on hand, or you need to adjust clips, screw on nuts and clamps etc. Just 3 Dumbags weights give you the equivalent of 7 different weight sizes.
-       Cost Effective: Dumbags won't cost hundreds or even thousands of dollars like metal weight sets; they are extremely cost-effective.
-       Unlimited exercises: Because of their innovative design features, you are only limited by your imagination as to the type and number of exercises you can do with Dumbags.
-       Easy to Transport: Dumbags are lightweight and easily transportable, unlike metal weights which are heavy and cumbersome, and impossible to transport safely.
-       Innovative Design: The design of dumbbells and kettlebells has stayed the same for hundreds of years. It's time for something New!

story:
My name is Jackie and I have been a supporter of our soldiers and veterans for my entire life. For two years I was a volunteer for an Army program called "Freedom Team Salute" until the program was dropped due to budget cuts.

These severely wounded veterans gave up their independence so we could keep ours. By being able to supply one of these brave heroes with the track chair, we will be giving them back their independence. Imagine being able to roll along the ocean on the beach for the first time since coming home from war.

Your contributions will help make this a reality. The track chairs are made available from Independence Fund and run between $12,000 - $15,000 each. They are an entirely 100% non-profit and all funds will go directly to the purchase of one of these chairs. The magnitude of the cost is why I am reaching out for everyone to help me make this a reality for our veterans.

Locally we will be holding a fundraising day on March 22, 2014. A custom made queen size quilt made out of Harley Davidson t-shirts will be raffled off and we will be having an auction and a poker run to help raise the much need monies.

If we don't reach our goal of an entire chair, what money is raised will still be given to Independence Fund to help off set the cost.

Getting another veteran back into the real world will also help them to continue to contribute to our great nation. Being mobile again will give them the opportunity to hold a better paying job. So please open up your hearts and help us to reach our goal of supplying a track chair to a severely wounded veteran.

Other Ways You Can Help

I realize in these trying times, not everyone will be able to donate to this great cause. If this is true for you, then please help in other ways, Send your friends over to our page and talk about this program to everyone. Help to raise awareness of our wounded veterans.

The main factor that made us decide to raise money for a chair through the Independence Fund is the fact that The Independence Fund is an entirely 100%, all-volunteer non-profit whose Board of Directors is comprised entirely of combat veterans. Their organization's administrative costs are less than 1% each year! That means that more than 99% of every dollar that that receive goes directly to a Veteran - Thanks to amazing people and communities like YOU!
