story:
The World's Most

Beautiful & Luxurious Smart Switch

Allow iotty smartness into your home.
Enjoy its modern Italian design and let yourself relax, keeping control just a touch away.

 

 

 

 

The iotty Smart  Switch takes your home, office, and anywhere else you need to update your lighting to a whole new level. 

 

 

 

 

Available for the Most Common Standards in the world!

Power supply: 90 – 260 VAC input, 50/60Hz frequency

 

USA, Canada, Australia, ...

 

Europe, Far East, Middle East, Africa, ...


** only BLACK and WHITE available for current perks

 

Crafted using Italian ingenuity and design, the iotty Smart Switch is made to fit seamlessly into your home decor.

  • Multiple colors 
  • Switch out the color you want based on your changing decor 
  • Glows softly, doubles as a nightlight or turns off completely for a great night sleep 
  • Timeless aesthetic

 

 

Although you can turn the lights on and off, as well as adjust the background lights with a single touch of the iotty Smart Light Switch Pro, all the advanced features can be easily controlled from our intuitive app.

 

 

 

Although right now your iotty Smart  Switch only works with the Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, IFTTT and Gideon. 

 

The iotty Smart Switch is so easy to install, you can do it in less than ten minutes....

All you need is a screwdriver! However, if you do run into any issues, we have tech support via website chat and email for your convenience.


Follow these simple steps to get your iotty Smart Switch up and running.

 

 

 

 

The iotty Smart Switch is easy-to-install and connects to 1, 2, or 3 gang portals in your home without the assistance of an electrician or special tools beyond a screwdriver. Once installed, simply set up your app and you’re ready to go. The iotty Smart Switch uses your wireless router to connect to your smartphone, enabling you to switch lights on and off, check your power usage, connect multiple lights at one time, and more advanced functions. While you’re away, your app is connected via cloud, so you can adjust for changes in your schedule, set automatic "away" functions, and manage your lights or garage door from anywhere in the world.

 


 

SEE WHAT IT CAN DO

 

OUR LUXURY INDIEGOGO SPOT

 

 

  • Power supply: 90 – 260 VAC input, 50/60Hz frequency
  • Neutral wire required
  • Works with or without Wi-Fi 
  • Standby power: < 0.5W
  • Supports any bulb (incandescent, fluorescent, LED)
  • Max 5A resistive load per output
  • Working temperature: 0 ÷ +45 °C

 

 

For USA, Canada, Australia, ...

 

Power supply: 90 – 260 VAC input, 50/60Hz frequency

 

For Europe, Middle East, ...

 

Power supply: 90 – 260 VAC input, 50/60Hz frequency

 

 

The iotty mission is to prove to the world that everyone can easily install and enjoy IoT electronics in their homes. The iotty Smart Light Switch Pro is the first in the family of IoT devices for home automation that follows a DIY philosophy with a special focus on functionality and a contemporary, beautiful aesthetic, proving that everyone can have a smart home without sacrificing on style.

The iotty Smart Light Switch is just the first step. We are working hard to apply the same principle to every home device: watering plants for the garden, weather stations, music players, air conditioning and heating controllers… the sky’s the limit! We plan on making our products to be affordable, aesthetically pleasing, and easy enough for anyone to use.

The iotty Team is comprised of electronic and informatics engineers and entrepreneurs. Over a year ago, the iotty team decided to embrace the challenge of effectively bringing IoT into homes at a reasonable price that are simple enough to install for the average DIYer.

 

 

 

We appreciate your support! The iotty Team has been working hard to make the best possible product for our early supporters. Thank you for taking the time to check out our Indiegogo campaign – we hope to continue to make your home even smarter!

 

 

Please take the time to follow iotty on Social Media for the latest news on iotty products, news, and related topics.




 

Where do we ship?

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included.

 

Risks and Challenges

Development of the iotty Light Switch is nearing completion, hardware and software functionality is already developed. We are in the process of arranging mass testing and production.

As with all capital construction products, time and/or cost overruns can impact the final delivery of the product. As we strive to provide you with the ultimate smart home light switch, and would not feel comfortable releasing any product until it is perfect, there is always the possibility of delays. We promise to do our best to keep you as up to date as possible on any and all iotty related developments and testing all quality assurance product issues, before iotty’s official release.

FAQ's

PRODUCT FEATURES

Why do I need an iotty Smart Switch in my home?

Easy – to simplify your life! We live in a fast-paced world, where time is valuable. Quickly install the iotty Smart Switch and connect your entire home, all through one application.

Totally Wireless?

Yes, totally Wireless! Other than installing the device in the wall, the iotty Smart Switch and all iotty products are designed to operate over WiFi completely wirelessly, without any control hub. Once the light switch is installed, connect through WiFi to all of your iotty devices through the iotty App.

Does the iotty Smart Switch work with USA and EU light switches?

We designed the iotty SmartSwitch to fit most standard USA and EU light switches. iotty Smart Switch is available in a variety of versions. When campaign is finished, you will receive a Reward Survey by email, then you can specify formats, colors and number of gangs.
Power supply is always 90 – 260 VAC input, 50/60Hz frequency, on all versions.

What colors are available?

iotty Light Switch is available in a variety of colors to help match your home decor. When campaign is finished, you will receive a Reward Survey by email, then you can specify formats, colors and number of gangs.

What tools do I need to install the iotty Light Switch?

A standard screwdriver and a DIY attitude! We designed iotty to be simple and easy to install with minimal tools needed.

What operating system is iotty Light Switch compatible with?

The iotty App is compatible with every smartphone and tablet running Android 4+ or iOS 8+.

Can I use my iPad or Tablet?

Yes! As long as your iPad/Tablet runs off Android 5+ of iOS 8+ software, iotty is compatible.

Do I need the iotty application to use an iotty Light Switch?

To connect device to WiFi and make customized settings, yes, the iotty application is needed. To turn on/off all lights, the iotty application is not needed. Once device is connected to WiFi, it can be used also with other integrated Smart Home platforms like Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant.

How many gangs can a single iotty Light Switch manage?

A single iotty Light Switch can connect 1 gang in US version, 1 or 2 gang in European 85mm x 85mm version and 3 gang in European 125mm x 85mm version. For US and Canada, also Double and Triple Glass plate will be available

What does iotty Light Switch control?

iotty Light Switch connects to light sources throughout any home or office. Supports any bulb (incandescent, fluorescent, LED) or resistive load of max 5A. Turn on or off lights, set schedules, and even open or close gates. Each individual light source can be programmed into the application to customize settings.

What other iotty products are in development?

In the future, iotty will become a series of affordable, DIY products that will help connect an entire home. Future products ideas include: power switch, thermostat, plant watering, aquarium monitoring, security cameras, music, and weather forecasts.

Does the iotty Light Switch come with a warranty?

Each iotty Light Switch comes with a one-year warranty. If anything breaks, contact our team and we will send you a new one!

 

TECHNICAL QUESTIONS

 

How does the iotty Light Switch work?

The iotty Light Smart runs through your home wireless router, which is connected to the cloud. From there, data is stored in the iotty server, using Secure Connection (SSL), which serves as a storage for user data, hub for device-to-app communication, and collects statistics. The iotty application can be accessed through any smartphone or tablet, which will pull information from the cloud.

What data is tracked in the iotty Application?

Data collection includes usage time of day, scheduling, automated actions, WiFi, GEOLocation and all other enabled actions.

How iotty Light Switch Calculates Energy Consumption: The iotty Light Switch collect all usage time of day, including manual and automatic usage, so it perfectly knows how many time you light has stayed ON. Through the APP, you can specify the electrical load for each gang and how much is your energy cost, so that you can view statistic based on money and energy.

Is iotty Light Switch dimmer capable?

iotty Smart Switch works with external dimmers.

Is 2 or 3 ways (Multi Ways Switching) mode supported?

iotty Smart Switch supports Multi Ways Switching via Wi-Fi.

Do iotty Light Switch work over z-wave technology?

iotty Light Switch technology is totally different, it has built in WiFi and it is designed to operate over WiFi completely wirelessly, without z-wave or any other control hub.

Is neutral wire required?

Yes it is. Most of the time the neutral wire is present. If it is not, it is extremely easy to retrieve it from a nearby electrical outlet. 
 

 

DISTRIBUTION

 

Where will you ship?

We are shipping worldwide!

What will the devices cost at retail?

Iotty Light Switches retail for $109.00.

I am a distributor or reseller. How do I contact you?

Please contact our iotty team at sales@iotty.com

 

CUSTOMER SUPPORT

 

Do you have customer service and technical support?

If you have any questions, please send us a direct message on Indiegogo, leave us a comment, or send an email to support@iotty.com and we would be more than happy to help!

How do I contribute to your campaign?

Indiegogo has provided details on how to contribute to a campaign. You can find the details listed out here.

What colors are available?
iotty Light Switch is available in a variety of colors to help match your home decor. When campaign is finished, you will receive a Reward Survey by email, then you can specify formats, colors and number of gangs.
What tools do I need to install the iotty Light Switch?
A standard screwdriver and a DIY attitude! We designed iotty to be simple and easy to install with minimal tools needed.
What operating system is iotty Light Switch compatible with?
The iotty App is compatible with every smartphone and tablet running Android 4+ or iOS 8+.
Can I use my iPad or Tablet?
Yes! As long as your iPad/Tablet runs off Android 5+ of iOS 8+ software, iotty is compatible.
Do I need the iotty application to use an iotty Light Switch?
To connect device to WiFi and make customized settings, yes, the iotty application is needed. To turn on/off all lights, the iotty application is not needed. Once device is connected to WiFi, it can be used also with other integrated Smart Home platforms like Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant.
How many gangs can a single iotty Light Switch manage?
A single iotty Light Switch can connect 1 gang in US version, 1 or 2 gang in European 85mm x 85mm version and 3 gang in European 125mm x 85mm version. For US and Canada, also Double and Triple Glass plate will be available
What does iotty Light Switch control?
iotty Light Switch connects to light sources throughout any home or office. Supports any bulb (incandescent, fluorescent, LED) or resistive load of max 5A. Turn on or off lights, set schedules, and even open or close gates. Each individual light source can be programmed into the application to customize settings.
What other iotty products are in development?
In the future, iotty will become a series of affordable, DIY products that will help connect an entire home. Future products ideas include: power switch, thermostat, plant watering, aquarium monitoring, security cameras, music, and weather forecasts.
Does the iotty Light Switch come with a warranty?
Each iotty Light Switch comes with a one-year warranty. If anything breaks, contact our team and we will send you a new one!
 
TECHNICAL QUESTIONS
 
How does the iotty Light Switch work?
The iotty Light Smart runs through your home wireless router, which is connected to the cloud. From there, data is stored in the iotty server, using Secure Connection (SSL), which serves as a storage for user data, hub for device-to-app communication, and collects statistics. The iotty application can be accessed through any smartphone or tablet, which will pull information from the cloud.
What data is tracked in the iotty Application?
Data collection includes usage time of day, scheduling, automated actions, WiFi, GEOLocation and all other enabled actions.
How iotty Light Switch Calculates Energy Consumption: The iotty Light Switch collect all usage time of day, including manual and automatic usage, so it perfectly knows how many time you light has stayed ON. Through the APP, you can specify the electrical load for each gang and how much is your energy cost, so that you can view statistic based on money and energy.
Is iotty Light Switch dimmer capable?
iotty Smart Switch works with external dimmers.
Is 2 or 3 ways (Multi Ways Switching) mode supported?
iotty Smart Switch supports Multi Ways Switching via Wi-Fi.
Do iotty Light Switch work over z-wave technology?
iotty Light Switch technology is totally different, it has built in WiFi and it is designed to operate over WiFi completely wirelessly, without z-wave or any other control hub.
Is neutral wire required?
Yes it is. Most of the time the neutral wire is present. If it is not, it is extremely easy to retrieve it from a nearby electrical outlet.  
 
DISTRIBUTION
 
Where will you ship?
We are shipping worldwide!
What will the devices cost at retail?
Iotty Light Switches retail for $109.00.
I am a distributor or reseller. How do I contact you?
Please contact our iotty team at sales@iotty.com
 
CUSTOMER SUPPORT
 
Do you have customer service and technical support?
If you have any questions, please send us a direct message on Indiegogo, leave us a comment, or send an email to  support@iotty.com and we would be more than happy to help!
How do I contribute to your campaign?
Indiegogo has provided details on how to contribute to a campaign.  You can find the details listed out here.

story:
A Swimming Pool! At Nowhere!

Poolhaus is returning to the playa for 2014! An oasis of water at the heart of Nowhere for you to splash about, cool off and relax!  First seen at Nowhere in 2011, Poolhaus is returning bigger and better in 2014 with more splash space for you dusty Nooners and a super-dooper-heavy-duty filter system! We want to make all this awesomeness happen, but we need your help!

Building a clean and safe swimming pool in the middle of a dusty desert is a tough job! Traditional chemicals would damage the playa so we’ve had to build an extra-powerful filter system to keep the pool free of dust, grime and nasties. We’re shipping 8 tons of irrigation water into the desert and arranging for nearly 300Kwh of power to run our pumps! There’s new equipment to buy, filter cartridges to replace, and all of our kit to haul out to the desert - we can’t do all that without you!

To make Poolhaus a reality we need to raise a minimum of £1500 by the end of May. That’ll get us to the starting line on the 8th July, topped up with water and ready for the fun to begin! If you can stretch a bit further we can bring you even more! Anything over our target will be put towards a ‘Wunderbar!’ a shady poolside bar with comfy cushions and free ice-cold cocktails for as long as our funds hold out!

So go on! Pledge what you can, and help us create a little moist patch in the dusty hotpants of Nowhere!

story:
Classic Models: Black and White 

Limited Edition: GoSho Walnut 

Having walnut wood as building material is not just about the looks, it’s about the acoustics too. Wood is naturally non-resonant, which will help speakers with minimizing distortion. It’s also great for amplification, which is why for centuries musicians build their instruments with wood to create a richer, clearer sound. 

  • "The brightness on this thing is really great... even if I open my curtain a little bit...  it still looks really clear!"
  • "The sound on the projector is loud and really nice. I didn't think it was gonna sound this good."
  • "Very good for gamers, because you're engulfed in the whole thing; it's hard not to be impressed!"

With 180 ANSI lumens, GoSho surpasses all other mini-projectors on the market with superior picture brightness and unbeatable contrast levels and clarity. You can enjoy HD picture in a regularly-lit room - so now, every seat is the best seat in the house.

GoSho may be small in size, but its 200" widescreen projection turns almost any home, office or cafe into an immersive cinema.

With its built-in WIFI module, GoSho can stream content directly from your smartphone, tablet, desktop, and game consoles. Mirror what’s on your screen with AirPlay and HDMI cable. GoSho also works with TV boxes and various streaming sticks, so all your favorite shows are right at your fingertips.

Connect to virtually anything

An Operating System That Gets You

You told us, we listened! GoSho 1.0 OS (linux) offers an uniquely designed, easy-to-use UI to help you quickly display films, TV, games and more.

A projector this small (3.5 inches) and this light (only 434g / 15.3oz). We'll also include up to 11000mAh durable battery so the projector can have an extended playtime of 4 hours, so you can use GoSho anywhere you want. ​

Check out this video of our early adopter Conner using GoSho in his backyard!

To make it even better, GoSho comes equipped with our patented Auto-Keystone Correction and a built-in 15-degree Kickstand, so you can easily adjust your projection height, while it automatically corrects the angle to prevent images from stretching.

Literally. Pair it with your smart home assistants like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, to achieve voice control capability.

 

 

 

The Making of GoSho

Our research and design team in L.A. collaborated with engineers in Shenzhen who specialize in manufacturing optimization, to insure that GoSho is not just a great product idea, but also mass producible and guaranteed to deliver to your doors. In fact, we've already started mass production!

We're in production! Earliest shipping starts in August! 

 

Press Kit

story:
Click here for this special offer

 

 

“Leaving your dog home alone can be challenging,” said Michael, Founder of Petkix. “As a dog parent, the struggle of having to leave my dog is what initially inspired the development of Petkix Camera.”

Featured In: Australian Dog Lover, Technobark ,  CES 2019 ,  Geeky Gadgets,

 

 

World Only 360° Coverage Dog Camera

Petkix Camera provides dog parents a superior coverage thanks to its massive 360° field of view in less than 3 seconds. 

Panning left/right rotation range that enables dog parents to take it for a spin to patrol the room, or set the camera’s patrol route with up to 4 custom waypoints to see every detail of the room, what dogs are doing while users are away, on-demand.

 

Privacy Protection

Turn on the Privacy Protection mode and Petkix will automatically rotate to face the wall when you are at home or when you you don't use the APP.

 

The Best Video Quality Available

 

a picture worth a thousand words. Check out full comparison clip below. 

 

 

 

1. Real-time Barking Alerts 

In addition to keeping dogs safe at home, Petkix gives pet parents real-time smart alerts to prevent potentially dangerous situations. 

 

Powered with AI technology, Peace of mind for every dog parent! Petkix 360° Dog Camera automatically alerts you via your phone when your dog is barking to keep your dogs safe from unexpected emergencies such as house fire or gas leak.

 

2. Real-Time Activities Alerts

Petkix detects when your dog is getting active and auto-records a 15-second dog-related event. Keep an eye on your dog without constantly monitoring the app by turning on Activity Alert. 

 

3. Fun Treat-Tossing With a Wide Range of Tossing and Built-in Treat Sizes filters

Petkix 360° Dog Camera gives you the best interaction tool with your dog. You can toss treats as the rewards for their positive behaviors, reduce their feeling of loneliness, and make them happy.  Also, an updated treat flinging mechanism allows users to better control treat portions and supports a greater variety of treat sizes for the treat-tossing feature. 

Now, you can control the range, change the angle to fling the treats, and choose the best filter that fits the size of your dog's favorite treats. 

 

4. Interactive Live-streaming Video & Audio  Call

Petkix live-streaming feature is our main priority to help you be in touch with your furbaby real-time. The camera delivers FULL HD with stunning clarity for the best view of your dog. A high-quality microphone with a built-in speaker enables you to listen and talk to him while not at home.

 

5. Night Vision

Petkix comes with the infrared sensor capable of streaming clear black and white video in the pitch dark. When the sensor detects a low level of ambient light, your Petkix camera will automatically activate the Night Vision mode.

 

6. Pet Diary

The “Pet Diary" ensures you never miss a moment with 24/7 video history. Petkix automatically creates a 1-minute time-lapse video clip of your dog's day. It uses the activity alert clips from 9 am to 7 pm.

 

 

What Everyone’s Saying About Petkix?

 

 

One App. For Any Device

Petkix app, combined with the Petkix device, can revolutionize how you care for, interact with, and train your pooch. This app works with any iOS, Android compatible device. It makes checking in and having fun with your fur babies so easy even when you're not home.

 

 

How APP Works

Simple icons on the main screen make it intuitive to navigate. You can patrol your room with a 360° camera, see, talk to, and toss treats to your precious pup from anywhere using your phone! Whether you are in another room or another country, the Petkix app lets you stay connected.

 

Behind The Screen

We took all the photos and clips in our office and at a friend's dog coffee shop. 

 

Dogs love Petkix 

 

 

Petkix Specifications 

  • Color: White
  • Weight: 28.2 oz (800g)
  • Product dimensions: 9.45" (240mm) * 5.51" (140mm) * 5.51" (140mm)
  • Power Cable Length: 6 feet (1.8m)
  • Ports: Type-C USB
  • Power Adapter Input: 110-240V (AC/DC)
  • Power Adapter Output: 5V/2000mA
  • Operation Temperature: 32℉ – 104℉ / 0°C – 40 °C
  • Operation Humidity < 90% at 104℉ / 40°C 

 

 

What’s in the Box 

  • Petkix 360 Cam Pan x1 
  • Power adapter x1 
  • USB cable x1 Quick 
  • Start Guide x1

 

 

Meet Petkix Team

Based in California, Petkix is made up of a small group of friends that have shared interests in Hardware and Pet Technology. After putting our heads together and working with amazing people across California, Taiwan, and Vietnam, we are proud to finally get to this stage and share the project we have passionately worked on for the last two years.

 

Petkix Team

 

Mata & Our Film Crew

 

Follow our story:

Instagram https://www.instagram.com/petkixcamera/

Twitter  https://twitter.com/petkix/ 

Website https://petkix.com/

Partnership

https://petkix-worlds-first-dog-camera.kickboos...

Contact: hello@petkix.com

story:
Although there are lots of LED touch lamps on the market, most of them:

1). Come with long cords, which either make your desktop messy or are easy to trip over.

2). Come with short cords that can only be used in a very limited area.

3). Are useless if there is no socket on the wall or floor nearby.

4). Are extremely fragile.

 

 

 

A minimalist yet functional LED touch lamp featuring great quality and can be easily carried around.

 

 

Simple, Functional, Reliable and Eco-friendly.

Cuppa comes in 3 colors and it perfectly blends in with all types of furniture & decorations. 

 

 

 

No need to invest in loads of lamps or extension sockets. Say goodbye to your messy desktop. Never trip over power cords again. Simply carry Cuppa around and place it anywhere, anytime! A reading lamp, a bedside lamp, an ambient lamp, a backup lamp during a blackout or even just a final touch to your furniture and décor.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The 360°Any Touch means Cuppa can be switched on/off from any position on the base, no more fumbling around for a tiny switch on the cord. With its patent-pending 360°Any Touch Technology, Cuppa is the world’s first cordless lamp featuring full-body touch control.

 

 

 

 

Since we designed Cuppa with full-body touch control, why not remove all physical buttons to make it completely minimalist?

 

 

 

More importantly, the buttonless design doesn’t sacrifice any functions. With its 360°Any Touch Technology, Cuppa still features stepless dimming and memory mode.

 

Touch & hold to trigger the stepless dimming.

 

 

 

The memory mode allows you to turn Cuppa back on each time, at the previous brightness level.

 

 

 

Stepless Dimming and Memory Mode makes it easy for users to customize their favorite type of illumination.

 

Featuring TYPE C fast charging, Cuppa can last for 2 hours with only 10 mins charging. With a full charge (2.5 hours), it can stay on for as long as 12 hours. 

 

 

 

You can even charge Cuppa with a power bank, meaning that you can use Cuppa as a perfect backup lamp, especially during a blackout.

 

 

Lightweight means poor quality, plastic material and a tendency to fall over. Heavyweight lamps are fragile and not easy to move around. Cuppa weighs a decent 1.98lbs (about the same weight as a cup of coffee), which makes it feel as good as it looks.

 

 

 

Meanwhile, the sticky base pad makes Cuppa extremely steady, with zero chance of it falling off.

 

 

 

 

 

Vintage style | Modern LED Technology with 80% of Energy-saving

 

  • Save up to 80% energy compared to the standard bulb.
  • Long life (up to 30,000 hours) - Reduce the hassle and money of replacing bulbs.
  • Comfort the eyes
  • 4w (40w equivalent)
  • 3000K, soft white, e27, 450lm

 

  • Recycled Fabric
  • Water-Resistant
  • Flame –Retardant
  • E27 Lampshade Holder

Cuppa is universally compatible with all e27 LED bulbs  ( DC/5v/4w ) and lampshades, 

 

 

 

 

“A small leak will sink a great ship”. That's why we paid so much attention on every single detail of Cuppa. Since Cuppa is designed to be frequently carried around, we built Cuppa to a very strict quality standard. Featuring an IP65 waterproof base, a flame-retardant, and water-resistant lampshade, Cuppa is technically the lamp version of “King Kong Barbie”. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We even make Cuppa 100% safe, there is absolutely no risk of an electrical shock.（Kids-friendly） 

 

 

 

 

CUPPA comes in three colors:

  • Classic Black
  • Cream White
  • Mint Green

 

 

 

 

 

 

With special THANKS to DINGHAO LIGHTING CO., LTD which is specialized in mobile lighting and provides technical support onto Cuppa. 

 

 

We wanted to design a smart lamp that would work individually without WIFI, Bluetooth, APPs, a smartphone or a remote controller, but still be smart and minimalist. This may sound crazy but please think about these:

  • How many APPs do you download but rarely use?
  • How often you really use them? Is it necessary to use them every single time?
  • If so, is it a bit of a hassle instead of being enjoyable?
  • What if the app stops updating?
  • What if the remote controller goes missing?
  • What if the smart device is easily broken?

This is where the idea came from, this is why we integrated all the main features into Cuppa, making it a cordless LED touch lamp with excellent quality.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Prototype Demonstration

360° Any Touch Control | Stepless Dimming | Fast Charging | Bulb & Lampshade Installation | Waterproof

 Memory Mode

 Brightness

 On/Off Switch (Lock Mode)

Sticky Base Pad

If so, is it a bit of a hassle instead of being enjoyable?
What if the app stops updating?
What if the remote controller goes missing?
What if the smart device is easily broken?
This is where the idea came from, this is why we integrated all the main features into Cuppa, making it a cordless LED touch lamp with excellent quality.       Prototype Demonstration360° Any Touch Control | Stepless Dimming | Fast Charging | Bulb & Lampshade Installation | Waterproof Memory Mode Brightness On/Off Switch (Lock Mode)Sticky Base Pad

story:
Look Who's Talking About the Stikitty Base!

Cats Online Blog: http://bit.ly/17TRmbN

Austin Newswire: http://bit.ly/14J1Feu

5 to Close: http://bit.ly/16EhbwN

Press Box (UK): http://bit.ly/16zCT4z

The Startup Business Hub: http://bit.ly/16zCT4z

 

 
We have two kids, a dog, and a cat. And a lot of mess.

We love our pets, but not the mess. We especially do not love cat litter mess.

 

No solution seemed to work to rid our house and our cat's paws of unhealthy cat litter mess until I accidentally found spilled cat litter on a cleanroom tacky mat. The  idea for the Stikitty System was born! 

 

The Stikitty System is my quest to bring the world's cats and their humans an innovative, effective, and stylish fix to cat litter mess.

 

This campaign is to fund the development of the Stikitty Base, a brand new product that improves the performance and style of the tacky mat. We want your pet to be happy and healthy. We want you to be happy and healthy, too. Read on for how we're using technology and innovative design to accomplish this.

 

Stikitty Base (in Prototype Stage) + Stikitty Refill (Existing) = The Stikitty System

  • Beyond a cat litter mat – Made from environmentally friendly materials, the Stikitty System stops litter tracking and cleans cats’ paws.
  • Proven idea, improved concept – The Stikitty Refill is already a successful product, the Stikitty Base extends the effectiveness and appeal with a chic, stylish look.

 

 


Our Rescue Kitty, Cookie, with the Stikitty System
(the Base Prototype in a sample Zebra print and Refill)

 

 

  • Painful paws relieved – Litter stuck between cats’ paws can become hardened and painful; the Stikitty System helps separate paws and grab the litter as cats step on the tacky mat.
  • Make cat litter tracking a thing of the past – The Stikitty System is sticky enough to grab litter but not bother the paws of some of the most finicky cats. And, it stops up to 95% of the litter keeping your home clean and healthy for your family.



Stikitty Base Rendering for Manufacturing Process

 

Potential Sizes (please note that we are in the prototype stage and the finished product sizes may adjust slightly):

 

Small System: -- Base 20" x 24" -- Refill 14" x 18"

Standard System: -- Base 24" x 36" -- Refill 18" x 30"
 
 

  • Sleek, trendy style – We're choosing the latest designer colors and patterns for the Stikitty System because cats and their humans deserve the best.
  • You won't need to hide your cat litter mat ever again – The Stikitty System will be pretty enough to show off!

 

Potential Design Options for the Stikitty Base (Please note: these are sample options and do not necessarily represent the final designs for the Stikitty Base).

 

 

  • Superior clean and happier, healthier pets – Stikitty System uses unique cleanroom technology to stop cat litter mess better than most conventional options.
  • Convenient subscription – Once you have the Stikitty Base, you can choose to have Stikitty Refills sent right to your door every 2-3 months. You don't have to remember to go online or drive to the store to purchase!

 

 

Results are a Cleaner, Healthier Home and a Happier Pet

 

  

With your donations, we will begin manufacturing the first of many Stikitty bases. We'll start with the Zebra print and then, if we raise enough funds, we'll ask YOU to help choose the second style. Additionally, we will use the funds to set up international distribution so people all over the world can get rid of cat litter tracking with the Stikitty System (without having to pay a paw and a tail in shipping!). Please help us rid the world of unhealthy cat litter mess! Fund the Stikitty Base today.

 

PERKS FOR YOU

story:
NEU! Siehe deutsche Version weiter unten.

 

 

THE MISSION

Hello, my name is Stefan Walz.  I used to be the co-owner of the "Tabou Tiki Room".  An infamous tiki bar, and first of its kind, in Berlin, Germany.  The place is long gone now, but it was there that the dream to produce my own infused rum was born.

 

"Tabou" was a bar that focused on the almost forgotten, rum based cocktails of the old days served in authentic tiki mugs, and an assortment of sipping rums fifty strong.  I had the pleasure of being in charge of searching and acquiring these rums from around the world.  As you can imagine, it was a fun and exciting job.  However, back in 2004 i just could not find a brand of spiced rum that met with my high standards.  What i found was mass produced liquor, flavored with artificial vanilla to cover up the taste of what was quite obviously mediocre rum.  It was through this search that the idea to make my own bottled rum began to form.  Don't get me wrong, i know that there are fine spiced rums out there nowadays, but i want to show that it is possible to produce handcrafted infused rum at a reasonable price, while maintaining a far superior quality to the industry standard.

 

I began by trying several recipes using quality rum with an assortment of exotic spices and various types of fruit infusions.  After several months of experimenting, analyzing, and taste-testing i concocted several unique possibilities, but felt that something crucial was missing.  In the end, it was my girlfriend who suggested the last, key ingredient and I knew that we had crafted something special.  Two weeks and several business meetings later, I had found a way to make naturally infused rum in small batches.

 

DIE MISSION

Hallo, mein Name ist Stefan Walz. Ich war Mitbesitzer des „Tabou Tiki Room“, eine
klassische Tiki-Bar (und erste ihrer Art) in Berlin. Die Bar existiert schon
lange nicht mehr, aber es ist der Ort, an dem die Idee, eigenen „infused“ Rum
herzustellen, geboren wurde.


„Tabou“ spezialisierte sich auf fast vergessene Rum-Cocktails aus vergangenen Tagen, serviert in authentischen Tiki-Bechern, und eine Auswahl von mindestens 50
fassgelagerten Rumsorten. Es war mir eine Freude, diese teilweise seltenen
Flaschen auf Reisen aufzustöbern. Wie man sich vorstellen kann, war dies der
angenehmste Teil des Berufs Barbesitzer. Trotz langer Suche, konnte ich 2004
keinen spiced Rum finden, der meinen hohen Erwartungen entsprach. Was ich
vorfand war industriell hergestellte Massenware, die mit künstlichen Aromen und
Farbstoffen versetzt wird, um den Geschmack des offensichtlich billigen
Grundproduktes zu überdecken. Während dieser erfolglosen Suche entstand die
Idee einer Tabou Tiki Room Hausmarke. Verstehen Sie mich nicht falsch, mir ist
bewusst, dass heutzutage ausgezeichnete spiced Rums existieren, aber ich möchte beweisen, dass es möglich ist, einen handgefertigten infused Rum für einen erschwinglichen Preis herzustellen und dabei qualitativ weit über dem Industriestandard zu liegen.



Ich begann mit einer Serie von Rezepten, bei der ich 4-jährigen Rum mit einer Mischung aus exotischen Gewürzen und Früchten ansetzte. Nach unzähligen Experimenten, Analysen und Geschmackstests, fehlte noch immer das perfekte Rezept. Am Ende steuerte meine Freundin die wichtigste Zutat bei, die die Rezeptur zu etwas Besonderem macht. Zwei Wochen und mehrere Geschäftstermine später, hatte ich einen Weg gefunden, Meermaid Infused Rum professionell in kleinen Mengen herstellen zu lassen.



 

 

THE GOAL

To fulfill our dream of seeing Meermaid Rum on the shelves of bars all over the world, we have created a business plan and approximate cost estimate of $9,005 to cover the following expenses:

 

 

Das Ziel

Um unseren Traum zu erfüllen, Meermaid Infused Rum weltweit in den Regalen von Bars zu sehen, haben wir diesen Geschäftsplan ausgearbeitet und die Kosten auf 6.731€ geschätzt, die wie folgt aufgelistet sind:

 

200 liters of rum (65% alcohol) $1.717            1.283€
Shipping $256                  191€
Bottles $768                  574€
Bottle Caps $64                      47€
Lables $76                      56€
Infusion & Bottling $3.460            2.586€
Taxes ca. $1.281               957€
Extras $640                  478€
Indiegogo fee

$743                  555€

(if goalreached)

___________________________________________________

TOTAL:                        $9.005            6.731€   

Because of the natural infusion process, it is not predictable how many bottles I will get in total. I am estimating it will be approximately 300-350.

With the profit from the first batch of Meermaid Infused Rum we will produce batch No.2 and create a website that allows online ordering. We will also focus on distribution outside Berlin and developing other Meermaid Infused Rum-based products.

No time or money will be wasted on marketing!

It will be a total“Do-it-Yourself” style project and we need your help to get to the next level and make my dream a reality.

Please check out our perks below for ways you can be rewarded for your contribution to our campaign. We sincerely thank you for your time!

Duch das natürliche Ansetzen, ist noch nicht klar, wieviele Flasche man aus der Rohmasse erhält. Es werden ca. 300-350 Flaschen sein.

Mit dem Gewinn aus der ersten Abfüllung, werden wir die zweite Abfüllung und eine Website mit online-shop finanzieren. Wir werden uns zu diesem Zeitpunkt um den Vertrieb außerhalb von Berlin und die Entwicklung von weiteren Meermaid Produkten kümmern.

Kein Geld wird für unnötiges Marketing vergeudet!

Dies ist ein "Do-it-yourself" Projekt und wir benötigen Eure Hilfe um unseren Traum zu erfüllen. Mit dem Kauf von unseren Produkten (siehe rechts), könnt Ihr zu dem Erfolg des Projektes beitragen.

Danke, dass Ihr Euch die Zeit für unsere Kampagne nehmt!

 

THE ARTWORK

The label artwork was done by the incredibly talented LaLaVox (www.lalavoxbox.com)

Check out the perks. This is the artwork we are using for THE MEERJUNGFRAU & THE UNDINE

 

THE KELPIE (aka The Tabou Tiki Room Mug)

 

 

 

 THE CREW

A big thank you to Damon Zurawski, Matt Voodoo & Dawn Nelson for your support and patience at the video shoot.

story:
Our Story:

Most everyone, man or woman, who has resided in an apartment, home or condominium, or occupied office space has had the occasion to hang pictures and other wall accessories and ornaments.  This task usually requires a tape measure, a hammer, a marking pencil and often a screw driver.  This necessitates retrieving these items which often is difficult as they are not handy, or have been misplaced, or otherwise unavailable.  Our device eliminates these requirements of searching and scrambling for tools, borrowing or buying these tools, asking someone to assist you to complete these simple tasks.  Our device is a ‘one and done solution’ with a durable lightweight composite frame of professional quality which will not mar finishes or surfaces. The tool is easy to use as it has oversized vial level bubble windows for easy, accurate reading.

Short Summary:

I have been involved in construction for the past 20 years and although I am usually prepared, there are times when I have lost my pencil, or a screw driver got misplaced, or I left my level in the truck.  Often, I’ve asked homeowners if they had one or more of these items for me to use and more often than not, they could not find them nor even had them in the house.  So many delays are caused by misplacement or not owning a common tool.  The ‘Hang Me’ answers the needs of regular people and homeowners by having all tools available in one tool, and eliminates misplacement.  The owner saves quite a bit of money in initial expense and in replacement costs.  Everyone, home owner, renter, professional needs the ‘Hang Me’ to make their life easier.


What We Need & What You get:

Our goal is $25,000 and the real good news is that we have done the complete work necessary to order the production of the ‘Hang Me’.  We have utilized a CAD Specialist who has drawn all of the specifications necessary for submission to a production company.  The funds that we receive will enable us to order the actual units and fulfill orders. The amount of money raised dictates the number of units that we can have manufactured.  Profits will be re-invested in production as we believe that the demand for the ‘Hang Me’ shall be tremendous. 

The Impact:  We are www.ganderfly.com , a unique ‘people-inventor-helping-‘ website.   Some of the profits shall be used to further fund this website so that many, many people can submit their ideas and inventions for review and production if warranted….people who would never have a chance to be heard and succeed without our help.  More people can submit their suggestions as to products in development and share in the profits.  Our imaginations know no limits.  We humans must recognize the power that we have within us. Everything on earth begins with thought.   Thoughts have power.  The more imagination that is used in our thinking processes, the more powerful our thoughts are.  Often people only need a little assistance for the stimulation of their thoughts to enter into reality.  This is a ‘win-win situation’ for regular people who are not fortunate enough to be able to fund their dreams.  You shall help us to help people!  Help make their dreams a reality, a reality which benefits many other people.

story:
SAY HI TO NATTYPETZ! A BRAND NEW RANGE OF PRODUCTS TO ENSURE THAT YOUR PETS LIVE IN A SAFE AND HEALTHY ENVIRONMENT.

 

Your support and funding will help us achieve this!

 

Using dirty pet products can cause bacteria and fungal skin diseases with sores, bumps and scabs on the skin. Pets with skin diseases also suffer itch, body odor and shedding of hair resulting in bald spots.
 

  

Pets eating or drinking from bowls or saucers which are infested by bacteria can also suffer gum, tongue and mouth infections.

Our Products are infused with Rozinco, an Antibacterial and Antifungal agent made by enhancing Zinc Oxide.

HOW DOES ROZINCO WORKS?

 

Rozinco, unlike other Antibacterial agents, kills bacteria on contact by rupturing bacteria cell walls. It has been proven in the labs of Institute of Biotechnology and Nanotechnology (IBN) in Singapore.

Rozinco, Our Zinc Oxide enhancement process is patented worldwide.

Rozinco is certified by Tuv-Sud (an international body). It is proven to be safe, gentle, non-irritant and non-toxic to the skin of human and pets. It does not cause allergies and is a skin protectant.

 

Benefits of Rozinco

  • Anti-Bacterial
  • Anti-Fungal
  • Safe on Skin
  • Non-Toxic
  • Suppresses odor

    Zinc Oxide Rozinco against Bacteria

 

 Current NattyPetz Product :

 Pet Leashes

 

 

Pet leashes can collect dirt, bacteria, yeast, and mold. Neglecting to clean or replace pet products can result in a home filled with dirt, bacteria, and allergens.

NattyPetz antibacterial leashes are safe, clean and it also looks stylish on your pet when you bring it out for a walk.

 

We have a list of upcoming products:

1.  Pet Bowl

2. Pet Bedding

3. Pet Towels

4. Pet Car Seat cover

5. Pet Cleaning tools

 

                                                               
                                                                 Certifications

 

We’ve​ ​worked​ with ​renowned​ ​scientists ​to​ ​create​ ​this​ ​patented​ ​product.​ Lab tests at the Institute of Biotechnology and Nanotechnology (IBN) in Singapore have shown our product to be non toxic in hemolytic tests.

Tuv Sud also certified our product to be non irritant (does not cause skin rashes) and non sensitive (does not cause allergies) to skin.

 

 

KEEPING YOUR PETS SAFE AND CLEAN IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY AS A PET OWNER, OUR MISSION IS TO MAKE IT EASIER FOR YOU TO ACHIEVE IT WITH NATTYPETZ.
story_txt:
SAY HI TO NATTYPETZ! A BRAND NEW RANGE OF PRODUCTS TO ENSURE THAT YOUR PETS LIVE IN A SAFE AND HEALTHY ENVIRONMENT. Your support and funding will help us achieve this! Using dirty pet products can cause bacteria and fungal skin diseases with sores, bumps and scabs on the skin. Pets with skin diseases also suffer itch, body odor and shedding of hair resulting in bald spots.   Pets eating or drinking from bowls or saucers which are infested by bacteria can also suffer gum, tongue and mouth infections.Our Products are infused with Rozinco, an Antibacterial and Antifungal agent made by enhancing Zinc Oxide.HOW DOES ROZINCO WORKS? Rozinco, unlike other Antibacterial agents, kills bacteria on contact by rupturing bacteria cell walls. It has been proven in the labs of Institute of Biotechnology and Nanotechnology (IBN) in Singapore.Rozinco, Our Zinc Oxide enhancement process is patented worldwide.Rozinco is certified by Tuv-Sud (an international body). It is proven to be safe, gentle, non-irritant and non-toxic to the skin of human and pets. It does not cause allergies and is a skin protectant. Benefits of Rozinco 
Anti-Bacterial
Anti-Fungal
Safe on Skin
Non-Toxic
Suppresses odorZinc Oxide Rozinco against Bacteria

  Current NattyPetz Product : Pet Leashes  Pet leashes can collect dirt, bacteria, yeast, and mold. Neglecting to clean or replace pet products can result in a home filled with dirt, bacteria, and allergens.NattyPetz antibacterial leashes are safe, clean and it also looks stylish on your pet when you bring it out for a walk. We have a list of upcoming products:1.  Pet Bowl2. Pet Bedding3. Pet Towels4. Pet Car Seat cover5. Pet Cleaning tools                                                                                                                                 Certifications We’ve​ ​worked​ with ​renowned​ ​scientists ​to​ ​create​ ​this​ ​patented​ ​product.​ Lab tests at the Institute of Biotechnology and Nanotechnology (IBN) in Singapore have shown our product to be non toxic in hemolytic tests.Tuv Sud also certified our product to be non irritant (does not cause skin rashes) and non sensitive (does not cause allergies) to skin.  KEEPING YOUR PETS SAFE AND CLEAN IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY AS A PET OWNER, OUR MISSION IS TO MAKE IT EASIER FOR YOU TO ACHIEVE IT WITH NATTYPETZ.

story:
Indiegogo Updates — Sud Stud Manufacturing Progress + Stretch Goals with New Colors

If you've recently placed an order, please expect a delay of up to 11 days for your survey to be sent via BackerKit!

SudStud eliminates bacteria cultivation, saves money on fancy soaps, and cleans better than your current showering routine.

 

 

SudStud may look simple; however, every aspect from its size, shape, and pillars have a uniquely engineered purpose of cleaning deeper.

 

 

As an alternative to the notoriously filthy loofahs we all use, Sud Stud's innovative design uses less soap and creates a frothier lather for a deeper clean while also eliminating bacteria build-up while awaiting its next use.

 

Hi everyone, I'm Dale and I'm going to solve a few problems you didn't know you had and upgrade your current showering routine.

 

 

When I finally became fed up with the current soap bar options available and being a stubborn millennial, I decided not to switch to body wash but to take it upon myself to create an accessory that will make my favorite soaps bars more efficient. Thus Sud Stud was born, and here we are, on crowdfunding project number two...

 

Reduce Bacteria with SudStud:

Clean Deeper with SudStud:

Scrub Better with SudStud:

Save Money with SudStud:

Not Just for Soap Bars:

Click Here to Order Two Sud Studs!

SudStud changes the traditional ways of body cleaning by creating a simple to use shower and accessory:

 

Sud Stud can easily expand over 200%, so it can easily fit almost any 6-8 ounce soap bar whether it's from a homemade soap brand or a larger soap manufacturer.

If your soap is larger or irregular in shape than a 'standard' bar, we'd recommend cutting larger soaps in half so that you only use part inside Sud Stud.

 

 

By cutting in half, it helps those larger and likely more expensive soaps to last even longer (save more money) since you're not exposing the whole bar to running water!

 

SudStud may look simple; however, every aspect from its size, shape, and pillars have a uniquely engineered purpose:

 

 

As outlined in the 72-second video above, I spent quite a bit of time to fully comprehend what the current marketplace options for soap accessories are and the pros/cons of each a loofah puff, natural loofah, bristle brush, and few less popular options that became the basis of how to engineer SudStud.

 

 

By first glance, SudStud may look rather simple, but as you'll see below, there is quite a bit of complexity with every unique engineering aspect from the shape, size, and material being considered to create the optimal shower accessory, no matter what type of soap you choose to use with it. 

 

A Simple, Yet Complicated Design:

 

After countless iterations and revisions to my prototypes, you'll find some important highlights below regarding the design and engineering of the final production model:

  • Size — Optimally sized to fit the most common soap bar sizes with the ability to adapt to a larger or smaller without much effect on the overall efficiency of Sud Stud's features. 
  • Shape — Hexagonal shape is the optimal design for compatibility with the most popular rectangle shaped soap bars while also being compatible with round, square, or other irregular shaped soap bars.
  • Pillars — Internally, you'll find 5 pillars that provide support for the edges and holds the soap in place while also allowing SudStud to maintain form as the bather grips or squeezes while scrubbing.
  • Combs — Patented Honeycomb Grid design reduces friction between soap and skin by 80% that allows one single bar of soap to last 5x longer while also creating 250% more soap suds than a bar alone. 
  • Feet — Externally, 6 circular bumps that allow water to drain and air to flow underneath SudStud after you are done using so the sleeve and soap dry quicker to maintain quality and eliminate bacteria.
  • Materials — Through testing flexibility, durability, drying, cleaning, safety, and cost of commercially available materials, I found Antimicrobial Silicone would perform the best for SudStud's purpose.
  • Textures — In addition to the material used, SudStud also offers two texture types on either side, one for deeper exfoliation and the other for a gentler scrub for those with more sensitive skin types.
Click Here to Order Two Sud Studs!

SudStud's design reduces your soaps surface area, allowing your soap to last 5x longer.

 

SudStud's design reduces your soaps surface area by 80% from removing direct soap to skin contact, therefore reducing friction and allowing your soap to last 5x longer. 

 

  • Less Soap Surface Area —Patented Honeycomb comb design reduces soap friction area by 80%, so the soap bar isn't in direct contact with your body, reducing friction tremendously and saving you enormous amounts of soap (money).
  • Fits Popular & Gourmet Soaps —Your fancy-schmancy, expensive gourmet soap bars will finally be worth buying as SudStud fits most soaps with its ability to expand up to 200% and adjusts to different shapes whether it be the most popular brands or the fancier gourmet soaps with irregular sizes. 
 

Increase suds by up to 250% while exfoliating with Sud Stud's patented honeycomb design.

 

 

SudStud's patented soft-side and scrub-sided honeycomb pattern allow a water block to form, in turn creating a richer and sudsier lather for a deeper skin cleaning. 

 

  • Two-Side Exfoliating Clean —With two sides, a soft silicone side for gentler cleaning or scrub-sided for deeper cleaning and removing dead skin cells, SudStud will not irritate your skin over time like bristles.
  • More Soapy Suds, Less Water —SudStud's patented soft-side and scrub-sided honeycomb pattern allow a water reservoir to form, in turn creating a richer and sudsier lather with up to 250% more suds for a deeper skin cleaning while also using less water.
 

Flexible and quick to dry, Silicone's anti-microbial properties help it to last through daily use.

 

 

SudStud's ultra-soft, flexible silicone is anti-bacterial and eliminates bacteria build-up prevalent in traditional loofahs while awaiting the next use in its humid environment. 

 

  • Antibacterial Soft Silicone —Unlike traditional shower loofahs, Sud Stud's ultra-soft, flexible silicone is anti-bacterial, eliminating breeding grounds for all kinds of bathroom bacteria bacterium build-up simply by the material that it is made of.
  • Quick Drying Easy Cleaning —When not in use, Sud Stud 'feet' prop it up, so it dries itself and the soap quickly by letting water and air underneath; and since silicone is a non-porous material, you can clean Sud Stud by submerging in boiling water to thoroughly sanitize.
  • Not Just For Showering —SudStud was first and foremost designed for a smoother, deeper, and more efficient cleaning while in the bath or shower but we've also found that its antibacterial properties are a great replacement for ditching your filthy kitchen sink sponge.
Click Here to Order Two Sud Studs!

One for the kitchen, one for the shower, one for the sink with different colors for different uses, no more mixing up Sud Studs. 

 

 

Sud Stud might look simple from the outside, but we made sure every aspect had a purpose.

 

 

As you'll see, I took quite some time to address every aspect of our current soap bar options to engineer an awesome solution.

After countless iterations and revisions to my prototypes, you'll find some important highlights below regarding the design and engineering of the final production model:

 

 

From interior support pillars, sizing, all the way to the shape, everything on your Sud Stud is designed with a purpose to help you clean better, save money, and reduce bacteria cultivation. 

 

Hi Indiegogo, my name is Dale, and I'm the founder of Silli Co. Silli Co is a play on the word "Silicone" and "Company." 

 

My goal is to develop fun and unique products that solve problems, big or small. I've used soap bars my whole life. But it wasn't until recently that I discovered that soap bars don't clean as well as other products. 

As a stubborn millennial, instead of searching for alternative soap products, I decided to design one that allows me to use my favorite soap bars. Thus Sud Stud was born! 

I'm an inventor and entrepreneur, and I've run a very successful Kickstarter campaign in the past. The product was called "Revoq". Outside of Kickstarter, I've ran my own e-commerce business for the past 5 years. 

 

Sud Stud's Roadmap:

Over the past 5 years, I've accrued over $3 million in revenue and fulfilled hundreds of thousands of products, and this taught me a lot about manufacturing and supply chain.

 

 

Additionally, the entrepreneurial experience has given me the training to bring together the right people to make the project happen:

story:
ABOUT US 

We are a start up formed by Young Design minds who love to change the society with Innovative Products.

Yes, Passion for Product Design is common among us. To live our passion, we decided to delve into the world of Product Design with our first product :World’s most affordable 3D printer.

 "A 3D Printer for every Home" 
 [ Compact. Cheap. Robust ]


Makers, we as engineers  and designers by profession have handled all kinds of 3D printers in our journey. After knowing its functionality and mechanism thoroughly, we built many DIY 3D printers in many sizes.  After realizing the importance and benefits of 3D printers,  our dream is to bring this technology '3D Printing' soon to every home. Yeah, that’s our goal !


Not aware 3D of Printing ? Scroll down to know more !

3D PRINTING

3D Printing is the present and the future. But still, it has not reached many hands in the world. We all know the tons of applications by a 3D Printer.


A Kid can print his/her own toys and learn the science behind it from young age!

Designers can get their designs prototyped easily by having one 3D Printer!

Architects can see their designs in mini scale before building it!

Doctors can print replica of organs for study and mock surgery! Etc..!


Check this video down to know more! 




OUR DESIGN

We started working on the design in late 2015, and today,  we have designed the world's most compact 3D Printer!

Don’t believe us ? Here’s a fact

It is 20 cm Cube!

How we designed it?

A 3D Printer's important specs is its Build volume i.e, how much volume it can print. We kept the standard build volume for a mini printer 1000 cubic cm.  The next important thing is the 'guideways and mechanisms' to move the extruder in all 3 direction. In most of the 3D Printers, the mechanism made the size so big and not compact. After thorough system analysis, Extraordinary Design Principles and FE Analysis were made and we come up with a mini guideway system where the motors are inbuilt and small. This helped us to reduce 50% of size in all the sides thereby improving the aesthetics too. We are using the best budash nozzle in extruder with auto leveling sensor for beds. For preventing the printer from accidents, we have provided clean fiber glass enclosure in 3 sides, which allow us to see what is going on inside.

SOME COOL FEATURES

  • Transparent Fiber Glass Enclosure 
  • Easy Push and Pull lock with Magnets
  • Compact Cube Design for Desktop Use with Laptops or PC
  • Free Filament Holder with Every printer
  • Auto bed leveling feature in an Affordable Printer
  • Aesthetic Extruder box Design
  • Mini rotary Fan inside Extruder box for best heat exchange
  • Wifi and SD Card file transfer in addition to USB Printing.

Our Printer is Colorful

The user can choose any color from the 5 standard colors that we provide.



TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

 Check out the Technical details of our Printer!  

                                                                                               



MAKER'S SOFTWARE & APP

Maker's Software will be Provided for both Mac and Windows PC along with the 3D printer. The users can print using all 3 modes : USB, Wifi & Mini SD Card.

Maker's free App will be launched along with the product for every users using Apple, Android & Windows Phones.



App will support printing from Phone to Printer using Wifi & USB.

App will have live Video streaming and Video Recording of the Printing through the inbuilt camera inside the printer and wifi.

The App will have a free Design Gallery where anybody from an amateur to novice, can print anything for free.

Upon request, a Maker's Designer will custom design for printing your Ideas.

A-Z 3D printing tutorials can be found in the Maker Design website


Our Journey so far and Upcoming action steps!



During a Project: Portable 3D Printer Making...


WHY DO WE NEED FUNDS?


To Pursue our Passion, It needs money Nowadays! Strange Fact! As strange as it may sound, to pursue our passion, money is essential.

As Young Designers, we are not limited by knowledge but by funds.

We need funds to continue to build our product and bring it to the world to ultimately achieve our goal of : "3D Printer for Every Home".  

HOW WILL WE USE IT?
  • R&D
  • Mould Making and Plastic Moulding
  • Electronic Components Purchases
  • Software & App Development
  • Testing & Assembly
  • Operational & Managerial Costs
  • Marketing and Publishing for our Final Product Launch Campaign. 

You will be our Initial Supporters and we going to thank you big for your every support.


Check out our Rewards!


The amount you sponsor for building our product will not be taken for granted by us. You will receive our 3D Printer for free along with addons worth $199 and higher discounts can be availed for any other small support. That is not all! There will be surprises and secret rewards for you, during our product launch in Nov 2016 !
We Love to Hear from You!

For Queries & Support email us at info@makerglobal.in

story:
Introducing LaPasyon

LaPasyon is a new brand of sensual, luxury bed linens available at prices you might find even sexier than the sheets themselves. These linens will redefine your bedroom, making it a place you want to spend even more of your finest hours.

Enhanced backers experience

  • Expect the best possible price
  • You can also expect the best possible quality with our top-notch European manufacturer and sumptuous Egyptian cotton sateen
  • With the help of our sizing charts you can choose the perfect design, color and fit for your bed in a perfect bedroom
  • Your contribution will help us to create a broad line of products which will redefine your bedroom and supply you with your choices

Whatever your bedroom personality, we have the linens to match. Choose from elegant, sexy and downright naughty with our three very different styles, each one reflects another type of personality.

Made of high quality Sateen, these sheets come in three intriguing patterns: Sasha Live, Megan Classic and Kasumi Anime. With LaPasyon you can give yourself and your partner the softest, smoothest, most sensual experience possible.

Whether you're single, in a relationship or it's complicated, you’re probably thinking it's time to spice things up in the bedroom, so go ahead and crank it up all the way to caliente with LaPasyon bedlinen.

Megan Classic

Sasha Live

See the full clear design on our website - www.lapasyon.com

Kasumi Anime

See the full clear design on our website - www.lapasyon.com

All pictures shown are for illustration only (Colors may vary according to the lighting condition).

U.S. Size Chart: Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, Cali King.

(Dimensions In Inches)

Europe Size Chart: Single, Double, Queen, King, Super King. (Duvet Set)

(Dimensions In cm)

Japan Size Chart: Single, Semi Double, Double, Queen, King.

(Dimensions In cm)

Each set comes with one fitted sheet, one flat sheet and two pillowcases.

*The chart are valid for all designs

LaPasyon Stylish T-Shirt available in the following sizes: S/M/L/XL/XXL

    Q. What are the LaPasyon bedlinen are made from?

    A. They are made from Sateen 300 (Egyptian Cotton)

     

    Q. Do you have plans to expand the product lines of LaPasyon?

    A: Of course. If the campaign succeed we will expand each line and also develop new lines (Kama Sutra, etc.)

     

    Q. Why you show the Anime and Real products without blur only in your website?

    A. Unfortunately this is due to the restriction policy of Indiegogo. in order to see without the blur please visit our website.

     

    Q. What are the shipping costs?

    A. Shipping costs (worldwide) are included in all pledges, so we will not charge extra shipping costs.

     

    Q. How do i choose my custom size?

    A. After choosing from our size chart please contact us by email or from the website.

     

    Q. Are the sheets wash resistant?

    A. Yes, the sheets are made from the highest quality sateen textile.

     

    Q: What will be the prices of the products after the campaign?

    A: The launch prices are  33% discounted during the campaign.

     

    Q: When do you intend to supply the products to the donors?

    A: The products will be shipped to the donors 3-4 weeks after the end of  Indiegogo campaign. We estimate to start deliveries starting February 2017.

    Follow us on the social networks for the latest updates of LaPasyon

Expect the best possible price

story:
Help HMCC Make This Awesome!

HMCC and friends will be transforming Churchill House into a Haunted Mansion this Halloween...and every contribution we get will help us turn it into something REAALLY SCARY!

The Haunted House event will also be a fund raiser for HMCC programs and projects.  The better we can make it, the more we will draw people from the area (and, hopefully, beyond) to come check it out, and the more successful our fund raiser will be!

Your contribution will go directly to HMCC and will be used to purchase props, special effects, costumes and other things that will make Churchill House come alive with horror and fright.

What We Need & What You Get

Here are some of the specific things that we will need to pay for in order to make our Haunted House great:

  • Costumes for our volunteer actors to make them look REAALLY SCARY!
  • Makeup and other effects for the actors so they are even more frightening.
  • Sound systems for scary music and sounds throughout the house.
  • Lighting effects that add to the horror!
  • Other props and materials to build props like dummies, zombies, ghosts, etc.

The Impact

HMCC has made considerable progress in the past year in improving the quality of recreational programs offered and creating new programs that serve people in our area.  And we want to do much more!

Advance tickets will be on sale for $5.00 and available at the door for $7.00.  Ticket sales will help support HMCC to continue to provide quality programs and to keep improving what we offer.  We hope to draw people from all around to come and enjoy being scared in our Haunted Churchill House!

Challenges

This is a big project, but we have a great team in place that have already come up with lots of ideas for transforming Churchill House for Halloween.  Now the challenge is executing these ideas, and gathering the resources to do it!

Any contribution you can make will help, and we promise to make the most out of your money by working hard to create something special!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute money, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Spread the word about the Haunted Churchill House event, and our campaign.
  • Share this campaign and other information about the event on facebook, etc.

  • If you want to help with the production, and are unable to donate money, please get in touch with us!  

  • We could use expertise in makeup, lighting, sound, decorating, costume design and small prop construction.  

  • We will also be looking for volunteer actors to play some parts in the Haunted House!

story:
Short Summary

GP Wing is our most iconic product that was first introduced in 2009. It all started out with a discussion on NorthAmericanMotoring (a MINI forum). At the time, everyone wanted a wing like this for their R53 MINIs, but no solution was available. As an R53 MINI owner/ enthusiast, I came up with an idea to make an affordable version so that every enthusiast would be able to purchase one. To date, we have delivered more than 100 GP wings and have received numerous positive feedback from our customers around the world. 

Recently we have received a lot of emails regarding the availability of our GP Wing but unfortunately we no longer stock them in our inventory. Therefore, we came up with the idea of using Indiegogo as our pre-order platform in order to bring a new batch to the market. 

The Gen 2 GP Wing will be our best quality GP Wing by far. It will fit both R53 and R56 MINI without any modification to your rear hatch glass. Installation is straightforward and simple with all the provided mounting hardwares.

This is going to be your best opportunity to own a GP Wing at the lowest price ever. We are offering them at the vendor/wholesale price so that you don't need to pay more to have the same quality GP Wing that other vendors offer. Please help us spread the word among the MINI community. 
You can also check out our other successfully funded campaign on Indiegogo: 
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/lotus-unikey...

Motor on! 
Terry


What's New?

1. Logo box will be filled and smoothed out.
2. Newer material that is stronger than the previous version.
3. The adjustable downforce feature will be on every single GP Wing.
4. All at an incredible wholesale price! 


What We Need & What You Get

We will need at least $4000 to start a new batch, that is roughly 10~11 committed buyers. How this campaign works is that once we have reached the goal, the product will be made and delivered. However, if the campaign fails, everyone who has funded will get the money back. 

Timeline of Production

MAR 12 2015 - Campaign starts
APR 01 2015 - Campaign ends
APR 02 2015 - Production starts
JUN 02 2015 - Quality check*
JUN 10 2015 - Delivery*
*all dates are subject to change, however we will try our best to keep everything on schedule. 
*this estimate is based on the order of 10 GPWings, if we end up receiving more than 10 orders, the production phase will take a few weeks longer. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the words in your local MINI clubs and online MINI communities. Your contribution is greatly appreciated. 

Q&A

1. Will it fit my MINI?
- GP Wing will fit on any R50, R53 and R56 hardtop MINI without modification.

2. Do I need to modify anything for installation? 
- You do not need to cut anything to mount this spoiler. However you will have to drill 2 holes on each side of your hatch to create attachment points for the mounting of GP Wing. There will be more details in the installation guide.

3. When do I expect to receive my item
- We aim to deliver your GP Wing in June 2015. We will keep everyone updated regularly. 

4. What will happen to my money if the campaign fails?
- You are guaranteed to get your money back within 3 to 5 business days. 

5. How do I reach you?
- sales@fubrication.com

Photos

story:
Your Money Will Help Give Us a House by Christmas

I'm running out of things to sell so I'm hoping that there are those of you out there generous enough to get us where we need to be. 

I know the image says $1800 and the campaign says $4921. That's because we have insurance to pay as well as Wells Fargo needing $920/month to stop them from foreclosing. 

**seriously if you'd like to donate more than $5 in return for me doing something like making you a banner for your website, making you a tea blend, editing a document (I have an English degree), writing you a story or something else (that I might be able to legally do message me and we can talk). I can also make you cinnamon ornaments for Halloween, Yule, Christmas or another holiday.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, maybe you know someone who can? Just $1 can make a difference and is much appreciated! 

Please share the campaign via twitter, facebook, wherever you can. Click the share buttons at the bottom of the picture. 

Thank you. Thank you and thank you. 

We appreciate any efforts you can spare. 

It's Every One's Dream

A safe neighborhood to raise your child in, a warm family home. 

We've lived paycheck to paycheck and hand to mouth for years. It's a story many of you can relate to, I'm sure.  

Some times out of tragedy comes relief.

We were left a home in a relative's will but it's still under mortgage. So we're in a terribel Catch-22 where if we stop paying on where we're living now we won't be able to assume the mortgage on the inherited home because we'll be considered unreliable and a risk; but if we stop paying the monthlies on the inherited home it will be foreclosed on before the paperwork is all finalized; and half the paperwork is up in New York where Hurricane Sandy recently hit further delaying our inheritance process. 

Once we're able to get everything squared away we'll have a larger home in a better neighborhood (without meth houses and bears) for less money than we're paying now. Our children will be in a better school district and we'll be set for life. 

However in the mean time our bills have gone up $900 per month for the duration and I'm unemployed outside of the home due to health issues and my partner hasn't had a raise since 2007.

story:
Hi! Welcome to our page.

"PowerCloth 1G" is a light-weight, flexible, foldable and washable solar fabric that can be attached to almost anything to turn that into a 5 Volt charging port.

                                                            

Motiviation:We receive a tremendous amount of energy every day from sun. If our outfits can somehow convert even a tiny part of that into useful electricity, it will fulfill the electricity needs of all of our electronic gadgets while we are outdoors.

Problem: Traditional solar cells cannot be used for the above task because these cells are brittle and very fragile. As a result, these need to be protected inside metallic frames which make them very heavy. For the application of solar cells in outfits, these cells need to be light weight, flexible and foldable.

         

How is PowerCloth 1G different from other/similar products?

  • PowerCloth 1G is light-weight, weighs less than 3 ounces and is ideal for outdoor enthusiasts.
  • Flexible, foldable, sturdy and amazingly unique in its self.
  • PowerCloth 1G provides an output current of about 700 mA charging your smart electronic devices in just 2-3 hrs.
  • PowerCloth 1G is capable of charging a 1800 mAh lithium ion powerpack in 3-4 hrs of sunlight. Using this powerpack, you can charge your gadgets at night and can light a 10 LED lamp for more than 12 hrs.
  • Most value added product at a much cheaper price, generating efficient energy for our day to day use.

Another fascinating and unique feature that distinguishes PowerCloth 1G from other contemporary products is that it is washable: just separate the fabric from the photovoltaic element, wash it and then slide the photovoltaic element back into the fabric.

PowerCloth 1G is efficient; it can work even in weak and diffused lighting situations.

 

                                       
        PowerCloth 1G weighs approximately 2.6 ounces (75 grams).

 

Why do we need your support?

We need your help to spread the word about the PowerCloth 1G, the first portable, flexible and washable solar panel. You'll be amongst the first to have one before the whole world knows about it.

 

What's next?

We’re now getting prepared to start commercial production of the PowerCloth 1G. With your support, we'll be able to start our first manufacturing run by August, 2012. We hope to start shipping them to you by September, 2012.

________________________________________________________

Update

_________________________________________________________ 

Contribute $105 to pre-order a Complete PowerCloth 1G  Bundle. Retail price of the Bundle after promotional period will be $155. 

                      Complete PowerCloth 1G  Bundle

 

________________________________________________________

"PowerCloth 1G" for your window blinds

_________________________________________________________

It’s a summer day! It’s hot outside!

You want light but no heat inside!

“PowerCloth 1G” offers a solution!!!

Just attach “PowerCloth 1G” to the blind or curtain on your window, it will give you “cold light”.

story:
HELP ME FINISH MY STREAMING STATION!

We have payed off the PC debt and i'm extremely greatful for that... Right now, i'm looking to finish off my streaming station, so if you're enjoying my streams, it's time to invest a bit more in me so i can have a fully comfortable streaming + video recording station. I'm already into full-time streaming and i plan on going part-time YouTube recording. You know how i'm borrowing the second monitor and have a messed up stand for it and stuff. The goal of this campaign is kinda big but it's possible and three of you lucky bastards will win something in return.


What the money will be used for:

  • 2 x 24" Asus VG248QE LED (400$ each, 800$ total.)
  • 1 x Monitor Wall Mount (80$ total.)
  • 1 x Rode PSA1 Mic Stand (100$ total.)
  • 1 x Blue Radius Custom Shockmount for the Yeti (80$ total.)
  • 1 x New Chair (100$ total.)
  • Upping my internet speed (40$ total.)


Perks!

For each and every single 5$ contribution, you will recieve a shout-out on my stream!

For each and every single 10$ contribution, you will recieve a chance at wining: 

  • My Steam account* with all of it's skins on it;
  • A ★ Gut Knife | Boreal Forest (Field-Tested);
  • An AWP | Asiimov (Battle-Scarred).
*The Steam account is trade-banned so you won't be able to trade away the invertory but you sure will have a lot of fun playing on it. As an extra, it has the overwatch feature where you can catch cheaters.

Picking the winners

The winners will be randomly picked out by me and Allison live on stream by writing all of your "names + emails" on a piece of paper and regular drawing from a hat. All will be performed live in front of you guys in two weeks! If you don't happen to be picked out and not win anything, your name will be added to the donators list on my stream.

Be sure to let me know if you contribute via a Twitch private message or in chat when i'm live!
