story:
The Concept

It's getting tougher and tougher to find the right gift.  Everyone has a budget, and we want to make sure the money we spend on gifts makes our loved ones truly happy. 

 

JotandGot.com removes all the hassle of keeping mental and written lists, remembering hobbies and favorite sports, and sifting through multiple registries.  It's gift-giving made simple:

 

 

The beta site will be launching Fall 2011. 

Planned Features

  • Centralized location of all the things you want.  Didn’t get that super cool vacuum for your wedding?  That sucks (get it?). Maybe someone will get it for your house-warming party or birthday!
  • Create a custom profile to list your clothing sizes, hobbies, favorite sports teams, etc.
  • Link to your friends and family, and see what their wishes they are adding to their profile.
  • Get reminders for special events along with a link to that person's wishes and wishlists.
  • Find the best deal before you buy!  No more having to buy gifts at a particular store to have it be removed from the registery.

 

And that's just the beginning!  We have a lot of other features marinating like sending members coupons to save money on gifts, and developing a mobile app. Oooo, mobile!

Plans for the $$$

Besides swimming in it like Scrooge McDuck (kidding), we need start-up funds for advertising and business expenses (like purchasing images, paying for web hosting, and other non-fun business stuff).  After this inital funding round, we will to generate our own revenue to sustain the business.

How you can help

  • Donate! All jokes aside, we really appreciate every dollar you can contribute.
  • Spread the word! Tell others about us. Everyone loves a good recommendation!
  • Send us your prayers, well-wishes, good vibes or cookies.

The Facts

The team

The expertise of our awesome (and slightly insane) team ranges includes: graphic design, search engine optimization and marketing, social network and email marketing, product development, e-commerce, project management, web development, and user interface engineering.  Bottom line: We have skills.
story_txt:
The Concept
It's getting tougher and tougher to find the right gift.  Everyone has a budget, and we want to make sure the money we spend on gifts makes our loved ones truly happy.  
 
JotandGot.com removes all the hassle of keeping mental and written lists, remembering hobbies and favorite sports, and sifting through multiple registries.  It's gift-giving made simple:
 

 
The beta site will be launching Fall 2011.  
Planned Features


Centralized location of all the things you want.  Didn’t get that super cool vacuum for your wedding?  That sucks (get it?). Maybe someone will get it for your house-warming party or birthday!

Create a custom profile to list your clothing sizes, hobbies, favorite sports teams, etc.

Link to your friends and family, and see what their wishes they are adding to their profile.

Get reminders for special events along with a link to that person's wishes and wishlists.

Find the best deal before you buy!  No more having to buy gifts at a particular store to have it be removed from the registery.
 
And that's just the beginning!  We have a lot of other features marinating like sending members coupons to save money on gifts, and developing a mobile app. Oooo, mobile!
Plans for the $$$
Besides swimming in it like Scrooge McDuck (kidding), we need start-up funds for advertising and business expenses (like purchasing images, paying for web hosting, and other non-fun business stuff).  After this inital funding round, we will to generate our own revenue to sustain the business.
How you can help
Donate!  All jokes aside, we really appreciate every dollar you can contribute.
Spread the word!  Tell others about us. Everyone loves a good recommendation!
Send us your prayers, well-wishes, good vibes or cookies. 

The Facts

The team
The expertise of our awesome (and slightly insane) team ranges includes: graphic design, search engine optimization and marketing, social network and email marketing, product development, e-commerce, project management, web development, and user interface engineering.  Bottom line: We have skills.

story:
By re-shaping and re-evaluating our consumption habits!

For the past 5 decades, plastic has become a leading material in manufacturing. Why? For "convenience" at home and on-the-go.

With these new products, we are offering eco-friendly alternatives to the most common types of everyday plastics. Straws, produce bags, utensils, cling wrap and more! 

 

 

All of our products have been designed to facilitate the transition to a zero-waste lifestyle!

It's obvious that plastic has negative effects on our planet, but we know that it isn't always easy to refuse plastic when you're stuck in a pinch

Our products are easy to adapt to your lifestyle, making it CONVENIENT and FUN to be zero waste!

Zero Waste Essentials (Early-Bird)

We've compiled a beautiful collection of all our zero waste favourites into one box that will help kickstart your new lifestyle! This kit is what will be sent out to backers that choose (Zero Waste Essentials)! Items are already heavily discounted making this the best bang for your buck! On top of receiving the starter kit, we are also including access to our Zero Waste Club a community where we can support and encourage each other to live our best, waste-free lives :) 

Each starter kit comes with...

  • 3 pack of beeswax wraps
  • 6 pack of reusable produce bags
  • 10 pack of bamboo straws
  • Bamboo travel utensil set
  • Wooden dish brush
  • 12 pack of reusable makeup remover pads

A Closer Look At The Starter Kit...

 

Reusable Makeup Remover Pads

Makeup remover pads are an absolute essential for any zero waste bathroom!

Our triple-layered reusable make-up remover pads are soft, gentle on your skin, durable, and will leave your face feeling clean and refreshed. One pad is equivalent to 1000 disposable cotton rounds.

We make it easy to wash and reuse the pads with the handy-dandy drawstring laundry bag. You can simply use the pads and throw the entire bag in the wash when you’re ready. Leave the pads out to dry and they will be good as new the next morning!

Material: 70% bamboo, 30% cotton

 

6x Organic Mesh Produce Bags

The reusable produce bags are made from organic cotton and are tightly woven to increase durability and longevity! With the double-stitched seams and a metal clasp drawstring, it makes them the perfect alternative to single-use plastic bags at the grocery store.

This set comes with 6 bags. 2 large, 2 medium and 2 small which makes it perfect for bagging, carrying and storing vegetables, fruits, nuts and bulk goods!

Material: GOTS certified organic cotton

Sizes: L- 40x30 cm. M- 30x25 cm. S- 25x20 cm.

 

Beeswax wraps

 Beeswax wraps are an eco-friendly alternative to plastic cling wrap. Our wraps are 100% natural and made with beeswax, jojoba oil and tree resin.

These colourful, fun wraps come in 3 different sizes with our signature pattern. They are perfect for covering leftover food, fruits and veggies.

Instructions: Use the heat of your hands to soften and activate the wraps as you place them around bread, cheese, bowls, cups and more!

 

Travel Bamboo Utensil Set with Pouch

All-natural, eco-friendly, biodegradable bamboo cutlery set including fork, spoon, knife, chopsticks and a straw + cleaner brush.

This set rolls up nicely and is secured with a metal snap fastener. It is the perfect size to keep in your car, purse, backpack, or lunchbox!

An estimated 40 billion plastic utensils are thrown away each year! The biggest issue is that plastic utensils are “convenient” and that you’re usually left with no other alternative while out and about.

Keeping a set of these utensils with you will make it easy to say no to single-use plastic utensils when you’re on the go, getting take out or wherever else! 

 

Wooden Dish Brush

Our cleaning brushes feature a durable wood handle and sisal bristles on a replaceable head. Sisal is a natural fibre derived from the long green leaves of the ‘agave sisalana’ cactus plant. They are all-natural and sustainably harvested.

These bristles are the perfect combination of durable and soft for scrubbing dishes in the kitchen and tubs in the bathroom but aren’t abrasive to cause scratching or damaging.

 

We adhere to strict quality standards and only work with responsible, certified manufacturers. To us, sustainability and the preservation of Earth's natural beauty is uncompromisingly our #1 priority. With the funding, we are planning to invest in new processes and systems that will allow us to lower and completely reverse our carbon footprint making us a carbon-negative company (meaning we remove more carbon from the atmosphere than we emit)! One of the ways we plan to do this by planting trees as carbon offsets. Did you know just 1 tree can remove 48 lbs. of carbon emissions from the atmosphere each year?!?

In terms of the products, we've gone through MANY iterations over the months, from the design to the materials used. We are making several changes to the products in order to bring something new and exciting to the table! Our main focus is to only use the best, most sustainable materials. This includes using recycled packaging, sustainably harvested materials and even repurposing materials that otherwise would have been manufacturing waste. 

Backing us will allow us to bring the starter kit into production at scale and bring us one step closer to a trash-free planet ?

 

Zero Waste MVMT was founded in 2018 by Zac and Janelle. The idea to contribute to and promote this eco-friendly movement came to fruition after travelling abroad for almost a year.

Their entire perspective on waste management and pollution changed after experiencing the detrimental effects on the environment first-hand. In less developed countries, they saw exactly what was happening to waste, it often contaminated beaches, gathered in “landfills” and even burned on the side of the road since there isn’t much in place for waste management facilities.

This is something that is often overlooked in western countries. Garbage is brought to the street side, it is taken away and that is the end of it. Out of sight, out of mind. But the reality of it is, all this waste IS going somewhere, it’s collecting in landfills, contaminating waterways, ending up in our oceans and much more.

This is what sparked the idea for Zero Waste MVMT. We decided we HAD to do something positive to raise awareness and contribute to the movement. Our mission is to inspire people around us and encourage them to live a more sustainable lifestyle. We want to help by collectively reducing waste and making sustainable products accessible to everyone. Together, we can help our precious Mother Earth thrive for generations to come!

story:
Ciao a tutti! Questa raccolta fondi è la nostra lista nozze, invece di perderci in un mare di piatti, bicchieri e poggiapentola a forma di Lama pensavamo di fare un bel viaggio di nozze!

Ci piacerebbe molto andare una settimana a Londra e vedere "I Miserabili" a teatro, conoscete bene la nostra ossessione.

Qualora aveste voglia di contribuire al nostro sogno vi saremmo eternamente grati!

-----------

Hello everybody!

This crowdfunding is our wedding list!

Instead of receIveing lots of plates, glasses and useless llama shaped stuff, we were thinking about a lovely honeymoon in London, so we can get the chance to enjoy "Les Miserables" at the Queen's Theatre.
(You know how obsessed we are with that musical).

We will thank you forever and ever if you give us the chance to make this dream come true!

story:
Solemate can be used with or without an App, it is easily operated with just one press of a button: 1 second activate Normal Mode, 5 seconds activate Strong Mode.

We designed our App to provide users with bigger convenience allowing them to store data about their shoes and easily repeat the same sterilization algorithm for the same pair of shoes and easily access information about the remaining battery.

 

What makes SoleMate so different?

We keep the process under controlled in our PEVA material sterilization bag. Using the hermetically sealed bag we ensure that certain density of negative ions and ozone generated by SoleMate will always stay on a certain level during the process. Ozone is an unstable, short-lived molecule, it is destroyed by other molecules of odors inside the sterilization bag, thus no ozone from SoleMate would ever reach you or influence environment.

Providing information about the material and type of your shoes you help App create an algorithm so that the amount of ozone should be generated to match the amount of possible odor. This way, molecules of ozone and odors will destroy each other and neither ozone nor odor is present after the completion of the process.

SoleMate does not overheat or overdry your shoes so it doesn't influence the shoe material in any way. It is especially important with leather shoes.

SoleMate designed the way that ozone and negative ion molecules can reach into every part of the shoe.

About Us

SoleMate is the first product of RegoTech Inc., the Seattle-based high-tech start-up founded by a few tech-savvy enthusiasts. With offices in Seattle, WA and heart of Chinese Silicon Valley – city of Shenzhen, RegoTech has all that needed to create a successful innovative product: R&D base, led by MIT graduate engineer in Seattle and production base in Shenzhen, the very city your iPhone was assembled.

Behind The Idea

Personally, I am an active person who is going to the Gym at least 3 days a week and as well a frequent business traveler for me it was always a problem to deal with a shoe odor caused by sweat which is inevitable as we are all humans. Sweat in our shoes can cause a growth of bacteria which led to a whole bunch of problems from unpleasant odor to fungus infection and athlete feet disease. Traditional sterilizers and deodorizers not very much of the help: take the sprays, they are totally useless, bulky, ugly devices, available now, are not portable and need to be plugged in into a power outlet.

So the idea behind the Solemate is my desire to solve this problem once and for all: give modern people the solution which will be easy to use, mobile, smart and discreet looking (we all know that this is a kind of problem you hardly want to share with anyone).

Risks and Challenges

We cannot wait to share SoleMate with you. This is a project we believe in because it solves an essential problem in the easiest way possible, which is also why we know you'll love it. We want to assure you that we will be able to deliver our product two months after the end of our Indiegogo campaign.

The progress we have made so far assures that we will keep our promises to you. With the resources and expertise of our manufacturers, we have already discovered and resolved every issue, maximizing efficacy and efficiency in producing our first 200 pieces for testing and review.

Considering SoleMate as a globally relevant product, we have invested research into the best shipment solutions to let us best provide worldwide shipment. Because of this, your rewards will reach you in the time promised

Please consider that due to the nature of the worldwide shipment, you may be obligated to pay customs duties and taxes for your order. Unfortunately, the SoleMate team has no control over these additional charges, as they are set and determined according to the regulations of your local customs authority.

Finally, let us say once more that we made this product because we truly believe in it. We can't wait until it becomes a part of your everyday life.

We appreciate and value your support. Spread the word: your SoleMate is here!

story:
Kibbi has been funded! Big thank you to everyone who supported our campaign.

Don't worry if you missed out, you can pre-order Kibbi from our website.


INTRODUCING KIBBI

Smart Security & More, Without Monthly Fees.


A complete smart home solution at a smart price.


As seen on.


"The Internet of Things (IoT) is an exciting prospect, but so far the main use seems to be for refilling your fridge when it's nearly empty. What about home security? Kibbi is here to help." - Trusted Reviews

"With IFTTT support, the possibilities are truly endless here." – Gadgetify

"If the prototypes are any indication, Kibbi is going to dominate the smart home system market." – hypi.st!


A few things that Kibbi can do.



Loaded with features.

With Kibbi, the possibilities are endless.





Compatible with nearly anything.

Seamlessly connect Kibbi with the devices your already own.


Smart Devices

and more...


Operating Systems


Streaming Audio


Extended Range for Complete Home Protection.

Kibbi is the brains and Kibbi Sensors extend the capabilities.



Kibbi

Kibbi lets you stay connected to your home. Kibbi knows when you leave home, and arms itself automatically.


Check-in wherever you are for the reassurance everything is ok. Want to know when a family member arrives home, or just when an alarm is triggered? 

You control the level of information you receive.


The Kibbi Sensors

Expand the reach of Kibbi by adding sensors to your network. 


Kibbi Sensors are waterproof to use outside, and last over a year with a replacement coin cell battery.

Stick a Kibbi Sensor to a door, window or wall and it will:
Keep an eye on the current temperature and notify if it spikes. 
Detect when your door/window is opened or closed.
Monitor for vibrations & movement.


If This Then That (IFTTT)

Put the internet to work for your.



Use Kibbi with the 'If This Then That' service to inter-link with other compatible devices around your home. 




For example:

If Kibbi detects movement, then turn on smart bulb...

If Kibbi detects outside temperature below 70, then turn off A/C...

...and the list goes on.


Just a few channels that IFTTT supports:


The Kibbi App

Kibbi let’s you stay connected to your home. 



Check-in wherever you are for the reassurance everything is ok.


Smart learning with Kibbi

Over time Kibbi will learn about your home to offer smarter protection.



Got a pet? Kibbi's advanced object profiling will identify friend from foe to eliminate false motion alerts.


Free cloud storage

If an intrusion is detected, Kibbi can automatically record to the cloud.



Record, encrypt and upload video footage to our secure cloud servers. Your footage is then available for whenever you need to view it. 

Cloud storage not your thing? No problem as Kibbi can also record straight to a USB drive.


Battery back up and mobile data

Streams even when the power is out.



Kibbi supports battery backup and has a USB port for a mobile data stick, so Kibbi can keep running when the power is lost!


Wireless music throughout your home.

Kibbi is equipped with a high quality, full-range speaker.



Wirelessly play music straight from your phone to multiple Kibbi’s around your home over your Wi-Fi network.


Want to talk back to your home wherever you are? Do it through your smartphone with our 2-way Communication stretch goal.



Silver & Black not your thing?


Customise a Kibbi for just $8 extra. Click here to see the options available, then pledge for 'Custom Colour' on the top right of this page.


Meet the team.

Experienced professionals.



Where we are now.

Your support makes final production a reality.



Kibbi has been in the making since late 2013 and has evolved through three generations to become what it is today - the very best in affordable home security.

We currently have functional prototypes for Kibbi and Kibbi Sensor, with your help we can get Kibbi finished and into your home... perfecting the GUI for the mobile apps, tooling, packaging, certification testing and getting first production run going.


We need your help to get Kibbi into production, mainly to cover the costs of tooling for plastic molds, and global safety certification. By pledging to our campaign you will be helping us get Kibbi to you, and thousands of others currently without any security in their home.

Support us at any of the perk levels above and you'll be among the first to receive your Kibbi! If you have any questions about Kibbi that's not in FAQ, leave us a message or comment and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.


FAQ.


Can Kibbi connect with my other devices?

We’ll be releasing a SDK so developers can make their own applications, integrate into existing systems, build a school/college project, or just about anything that comes to mind really.  The SDK will allow you to communicate with the either the Kibbi Sensors directly using Bluetooth Low Energy, or the complete Kibbi system over Wi-Fi/Ethernet using our JSON API.


Will my pet activate Kibbi’s motion detection?

For Kibbi, we have developed an advanced object profiling to identify your pet(s) to prevent false alerts. Similar to the way a camera can identify where people’s faces are.


What happens in the event of a power-cut?

Kibbi has battery backup (4 x AAA batteries), and also a USB port for a data network stick so Kibbi can keep protecting your home for a few hours even if the power is lost. You will be notified on your phone that mains power has been lost. If you don’t use a data network stick then our servers will detect your Kibbi is offline and we’ll let you know.


I don’t want to use your Cloud service or I don’t want to enable Live Stream, can they be turned off?

Yes, Kibbi has been designed to offer the services and level of protection you are comfortable with. You can choose to save video footage locally and live streaming can be completely switched off. Because Kibbi has Bluetooth connection, these feature settings can only be set locally, not over the Internet.


Which phones do Kibbi work with?

iOS devices running iOS 7.1 or newer with Bluetooth 4.0 support.

Android devices running Android 4.4 or newer with Bluetooth 4.0 support.

Windows Phone devices with Bluetooth 4.0 support.


Can multiple phones be used with a Kibbi?

Yes, you can have multiple users and you can set different levels of control for different users. For example your child may be able to activate/deactivate Kibbi, but can’t change the setup configuration.


What are Kibbi’s technical specs?

Kibbi:

  • Size: 152x92x80mm
  • Camera Viewing: 130° diagonal
  • Video Quality: 1080p, 30FPS
  • Processor: ARM Cortex-A9
  • Connectivity: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0
  • Speaker: Full range, rated up to 8W
  • PSU: 9V, 2A

Kibbi Sensor:

  • Size: 36x30x10mm
  • Battery: CR2330 (replaceable)
  • Battery Life: 1-3 years depending on setup
  • Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0


Is there a limit to the number of Kibbi’s/Kibbi Sensor’s I can use?

The Kibbi app can support 10 Kibbi’s and 50 Kibbi Sensors on a single setup.


When will Kibbi ship?

We plan to begin shipping Kibbi in March 2015.


What are the shipping and customs costs?

Shipping is free in the UK and US. There are shipping costs to the rest of the world, details can be found in the perks section on the top right of the page. Any tax or customs charges are the responsibility of the purchaser.


What warranty will Kibbi come with?

Kibbi products will come with a 12 month warranty against manufacturing defects.
story_txt:
Kibbi has been funded! Big thank you to everyone who supported our campaign.Don't worry if you missed out, you can pre-order Kibbi from our website.INTRODUCING KIBBISmart Security & More, Without Monthly Fees.A complete smart home solution at a smart price.As seen on."The Internet of Things (IoT) is an exciting
prospect, but so far the main use seems to be for refilling your fridge when
it's nearly empty. What about home security? Kibbi is here to help." - Trusted Reviews"With IFTTT support, the possibilities are truly endless here." – Gadgetify
"If the prototypes are any indication, Kibbi is going to dominate the smart home system market." – hypi.st!

A few things that Kibbi can do.

Loaded with features.With Kibbi, the possibilities are endless.Compatible with nearly anything.Seamlessly connect Kibbi with the devices your already own.Smart Devicesand more...Operating SystemsStreaming AudioExtended
Range for Complete Home Protection.Kibbi
is the brains and Kibbi Sensors extend the capabilities.

Kibbi
Kibbi
lets you stay connected to your home. Kibbi knows when you leave home, and arms
itself automatically.



Check-in wherever you are for the reassurance everything is ok. Want to know when a family member arrives home, or just when an alarm is triggered? You control the level of information you receive.



The Kibbi SensorsExpand the reach of Kibbi by adding sensors to your network. 



Kibbi Sensors are waterproof to use outside, and last over a year with a replacement coin cell battery.


Stick a Kibbi Sensor to a door, window or wall and it will:
Keep an eye on the current temperature and notify if it spikes. Detect when your door/window is opened or closed.Monitor for vibrations & movement.



If This Then That (IFTTT)Put the internet to work for your.

Use Kibbi with the 'If This Then That' service to inter-link with other compatible devices around your home. 




For example:

If Kibbi detects movement, then turn on smart bulb...
If Kibbi detects outside temperature below 70, then turn off A/C...
...and the list goes on.
Just a few channels that IFTTT supports:



The Kibbi AppKibbi let’s you stay connected to your home. 


Check-in wherever you are for the reassurance everything is ok.


Smart learning with KibbiOver time Kibbi will learn about your home to offer smarter protection.


Got a pet? Kibbi's advanced object profiling will identify friend from foe to eliminate false motion alerts.



Free cloud storageIf an intrusion is detected, Kibbi can automatically record to the cloud.

Record, encrypt and upload video footage to our secure cloud servers. Your footage is then available for whenever you need to view it. 
Cloud storage not your thing? No problem as Kibbi can also record straight to a USB drive.

Battery back up and mobile dataStreams even when the power is out.


Kibbi supports battery backup and has a USB port for a mobile data stick, so Kibbi can keep running when the power is lost!



Wireless music throughout your home.Kibbi is equipped with a high quality, full-range speaker.


Wirelessly play music straight from your phone to multiple Kibbi’s around your home over your Wi-Fi network.



Want to talk back to your home wherever you are? Do it through your smartphone with our 2-way Communication stretch goal.
Silver & Black not your thing?

Customise a Kibbi for just $8 extra. Click here to see the options available, then pledge for 'Custom Colour' on the top right of this page. 




Meet the team.
Experienced professionals.

Where we are now.Your support makes final production a reality.
Kibbi has been in the making since late 2013 and has evolved through three generations to become what it is today - the very best in affordable home security.We currently have functional prototypes for Kibbi and Kibbi Sensor, with your help we can get Kibbi finished and into your home... perfecting the GUI for the mobile apps, tooling, packaging, certification testing and getting first production run going.


We need your help to get Kibbi into production, mainly to cover the costs of tooling for plastic molds, and global safety certification. By pledging to our campaign you will be helping us get Kibbi to you, and thousands of others currently without any security in their home.
Support us at any of the perk levels above and you'll be among the first to receive your Kibbi! If you have any questions about Kibbi that's not in FAQ, leave us a message or comment and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.







FAQ.

Can Kibbi connect
with my other devices?
We’ll be releasing a SDK so developers can make their own
applications, integrate into existing systems, build a school/college project,
or just about anything that comes to mind really.  The SDK will allow you to communicate with
the either the Kibbi Sensors directly using Bluetooth Low Energy, or the
complete Kibbi system over Wi-Fi/Ethernet using our JSON API.

Will my pet
activate Kibbi’s motion detection?
For Kibbi, we have developed an advanced object profiling
to identify your pet(s) to prevent false alerts. Similar to the way a camera
can identify where people’s faces are.

What happens in
the event of a power-cut?
Kibbi has battery backup (4 x AAA batteries), and also a
USB port for a data network stick so Kibbi can keep protecting your home for a
few hours even if the power is lost. You will be notified on your phone that
mains power has been lost. If you don’t use a data network stick then our
servers will detect your Kibbi is offline and we’ll let you know.

I don’t want to
use your Cloud service or I don’t want to enable Live Stream, can they be turned
off?
Yes, Kibbi has been designed to offer the services and
level of protection you are comfortable with. You can choose to save video
footage locally and live streaming can be completely switched off. Because
Kibbi has Bluetooth connection, these feature settings can only be set locally,
not over the Internet.

Which phones do
Kibbi work with?
iOS devices running iOS 7.1 or newer with Bluetooth 4.0
support.
Android devices running Android 4.4 or newer with
Bluetooth 4.0 support.
Windows Phone devices with Bluetooth 4.0 support.

Can multiple
phones be used with a Kibbi?
Yes, you can have multiple users and you can set
different levels of control for different users. For example your child may be
able to activate/deactivate Kibbi, but can’t change the setup configuration.

What are Kibbi’s
technical specs?


Kibbi:

Size:
152x92x80mm
Camera
Viewing: 130° diagonal
Video
Quality: 1080p, 30FPS
Processor:
ARM Cortex-A9
Connectivity:
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0
Speaker:
Full range, rated up to 8W
PSU:
9V, 2A


Kibbi Sensor:

Size:
36x30x10mm
Battery:
CR2330 (replaceable)
Battery
Life: 1-3 years depending on setup
Connectivity:
Bluetooth 4.0





Is there a limit
to the number of Kibbi’s/Kibbi Sensor’s I can use?

The Kibbi app can support 10 Kibbi’s and 50 Kibbi Sensors
on a single setup.

When will Kibbi
ship?
We plan to begin shipping Kibbi in March 2015.

What are the
shipping and customs costs?
Shipping is free in the UK and US. There are shipping
costs to the rest of the world, details can be found in the perks section on
the top right of the page. Any tax or customs charges are the responsibility of
the purchaser.

What warranty will
Kibbi come with?
Kibbi products will come with a 12 month warranty against
manufacturing defects.

story:
***IN DEMAND IS NOW CLOSED - YOU CAN PLACE NEW ORDERS FOR THE BASELANTERN & BASELANTERNXL AT THE BIOLITE SHOP***


Meet the BioLite BaseLantern

The BioLite BaseLantern is the world’s first flatpack lantern that combines breakthrough edge-lighting with Bluetooth connectivity to bring you a portable lighting solution that doubles as your own miniature smartgrid. No bigger than the sandwich you pack in your lunch, the BaseLantern can light large group settings, charge phones and other devices, and offer powerful real-time analytics so you get the most from your off-grid energy.





  1. Light Your Site.Illuminate large areas with a lantern that fits in the palm of your hand; extend light around your site with the integration of BioLite string lighting.
  2. Power Your Gear.The rechargeable internal battery doubles as a portable powerbank to charge phones, tablets, and other devices.
  3. Bluetooth Control.Unlock the functionality of a mini smart grid from your phone with features like Proximity Activation, Full Color Control, and Real Time Energy Analytics.

BaseLantern is ready for any off-grid situation:

Edge Lighting: Big Light In A Small Package

When you went camping twenty years ago, chances are you brought along a big bulky sleeping bag with you – but then compression sacks came along and took the air out, shrinking your bag into a fraction of its original size.


That’s exactly what we’re doing with the BaseLantern – we’re taking the air out. Using the same principles found in fiber-optic cables, we've skinned our lantern's rechargeable batteries in a thin, durable, bright sheet of light.

By using edge-lighting rather than traditional diffusing lenses, we're able to remove wasted space and deliver a lantern that's four times smaller than the competition.


Here's a quick video where Mike and Anton explain how it works:


The result is a super compact lantern that can throw 500 lumens of light in a footprint no bigger than, well, a sandwich:



Shareable Energy: The Power to Do More

The BaseLantern features a 7800 mAh rechargeable li-on battery that provides a burn time of up to 54 hours or power out to your other electronic gear via 2 USB charging ports. 

The BaseLantern also features two custom ports to power BioLite SiteLights for extended lighting. 


And with two USB ports, no waiting in line to charge up your phone if you’re with friends.

 


You can recharge your BaseLantern off-grid anytime from power generating gear like the BioLite SolarPanel5+ or BioLite BaseCamp Stove (you can pick those up in our reward levels).

Unlocking the Smartgrid: Light & Power Controlled from Your Pocket


Your phone is one of the best remote controls out there, so we built a custom Low Energy Bluetooth app that connects with your BaseLantern and transforms it into your own miniature smartgrid:

The app’s dark background is easy on the eyes in low-light conditions and is designed to be super intuitive – so if a friend picks up your phone, there’s no learning curve, they can use it right away. 

 


The BaseLantern app also provides real-time analytics and feedback on the battery life so you can calibrate energy usage to sustain the length of your trip – no guessing on how much juice is left.


Proximity Activation automatically turns the BaseLantern on or off based on your relative location. Your own personal beacon, it's perfect for finding your way home in the dark.

 Full Features

 Tech Specs



Perks



Energy On A Mission


WATCH: Lighting A Better World


When you back the BaseLantern, you’re backing a better world.

At BioLite we’re on a mission to bring safe, affordable energy access to families living in energy poverty. To date, we have distributed over 15,000 HomeStoves across India, Kenya and Uganda, providing clean cooking and charging. Through our unique business model (we call it Parallel Innovation), we incubate core technologies that get turned into products for both our outdoor recreational audience and our households in emerging markets. Revenue from our outdoor gear – like the BaseLantern – gets re-invested into the long-term development of our solutions to the big challenges we face where the grid doesn’t exist.

Reliable lighting in emerging markets can transform a life: it’s a child able to read her homework; it’s an entrepreneur keeping her shop open after dark; it’s a family empowered to leave dirty, expensive kerosene behind and bring bright, safe light into their home.

When you support the BaseLantern today, you’re supporting the research, development, and distribution of BioLite lighting to those who need it most.



The Team Behind BaseLantern

 

 

 

 

 



Why You Should Pre-Order On IndieGoGo Today

To celebrate the launch of the BaseLantern we've put together great perks that feature the whole BioLite family in a range of combinations and deals. Most importantly, the BaseLanternXL is a BioLite exclusive through 2016 (you won't find it in any stores later this year) so grab one on InDemand today and be one of the first to own this supercharged model – you'll get it in time for the holidays!

Production Schedule

FAQ


WATCH: BioLite Engineers Answer Your Most Common Questions

All FAQs

  • What are the basic tech specs for BaseLantern and BaseLanternXL? See tech specs chart.
  • How do I charge the BaseLantern? You can charge the BaseLantern at home via USB on your computer, wall-outlet etc. If you're off-grid, you can also charge it via the BioLite SolarPanel 5 Series or the BioLite BaseCamp Stove! (And yes, other solar panels will work, too)
  • Are BaseLantern and BaseLanternXL the same size? Yes! They are the same footprint, however the BaseLanternXL will weigh slightly more because there's a larger battery inside. (1.31 lbs vs 1.42 lbs)
  • Can I charge my laptop from the BaseLantern? Nope. But you can charge tablets, phones, cameras, speakers, fitness trackers, and lots of other devices.
  • How water resistant is the BaseLantern? The BaseLantern has an IPX4 rating which means it can withstand splashing of water. If you're in a place where it can get really really wet, we suggest bringing a dry bag along!
  • How many SiteLights can I chain from the BaseLantern? Technically speaking, as many as you like! Our recommended max is to string up [4] per SiteLight port for a total of [8] SiteLights.
  • Will shipping be extra? When you select your pledge level, you will be prompted to select your country as well. This will clearly indicate any shipping fees associated with your pledge. No additional costs will happen after that! To INTERNATIONAL customers: our fees INCLUDE all duties and taxes so that you won't get surprised by any additional fees. Many other pre-order campaigns do not do this which is why their shipping appears lower at first, but you get an unexpected surcharge upon delivery (which feels like a bummer of an experience in our opinion). And no, we cannot mark your unit as a gift to get around duties, it's illegal.
  • If I choose a perk that has multiple products, can you ship some items sooner? Unfortunately, we cannot. Splitting shipments adds additional costs and requires manual processing of each order that eats up a lot of time (a LOT). That is time we need to be answering messages from backers, commenting on the community board, tracking down technical info from our engineers, and developing stretch goals with the broader team that we can share in new updates. We totally understand wanting to have some of this gear before summer hits; if your timelines are more urgent, we recommend backing the BaseLantern or BaseLantern/SiteLight combo here on IndieGoGo and grabbing the rest of our products on BioLiteEnergy.com (if you sign up with your email you'll be in the loop about any upcoming offers, promos, etc). Part of the awesome savings you see on our IndieGoGo perks factors in thanking you for your patience for a later delivery time :)
  • Will the BaseLantern be in retail stores? Yes, we are planning to carry the BaseLantern with retail partners. A few key locations will have the BaseLantern in the late fall, but they will not offer bundled packages like our Perks and none of them will have the BaseLanternXL.

Energy Analytics

 Full Features

story:
Hello The Internet, we need your help!!! We're two love-struck teenagers that are still struggling to adult, but can't wait to marry each other so here we are.

We originally planned on a courthouse elopement with two close friends as witnesses, but sadly, a snitch (don't worry, he got stitches) couldn't keep his mouth shut and the event has clearly escalated to the point where we're asking for help from complete strangers.

You may be wondering what your money will be used for and to answer your question, we have a few ideas we've been kicking around:

  • Drag Queen MC
  • Chicken and Waffles as a catered meal
  • Beer Pong tournament
  • and many more...

The real reason we're here is that we are lacking in the ideas (and funds) department. So that's where you come in. As you can see in the offered perks, you have many options on how to be part of this special day, as well as the planning itself. We welcome any suggestions in the comments, and will be sending out surveys for final decisions on topics like whether or not we should get a penis cake. All of this you will be able to see through the livestream we plan on hosting throughout the wedding/reception. So help us make this the most insane and memorable wedding yet!!

Risks & Challenges

We're attempting to plan a wedding in ONE month, so yeah, there's that.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think this is a great idea, share this campaign with your friends, your dog, your nana and her bff Rose (just so you know, they both could've fit on that door...)

story:
Patented scoop precisely filters out all clumped waste into the separate disposal bin.
 



Circle Zero automatically cleans cat waste, 7 minutes after the cat leaves the litter box.  

The scoop rotates 360° all the way to the bottom.  Clumped up litter and turds are filtered and dropped to the back of the unit into the waste container.  

After cleaning, the scoop will rotate backward to flatten out the litter bed. 
 

 

 

 

 

 

Circle Zero was tested with a SHINYEI Japan IAQ OMX-RSM Odor Meter. 

Before sealing the waste bin with the Circle Zero dome shell, the odor measurement was 33 units.  After sealing, odor measurement was down to 0.

There is no need for any filter to control odors.  No monthly extra costs. 

WATCH US MEASURE WITH THE OMX-SRM IN REAL-TIME!
 



 

 

Any clumping litter will do - No need to purchase special litter or liners.

Circle Zero comes with your choice of scooping devices

 

 

Available as Add-On at Checkout

Monitors your cat’s visits and how long they stay

 



 



Click to earn cash from each pledge that you refer!

 

 

  
Just a few of our happy users!

 

 

Circle Zero is packed with complex tech, and yet simpler to maintain than a traditional litter box.

 

 

 

 

Watch our video on how to set up Circle Zero here!

 

 

PLUTO was established in Korea in 2018. Our goal is to make products that can benefit your life by leveraging technology with creative and futuristic designs.

Currently, the first product of PLUTO Electronics is the smart automated cat litter box. It provides a pleasant environment for both cats and the feline owners with the design that suits any part of your house.



Hae Min loves cats.  One of his beloved feline companions died of kidney failure, which may have been caused by unsanitary litter.  With his background in product design and marketing, he made it his passion to create an automatic cat litter box that was safe to use, always sanitary and reasonably priced.  He also knew that litter boxes were considered an eyesore and wanted one that was beautifully designed.  This motivated Hae Min to start a company with Yeong Jin Jeon,  who was also a pet owner with an extensive manufacturing background. 

Yeong Jin Jeon comes from a family with over  20 years experience in the Korea automotive industry, He had the opportunity to work in the manufacturing business from an early age and experience first hand the odyssey of bringing new technology to the market. Through his network with veteran industry developers, he pushed to perfect Circle Zero. 

David Kim has a strong background in accounting and finance. He started his early career as a consumer sector analyst,  and has over 10 years of experience in financial consulting and asset management.  

Currently PLUTO Circle Zero is the number one automatic cat litter box product in East Asia.  Over 2,000 units have been delivered to happy Korea cat parents and 1,000 units have been shipped to Japan. 

Our goal is to introduce Circle Zero to the U.S and Canada.  Circle Zero is manufactured in Korea and our production processes and logistics have been certified to be clean, safe with a solid commitment to the highest quality of production standards.  

 

 

 

We are shipping only to the U.S. and Canada. VAT and GST not included. 

 

Shipping starts July 2020*.  We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.  *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future versions of Circle Zero. The exclusive to Indiegogo discount will not be available after the campaign ends. 

 

More than $25,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support!.
 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.
story_txt: Patented scoop precisely filters out all clumped waste into the separate disposal bin. Circle Zero automatically cleans cat waste, 7 minutes after the cat leaves the litter box.  The scoop rotates 360° all the way to the bottom.  Clumped up litter and turds are filtered and dropped to the back of the unit into the waste container.  After cleaning, the scoop will rotate backward to flatten out the litter bed.       Circle Zero was tested with a SHINYEI Japan IAQ OMX-RSM Odor Meter. Before sealing the waste bin with the Circle Zero dome shell, the odor measurement was 33 units.  After sealing, odor measurement was down to 0.There is no need for any filter to control odors.  No monthly extra costs. WATCH US MEASURE WITH THE OMX-SRM IN REAL-TIME!   Any clumping litter will do - No need to purchase special litter or liners.Circle Zero comes with your choice of scooping devices  Available as Add-On at CheckoutMonitors your cat’s visits and how long they stay  Click to earn cash from each pledge that you refer!    Just a few of our happy users!  Circle Zero is packed with complex tech, and yet simpler to maintain than a traditional litter box.    Watch our video on how to set up Circle Zero here!  PLUTO was established in Korea in 2018. Our goal is to make products that can benefit your life by leveraging technology with creative and futuristic designs.Currently, the first product of PLUTO Electronics is the smart automated cat litter box. It provides a pleasant environment for both cats and the feline owners with the design that suits any part of your house.Hae Min loves cats.  One of his beloved feline companions died of kidney failure, which may have been caused by unsanitary litter.  With his background in product design and marketing, he made it his passion to create an automatic cat litter box that was safe to use, always sanitary and reasonably priced.  He also knew that litter boxes were considered an eyesore and wanted one that was beautifully designed.  This motivated Hae Min to start a company with Yeong Jin Jeon,  who was also a pet owner with an extensive manufacturing background. Yeong Jin Jeon comes from a family with over  20 years experience in the Korea automotive industry, He had the opportunity to work in the manufacturing business from an early age and experience first hand the odyssey of bringing new technology to the market. Through his network with veteran industry developers, he pushed to perfect Circle Zero. David Kim has a strong background in accounting and finance. He started his early career as a consumer sector analyst,  and has over 10 years of experience in financial consulting and asset management.  Currently PLUTO Circle Zero is the number one automatic cat litter box product in East Asia.  Over 2,000 units have been delivered to happy Korea cat parents and 1,000 units have been shipped to Japan. Our goal is to introduce Circle Zero to the U.S and Canada.  Circle Zero is manufactured in Korea and our production processes and logistics have been certified to be clean, safe with a solid commitment to the highest quality of production standards.     We are shipping only to the U.S. and Canada. VAT and GST not included.  Shipping starts July 2020*.  We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.  *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future versions of Circle Zero. The exclusive to Indiegogo discount will not be available after the campaign ends.  More than $25,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support!. Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
HoHoHoH2O™ is here to put the magic back into having a fresh Christmas tree! Everyone loves the idea of a fresh Christmas Tree: picking out the perfect shape, the traditions it incites and of course, the smell. HOWEVER, the hassle of the dry needles, the constant watering and the inevitable overflow has turned thousands of families to the fake, bendy, tree-in-a-box.

No more!!! Simply set up your HoHoHoH2O™ EZ Christmas Tree Watering System, and leave it to care for your tree while you enjoy the holidays.

When your tank is low on H2O, our flashing light reminds you that it is time for a refill!

 

 


Gift box measures in at 13.5 x 10.4 x 9.5 inches, and disguises HoHoHoH2O™ as a beautifully wrapped gift. At 10.4” high, it fits perfectly under your tree. Choose from two patterns to best match your holiday style. Our original pattern features a whimsical scene of reindeer, santas and trees. If you prefer a more simple design, our snowflake pattern is also available on red. We suggest adding your favorite bow to complete the look!

 

 

Remove the lid and you will find the opening to fill the tank with ease as well as the on/off switch. Additionally, there is an option to set your ‘low tank alarm’ from a blinking light to a beeping sound, depending on preference!

 

 

The water sensor and water tube are 35" long to accommodate even the fullest trees and inconveniently located power outlets. Simply attach the tube and sensor to the trunk of your tree using the velcro fastener. (That’s the last time you’ll be army-crawling under the tree until take-down!)

 

 

Plug it into a three-pronged outlet - the cord is 50" long!

 

 

Be the first to get the gift that will keep on giving for Christmases to come!

 

 

We are looking to raise $10,000 ahead of our retail launch for Christmas 2019! Not only will you be the FIRST to receive your HoHoHoH2O™ (in October), you will be getting it at the lowest price possible, up to 45% off!!

 

Because we have a flexible goal, you will be getting HoHoHoH2O™ no matter how much we raise! Simply consider this a pre-order for the soon-to-be hottest Christmas item of 2019. Instead of fighting the masses to get yours next fall (not to mention paying full price), yours will be delivered right to your door come October!

story:
Brinno DUO - Smarter Security for

Apartment Renters & Homeowners.

Brinno cares for your family.  We designed a unique smart door cam that offers a high degree of safety, and makes it one of the most practical home security devices on the market.

Brinno DUO ensures you peace-of-mind with minimal effort by monitoring your front door for you and your loved ones.

 

Double Safety, Double Love & Care, 

with No Double Expense

Brinno makes home security an ENTIRE family matter. We designed the Brinno DUO as a SIMPLE, SAFE & PRACTICAL solution that takes care of not only tech-savvy adults when they are away from home, but also for the vulnerable tech-challenged mature adults and kids who are at home or don’t use smartphones.

 

Retrofit your Peephole to View & Photograph Visitors Discreetly and Remotely

Unlike smart doorbells, the Brinno DUO is designed to be hidden and theft-proof, keeping your front door unaltered and perfect for apartment renters. With easy installation & removal, the Brinno DUO provides a smart home security solution for minimal cost and ease-of-use for you.

 

What is Brinno DUO?

We designed the Brinno DUO as a SIMPLE, SAFE & PRACTICAL solution that takes care of not only tech-savvy adults when they are away from home, but also for the vulnerable tech-challenged mature adults and kids who are at home or don’t use smartphones. Brinno DUO ensures you peace-of-mind with minimal effort by monitoring your front door for you and your loved ones. Discreet peephole security camera for home and apartment front doors with smartphone alerts, motion sensors, dual internal storage, and inside digital display.

 

How does Brinno DUO work?

 

 

Why you need Brinno DUO?

 

Dual Screens

A built-in LCD screen on the inside of your door helps small kids & mature adults at home clearly see visitors before greeting them and offering an increased peace of mind. Meanwhile, visitors’ images are automatically sent to mobile phone screen via email and/or the Brinno app. Brinno DUO watches your home for you and your family regardless of where you are.

 

Dual Storage

Brinno DUO creates 2 sets of visitor log files: one on the SD card in the device at home, and the other in the designated email box of your choice. No file is stored in Brinno’s cloud server. Visitor data is completely safe in your hands & at your disposal to protect your privacy.

 

Theft-Proof

The concealed device creates an invisible security barrier between unwanted visitors and your family. No one is able to steal or damage the device unless they break in.

 

DIY Installation

Brinno DUO installs easily within minutes without the need of fancy tools. It’s also perfect for apartment dwellers that can’t alter their residence. Plus you can install it yourself with no need for scheduling or waiting for a professional.

 

Save Smart

A simple one price solution with no additional costs for professional installation, add on accessories, or data storage plans. Brinno DUO keeps your budget in check.

 

Data Privacy

Privacy is of vital importance nowadays when it comes to personal information protection. Brinno DUO keeps your visitor log files either on a local micro SD card in the device at home or in the designated email box of your choice. No file will be stored in Brinno’s cloud server.

 

What makes Brinno DUO unique?

 

Hidden Peephole Security Camera

Brinno DUO's discreet security camera blends in naturally with front doors to provide an innovative security solution for homeowners and apartment renters.

Unlike many video doorbells and security cameras, Brinno DUO's concealed & theft-proof camera with an optical grade lens seamlessly merges with your front door through the traditional 12mm/14mm peephole with minimal installation effort.

  • Camera Angle
    With 90° coverage, Brinno only captures clear shots of guests at your door and nothing else.

  • Internal Digital Display
    The 2.7" interior color display conceals inside shadows/ movements and allows for real-time exterior front door views with a button push.

  • Lens Quality
    An optical grade peephole lens allows Brinno to capture crisp images to identify visitors even from afar.

  • Camera Connection
    With home WiFi connectivity, Brinno's peephole camera delivers an alert message to your smartphones and sends to your designated Email box.

  • Wirefree Installation
    Unlike most existing options, Brinno's peephole security camera is wire free for easy DIY install/removal that's perfect for renters.

  • Battery Life
    Operated on four AA batteries, the new Brinno DUO last for up to 6 months or over 1,000 visits to your door.

 

Discreet Motion Sensor Secret Monitoring

Brinno DUO's motion sensor has the ability to be theft-proof and hidden out of sight in its included door knocker or to be mounted externally to trigger at difficult angles.

Brinno DUO integrates a  unique Passive Infrared (PIR) motion sensor that eliminates false alarms by using ambient heat change sensors that triggers when a human body approaches.

  • Automatic Capture
    Brinno DUO's automatically capture visitors when motion is detected and stores to your designated Email box and inside display screen SD card.

  • Detection Triggers
    Brinno's 90° horizontal motion detection angle detects changes in temperature as human bodies approach up to 13 feet away to avoid false alarms.

  • Knocking Mode
    In addition to temperature change motion detection, Brinno DUO also integrate a knocking sensor to be notified specifically for visitors waiting at your door.

  • Sensor Battery Life
    Brinno's motion sensor can easily operate off one CR2450 3 Volt Button Cell Lithium battery for up to 28,000 motion triggers.

  • Internal or External
    Either hide Brinno's motion sensor internally in its included door knocker or mount externally for transmission up to 32 feet away with included mount. ·Either hide Brinno's motion sensor internally in its included door knocker or mount externally for transmission up to 32 feet away with included mount.

 

Peephole Security App for Smartphones

Brinno DUO's home and apartment security software is controlled via app but more importantly adds dual storage and viewing screens for added layers of protection.

Available in the Google Play Store or Apple App Store, Brinno DUO's comprehensive security app allows easy to use to convenience for young or old with real-time alerts and easy access storage feature that never costs any more money.

  • Security Alerts
    Brinno's connected security system instantly alerts you and extra users of home or apartment visitors with push alerts to your iOS or Android smartphone along with optional emails to archive of anomalies.

  • Dual Storage
    As a backup redundancy, the Brinno app automatically records and backs up visitor records allowing you an extra level of security for worse cases of damage or theft of your internal screen's local SD Card storage. Brinno DUO also sends both an image of the visitor to your designated Email box and an alert message to your mobile phone no matter where you are.

  • Dual Screens
    In addition to real-time views locally on your Brinno device, the smartphone app also allows for real-time views anytime or instantly from visitor motion alerts.

  • Zero Subscription Costs
    Unlike most other home security devices that charge monthly fees from $9.99 to $49.00 monthly, Brinno has zero hidden fees or upgrades for cloud Storage.

Order Brinno DUO Now For December Delivery
Order Brinno now to lock in an early bird savings of 52% off  its retail pricing with December delivery for all Indiegogo backers.

 

 
Brinno DUO Tech Specs

Brinno DUO is complete with all the hardware needed to secure and monitor your home or apartment while home and away.




Brinno DUO Delivers Soon!
Our third generation Brinno DUO has undergone sophisticated design and engineering since 2017 to bring you the best security monitoring for home or apartment.


Brilliant Innovation Is What We Do
Brinno started its design business in 2003, and has built a hard won reputation as a professional design power house.

story:
Our society is looking for different ways to eat healthier and new ways to grow more food in a much less space. AIO Innovation is combining both in a unique way of doing things. Our system will grow food in an organic way while at the same time save space and water. It doesn't require any soil, so you can use the system almost anywhere. AIO Innovation system is a self-contain and automated concept.

All in one automated soil-less vertical aeroponic garden that can be customized by modules and recycle water.

Imagine a garden that takes up only about 3 to 4 square feets, which can be assemble into multi-configurations for different needs. Offering fresh fruits, vegetables and fishes.

AIO Innovation system is also ECO friendly. Our system can potentially reduce water usage by 98%, reduce fertilizer by 100%, reduce chemical by 100%, reduce pesticide by 100%, reduce polluted water run off by 100%

How to help out

Share our link on the social networks at http://igg.me/at/AIOGarden

Additional information about our system

  1. It maximize food production without taking up too much space and water, due to our special vertical multi-configuration patent pending design. which means it can grow more compare to conventional gardens.
  2. It can grow plants 365 days a year indoors. While growing 2x-5x faster which means more food are produce during the same time in comparison to standard home gardens or farms.
  3. It is automated (automatically water the plants and automatically filters the water) and recirculated the water. It conserve water because it re-uses its own water, so it can be used in drought area, green house, roof top, balcony..etc.
  4. Recycled water from the filters and recirculated it with little lost.
  5. It has an aeroponic soil-less design, so it can be use in any location without soil and no soil base diseases. It does not use any pesticide or chemicals, making the plants safer.
  6. Our design is self sustainable and is a closed environment.
  7. Our system has an aqua tank that uses fish to organically fertilize the plants or used without fish as a fertilized water tank.
  8. AIO Innovation System is designed to be easy as building blocks to put together for different configurations as desire.

A large garden in a small space

You don't need a farm or a large backyard to grow fresh vegetables and fruits. You don't even need a garden. With AIO Innovation system you can get a high yield in a small space. It is remarkable how many delicious vegetables or fruits you can fit into a small growing area. You just need plenty of sunshine or grow light.

Seed companies are frequently producing new varieties of vegetables that can be grown as dwarf plants, in small areas and even in pots. They would fit in perfectly with AIO Innovation system.

There is small water requirements and small land requirements with high yields year round in shorter time. Which is perfect for both the home user and urban farmer.

What makes our system unique?

 Our system combine the best of hydroponic, aquaponic, low pressure gravity fed aeroponic, vertical farming, bio-sand filter, radial swirl filter container, fish or liquid solution tank using a air water siphon pump and design for a small carbon footprint with automation into a unique all in one automated self contain system.

It will limit water usage by using aquaculture water as fertilizer for the plants. It will recycle the water and clean it through radial swirl container filter and bio-sand filter before recirculating back to the fish tank or can be use without the aquaculture part and just use liquid fertilizer.

It is an All In One stack-able and customizable system that can fit either home user or expandable to urban farming or extended even more to maximize farming space. It can be use indoor or in greenhouse or for year round farming or for limited space farming in an automated way.

AIO Innovation system works great in drought conditions as it recycle water. 

Our system also doesn't use any soil. Our soil-less design means no soil base diseases and no need to replace the soil. Which also allows it to be use almost anywhere. 

The radial swirl container is design in a new unique way to make it easy to clean.

This system is using a locking net pot and neoprene collar media system (does not use soil)

This is a self contain automated system and easy to use after set up. 

It is organic by using fish waste as fertilizer and not any chemicals. As it is soil-less, there is no soil based disease and no need for pesticide indoor.

It doesn't have any soil base disease as there is no soil media. This also means no crop rotation is needed and no soil replacement is needed.

It grows the plants 2x-5x faster by watering oxygenated micro droplet directly to the roots and uses less space then standard farming techniques that uses soil.

It uses less electricity with a air water siphon pump (aka AWS pump or Airlift pump).

It is automated with timer, air water siphon pump, and allows a 3rd party automated feeder for the fish. 


What AIO Innovation system offers

Our system let you grow your own fresh organic fruits and vegetables plants while at the same time help you be more independent with your food resources.

Our system let you grow your own fish.

Our system maximize space to grow your plants in limited indoor space.

Our system helps if you are too busy to watch over it everyday because it is a self contain closed environment and automated (self watering, self water filtering and self fertilizing garden). It is lower maintenance with less clean up and no soil replacement because we are a soil-less design.

Our system has a seed starter to help you get started.

Our system allows you to grow food year round indoors.

Our system can help customized your garden to fit your needs by offer 8 customized configurations for both small and large requirements.

Our system has a bio sand  and radial swirl water filter for cleaning the water in the aqua tank.

Our system has a versatile design to fit inside a house, a greenhouse, a balcony or any urban settings.

Our system can potentially reduce water usage by 98%, reduce fertilizer by 100%, reduce chemical by 100%, reduce pesticide by 100%, reduce polluted water run off by 100%

Some problems with existing gardening technology vs AIO Innovation system

High pressure aeroponic systems tend to get clog and require a lot more maintenance and takes a lot of space. 

Our system is low pressure and is low maintenance and it doesn't take a lot of space.

Vertical farming tend to require liquid fertilizer replacement and soil replacement. 

Our system uses fishes to fertilize the plants in a continuous life cycle and it does not use soil, making it easier and cheaper in the long run.

Aquaponic takes up a lot of space (horizontal). 

Our system uses less horizontal space in comparison while producing more food. Our system is also design for the home users and urban farmers instead of pure large scale commercial uses.

Hydroponic takes up a lot of space (horizontal) and need fertilizer. 

Our system uses less horizontal space in comparison, have fresh fishes as additional food resources and that recycled fish waste as fertilizer.

Most conventional garden require soils (lots of soil for the plants). 

Our system is soil less and does not require yearly replacement of soil or fertilizer or crop rotation. Also unlike outdoor gardens, there is less labor needed. There is also no soil based diseases.  About 71% of the earth is cover by water and of the 29% land mass only a small percentage of that is farm-able land, but our system allows it to be use in most locations. This include undersea hotels, cruise ships, sea rigs, deserts, mountainsides, or most other location without soil.

Swirl container are not as efficient as a radial swirl container and are not easy to clean. 

Our radial swirl container is more efficient and is easier to clean with our unique design.

Most systems are not available for the average home owner, but are only available for the DIY (Do it yourself) or large commercial farms. 

Our flexible system is available for everyone ranging from small individual grower to larger urban farms (school, restaurant, rooftop, airport, grocery, etc..) to larger commercial farms.

Most system require a lot of electricity, water, soil, fertilizer and maintenance. 

Our system has a low carbon footprint with low energy requirement, low water requirement, no soil, no fertilizer and low maintenance.

Most systems are not automated. 

Ours system is design to have automated watering, automated water filtering and allow 3rd party automated fish feeding. This is less labor intensive compare to traditional gardening.

AIO Systems with different configurations:

Basic package #1:

1 seed starter container
1 vertical tube with 19 net pots
1 biosand filter tube
1 water tank
1 radial swirl filter bucket
1 air water siphon pump
Misc items
1 bumper sticker
1 shirt

1 seed starter container
1 vertical tube with 19 net pots
1 saucer with 8 net pots
1 biosand filter tube
1 water tank
1 radial swirl filter bucket
1 air water siphon pump
Misc items

1 shirt
**********************************************

Basic package #3:

1 seed starter container
2 vertical tube with 38 net pots
1 saucer with 8 net pots
1 biosand filter tube
1 water tank
1 radial swirl filter bucket
1 air water siphon pump
Misc items

1 shirt
**********************************************

Intermediate #1:

3 seed starter containers
3 vertical tube with 57 net pots
1 biosand filter tube
1 water tank
