FAQ

Why am I doing this?

Home gardening have not evolve much when it comes to new tech. The majority of time it is still the standard backyard or containers. Most of the new innovations are done by large scale commercial enterprises or by DIY. AIO Innovation Automated Garden Systems are designed with the revolutionary innovation ease of use concept to the home owners who does not have the time to Do It Yourself. AIO Innovation Automated Garden Systems are created with affordability, flexibility customizable settings and expandable systems to fit home growers needs. Plus I believe this might help the world food supply.

How can you help?

Share our link on the social networks at http://igg.me/at/AIOGarden

Where is this available to be ship?

This will be ship from Amazon in the USA. There are also 3rd party freight forwarding that would make it available world wide. However the shipping cost for world wide might run up to $500 dollars in shipping cost. Here is a link for some information about 3rd party freight forwarding sites. http://www.hongkiat.com/blog/mail-parcel-forwar...

Will the AIO Innovation Automated Garden Systems looks exactly like what is shown in the picture?

No, what is in the picture are of artist renderings only and the final version will includes improvements and various design enhancement.

What can I grow?

Growers have the options to choose from most small and medium size plants (strawberries, lettuce, spinach, arugula, herbs, celery, green onion, cabbage, bok choy, broccoli, small bush pepper plants and small bush tomato plants are some examples).

What do you mean by Eco-friendly?

Eco friendly means its low carbon footprint...does not use too much electricity to power air water siphon pump. its design for low energy uses. Can work with 3rd party solar panel and battery. Recycle the water and save water usage. Does not use fertilizer. Does not use pesticide. Does not use chemical. No polluted water run off.

I live in an apartment so I have limited space. What will be the space required if I were to buy this system?

It uses 3-4 sq ft. (horizontal) and the vertical is dependent on the configuration.

How tall are the systems?

It is design to fit inside the house and are between 5 ft to under 8 ft tall for most of our systems, except for our advance systems which is about 10 ft.

How often do I clean the aqua tank?

The aqua tank is clean by the radial swirl filter bucket and  the biosand filter. The aqua tank can support one pound of fish for every 2 gallon of water and as long as it is not overloaded with fishes, you should not need to do any additional cleaning except once every 3-6 months.

What is the benefit of our AIO Innovation automated garden system?

AIO Innovation automated garden system advantages is that it will grow 2x-5x faster using aeroponic micro droplet mix with oxygenated air as it feed directly to the roots. The air water siphon pump oxygenate the water and the small holes in the diffuser that the water are force through make it micro droplets that are just the right size for the roots that will enhance the growth of the plants.

Growing in deserts or other inhospitable regions.

Pest and  soil based disease problems are reduced  without harsh chemicals or pesticides.

Water and nutrients are recyclable with a reduction in pollution in environment with no polluted water run off.

Larger fresh organic yields year round in smaller spaces.

No crop rotation needed.

Do I have to keep the pump running constantly?

The pump are not running all the time. It is automated on a timer that can be set.

Does it need to be connected to the power socket?

You need to plug it in for the automated timer and the air pump. Or you can add a 3rd party solar panel and battery.

Who can benefit from our system?

Semi casual gardener (home owner), prepper, organic gardener, urban gardener, people with limited space, people living in drought or inhospitable condition, people with greenhouse, people who want a self contain system,  restaurants, schools, airports, grocery stores,  farmer markets, large commercial farmers.

What materials will be used for the system?
The material used is plastic. At this time we haven't decided which one yet.  We are considering high density polyethylene (HDPE) or any  new plastic material that is food safe.

Where are some unusual places to put this?

1) Can be place in a underground basement with 3rd party grow lights

2) Can be place in a undersea hotel with 3rd party grow lights

3) Can be place in a greenhouse at the desert or mountainside or other inhospitable regions

4) Can be place at a beach

5) Can be place on a rooftop

6) Can be place on a balconey

7) Can be place in restaurants

8) Can be place on a cruise ship

9) Can be place inside hotels

10) Can be place inside grocery stores

11) Can be place in schools

12) Can be place in airports

13) Can be place in shopping malls

14) Can be place in business offices

15) Can be place in conventions

16) Can be place in hospitals

What are the list of potential sea animal for the water tank (keep each in its own dedicated tank)? 

Tilapia, Freshwater Shrimp,Crawfish, and Goldfish are some examples. Most fresh water fishes too.

Do you provide the plants and fishes?

We do not provide the plants and fishes.

What are the potential benefit in food production in a acre?

Potentially about 284x more production of  fruits or vegetables in comparison to a standard farm, not including the fish farm.

Calculation:

1 acre is 43,560 square feet. 1 of our system is about 4 square feet. Potentially 10890 of our system can fit in a acre. 1 of our system can have potentially 122 plants. Potentially 1,328,580 plants in a acre. If we use strawberries as examples, and each strawberry plants makes about 3 pounds of strawberry. Potentially about 3,985,740 lbs of strawberries can be produce in a acre using the full system. Standard farm produce about 14,000 lbs of strawberries in a acre. Which means potentially about 284x more production than a standard strawberry farm.
story_txt:
Our society is looking for different ways to eat healthier
and new ways to grow more food in a much less space. AIO Innovation is
combining both in a unique way of doing things. Our system will grow food in an
organic way while at the same time save space and water. It doesn't require any 
soil, so you can use the system almost anywhere. AIO Innovation system is a self-contain and automated concept.

All in one automated soil-less vertical aeroponic garden that can be customized by modules and recycle water.

Imagine a garden that takes up only about 3 to 4 square feets, which can be assemble into multi-configurations for different needs. Offering fresh fruits, 
vegetables and fishes.
AIO Innovation system is also ECO friendly. Our system can potentially reduce 
water usage by 98%, reduce fertilizer by 100%, reduce chemical by 100%, reduce 
pesticide by 100%, reduce polluted water run off by 100%

How to help out
Share our link on the social networks at http://igg.me/at/AIOGarden 

Additional information about our system


It maximize food production without taking up too much space and water, due to our 

special vertical multi-configuration patent pending design. which means it can 

grow more compare to conventional gardens.



It can grow plants 365 days a year indoors. While growing 2x-5x faster which means 

more food are produce during the same time in comparison to standard home gardens 

or farms.



It is automated (automatically water the plants and automatically filters the 

water) and recirculated the water. It conserve water because it re-uses its own 

water, so it can be used in drought area, green house, roof top, balcony..etc.


Recycled water from the filters and recirculated it with little lost.


It has an aeroponic soil-less design, so it can be use in any location without 

soil and no soil base diseases. It does not use any pesticide or chemicals, making 

the plants safer.


Our design is self sustainable and is a closed environment.

Our system has an aqua tank that uses fish to organically fertilize the plants 

or used without fish as a fertilized water tank.

AIO Innovation System is designed to be easy as building blocks to put together 

for different configurations as desire.


A large garden in a small space
You don't need a farm or a large backyard to grow fresh vegetables and fruits. 

You don't even need a garden. With AIO Innovation system you can get a high yield 

in a small space. It is remarkable how many delicious vegetables or fruits you can 

fit into a small growing area. You just need plenty of sunshine or grow light.
Seed companies are frequently producing new varieties of vegetables that can be 

grown as dwarf plants, in small areas and even in pots. They would fit in 

perfectly with AIO Innovation system.
There is small water requirements and small land requirements with high yields 

year round in shorter time. Which is perfect for both the home user and urban 

farmer.

What makes our system unique?

 Our system combine the best of hydroponic, aquaponic, low pressure gravity fed 

aeroponic, vertical farming, bio-sand filter, radial swirl filter container, fish 

or liquid solution tank using a air water siphon pump and design for a small 

carbon footprint with automation into a unique all in one automated self contain 

system.
It will limit water usage by using aquaculture water as fertilizer for the 

plants. It will recycle the water and clean it through radial swirl container 

filter and bio-sand filter before recirculating back to the fish tank or can be 

use without the aquaculture part and just use liquid fertilizer. It is an 

All In One stack-able and customizable system that can fit either home user or 

expandable to urban farming or extended even more to maximize farming space. It 

can be use indoor or in greenhouse or for year round farming or for limited space 

farming in an automated way.

AIO Innovation system works great in drought conditions as it recycle 

water. 
Our system also doesn't use any soil. Our soil-less design means no soil base 

diseases and no need to replace the soil. Which also allows it to be use almost 

anywhere. The radial swirl container is design in a new unique way to make it 

easy to clean.This system is using a locking net pot and neoprene collar 

media system (does not use soil)This is a self contain automated system 

and easy to use after set up. It is organic by using fish waste as 

fertilizer and not any chemicals. As it is soil-less, there is no soil based 

disease and no need for pesticide indoor.It doesn't have any soil base 

disease as there is no soil media. This also means no crop rotation is needed and 

no soil replacement is needed.It grows the plants 2x-5x faster by watering 

oxygenated micro droplet directly to the roots and uses less space then standard 

farming techniques that uses soil.It uses less electricity with a air 

water siphon pump (aka AWS pump or Airlift pump).It is automated with 

timer, air water siphon pump, and allows a 3rd party automated feeder for the 

fish. What AIO Innovation system offers
Our system let you grow your own fresh organic fruits and vegetables plants 

while at the same time help you be more independent with your food 

resources.
Our system let you grow your own fish.
Our system maximize space to grow your plants in limited indoor space.
Our system helps if you are too busy to watch over it everyday because it is 

a self contain closed environment and automated (self watering, self water 

filtering and self fertilizing garden). It is lower maintenance with less clean up 

and no soil replacement because we are a soil-less design.
Our system has a seed starter to help you get started.
Our system allows you to grow food year round indoors.
Our system can help customized your garden to fit your needs by offer 8 

customized configurations for both small and large requirements.
Our system has a bio sand  and radial swirl water filter for cleaning the water 

in the aqua tank.
Our system has a versatile design to fit inside a house, a greenhouse, a 

balcony or any urban settings.
Our system can potentially reduce water usage by 98%, reduce fertilizer by 

100%, reduce chemical by 100%, reduce pesticide by 100%, reduce polluted water run 

off by 100%

Some problems with existing gardening technology vs AIO Innovation system
High pressure aeroponic systems tend to get clog and require a lot more maintenance and takes a lot of space. 


Our system is low pressure and is low maintenance and it doesn't take a lot of space.

Vertical farming tend to require liquid fertilizer replacement and soil replacement. 


Our system uses fishes to fertilize the plants in a continuous life cycle and it does not use soil, making it easier and cheaper in the long run.

Aquaponic takes up a lot of space (horizontal). 


Our system uses less horizontal space in comparison while producing more food. Our system is also design for the home users and urban farmers instead of pure large scale commercial uses.

Hydroponic takes up a lot of space (horizontal) and need fertilizer. 


Our system uses less horizontal space in comparison, have fresh fishes as additional food resources and that recycled fish waste as fertilizer.

Most conventional garden require soils (lots of soil for the plants). 


Our system is soil less and does not require yearly replacement of soil or fertilizer or crop rotation. Also unlike outdoor gardens, there is less labor needed. There is also no soil based diseases.  About 71% of the earth is cover by water and of the 29% land mass only a small percentage of that is farm-able land, but our system allows it to be use in most locations. This include undersea hotels, cruise ships, sea rigs, deserts, mountainsides, or most other location without soil.

Swirl container are not as efficient as a radial swirl container and are not easy to clean. 


Our radial swirl container is more efficient and is easier to clean with our unique design.

Most systems are not available for the average home owner, but are only available for the DIY (Do it yourself) or large commercial farms. 


Our flexible system is available for everyone ranging from small individual grower to larger urban farms (school, restaurant, rooftop, airport, grocery, etc..) to larger commercial farms.

Most system require a lot of electricity, water, soil, fertilizer and maintenance. 


Our system has a low carbon footprint with low energy requirement, low water requirement, no soil, no fertilizer and low maintenance.

Most systems are not automated. 


Ours system is design to have automated watering, automated water filtering and allow 3rd party automated fish feeding. This is less labor intensive compare to traditional gardening.

story:
The KIWI P1 is the ultimate measuring tool designed to make lives easier for those who need to accurately and quickly measure items on a daily basis. Standard laser measuring devices come with 4+ buttons, packed with complex functionalities, which majority of us find not only unnecessary but also confusing. With KIWI P1​ we wanted to make a difference: we wanted to create a LDM device that was user-friendly, without compromising on functionalities, design or accuracy.

Forget bulky, complicated LDM devices with a number of confusing buttons. KIWI P1 is the perfect all-in-one product to cure your measurement headaches. Oh, it also has this sleek, modern design that makes you look like a pro, even if you had to google what LDM actually stands for. We felt like we should mention that.

Comments from testers

We know it all sounds fancy so let us break it down for you. After all we’re here to make pro-tools easy to use. Here’s to our simple, smart, small philosophy.

Get your readings right. Our innovative VA Display offers easy and convenient readings even in dark or extremely bright environments. Down in a coal mine, or renovating Santa’s workshop up on the North Pole, your reading quality stays the same.

 

We know that micro-millimeters matter. I mean don’t get me wrong, The Leaning Tower of Pisa is great but I know a few people who would rather have their built-in wardrobe fitted to perfection. P1 makes estimates quick and easy, with its stunning accuracy of +/- 2 mm.

 

Take control over uncontrollable. Use KIWI P1 as a remote control to take measurements in hard to reach spots and difficult conditions, and say goodbye to tangled tape measures. Simply double click to go into auto fetch mode, place KIWI P1 on the starting point, and walk to endpoint. In just 10 seconds your measurement data will be available.

Let’s talk business for a minute. You can measure in a right, or a wrong way. It’s that simple. Our special smart switch add-on gives you the extra edge for a more precise alignment, which can make all the difference. Made from a sensor and magnetic base it can be conveniently
attached or detached with ease.


Insider tip: Use smart switch as a target plate when using KIWI P1 in the auto-fetch mode.  Smart, small, simple. We keep our promise. 

Ok, let’s get real. I know that you probably don’t see yourself using KIWI P1 on a daily basis unless you’re planning on a major home renovation, or work as an interior design consultant, architect, or engineer. Other than that though, you mind find yourself considering it as a single-occasion purchase. Well, you may as well, but there is so much more you can do if you let yourself think outside of the box. 


KIWI P1 fits everywhere. Home. Office. Purse. Small is the new powerful. And if you wondered how small it really is let us let you in on a secret: with a weight of 0.15 pounds (68g) and dimensions of 3.94 x 1.38 x 0.71 inches (100 x 38 x 18 mm) it's about half of a size of iPhone 7. 

Don’t trust us. Trust the numbers. After all, that’s what it is all about. 

1)  What makes KIWI P1​ different?

P1 is a perfect design for everyone! Unlike other LDM (Laser Distance Meter), one of the key features of P1 is “one-button control”, which makes it much easier to use.

We have also created the “10S auto fetch” function, which allows you to measure any object without reflective surface.

Another cool feature is that P1 also measures body height, no matter big or small!

Measure can now be so simple with P1.   

2)  How do I use KIWI P1​ to measure distance when the wall or target objects are transparent?

Generally, the laser beam goes through the transparent objects. Therefore, we suggest that you use a non-transparent objects, e.g. paper, place it in front of the transparent objects to help measure.   

3) What’s the warranty policy for KIWI P1​?

P1 comes with an one-year warranty. Your satisfaction is for us the most important. If you have any question or problem about the products, please contact us : sales@imyantenna.com. We will be there to help!   

4)  Does the laser beam harm human skin or eyes?

P1 is classified as Class II diode lasers, which powers less than 1 mW. Most of the laser measuring tools made by other brands are also classified as Class II.

A Class II laser is considered to be safe for skin because the blink reflex (glare aversion response to bright lights) will limit the exposure to no more than 0.25 seconds.

Intentional suppression of the blink reflex could lead to eye injury. P1 is not for use by children without adult supervision. Please keep away from children and pets.

5) What type of batteries the product operates on? 

To use KIWI P1 you will need 2 standard triple-A batteries, which will provide you with up to 5 hours of continuous usage.

 

EXPERIENCE & RELATIONSHIP  
Our team have over 20 years of product design and development experience. The prototype units are 100% fully functional, the first batch production of 200 pcs is already finished, from sourcing to part manufacturing, we have tried different suppliers, and now come up with those reliable and stable one we are working with right now. our main job now is to improve the structure designing and yield improvement. 

DELIVERY  
We have built extra time into the manufacturing process, so we are confident with our shipping timeline. Our team has extensive experience in logistics and shipping large volumes of inventory. 

The certs take time. But from the start of this campaign until delivery, we will update you with our progress. If we run into unexpected issues or delays, we promise to keep you in the loop and handle them with full transparency. 
Everything is ready. All we need now is YOU.

We know that micro-millimeters matter. I mean don’t get me wrong, The Leaning Tower of Pisa is great but I know a few people who would rather have their built-in wardrobe fitted to perfection. P1 makes estimates quick and easy, with its stunning accuracy of +/- 2 mm.
 
Take control over uncontrollable. Use KIWI P1 as a remote control to take measurements in hard to reach spots and difficult conditions, and say goodbye to tangled tape measures. Simply double click to go into auto fetch mode, place KIWI P1 on the starting point, and walk to endpoint. In just 10 seconds your measurement data will be available.


Let’s talk business for a minute. You can measure in a right, or a wrong way. It’s that simple. Our special smart switch add-on gives you the extra edge for a more precise alignment, which can make all the difference. Made from a sensor and magnetic base it can be convenientlyattached or detached with ease.

Insider tip: Use smart switch as a target plate when using KIWI P1 in the auto-fetch mode.  Smart, small, simple. We keep our promise. 

Ok, let’s get real. I know that you probably don’t see yourself using KIWI P1 on a daily basis unless you’re planning on a major home renovation, or work as an interior design consultant, architect, or engineer. Other than that though, you mind find yourself considering it as a single-occasion purchase. Well, you may as well, but there is so much more you can do if you let yourself think outside of the box. 

KIWI P1 fits everywhere. Home. Office. Purse. Small is the new powerful. And if you wondered how small it really is let us let you in on a secret: with a weight of 0.15 pounds (68g) and dimensions of 3.94 x 1.38 x 0.71 inches (100 x 38 x 18 mm) it's about half of a size of iPhone 7. 


Don’t trust us. Trust the numbers. After all, that’s what it is all about. 









1)  What makes KIWI P1​ different?
P1 is a perfect design for everyone! Unlike other LDM (Laser Distance Meter), one of the key features of P1 is “one-button control”, which makes it much easier to use.
We have also created the “10S auto fetch” function, which allows you to measure any object without reflective surface.
Another cool feature is that P1 also measures body height, no matter big or small!
Measure can now be so simple with P1.   
2)  How do I use KIWI P1​ to measure distance when the wall or target objects are transparent?
Generally, the laser beam goes through the transparent objects. Therefore, we suggest that you use a non-transparent objects, e.g. paper, place it in front of the transparent objects to help measure.   
3) What’s the warranty policy for KIWI P1​?
P1 comes with an one-year warranty. Your satisfaction is for us the most important. If you have any question or problem about the products, please contact us : sales@imyantenna.com. We will be there to help!   
4)  Does the laser beam harm human skin or eyes?
P1 is classified as Class II diode lasers, which powers less than 1 mW. Most of the laser measuring tools made by other brands are also classified as Class II.
A Class II laser is considered to be safe for skin because the blink reflex (glare aversion response to bright lights) will limit the exposure to no more than 0.25 seconds.
Intentional suppression of the blink reflex could lead to eye injury. P1 is not for use by children without adult supervision. Please keep away from children and pets.
5) What type of batteries the product operates on? 
To use KIWI P1 you will need 2 standard triple-A batteries, which will provide you with up to 5 hours of continuous usage.

 

EXPERIENCE & RELATIONSHIP  Our team have over 20 years of product design and development experience. The prototype units are 100% fully functional, the first batch production of 200 pcs is already finished, from sourcing to part manufacturing, we have tried different suppliers, and now come up with those reliable and stable one we are working with right now. our main job now is to improve the structure designing and yield improvement. 
DELIVERY  We have built extra time into the manufacturing process, so we are confident with our shipping timeline. Our team has extensive experience in logistics and shipping large volumes of inventory. 
The certs take time. But from the start of this campaign until delivery, we will update you with our progress. If we run into unexpected issues or delays, we promise to keep you in the loop and handle them with full transparency. Everything is ready. All we need now is YOU.

story:
Olarm™ is the Next Generation home security system, the smartest security system available today. It is reliable and priced to fit your budget!

HOW DOES IT WORK?   

Olarm™ consists of a HUB and SENSORS that perform several functionalities, jam-packed with our patent-pending technology.  Simply peel-n-stick these small intelligent sensors anywhere. Download the Olarm™ app, follow the simple steps and you are all set.

It's time to ditch all the traditional ways of security and get up to speed with the latest home security system that promises to be your eyes and ears when you're not around.  

NEXT GENERATION **Patent Pending**  

 

MEET THE OWNERS

OLARM™ FUNCTIONS

One sensor covers the whole room, each is equipped with a motion detector that can feel body heat using our advanced PIR technology, and it can also detect noise through a proprietary built-in microphone design.

The Olarm™ sensor detects motion regardless of available light. When your system is ARMED, the motion function is activated. It can detect heat and movement in the surrounding areas, creating a protective “grid.” This technology ensures intruders cannot pass unnoticed. Yet, Olarm's motion sensors are designed to avoid false alarms, such as small and large pets.    

Olarm’s built-in microphone technology listens for sounds in your home and detects noise activity anywhere it is placed. The system alerts you instantly if something unusual happens, like a smoke detector going off, glass shattering, or even a loud bang that could indicate a forced entry.   

Olarm™ detects leaks using two leads placed in the bottom of the sensor. For this functionality to work you need to place the sensor low to the ground, like on the baseboard. In case of a leak, you are immediately notified so you can avoid further damage to your property. Olarm™ assures your basement, water heater, bathroom or kitchen are consistently monitored.  

Olarm™ FEATURES & TECHNICAL SPECS  

Eliminate the need for professional installation with Olarm™. Our system does not require a landline or hardwire to ensure full functionality and reliability.

Hub receives primary power from a standard outlet,  In case of outage or disruption, the system will temporarily run on backup battery up to 48 hours.

If your Wi-Fi or internet are interrupted, the hub will automatically switch to a cellular connection like 3G or LTE. 

                                                             

Olarm™ MOBILE APP 

Get rid of the unnecessary alarm codes and keypads. Olarm™ will recognize your smartphone as its control panel, allowing for an easy and seamless access point. It will guide you through the process quickly and easily so that anyone can set up this smart security system in minutes. 

Olarm™ utilizes multiple signals such as Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and GPS from household members’ smartphone to intelligently arm and disarm your home. 

Olarm™ will learn your lifestyle and adapt to it, based on your location and daily activities.  

                                                             

Olarm™ MONITORING SERVICES
 

We are a commercial monitoring company, licensed to monitor across the United States. Hence, Olarm™ will offer a variety of monitoring services such as free self-monitoring, free community monitoring, inexpensive cellular backup, and even the LOWEST monthly cost professional monitoring in the US (less than 3 cups of coffee), unlike the excessively overpriced monitoring plans offered by existing providers.  

We are seeking to be recognized as one of the top 10 providers in the USA. Our average answer speed when you call is 30 seconds or less, and our average response time to an alarm signal is 15 seconds or less. Our goals have been set, all we need now is your support!  

OLARM™ ON-THE-GO   

RV and boat security should be on the mind of everyone who enjoys this portable lifestyle. Finding reliable security is often too expensive or unavailable. With a reliable cellular connection, Olarm™ can assure you are covered. After all, home is where you park it. Yes, the good life just got better!

STRETCH GOALS   

The more support we receive from our backers, the more functions we can add to Olarm™. Help us reach our goals and unlock these amazing features!

Help us reach our next goal of $40,000 and we will unlock "Olarm in colors" for you. Aesthetics can matter and this is why we are giving you the chance to pick from a variety of colors to match your home theme.

Help us reach 50K, and we will unlock the Smart Home Integration feature. You will be able to integrate your Olarm™ system and smartphone app with other smart home devices that you may already own (e.g. Nest, Arlo, Ring, Amazon Echo, Google Home, plus more) so you can monitor and manage it all from one app.

Help us reach our next goal of $100,00 and we will unlock "O-siren" plug-n-play alarm sirens that are used to scare off intruders. You can control the volume, customize alert tones for every household member, and it relies on artificial intelligence that can be programmed to activate during certain events. 

WHY SHOULD I PLEDGE?  

As reported by the FBI in the 2017 Census Report, a burglary happens every 15 seconds. Burglars use the front door about 50% of the time. 65% of burglaries occur in the daytime and a surprising 74% of burglaries happen in residential neighborhoods, not in businesses, like banks and stores. Property damage from home burglaries exceeds $2000 on average per event. Burglars are 3X as likely to break into a home with no visible signs of a security system. Keep yourself, your loved ones, and your valuable items safe and secure with the most affordable, simplest, and smartest security system in the world!

NEED ANOTHER REASON?   

What if we told you the cost of pledging here could be offset by discounts on your home insurance policy? On this topic of home insurance discounts, the president of the Electronic Security Association, Dom D'Ascoli, notes, "A survey of the 10 largest insurance companies offering homeowners coverage found premium discounts up to 20 percent if a home is equipped with a monitored alarm system.” Based on the 2018 average annual cost of homeowner insurance of $1083, you can save up to 20% or about $216 annually. Our 24/7 professional monitoring service will cost you only $120 annually ($10/month), now what's your excuse?

 

DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT
  

We have replaced all the bulky, traditional, old school hardware and hard wiring, and bring you these silver dollar sized smart sensors to life. We even took it one step further by integrating Olarm™ with various devices to give you the ease of controlling and monitoring your home from one place.

MEET THE TEAM 

For the past 2 years, our San Diego-based team has been working on developing the smartest, most reliable, cost-effective, and easy to use “all-in-one” alarm system. It is the only smart system that learns your lifestyle and adapts to it; Olarm™ is a new disruptive technology that is going to change the game for the home security system arena. Our product is simple and customizable, but first and foremost it keeps you safe.

 OUR STORY  

Our team operates a very successful security guard company and a professional commercial monitoring service nationwide. Over several years, we have proved to be trustworthy and are proud to say that we have some of the biggest accounts, such as the US Navy, several unified school districts, Walmart, Home Depot, and Wells Fargo among others.  

As an evolutionary step, we wanted to expand our business by offering our services and catering to the needs of the residential market. Driven by making people’s lives easier, more efficient, but most of all safer, we created Olarm™, the world's smartest home security system. Our team was motivated to create a solution for these needs that was reliable, affordable with a simple design, and yet complex in its technology. Two years later and lots of sweat and tears, World, meet Olarm™!

CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY  

Olarm™ believes that security is a necessity and not a luxury. And because giving back to the society is at the very core of our mission, we've decided to join forces with a very special partner: "Single Mom Strong." Being a single mom comes with additional worries and responsibilities, especially kids and home safety. Through this valuable partnership, we plan on donating Olarm™ systems to several members of "Single Mom Strong" upon project delivery date. Also, moving forward we plan to give a portion of our profit to "Single Mom Strong" and similar organizations with this powerful purpose. Show moms some love and back us today!

story:
Clean and Simple Planter pots can be messy! Most come with multiple drainage holes on the bottom of the pot to allow water to escape. We’ve integrated an internal water reservoir into our design. This not only captures the excess water, preventing it from spilling out, but also means you can water less frequently. This design allows for the pots to be placed directly on your desk or furniture with less risk of leakage or soil escaping.

Modular, LEGO®-like Assembly The modular shape of our plant pots allows for limitless creativity. Make your own unique plant arrangements. Stack them high, spread them out, add additional humidifiers or lamps, and grow a large variety of plants and flowers.

LED Grow Lamp Our two-bulb LED grow lamp provides nourishing light for a variety of plants. It can be set in 6-hour increments so that your plants get the light they need to flourish. Generating up to 50,000 Lux and height adjustable, our lamp is perfect for winter growing.

360° Humidifier Most plants die due to a lack of moisture in the air. This is particularly problematic with indoor environments when heating and air conditioning is present. Our humidifier distributes moisture 360°, providing necessary water for plant growth. In addition, humidifiers have been shown to help reduce eyestrain, soften skin, and have many other health benefits.

Quick Charging Pot Our Power Pot includes 4 USB ports to power all your USB devices, including a Quick Charge 3.0 port for your smart phone. This pot is ideal for side tables and workspaces.

 

 

 

 

Hi there! My name is Haobin Lin and I am originally from Mainland China. When I was a young boy I was fortunate enough to grow up in the magnificent Chinese countryside. Beautiful plants and animals surrounded me. This experience left me with a deep connection to nature. I always felt calm amidst its tranquility.

Unfortunately though, as I grew older and took on new responsibilities I was forced to leave my village. First I went to university, and then to the big city to earn an income for my family. Over time the longing for the natural world grew inside me, but it wasn’t until about 5 years ago that I finally had to act.

When my daughter was born I decided that if it was impossible for us to leave the city, I must bring the beauty of nature to my daughter. So began a 3-year journey to create the best indoor garden I could design.

One day I noticed my daughter playing with her favorite toys – “building blocks.” In that moment I realized that indoor gardens could be so much more than just a bunch of pots. By allowing you to stack and expand your pots everyone can create a unique garden just like my daughters unique building creations.

The Lego-like design has the added benefit of fitting into smaller spaces like our apartment. However, it also provides flexibility, so that my daughter can move and expand her garden as she grows. Once I began to design the pot I realized that this garden could be so much more.

 I noticed that indoor gardens could be quite messy! This is because of the multiple ventilation holes on the bottom of traditional pots, allowing excess water and soil to get everywhere. So as I designed our planter pots I added an internal water reservoir that can capture the excess water and an elevated ventilation hole to reduce soil escape.

With the mess taken care of, I quickly realized that we needed to improve the lighting in our apartment if we wanted anything to grow to its fullest. My wife and daughter were particularly keen on succulents and would often leave them on the windowsill to get light, yet that still was not enough. So I set about to design a lighting fixture that could provide for multiple plants at once and have an automatic shut off so they don’t get too much light.

At this point things were going well and our plants were getting better, but some still continued to struggle. After some research I realized that many plants require moisture in the air to thrive.

Instead of buying an off-the-shelf humidifier I decided to create something beautiful, compact, and would match our building block concept. This provided an especially difficult challenge for me and it took 23 designs before I finally created a 360° diffusing mist humidifier.

Not only do our plants get the moisture they need, but it also provides additional health benefits. My eyes are less stressed and I sneeze far less often when I work next to the humidifier. At this point our garden system was shaping up to be a beautiful, easy-to-use masterpiece, but there was still one more thing I wanted to do.

Since I spend countless hours at the office I wanted to add some greenery to my desk. Our system works perfectly for workspaces, but one day I thought ‘wouldn’t it be cool if I could charge my phone with the plant on my desk?’ I immediately started working on our Power Pot. 

This mini power hub has 4 USB ports, so that it can power the LED lamp and humidifier, plus my phone and tablet.

It wasn’t until we completed the Power Pot prototype that I realized how incredibly convenient it truly was. Any desk, end table, or counter can now have a beautiful plant and a quick-charge station!

This whole project over the past 3 years has been an amazing experience. Not only was the LeGrow Smart Garden born, but also, I was able to spend quality time with my daughter planting, growing, and expanding our home garden. Now we hope to share this experience with you.

The money we raise here on Kickstarter will provide us with the capital necessary to start full production of the LeGrow Smart Garden. We hope someday it can help millions of people reconnect with nature and grow something beautiful. Thank you! 

 

 

 

LeGrow’s Smart Garden lets customers pick and choose what their eco-system looks like, design and build it, then watch it grow. It is revolutionary because the different parts allow you to solve different problems when growing plants indoors. Not enough light? Too dry? Not much space? Purchasing parts individually or as a package allows you to create exactly what you want.

LeGrow LED Lamp - Let there be light! The lamp contains 2 LED bulbs, which automatically light up for 6 hours everyday. It ensures that your plants get enough light to grow healthily and allows you to place plants anywhere indoors. The lamp is a great tool to help herbs grow in wintertime. Using the base pots you can adjust the height of the lamp to suit your plants.

Custom broad spectrum warm 3000K white LED light that turns your plants into healthy growth.

LeGrow 5W High Efficiency LED Light 

  • Max 50000Lux. 
  • User Friendly White Lights
  • 3000 K Color Temperature 
  • Represents Colors Vibrantly (High CRI Value), No Blue or Red Tint • Supports Plant Growth 

LeGrow Humidifier - The missing link to growing plants. The #1 cause of plants dying indoors is from lack of moisture in the air. This could be from heating, air conditioning, or a desert environment. LeGrows compact, beautifully designed humidifier adds moisture to the air and also acts as a water storage device for convenience. Small but powerful, this humidifier can release more than 30 ml of water per hour for up to 6 hours. It automatically shuts off when out of water and will resume when refilled. A must-have for all indoor plant enthusiasts. What's more, having a humidifier indoors can improve the air that you breath too, benefiting your lungs, overall health, and even reducing dry skin.

LeGrow Power Pot - Combining nature with modernity. Say goodbye to ugly power sockets and cables, and instead charge your smart phones, tablets, or any other USB-powered device via your plants. The power pot is equipped with 4 USB ports (DC 5V, 36W total output power, input voltage 100-240V AC) that support fast charging, and are waterproof so you can water your plants while you charge. A smart switch allows you to turn the power on when inserting a growing pot on top of the power pot. A great accessory for any workspace.

Base Growing Pot - This is where your garden starts. The base pots can be stacked or connected together with base trays to keep your garden clean and tidy. Using silicon connectors you can stack the pots as high as you want, and in fun designs. Each pot is 8.5cm by 8.5cm and is designed to retain up to 30 ml of water, allowing you to water less often.

We hope that through the Smart Gardens flexibility and add ons, growing plants indoors will become easier and fun. LeGrow has designed a simple system that allows you to grow what you want, where you want. We believe that by bringing nature indoors you will be able to reap the benefits that plants can provide us. From reducing stress and anxiety levels, improving air quality and oxygen levels, to even making us more productive and sharpening focus, the benefits are endless.

 

 LeGrow LED Lamp has 2 LED bulbs. The height of the light is adjustable with different numbers of stacked growing pots, the lamp can provide the sunshine similar light for the plants to thrive indoors.The maximum output is 50,000 lumens.

LeGrow Humidifier releases more than 30 ml of water per hour. The water storage capacity lasts for 6 hours. It will automatically shut off when it is out of water and automatically resume again once the water is refilled.

LeGrow Power Pot is a safe power. It provides 4 USB ports with DC 5V, 36W total output power. Input voltage is 100-240V AC.

Base Growing Pot: Size: 85*85*100mm. Each pot can water 30ML.

Base Tray: Size: 255*85*20mm. Each base can hold 3 growing pots.

Connector: Size: 70*70*30mm. It can be used to connect and fix the upper and lower growing pots.

Haobin Lin is the Founder and Chief Designer of Winmart Designs (creator of the LeGrow Smart Garden) and has more than 12 years of industrial design experience. 

King Liang is the Co-founder of Winmart Design and has over 15 years experience in international marketing, logistics, finance and gardening product development.

Bharat Katyal is our Kickstarter Campaign Director and E-commerce Specialist.

 

 

 

LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group, which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this web site or product.
story_txt:
The LeGrow Smart Garden is a complete indoor garden ecosystem. The garden itself is a modular setup where each individual planter pot acts as a building block. This allows you to stack, expand, and build your garden into limitless creations. 
The ecosystem includes advanced planter pots, LED grow lamps, humidifiers, and a unique Power Pot with 4 USB charging ports. Each Smart Garden set comes with a different selection of features and you can get the Power Pots as a stand-alone. See the reward options on the right side of your screen.    Clean and Simple Planter pots can be messy! Most come with multiple drainage holes on the bottom of the pot to allow water to escape. We’ve integrated an internal water reservoir into our design. This not only captures the excess water, preventing it from spilling out, but also means you can water less frequently. First I went to university, and then to the big city to earn an income for my family. Over time the longing for the natural world grew inside me, but it wasn’t until about 5 years ago that I finally had to act.When my daughter was born I decided that if it was impossible for us to leave the city, I must bring the beauty of nature to my daughter. So began a 3-year journey to create the best indoor garden I could design.One day I noticed my daughter playing with her favorite toys – “building blocks.” In that moment I realized that indoor gardens could be so much more than just a bunch of pots. By allowing you to stack and expand your pots everyone can create a unique garden just like my daughters unique building creations.The Lego-like design has the added benefit of fitting into smaller spaces like our apartment. However, it also provides flexibility, so that my daughter can move and expand her garden as she grows. Once I began to design the pot I realized that this garden could be so much more. I noticed that indoor gardens could be quite messy! This is because of the multiple ventilation holes on the bottom of traditional pots, allowing excess water and soil to get everywhere. So as I designed our planter pots I added an internal water reservoir that can capture the excess water and an elevated ventilation hole to reduce soil escape.With the mess taken care of, I quickly realized that we needed to improve the lighting in our apartment if we wanted anything to grow to its fullest. My wife and daughter were particularly keen on succulents and would often leave them on the windowsill to get light, yet that still was not enough. So I set about to design a lighting fixture that could provide for multiple plants at once and have an automatic shut off so they don’t get too much light.At this point things were going well and our plants were getting better, but some still continued to struggle. After some research I realized that many plants require moisture in the air to thrive.Instead of buying an off-the-shelf humidifier I decided to create something beautiful, compact, and would match our building block concept. This provided an especially difficult challenge for me and it took 23 designs before I finally created a 360° diffusing mist humidifier.Not only do our plants get the moisture they need, but it also provides additional health benefits. My eyes are less stressed and I sneeze far less often when I work next to the humidifier. At this point our garden system was shaping up to be a beautiful, easy-to-use masterpiece, but there was still one more thing I wanted to do.Since I spend countless hours at the office I wanted to add some greenery to my desk. Our system works perfectly for workspaces, but one day I thought ‘wouldn’t it be cool if I could charge my phone with the plant on my desk?’ I immediately started working on our Power Pot. This mini power hub has 4 USB ports, so that it can power the LED lamp and humidifier, plus my phone and tablet.It wasn’t until we completed the Power Pot prototype that I realized how incredibly convenient it truly was. Any desk, end table, or counter can now have a beautiful plant and a quick-charge station!This whole project over the past 3 years has been an amazing experience. Not only was the LeGrow Smart Garden born, but also, I was able to spend quality time with my daughter planting, growing, and expanding our home garden. Now we hope to share this experience with you.The money we raise here on Kickstarter will provide us with the capital necessary to start full production of the LeGrow Smart Garden. We hope someday it can help millions of people reconnect with nature and grow something beautiful. Thank you!     
 LeGrow’s Smart Garden lets customers pick and choose what their eco-system looks like, design and build it, then watch it grow. It is revolutionary because the different parts allow you to solve different problems when growing plants indoors. Not enough light? Too dry? Not much space? Purchasing parts individually or as a package allows you to create exactly what you want.LeGrow LED Lamp - Let there be light! The lamp contains 2 LED bulbs, which automatically light up for 6 hours everyday. It ensures that your plants get enough light to grow healthily and allows you to place plants anywhere indoors. The lamp is a great tool to help herbs grow in wintertime. Using the base pots you can adjust the height of the lamp to suit your plants.Custom broad spectrum warm 3000K white LED light that turns your plants into healthy growth.LeGrow 5W High Efficiency LED Light 

Max 50000Lux. 
User Friendly White Lights
3000 K Color Temperature 
Represents Colors Vibrantly (High CRI Value), No Blue or Red Tint • Supports Plant Growth 

LeGrow Humidifier - The missing link to growing plants. The #1 cause of plants dying indoors is from lack of moisture in the air. This could be from heating, air conditioning, or a desert environment. LeGrows compact, beautifully designed humidifier adds moisture to the air and also acts as a water storage device for convenience. Small but powerful, this humidifier can release more than 30 ml of water per hour for up to 6 hours. It automatically shuts off when out of water and will resume when refilled. A must-have for all indoor plant enthusiasts. What's more, having a humidifier indoors can improve the air that you breath too, benefiting your lungs, overall health, and even reducing dry skin.

LeGrow Power Pot - Combining nature with modernity. Say goodbye to ugly power sockets and cables, and instead charge your smart phones, tablets, or any other USB-powered device via your plants. The power pot is equipped with 4 USB ports (DC 5V, 36W total output power, input voltage 100-240V AC) that support fast charging, and are waterproof so you can water your plants while you charge. A smart switch allows you to turn the power on when inserting a growing pot on top of the power pot. A great accessory for any workspace.
Base Growing Pot - This is where your garden starts. The base pots can be stacked or connected together with base trays to keep your garden clean and tidy. Using silicon connectors you can stack the pots as high as you want, and in fun designs. Each pot is 8.5cm by 8.5cm and is designed to retain up to 30 ml of water, allowing you to water less often.
We hope that through the Smart Gardens flexibility and add ons, growing plants indoors will become easier and fun. LeGrow has designed a simple system that allows you to grow what you want, where you want. We believe that by bringing nature indoors you will be able to reap the benefits that plants can provide us. From reducing stress and anxiety levels, improving air quality and oxygen levels, to even making us more productive and sharpening focus, the benefits are endless.


 

 LeGrow LED Lamp has 2 LED bulbs. The height of the light is adjustable with different numbers of stacked growing pots, the lamp can provide the sunshine similar light for the plants to thrive indoors.The maximum output is 50,000 lumens.
LeGrow Humidifier releases more than 30 ml of water per hour. The water storage capacity lasts for 6 hours. It will automatically shut off when it is out of water and automatically resume again once the water is refilled.
LeGrow Power Pot is a safe power. It provides 4 USB ports with DC 5V, 36W total output power. Input voltage is 100-240V AC.
Base Growing Pot: Size: 85*85*100mm. Each pot can water 30ML.

Base Tray: Size: 255*85*20mm. Each base can hold 3 growing pots.
Connector: Size: 70*70*30mm. It can be used to connect and fix the upper and lower growing pots.


Haobin Lin is the Founder and Chief Designer of Winmart Designs (creator of the LeGrow Smart Garden) and has more than 12 years of industrial design experience. 
King Liang is the Co-founder of Winmart Design and has over 15 years experience in international marketing, logistics, finance and gardening product development.
Bharat Katyal is our Kickstarter Campaign Director and E-commerce Specialist.
 


 
 
 
LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group, which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this web site or product.

story:
Sleep Heals You

...but your bedding is fighting back. Filled with illness-bearing bacteria, your bed is covered with allergens, acting as a feeding ground for pathogens. We're taking sleep back.

29 Linens are soft and creatively constructed sheets that are interwoven with advanced copper ion technology. The copper performs two functions; Destroys bad bacteria and prevents future pathogen growth.

Why Bed Linens?

After one nights sleep, your bed accumulates countless allergens and fungi. We're advised to wash our bed sheets every 5-7 days... but with the hustle of life and hassle of cleaning, that's hard to follow. In fact, one study showed that most adults wash their sheets every 5-7 weeks.

From now on, lets 'rest assured'. 29 Linens takes care of you. Our sheets and pillowcases are engineered to remain crisp and fresh, self-cleaning and comfortable, night after night — even after 300 washes.

What makes 29 Linens unique?

Bactericidal: Because of the copper, upon contact, 99.9999% of bad bacteria is killed in 30 minutes.

Longevity: Similar products loose their quality and functionality over time. Our copper is fused and woven directly into our fabric; it will never wash away.

Soft & Comfortable; Bamboo is one of the fastest growing plants (grass) on earth. Some genera grow up to 35 inches per day! If processed correctly, bamboo can transform into some of the softest and comfiest linens you'll ever feel! With an 800 thread count, percale weave, we've got you 'covered'!

Benefits of Copper

Copper is incredibly useful. Optimized for its thermal and electrical conductive properties, Copper is also Oligodynamic (yeah, it's a real word). NO microorganisms have developed a resistance to copper, which is why it has been used for centuries to disinfect liquids, solids and even human tissue. In fact, copper has been used in the health, hospitality, and cosmetic industries for decades. Surgeons, Chefs... And now you!

The Chemistry

 Copper vs Silver

Does it work with pets?

Your pets are loving... and charitable! When it comes to bacteria and allergens, they give more than anything else! With our linens, your four-legged friends can still cuddle and snuggle without bringing all of THEIR 'friends' with them!

Are the sheets still comfy?

With our bamboo coming from Oeko-Tex Certified mill and composed of an 800 thread count (500 counts above average) percale weave, we know our sheets will be addictively comfortable.

How it's made

We first head to Laos in South East Asia. There, we chose Balcooa Bambusa; a species of the Bamboo family known for its cultivation and functionality purposes.

With our partner's advanced technology, we incorporate copper with bamboo, batch test the softness, strength and longevity of the fabric and finally package and ship it to your front door!

NOTE: The copper ions are infused throughout the ENTIRE fabric... spread evenly, thoroughly and comprehensively in every square inch of everyone of our sheets and pillowcases... the copper thread line weaved at the top of the sheets is merely an accent to distinguish 29 Linens from other sheets...

Simple & Beautiful

Our intent was to create something beautiful and simple. We eliminated colors, patterns, designs and minor detailing to help focus on what we felt was most important; Quality.

Pillowcases

Our Pillowcases come in two colors; gray and white. Once the campaign is over, we will contact all backers to confirm color and size selection.

Bed Sheets

Our Bed Sheets come in two colors; gray and white. Once the campaign is over, we will contact all backers to confirm color and size selection.

Duvet Covers

Our Duvet Covers come in two colors; gray and white. Once the campaign is over, we will contact all backers to confirm color and size selection.

 Linen Set

Washing and Drying Requirements

Washing

-Wash all bed linens every 35 to 49 days (in the words, once every 5-7 weeks). 

-Wash on cool cycle.  

-Do NOT use chlorine bleach.

Drying

-Tumble dry on low heat or hang to dry. 

Note; An average top-loading washer uses 27 gallons of water per full load of laundry. With 29 Linens, we're saving you from doing an extra 40+ loads of laundry PER YEAR… which improves the environment, reserving hundreds of gallons of water and many dollars saved each month from energy expenditure.

 

THE TEAM

Apart from our manufacturers, warehouse facility and distribution center, our team is small but effective! From inception to concept, we've worked together in creating what we feel will be a game changing product!

 

Our product and shipping prices do NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes, custom fees, import duties or any other country specific fee associated to packages entering into that country from the U.S.

Our Terms of Sale are for CIF destination only. This means that we’ll cover all freight and shipping costs TO the country but none of the duties or taxes of the country to which the order is being shipped. It’s impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

Check out this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties, just remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a...

Also, for all CANADIAN BACKERS, your Customs are very strict on products imported into from the U.S. to Canada. All products over $25 are subject to duties and GST or VAT tax.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars: http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-e... 

In addition, our invoices are in U.S. dollars.

Finally, we also will NOT mark any package as a “GIFT”… this is illegal so we will not do this.

Risks and challenges

We expect to fulfill orders by June/July of 2017...

Physical products can be a long-winded and bumpy process without prior experience and effective communication.

Fortunately, each team member has helped launch multiple successful Kickstarter Campaigns.

We know the drill.

We will remain transparent and thorough in our updates; both DURING and AFTER the campaign.

Our biggest challenge up to this point was anticipating delivery time... yet through multiple conversations with our manufacturers, we've 'over-anticipated' our potential order quantities, ensuring that our partners can manufacture, package and ship on time.

Sleep ultimately affects every part of our life... and it's important that we keep it important. Our dream is to create products that promote cleanliness and comfort, integrating cutting edge technology to do it. We're passionate about this and hope that you can help us in realizing our vision!

story:
Hi my name is Mark Prescott, I live in Stephentown NY with my wife, two children, four dogs and a cat. I have been in the nursery/lawn and garden industry for almost 30 years and have developed several unique products and hold 3 patents and several provisional patents in the industry. Thanks for looking at my project, because I am going to fix a problem for you if you have a cat.  

All you need is a covered cat box, a house plant, and I can completely eliminate litter box odors in your house without harmful sprays, fancy equipment and only using the least expensive litter available (oh, you also need the cat).

Low voltage power supply for saftey, uses between 3 and 12 watts. annual opperating costs are about $6.00.  Pump noise is almost undetectable. 

See my video on the gallery tab top right over cat cover picture!! (I'm a litte awkward behind the camera, it is not my thing.)

I can do this by using a natural air cleaning process that NASA researched for more than 30 years to improve interior air quality for space travel. This process cleans harmful contaminates from the air (VOCs) using plants and the beneficial bacteria/enzymes living in the plants roots system. Its called Phytoremediation.

I also have a patent pending irrigation system called SELFWTR that makes this air cleaning process effective and inexpensive on a small consumer scale or on a larger scale for commercial buildings.

How Purrfect Air™ came to be:

I am a co-founder of AgroSci Inc., a startup company, which has developed this product. I was working in my home office, which is just fine “usually”, but unfortunately for me the only space available was a little room in the back of the house. This room also had the litter box. This was pretty awful and I was not happy about it. At the same time, I was working on a commercial scale system to clean indoor air using green walls and our SELFWTR irrigation system when it hit me!

While sitting in my cloud of toxic litter box odor, a light bulb went off in my head! Why not use our mini-SELFWTR system with one of my house plants and get rid of the stink using Phytoremediation? After 3 hours of tinkering I had a workable prototype ready to go. I got it running and it was nothing short of a miracle. I know this is a little sad but this system changed my life! Within 15 minutes most of the odors were gone and by the end of the day you could not tell there was a cat box in the room.  After all the room air freshener sprays, plug in air fresheners, expensive cat litters, (all of which are very bad for you and the cat), here was a clean natural solution to this problem. Purrfect Air™ actually cleans 1500 gallons of air a day! So not only was the smell gone but the air quality in the room was dramatically improved.  I knew then that I had to share this with the world...and this is where you come in.

What I need, what you get:  YOU GET RID OF THE STINK FOREVER!

**If campagne goal is not met Rewards will still be filled, we have wholesale orders for Purrfect Air now and will still ship product in March, your participatation will still make a big difference with this product introduction!!**

So be the first to get a Purrfect Air System of your own!!

I am looking at this crowd funding a little differently than perhaps other startup campaigns that you have seen. I have spent many hours in front of bank lenders, venture capitalists and state organizations with some success but....

For this project I want to go right to you. I know this is a big problem in a big market. I want to raise $30,000 by giving great rewards and get this system to you at a great value (25% below retail). Yes, we will have tee shirts, we have even offered our mini-SELFWTR system as a reward (My Lazy Gardener). But I want all you cat owners to see how powerful this air cleaning method is and how easy it is to operate. And Purrfect Air™ will save lots of money and pay for itself many times. Then if I need more funds, I will be able to say, see, these are the people that supported this. You can validate our Purrfect™ Air Litter Box System by supporting our project and getting a green healthy solution to this problem for your own home.  

I discovered many things while working on this project about the fragrance industry. Mostly I discovered that what they are selling us is really awful and sometimes very dangerous, without regulation, anything can be put into these products. Acetone, butane, crystalline silica, propane, all these chemicals, known carcinogens, are used in these products. They do not even have to tell you what’s in the fragrance because there is no regulation that makes companies reveal them.  Your support will keep you, the cat owner, from using these products and help us finish the commercial product and move to the next project we have for cleaning indoor air.    

If you don’t have a cat but like what you see, every bit will help. So consider the smaller contribution rewards, and Purrfect Air™ does make a great gift! You can also make a HUGE contribution by just passing this along to people you know who have a cat. Please tell your friends and thank you so much for your support!!

GET RID OF THE STINK!       KEEP THE CAT!

story:
Designed for the Small Dog, but with Dachshunds in Mind

I am the owner and creator of Crusoe the Celebrity Dachshund, an internet-famous wiener dog, but my introduction to ramps occurred when Crusoe underwent spinal surgery two years ago for a blown disc. He unfortunately suffers from Intervertebral Disc Disease (IVDD), which affects 25% of dachshunds as well as other long-bodied dogs. That was a really difficult time that I never want to go through again.

Most IVDD-related injuries occur from dogs jumping off high places, so, a lot of time was spent searching online for a bed ramp, but nothing came close to what we wanted in looks or functionality.

So over the past couple years, prototypes were built and rebuilt, and finally I created a ramp that WORKS, allowing our little pup to get onto and off the bed easily and safely. But it was the added features of being adjustable to different heights, reversible railings, easily collapisible/stowable that make it versatile and useful for everyone with a small dog. Introducing, DoggoRamps!

 

Ideal for Dogs Under 25 lbs, such as:

And... even cats!!!

It is great to have a product that solves a problem but can also make a difference in protecting dogs from injury, especially dachshunds with their sensitive backs. Seeing my little guy through surgery, teaching him to walk again, and seeing him suffer while not even understanding himself why it was all happening, was... heartbreaking. No dog owner or dog should have to go through that.

Key Features:

The only ramp on the market that combines all these features.

  • Adjustable in height, accommodating bed heights all the way up to 37" or a bit more.
  • Long enough but not too long. The ramp is long enough to allow a comfortable incline for dogs to climb up, but not so long that it takes up your whole bedroom.
  • Foldable/collapsible, all the way down to only 3", so it can be easily stowed under a bed or upright in a closet when not in use, or even taken along on a road trip or to a hotel.
  • Lightweight but sturdy. The ramp itself weights no more than 12lbs, so it can be easily moved and shipped. It also comes with a simple yet super effective safety rope to help anchor the ramp to the bed for sturdiness.
  • Reversible railings. Railings come unattached, so you can position on them on either side of the ramp, giving you the flexibility to orient the ramp as you like.
  • Simple and stylish. The ramp is light, sturdy, and minimalistic, not bulky, heavy, and constantly in-the-way, like so many other products. Plus, the ramp comes in limited-edition white and walnut colors.
  • For small dogs (and cats) under 25lbs. Although designed originally for a dachshund, the ramp is ideal for animals under 25lbs, including mini dachshunds, yorkies, chihuahuas, and even cats! 

 

What's Included?

Your ramp arrives in the mail fully assembled. The railings are always removable, so you can place them on either side of the ramp, allowing you to orient the ramp however you like. In the box we also include a safety rope, explained lower down.

The ramp is also 70" long and 12" wide, with the walkway itself being 9" wide. This is designed to be compact and not obtrusive in the bedroom, but please ensure this width of walkway is sufficient if you have a larger breed of dog.

Extra Sturdy for Extra Peace-of-Mind

This may possibly be the best innovation of the whole ramp; a little simple little wood block and rope that is super easy to install and yet incredibly effective in making this ramp 100% sturdy. 

The Safety Rope:

  • A simple yet very effective way to anchor the ramp from wobbling
  • Place wood block on opposite side of bed with rope under the mattress
  • Pull rope tight, tie off to leg of ramp.
  • *Even if your bed does not have this setup, rope can be tied off to a post, loop over a footboard, as well as further configurations which we detail in our Setup Videos.

Exclusive to This IndieGogo Campaign:

Exclusive to our pre-sales on IndieGogo, we're offering early bird (pre-order) discounts that are only available during this campaign, as well as FREE SHIPPING on all order to North America, plus we'll be testing out the popularity of paint/stain colors of the ramp, so if you pre-order now, you also get the choice of whitewash stain or dark walnut stain. If you don't choose a color, the ramp comes unstained in its natural Pine.

Ready to Get Your Very Own DoggoRamp? Here's What to Do!

  1. Select one of the "PERKS" from the right-hand side. Each perk is essentially a "product" you are purchasing.
  2. Ramps are already produced and in stock. Your order should ship out within a few days of your purchase.
  3. We say "thank you" to you for protecting your own pup and supporting this business, which will help put more ramps in the hands of more pet owners out there for the benefit of all pups.

Timeline:

Ways YOU Can Help

Reaching our goal is the best surefire way of ensuring we reach our minimum order and can push this through to production and then to your doorstep. 

  • Tell your friends and family who own small dogs and could use this.
  • Use the share buttons here to spread around on social media.

And that's all there is to it.

A Word About Intervertebral Disc Disease (IVDD)

IVDD (intervertebral disc disease) is a condition that affects about 25% of dachshunds as well as some other breeds, especially those with longer backs. Our bodies have little discs between our vertebrate – sort of like jelly-filled donuts - that act as cushions between the vertebrae. IVDD is when these discs become susceptible to bursting over time as the outer fibrous layer hardens and loses its elasticity.

Burst or bulging discs usually occur from hard impacts or injury, like from wrestling, jumping off or over things, doing stairs, etc. The offending disc can push on nerves or the spinal cord itself, causing severe pain and in some cases, paralysis.

This is why it is so important to ensure that a dog prone to IVDD avoids repetitive or hard landings from jumping off furniture or doing stairs.

 

It’s always best if you can prevent a disc from bulging/bursting in the first place, because recovery is long and hard, and if paralysis occurs, surgery is usually the recommended course of action, which is very costly and stressful.

Here are some good tips on how to prevent an injury:

  • Keep your dog strong! A strong back puts less stress on the discs themselves to absorb impacts.
  • Don’t let your dog do stairs! Here at Crusoe’s house, we have baby gates set up at the top and bottom of all staircases.
  • Use ramps for couches and beds. Like DoggoRamp! Hehe

Crusoe underwent spinal surgery for a blown disc in August 2016 after he had gone "wobbly" in the back legs. It was a long, hard recovery process that we never want to go through again. I know the DoggoRamp will not only add convenience to people's lives, but help prevent other dog families from going through what we did.

Risks & Challenges

Bringing any product to market has its inherent risks and challenges. Our production factory has already been determined, and sample product provided, which we are very happy with. We're now ready to go into production. There's risk anytime you are importing product from far away, but with sound advice from partners and a meticulous approach, we foresee no issues.
story_txt:
Designed for the Small Dog, but with Dachshunds in Mind
I am the owner and creator of Crusoe the Celebrity Dachshund, an internet-famous wiener dog, but my introduction to ramps occurred when Crusoe underwent spinal surgery two years ago for a blown disc. He unfortunately suffers from Intervertebral Disc Disease (IVDD), which affects 25% of dachshunds as well as other long-bodied dogs. That was a really difficult time that I never want to go through again.
Most IVDD-related injuries occur from dogs jumping off high places, so, a lot of time was spent searching online for a bed ramp, but nothing came close to what we wanted in looks or functionality.
So over the past couple years, prototypes were built and rebuilt, and finally I created a ramp that WORKS, allowing our little pup to get onto and off the bed easily and safely. But it was the added features of being adjustable to different heights, reversible railings, easily collapisible/stowable that make it versatile and useful for everyone with a small dog. Introducing, DoggoRamps!
 





Ideal for Dogs Under 25 lbs, such as:

And... even cats!!!


It is great to have a product that solves a problem but can also make a difference in protecting dogs from injury, especially dachshunds with their sensitive backs. Seeing my little guy through surgery, teaching him to walk again, and seeing him suffer while not even understanding himself why it was all happening, was... heartbreaking. No dog owner or dog should have to go through that.

Key Features:
The only ramp on the market that combines all these features.


Adjustable in height, accommodating bed heights all the way up to 37" or a bit more.

Long enough but not too long. The ramp is long enough to allow a comfortable incline for dogs to climb up, but not so long that it takes up your whole bedroom.

Foldable/collapsible, all the way down to only 3", so it can be easily stowed under a bed or upright in a closet when not in use, or even taken along on a road trip or to a hotel.

Lightweight but sturdy. The ramp itself weights no more than 12lbs, so it can be easily moved and shipped. It also comes with a simple yet super effective safety rope to help anchor the ramp to the bed for sturdiness.


Reversible railings. Railings come unattached, so you can position on them on either side of the ramp, giving you the flexibility to orient the ramp as you like.

Simple and stylish. The ramp is light, sturdy, and minimalistic, not bulky, heavy, and constantly in-the-way, like so many other products. Plus, the ramp comes in limited-edition white and walnut colors.

For small dogs (and cats) under 25lbs. Although designed originally for a dachshund, the ramp is ideal for animals under 25lbs, including mini dachshunds, yorkies, chihuahuas, and even cats!

If you don't choose a color, the ramp comes unstained in its natural Pine.
