story:
Once again, we'd like to show our appreciation for your trust and support on IMILAB EC2.

We're so grateful that we have raised $586k after our project released. We could never achieve this without you!

Now, we've decided to end the crowdfunding in Jun. 21st 22:00 EST and the price will be raised. It's a hard decision for us but we can't be on crowdfunding forever and we have to step forward. To backers who already backed us, the delivery is back to normal now and your perks are ready to be sent out and we will start shipping before the end of June.

2020 is a hard time for everyone. As a start-up company, we did not have any experience on this. We kept on improving ourselves and got our backers updated from us, and for this long time, we believe that we had made IMILAB EC2 good enough for the global market and we are looking forward to seeing you in the future.

It's now or never. You still have couple of hours to get the best price ever. So what are you still waiting for, go grab yours before it's gone!

Here is a video about how to set up IMILAB EC2

Another review coming, thanks Xiaomify：

Thanks for Just Vlad's review:

 

Home security is on every home owner's mind.  No budget to hire security guard? Don't worry! Security camera is the best solution to monitor your home wherever you are & watch over the things in your life you value most. 

However installing traditional CCTV equipment is really messy and make people frustrated. What's more? You will receive the bill every month, which cost you even more than the cameras.

IMILAB EC2 is a 1080P wireless security camera with best performance in price for an AI system. It can work 24/7 to monitor your home, identifying dangerous automatically. Never breakdown. No vacation. No need to pay salary. It is even better than a security guard.

Integrated with PIR and the cutting edge AI (artificial intelligence) technology, IMILAB EC2 can differentiate among human, large pets or other large warm moving objects. If animal is detected,  the system will not send alarm notifications to reduce false alarm. If human is detected, the owner will receive an APP notification quickly. Then, you could open the app to check the status of your home.

IMILAB EC2 is equipped with high-performance self-driven infrared light which will turn on automatically in low light and enable an effective night vision at up to 100 m (330 feet), so the AI system can keep on working, monitoring dangerous and response quickly, even in the dark.

Night vision comparing: IMILAB EC2 vs iPhone

With IMILAB EC2 and Mijia Home APP, you can speak to anyone who is in front of the camera, no matter where you are. With a built-in speaker and microphone,  you can hear the visitor when you open the notification to see a live video stream. You can have a conversation with the visitor not necessarily just at home but you can be at work, on vacation, or literally anywhere in the world.

IMILAB EC2 allows you to monitor your home from anywhere and support your safety concerns with ease. Simply view with the Mi Home App via your mobile device and access the camera through the cloud anytime. Shows real-time video and sound in your little one’s room. Watch, listen and talk to your babies with your mobile device even when you're away.  You can also keep an eye on your babies at night without disturbing their sleep. Enjoy having a peace of mind anytime anywhere!

 

The IMILAB EC2 is easy to setup and can be installed by drilling in the bracket with two screws and mounting the camera. Or with an adhesive backing. Simply place it virtually anywhere, mount the camera and power it on.

IMILAB EC2 security camera comes with 360° adjustable ball joint holder frames bracket set which allows you to adjust different angles easily.

IMILAB EC2 camera systems are small, really easy to use and install by yourself – just attach them to any flat surface, indoors or outdoors, doorway, backyard, garage or even on the trees. With no drilling or wires to hide.

IMILAB EC2 consists of a built-in 5100 mAh lithium rechargeable battery and do not need to constantly be plugged in and recharged. The battery can support the security camera to operate for 120 days on one single charge and only need to be charged 3 times per year. It can be easily unfixed to recharge or you can even just charge it with a power bank directly.

If you want the peace of mind that comes with having a home security system but don’t want to break the bank paying high monthly monitoring fees for negligent manpower monitoring, IMILAB EC2 is the best option for you. IMILAB EC2 home security camera system is DIY and 100% wireless installation. Mount these devices strategically around your home, and enjoy a more robust home security experience. There are no monthly fees, installation costs, or long-term contracts required. Equipped with PIR and AI technology to replace manpower, offer you a more reliable and secure home protection system.

IMILAB EC2 is the first security camera with Free lifetime cloud storage in the market. For even more security, enjoy the free secure cloud storage to stream and download surveillance footages from the past 7 days. Register once you purchase IMILAB EC2 and you can enjoy the free cloud storage service forever. 

IMILAB EC2 features PIR (Passive Infrared) thermal sensing technology to work entirely by reliably detecting heat-generating moving objects. When someone enters the sensing range (normally 5-14um wavelength), the PIR motion sensor will automatically receive the infrared wave emitted by the human body which is smart enough to detect humans rather than sheets blowing in the wind.

To reduce false triggers, combining the AI (artificial intelligence) technology to differentiate among human, large pets or other large warm moving objects. If animal is detected,PIR will not send alarm notifications nor recording in the system that help to consume less energy and reduce false alarm.

Combination of IMILAB EC2 Wire-free gateway and Wire-free home security camera. The gateway can support up to 4 wire-free cameras with a long range of 100 meter (330 feet), which can cover all desired monitoring place of a house.

IMILAB EC2 with built-in Cloud DVR and remote viewing allows you to see what's happening in your home & business via phone or pad while you are away. Quick setup, stream high-resolution live video and playback footages using Mi Home APP at any time anywhere you are.

We apply the most recent technologies of manufacture and works with the most sought-after industrial designers of XIAOMI phones. We aim to provide you with long-lasting and stylish-looking smart gadgets that make your life easier. IMILAB EC2 offers a quality design with IP66 waterproof feature, designed to withstand any extreme weather of rain, snow, and temperatures of -4° to 122° F (-20° to 50° C). Operate perfectly in any circumstance to offer you flexibility and stability in your security monitoring.

IMILAB Security Cameras provide a resolution of 1080P that is equivalent to Blu-ray quality. It is also equipped with a 120° ultra-wide-angle lens to easily cover more areas in the room and effectively reduce blind spots.

IMILAB has been pursuing the conception of providing low-cost and high-quality products in order to win the favor of our customers. We hope more people can enjoy the use of our products and know about our brand through the crowdfunding this time. Therefore, we offer the lowest price ever in our crowdfunding which is only 1/2 of the price of other similar products. Furthermore, we offer a smaller combination of possibilities: The basic set including 1 camera and 1 gateway. You can also add an extra camera for just $69. A gateway can support up to 4 cameras.

We will offer you 16GB TF card if you share our link on your social media, such as Facebook, Twitter, then post the link of your sharing post in our comment section.

Simply just follow these 3 easy steps:

1. Find your private link:

You can directly click and copy the link, please don’t miss your privacy ID, the last several digits:

2. Post the link on your social media with captions, like:

  • No monthly fee & Free cloud storage
  • Cordless. No cable required.
  • 1080P & Night Vision
  • IP66 & Cordless
  • Xiaomi Ecosystem

That should be better

4. After you share the link on social media, please copy the link of your sharing post and paste it on our comments box. Then, we will know you have joined our REFERRAL PROGRAM. We will do record and add on the TF card into your package.

Probably you may ask: I have ordered a TF card or my package includes a TF card. Why do I need another one? TF card can be used for many devices, such as Android smart phone, camera and laptop. So never worry finding yourself keeping too many TF cards. 

So are you ready? Quickly share the campaign and get the FREE gifts today! Go, go, go.

IMILAB is one of the most important members of Xiaomi Ecosystem. We have supplied 2,800,000 sockets and 9,000,000 cameras to Xiaomi in the past 5 years. EC2 is the first product for IMILAB to do the global marketing. We promise its quality and reliability will be the best.

Work With Partners：

Work With Partners：

story:
Short Summary

  • I am Dr Phil Green, I have been involved in start-up businesses  and currently lecture Engineering & Design subjects at a University.
  • The Midnight Pebble was developed in recognition that current high performance photoluminescent materials were only utilised in industrial/safety applications and could be used to good effect in a domestic setting. The face of the pebble is high grade photoluminescence (glow-in-the-dark) which illuminates a bedside glass or bottle of water whilst providing backlighting for the hands of the clock.
  • A GB patent has been granted for the Midnight Pebble and I am currently trying to set-up manufacture and global distribution of the Midnight Pebble.
  • Contributions will help to get this innovative product to the global market.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am looking to raise £4000 in order to complete the last stage of setting-up manufacture and negotiating global distribution contracts. I have personally invested over £12,000 to date which has exhausted my available funds.
  • Contributors pledging £20 or more will receive a Midnight Pebble as a perk (fully functional and production representative)

The Impact

  • The Midnight Pebble is another example of uk based innovation and will benefit end users as well as making a contribution to the UK economy.
  • I am the principal pioneer of the D30 impact technology which is now a thriving UK based technology company.
  • I have had an initial 1000 made at a relatively high cost due to the low quantity. The feedback  from end users is very encouraging. A successful campaign will help get this product known globally.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share the link with anyone you feel may be interested in this unique product
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary
I am Dr Phil Green, I have been involved in start-up businesses  and currently lecture Engineering & Design subjects at a University.
The Midnight Pebble was developed in recognition that current high performance photoluminescent materials were only utilised in industrial/safety applications and could be used to good effect in a domestic setting. The face of the pebble is high grade photoluminescence (glow-in-the-dark) which illuminates a bedside glass or bottle of water whilst providing backlighting for the hands of the clock.

A GB patent has been granted for the Midnight Pebble and I am currently trying to set-up manufacture and global distribution of the Midnight Pebble.

Contributions will help to get this innovative product to the global market.

What We Need & What You Get
I am looking to raise £4000 in order to complete the last stage of setting-up manufacture and negotiating global distribution contracts. I have personally invested over £12,000 to date which has exhausted my available funds.

Contributors pledging £20 or more will receive a Midnight Pebble as a perk (fully functional and production representative)

The Impact
The Midnight Pebble is another example of uk based innovation and will benefit end users as well as making a contribution to the UK economy.

I am the principal pioneer of the D30 impact technology which is now a thriving UK based technology company.
I have had an initial 1000 made at a relatively high cost due to the low quantity. The feedback  from end users is very encouraging. A successful campaign will help get this product known globally.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please share the link with anyone you feel may be interested in this unique product

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
ROCKUBOT MINI, a mini-size for easy-to-carry and powerful UVC light, has two powerful UV-C bulbs to area 2 meters around for your bedroom, cabinet, cupboard and bathroom.

 

Due to the advanced UV light technology, ROCKUBOT Mini can clean  thoroughly in nothing flat by damaging the DNA of germ's cells, preventing them from replicating.

Don't worry about the harm of the UVC light for human. The sensor automatically turns off the UVC light when human or animal is within the 2 meters detected zone.

PIR (Pyroelectric Infrared) sensor is also called human infrared sensor with working principle as follows:

The piezoelectric ceramic dielectric of PIR sensor can maintain the polarization state after polarization, which is called spontaneous polarization. The spontaneous polarization decreases with increasing temperature, and the temperature drops to zero at the Curie point. Therefore, when this material is exposed to infrared radiation and the temperature rises, the surface charge will decrease, which is equivalent to releasing a part of the charge, so it is called pyroelectric. The discharged charge can be converted into voltage output by the amplifier. This is how the PIR sensor works.

Say goodbye to huge spacious UVC light as its pocket size feature makes it anywhere.

USB-C Port Fast Charging

3 Modes - 5mins, 10mins, 20mins 

UVC Wand

ROCKUBOT MINI is also designed with two modes, automatic mode and handheld mode. Under handheld mode, you can also just hold it to clean the knobs, toilet seats or those fancy utensils, anything anywhere.( Handheld mode, only one bulb will turn on to avoid direct exposure of user to UV-light).

Testing Report

The idea for ROCKUBOT MINI came to us while we travel around one day, and realized that we can have a better safe way to clean our surroundings. We spent months researching the current market and determined to create something different. It should be an easy-to-carry item, and safe for living, as it is a UV-light. As well as easy-to-use. We finally decided to design it a one-button pocket-size powerful UVC light which has built-in a PIR human sensor sensitive to detect the human or animals to avoid the harm of UV-light to living creatures. Two UVC bulbs are powerful enough to clean the space where huge one can't reach.

This is not the first time to go crowd funding. With the experience of the ROCKUBOT UVC Robot, which over thousands of backers helped us to bring it come true. Even though we have a hard time to produce, test and ship, finally we go through every barriers and shipped the product to backers. We believe that with the experience, we can make this new ROCKUBOT MINI a better product and arrange the production and shipment well. As you can see from the pictures, the tools are ready for production, and this time we are trying to start mass production and ship in September.

Production Line

Fulfillment & Shipping

We are planning to make the fulfillment on the September. The first batch is about 500pcs and the others will also be sent before the end of September.

Risks and Challenges

With our current production capabilities, we should be able to produce the units sold on Indiegogo in 2-3 months. We are still constantly receiving feedback from our testers, improving the product and adding more features to it as we go to make it even better! We have our manufacturers lined up, and our production team is waiting for our signal. We know what we're doing, and you should be confident that we will deliver what we promise when we say we will. We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality and high-reliability robot, on time, that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come. Should any issues come up, you can be confident we will handle them with transparency and the utmost care for you, our backers. Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us! In case you have any questions, please feel free to e-mail us at rmini@rockubot.co

story:
When was the last time you looked for a smart home hub and could find all the features you wanted in one device? And for an unbelievable price. Presenting the HeimVision Assure B1—an all-in-one smart home security hub that comes with useful features such as two-way audio, 130° FoV, five-minute setup, and more. All starting from a price of only $79.

HeimVision Assure B1 is designed to cover every corner of your home. You can connect up to 4 wireless cameras to 1 base station to monitor large spaces. With 2K Full HD resolution and a 130-degree field of view, nothing escapes this smart home camera. Plus, designed with a smart PIR sensor, it can identify any presence, and the human-figure detection reduces false alerts to save standby time.

Additionally, the security camera also boasts a minimal and stylish design that can easily blend with any modern home decor.

 

You can easily detect any suspicious activity around your compounds with the spotlight focused night vision skills of this camera. It can automatically detect motions and will light up if required, in case of an emergency.

 

 

In case you want to store all of your recording data in the cloud, HeimVision Assure B1 provides the necessary services for you, at an affordable price.

 

 

 

HeimVision main focus is to launch home security cameras and products around the smart home vertical. Their HM241 NVR system and HM211 outdoor cameras were certified as a "Best Seller" on major e-commerce platforms.

story:
Short Summary

Door Décor is the new style of decoration for your front door and all doors in your home. Posterize your favorite memory, experience, person, or occasion. It comes with adjustable illumination and records personal greetings. It connects it to your home alarm system to signal emergency services when you need help. And it will flash brightly until first responders can find you. Or you can use it as signage and advertising for your business.

What You Get

Door Décor’s Features at a glance

  • An unbelievable selection of vivid holidays, special occasions, sports teams, comic books, and cartoon character illustrations.   
  • Make to order graphics to fit any celebration, event, or reason. 
  • Its bright illuminating backlight glows into the night and also comes with a dimmer and on/off switch. 
  • Customizable audio message recorder to welcome and impress guests
  • It has an emergency flashing alert feature giving you a comforting sense of safety and security. It serves as a powerful helping hand to first responders.
  • Contains special software that connects to your home alarm system and all local emergency services. 

  • It comes with remote control.

  • It’s extremely durable, waterproof, and weather-proof.

It’s preassembled and installation can be done by almost any adult. It has a slick and unique design while remaining relatively simple, easy, and ready to use. It’s backed by our world-class customer guarantee that assures you of the consistency and reliability of Door Décor’s performance.

Give a message of love and hope to all you welcome into your home. Door Décor’s ultimate goal is to bring love and appreciation back into remembrance because the world is absolutely in need of love today. Uplift your mode each and every time you walk through your door.

For businesses that need inexpensive signage and advertising. Impress your customers with something creative, lively, and exclusive. 

Feel even more relaxed and serene in your home knowing that you now have an extra level of protection by Door Décor being connected directly to local police and first responders.

Part of the campaign is involved with basing our manufacturing factories on American soil.  I want to bring manufacturing into the urban areas where those who we employ live, so it'll be easier for them to get to work. But it's extremely important that we bring business back to the United States. We're outsourcing over 80 percent of our products from overseas. We can do it right here at home.

Other Ways You Can Help

With the state of the entire world, it is completely understandable that some are unable to donate due to their financial situation. That is the case sometimes, so it would be greatly appreciated if they could follow and share our social media and our Indiegogo page!  

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thedoordecorator/ 

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/DoorDecorLLC

story:
In The Press:

 

 

 

   

 

   

 

  

 

 Towels stink – But we discovered that the root of the issue is bacteria.

Our Micro-fine fibers are carefully coated with pure silver, and proven to eliminate up to 99% of bacteria

By twisting these silver fibers with organic cotton, the Silvon Towel eliminates bacterial growth while remaining lusciously soft and absorbent.

 

Antimicrobial silver has been used in the medical community for many years now. This technology has been verified by more than a decade of testing at research institutions including Pennsylvania State University and Cornell University.  

Silvon relies on the oligodynamic effects of natural silver, a well regarded antibacterial property that destroys bacteria cells. 

The result is a 99% reduction in bacteria on the fabric surface, providing countless benefits to your skin and health.

 

 

Testing: The international standard (ISO) 20743, is the test method used on Silvon products. This method is designed to test the ability of fabrics to prevent microbial growth. Simply put, fabric samples are exposed to bacteria, and the antimicrobial activity is closely monitored and measured.

Our Lab: We’ve partnered with MicroStar Lab in Crystal Lake, Illinois for all antimicrobial testing. MicroStar Lab is one of the world’s premier microbiology labs dedicated to providing quality microbiological testing for manufactured products.

Results: All Silvon products have effortlessly received (ISO) 20743 certification! To outline this process, We’ve included a (very elaborate) lab report below:

Silvon Towel Testing Report

 

 

 No harsh chemicals, no nanotechnology – those were our guidelines. Silvon is committed to manufacturing products that surpass the most stringent safety and environmental protection standards. All of our partners are Oeko-Tex certified, an international association focused on textile safety and sustainable production.

 

 

 

 

 Why Us?

Last year we launched Silvon Bedding with over 13,000 customers around the globe. This was just the beginning of an incredible journey to revolutionize the fabrics that are part of our every day lives. 

Over the past year, we pored over research, studies and customer feedback to see what other products could benefit from our advanced silver yarn. From there, we set out to take this research and design another product that could help everyone. After months of prototypes and lab tests, we've created a towel that we know you'll love.

story:
Good news! Free windows/door sensor waiting for you!
If you order slim kit, package A or B, then share it on your SNS, like Facebook, Twitter, Google+, we will give you a windows/door sensor as a free gift. Please email your screen copy to kithlee@sina.com . We will put the gift into your package. Thank you for your support.

Start from $79, no annual fee, easy to get guard from iGia home security system. Let's project our family together.

Oliver made a lite review for us. Thanks Oliver.




iGia is a smart home security kit integrated with intelligent algorithm and smart sensors. iGia system contains central control unit, HD camera, motion sensor, door/windows sensor, smart smoke detector and alarm trigger. You can freely add or remove those smart sensors to build up your customized smart home guard!

iGia is not just sensor bundles, this intelligent system is your trustable smart home guard!

     


iGia is very easy to install and use. No damage to the wall. All accessory sensors can be scanned to connect. Touch and scan, then enjoy smart home security!


There are some so called smart security cameras on the market, but are they really smart and safe enough?

The other security cameras can only monitor part of your house due to the vision angle limits. But iGia can cover all of your house with the help of the smart sensor systems, you can fully monitor everywhere of your house!

iGia provides cloud database supports. Users can back up the video on the cloud, and review them anytime and anywhere. In addition, the cloud technique involves with intelligent algorithm, and can enhance the signal safety and stability, avoid false alarm.

iGia is smart. The most unique and core technology make iGia smart is the intelligent algorithm so called “intelligent error correction system (IECS)” algorithm. As is known, because of environmental and human factors, the signal may be disturbed, resulting in the difference between received data and the original data. iGia uses IECS technique to make sure the data is correct and stable, and can even restore the broken or disturbed data. 


Note: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.



Q:What advantages does iGia have?

A:This security system is suitable for the theft-proof of home,  shops and offices. All triggered alarms will be directly sent to your mobile APP through internet. It will make you informed of the security information of your home no matter where you are. iGia also integrates intelligent algorithm, avoids of false alarm. Home security is never been so stylish and affordable!

Q: Is door and window sensor installable for the door with a frame? 

 A: Of course it is. Just make sure the two parts are kept in the same level.

Q:How is the equipment signal’s ability to go through the walls? How large is the area that the signal can cover? 

A; The equipment’s ability of getting through the wall is strong. All the fittings’ signal, within the effective distance from the central control unit, can reach 800 meters if in open area.It can go through 5 walls, around 30 meters if inside of the house. In a word, the covering distance is large.

Q:Will this product need plugged in? How is the safety? 

A: This equipment needs plugged in. The power source of the host is 5v, 2000mA. The fittings contain batteries which can be used for 2 year. So, the equipment is safe please do not worry.

Q:How is the battery life?

A: This equipment has intelligent power design. The battery can work for 2 years and there is no need for frequent maintaining. Please do not worry.

Q:Is it compatible with sensors of other brands? 

A: Other products and brands are not supported.

Q:Is there any plan of releasing some extended parts like a universal  remote control? 

A: Thank you for your attention! We have worked on the extended functions during the crowd-funding period.

Q:What type of mobile phones does iGia support? 

A: iPhones and Android phones.

Q:How long is the warranty period?

A:The warranty is 1 year.

Q:Where can I download the APP?

A: The way of downloading is presented in user guide. You can download the special APP for iGia from major APP market or the official Website of iGia.

Q:What is the major function of the emergency alarm trigger? Is it used to control the door and window sensor and motion sensors?

A: The button is for emergency call. If someone presses the button, the APP will send you the message immediately to tell you what happened so that you can take actions accordingly.

story:
STORY UPDATE


First of all, we would like to thank you all for the tremendous support you have given us in these hard times. We appreciate everything and are forever in debt to you all.

Secondly, some good news - even though our apartment was NOT insured, the building was. Which means the insurance agency will cover the costs of repeartion. Eletricity, gas, walls, ceilings and floors will be replaced at their cost, which is a HUGE relief.

We still do need money for beds, closets, clothes and other minor things so your money which you selflessly donated will be put to good use and will help us replace the things we lost in the fire. Thank you again for that, we are so grateful.

So with this good news, we will be closing the campaign as we feel the situation has changed and we would feel wrong to take more money. We can assure you, once again, the money we recieved will be put to good use.

Thank you again so much, forever in your debt, God bless you all.

Since indiegogo does not allow for a campaign to be closed and we are unable to delete it, we will leave it up. If you decide to donate, please read the full story and remember the insurance agency will cover the cost of rebuilding and all the money donated will be used for the interior,

Thank you again, God bless.


A Christmas to never be forgotten

{Tradução em português ao final}

This is the story of a family that just lost their house in Zagreb, capital of Croatia, by fire on Christmas - during lunch time on 25th of December. Now 3 retired people + 1 schizofrenic man are homeless and have to restart their lives from the beginning. The fire has started because of Christmas´ tree lights and thanks to God they were able to scape with no big injuries.

My name is Carla, I´m from Brazil and I live in Croatia. I´m a big friend of their son, Neven, who moved to my home with his girlfriend. As all the family is still shocked by this disaster, me and my friends decided to help them with this campaing on IndieGogo.

This is their story:

We were having lunch on Christmas and everything happened so fast that it is hard to explain. We had to leave our home with no time to save anything but ourselves. And now, after losing documents, furniture, clothes, shoes, food, memories, our lovely home, all we have is hope and support from family and friends to start a new life.

Fortunately we could move to my son´s house, but as it is really small, he had to leave in order to open space to us and now he is sleeping each night at different friend´s houses with his girlfriend. 

Many friends are donating us new clothes and supporting us with food and we are very glad to see that we can count with them at this difficult moment. But the main problem is that we don´t have the money to buy anything - neither for a new house or to rebuild this one and try to recover what is left (one bedroom wasn´t burned, but the living room, the kitchen, the bathroom and 2 other rooms). It is estimated that we need around 100.000 euros for it, and we need to start doing it as soon as possible because we are truly homeless in this very moment. 

Update: We found small apartments for around 55.000 euros, but as we can´t change the campaign value, please have in mind that we don´t less money to restart our lives! 

The damage was so big that we were on the news in Croatia. Here you can see some publications and pictures of the disaster:

U pozaru na Zagrebackoj salati ozlijedene cetiri osobe

Izgorio prvi kat obiteljske kuće - Četiri osobe lakše ozlijeđene

We didn´t lose only material goods, but part of our story. Christmas will be forever marked by this disaster that could be killed my family, but also as a huge life challenging that put all my family more united than never before. We are alive and we have the strenght to build a new story. That´s why we came to IndieGogo to kindly and ask for help and compassion.

Thank you,

Lidija, Ozren, Zoja and Vedran


Um Natal que jamais será esquecido

Essa é a história de uma família croata que acabou de perder sua casa em Zagreb, capital da Croácia, devido a um incêndio no dia do Natal. Agora três aposentados e um homem esquizofrênico estão sem teto e precisam recomeçar suas vidas do zero. O fogo teve início devido aos piscas-piscas de Natal e graças a Deus todos escaparam sem grandes ferimentos.

Meu nome é Carla, eu sou brasileira e moro na Croácia. E sou uma grande amiga do filho deles, o Neven, que se mudou temporariamente para minha casa com a namorada. Eles ainda estão em choque com o acidente, e por isso eu e meus amigos decidimos iniciar esta campanha no IndieGogo como uma forma de ajudá-los.

Esta é a história deles:

Nós estávamos almoçando durante o Natal e tudo aconteceu tão rápido que é difícil de contar. Nós tivemos que deixar nossa casa correndo sem tempo para salvar nada mais além de nós mesmos. E agora, após perder documentos, móveis, roupas, sapatos, comida, memórias, nossa querida casa, tudo o que temos é esperança e ajuda da família e de amigos para começar uma nova vida.

Felizmente nós pudemos nos mudar para a casa de meu filho, mas ele precisou deixar sua própria casa para abrir espaço para nós, visto que o apartamento é muito pequeno, e agora ele dorme a cada noite na casa de diferentes amigos com a sua namorada.

Muitos amigos estão nos doando roupas e nos dando suporte com alimentação, e nós ficamos muito felizes em saber que podemos contar com eles em um momento tão difícil para nós. Mas o problema principal é que nós não temos dinheiro para comprar uma casa nova ou para reconstruir essa e recuperar o que o fogo deixou (um quarto não foi incendiado, mas todo o resto, que incluíam a cozinha, a sala, o banheiro e dois quartos). Foi estimado que essa reconstrução custará em torno de 100.000 euros e nós precisamos começar as obras o quanto antes porque nos encontramos neste momento verdadeiramente sem teto.

Atualização: Nós encontramos alguns apartamentos pequenos à venda por cerca de 55.000 euros, mas como não podemos mudar o valor dessa campanha, viemos aqui informar que não precisamos atingir o limite máximo para recomeçar nossas vidas.

O desastre foi tão grande que saiu em alguns jornais da Croácia. Aqui estão alguns links onde é possível ver mais fotos:

U pozaru na Zagrebackoj salati ozlijedene cetiri osobe

Izgorio prvi kat obiteljske kuće - Četiri osobe lakše ozlijeđene

Nós não perdemos apenas bens materiais, mas parte de nossa história, Nosso Natal será para sempre marcado por esse desastre que poderia ter matado minha família, mas também como um enorme desafio de vida que uniu ainda mais nossa família. Estamos vivos e fortes para construir uma nova história. Por isso viemos até o IndieGogo pedir encarecidamente por sua ajuda e compaixão.

Obrigado,

Lidija, Ozren, Zoja and Vedran


What We Need & How We Will Use Your Money

We will find the cheapest way to figure this out, even if means buying a small new house, recovering this damaged one or renting a new apartment for a while. We just need to start our new life.

Nós iremos buscar a maneira mais barata de reconstruir suas vidas, seja comprando uma nova e pequena casa, reconstruindo esta que foi incendiada ou alugando um apartamento por um tempo. Apenas precisamos recomeçar nossa nova vida.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can´t donate any money, please be kind to help us sharing this campaign on your social medias and with friends. Thank you in advance and God bless you!

Se você não puder doar dinheiro, nos ajude compartilhando essa campanha em suas redes sociais e com amigos. Muito obrigado e que Deus te abençõe!
story_txt:
STORY UPDATE

First of all, we would like to thank you all for the tremendous support you have given us in these hard times. We appreciate everything and are forever in debt to you all.

Secondly, some good news - even though our apartment was NOT insured, the building was. Which means the insurance agency will cover the costs of repeartion. Eletricity, gas, walls, ceilings and floors will be replaced at their cost, which is a HUGE relief.

We still do need money for beds, closets, clothes and other minor things so your money which you selflessly donated will be put to good use and will help us replace the things we lost in the fire. Thank you again for that, we are so grateful.

So with this good news, we will be closing the campaign as we feel the situation has changed and we would feel wrong to take more money. We can assure you, once again, the money we recieved will be put to good use.

Thank you again so much, forever in your debt, God bless you all.

Since indiegogo does not allow for a campaign to be closed and we are unable to delete it, we will leave it up. If you decide to donate, please read the full story and remember the insurance agency will cover the cost of rebuilding and all the money donated will be used for the interior,

Thank you again, God bless.


A Christmas to never be forgotten {Tradução em português ao final}
This is the story of a family that just lost their house in Zagreb, capital of Croatia, by fire on Christmas - during lunch time on 25th of December. Now 3 retired people + 1 schizofrenic man are homeless and have to restart their lives from the beginning. The fire has started because of Christmas´ tree lights and thanks to God they were able to scape with no big injuries.


My name is Carla, I´m from Brazil and I live in Croatia. I´m a big friend of their son, Neven, who moved to my home with his girlfriend. As all the family is still shocked by this disaster, me and my friends decided to help them with this campaing on IndieGogo.
This is their story:
We were having lunch on Christmas and everything happened so fast that it is hard to explain. We had to leave our home with no time to save anything but ourselves. And now, after losing documents, furniture, clothes, shoes, food, memories, our lovely home, all we have is hope and support from family and friends to start a new life.






Fortunately we could move to my son´s house, but as it is really small, he had to leave in order to open space to us and now he is sleeping each night at different friend´s houses with his girlfriend. 
Many friends are donating us new clothes and supporting us with food and we are very glad to see that we can count with them at this difficult moment. But the main problem is that we don´t have the money to buy anything - neither for a new house or to rebuild this one and try to recover what is left (one bedroom wasn´t burned, but the living room, the kitchen, the bathroom and 2 other rooms). It is estimated that we need around 100.000 euros for it, and we need to start doing it as soon as possible because we are truly homeless in this very moment. 



Update: We found small apartments for around 55.000 euros, but as we can´t change the campaign value, please have in mind that we don´t less money to restart our lives! 



The damage was so big that we were on the news in Croatia. Here you can see some publications and pictures of the disaster:
U pozaru na Zagrebackoj salati ozlijedene cetiri osobe
Izgorio prvi kat obiteljske kuće - Četiri osobe lakše ozlijeđene


We didn´t lose only material goods, but part of our story. Christmas will be forever marked by this disaster that could be killed my family, but also as a huge life challenging that put all my family more united than never before. We are alive and we have the strenght to build a new story. That´s why we came to IndieGogo to kindly and ask for help and compassion.




Thank you,
Lidija, Ozren, Zoja and Vedran

Um Natal que jamais será esquecido
Essa é a história de uma família croata que acabou de perder sua casa em Zagreb, capital da Croácia, devido a um incêndio no dia do Natal. story:
Kansoka Designs

Kansoka Designs seeks to bring you high-quality and exquisitely designed craftwork with Japanese handcrafted style.

The silver and gold palette are typical of the Japanese aesthetic. The collocation of cold silvery gray and warm golden images of pine, bamboo and plum deliver the beauty of Japanese tea ceremony.

Pine, bamboo, plum are typical plants in Japanese landscape garden culture. We bring them to life with our Tin coaters to empower you to admire Japanese Datsuzoku beauty. Datsuzoku is the concept of "breaking from the daily routine".

“Pine, bamboo, and plum” all are related to good luck in Japanese culture. 

An elegant centerpiece on your table. Calm and awaken your soul.

Admire the beautiful images of pine, bamboo and plum while you enjoy your tea. Add a matching crystal tea cup to make your set complete!

Exquisite images, handmade hammer grain and polished finish reflect the Japanese aesthetic perfectly.

Each coaster has different handmade hammer texture which makes Kansoka Solid Tin Coaster Set unique.

The chemical properties of tin are stable and will not easily oxidize or change color.

Pine represents longevity, virtue, and youth and is also associated with masculinity and power. 

Bamboo is a very strong plant. Because of its sturdy root structure, it is a symbol of prosperity in Japan. 

Japanese plum has played an important role in Japanese culture for many centuries. The plum is associated with the start of spring, because plum blossoms are some of the first blossoms to open during the year. It's also a symbol of virtuousness.

Pledge today to help us make the Kansoka Solid Tin Coaster Set a reality!

story:
With the Shiroi Hana collection we have set out to create a high-end chef knife collection that inspires creativity in the kitchen. To do this we combined Japanese steel, experienced craftsmanship, and unique London design.

The SHIROI HANA knives have been designed by Christian Bird, who wanted to create an effortlessly beautiful knife which is both aesthetic and highly functional. This is a set to be put on display, but which can be easily used every day.

The polished mirrored finish has been added benefit of highlighting the beautiful floral pattern of the Japanese steel blade and integrates seamlessly into the hallmark handle.

Based on our experience in knife making we carefully selected a supreme quality Japanese steel called AUS-10. With a hardness range of 58-60 HRC, high toughness, supreme sharpness and good corrosion resistance, this steel is ideal for the highest quality Chef knives.

The innovative high carbon steel core also contains vanadium which improves the wear resistance, toughness, and ease of sharpening. The remaining layers are formed by alterations of S/S 430 and S/S 431 steel to create an outer case, protecting the valuable AUS-10 cutting core. 

 Every Shiroi Hana blade consists of 67 layers of premium steel, protecting the AUS-10 Japanese steel cutting core. This multi-layered steel has its origin in both Japanese Samurai and Damascene sword making.

 The AUS-10 cutting core enables the edge to hold and retain a supreme sharpness. This is why it is the recommended steel for high-end chef's knives. Each blade in the Shiroi Hana Collection has this multi-layered blade.

The blade cutting angle is 35º (17.5 on each side for optimal sharpness).

story:
What is My DIY Budget

My DIY Budget is the first of its kind "Do It Yourself" home improvement project planning and management software product. For the first time home owners can plan, manage and showcase their DIY projects using the power of the computer and the power of sharing. My DIY Budget gives DIY project owners the first tools ever created for sharing real project costs from real projects done by real people.

Making a Difference

There are millions of home owners throughout the world who are self described DIYers. The My DIY Budget website is for them. Planning, managing and showcasing DIY projects on My DIY Budget is free. Browsing through projects hosted on My DIY Budget for inspiration is free. There are no websites on the Internet today that showcase DIY projects done by real people and provide the tools to plan and manage real DIY projects.

Our Goal

So far we have raised $2,965 of the $10,000 we need to raise by the end of April 2014. The money that we raise will be used for the equipment that we need to support the launch of the My DIY Budget website in May 2014.

Meet Our Team and Spread the Word

Visit http://mydiybudget.com to meet our team and learn more about the history of My DIY Budget. Help spread the word about our project to your friends and followers. You can tweet or share from our website or through the Indiegogo sharing tools.

Thank you for your help.

story:
Keezels are available and shipping at https://keezel.co

 

If you haven't received your Keezel yet, please send an email to support@keezel.co

 

Meet Keezel

 

The world's first portable, one-button-only internet encryption device.


Keezel uses VPN technology to secure your Internet connection and thus greatly improves your online privacy & security. With Keezel, your data and all other confidential & sensitive information is protected from hackers, online snoopers, your ISP, network admins, and/or government surveillance.

 

 

 

It also lets you enjoy complete online freedom, which means you get to experience the same internet & online content whether you’re at home chilling on your sofa or away on business working on that big presentation.

The Keezel works on any WiFi network and with all your favorite WiFi-capable devices, including Apple TV, Roku, Chromecast, Sonos etc.

 

Keezel in the press
 

Dangers of public WiFi

Using the Keezel

 

Free WiFi is everywhere and people love it. Nevertheless, every time you connect to WiFi you expose yourself to identity theft and data leakage. Also, did you know that your colleagues at work can see when you are chatting on Facebook on your phone when on the company network?

 

Simply connect to your personal Keezel WiFi and you are good to go! You don't need to install any software. Now all your devices can enjoy increased privacy, security, and online freedom. Even those without screens such as your Chromecast, Roku, Sonos etc.

 

Keezel protects your privacy, security and clients' information, while using the Internet in coffee shops, hotels and airports. It encrypts your connection on all connected devices without you having to install a thing.

 

Episodes of your favorite show may all of sudden be unavailable when travelling. Or you might want to watch a sports game or a race and find that you can’t access it from your country or region. To fix this, all you need to do is connect your Keezel to a server in the country of your choice and enjoy the Internet as if you are actually there. Keezel is also useful for circumventing online censorship of Facebook, Twitter and other websites. 

 

The Keezel’s powerful battery has a capacity of 8000+ mAh, which is almost four times the capacity of an iPhone 6s. Use your Keezel to charge other devices on the go.

 

How it works

 

The Keezel was designed with simplicity in mind. We want to make good encryption available to just about everyone. The device whips up a secure connection for you in just 3 steps, and can be easily configured via an intuitive web app that can be accessed from any browser on any device. 

 

 
Here's a video showing you how easy it is to set up a secure connection. 

 

 

The technology behind Keezel


Your Keezel connects to WiFi networks, like the one in your favorite coffee shop and then, sitting in between your devices and that open network, creates another secure hotspot. Just For You. 

The device works with a technology called Virtual Private Network. Our VPN software uses an encryption algorithm similar to what big companies and government organisations use to protect their data. It doesn't require installation on your laptop or phone. 

Keezel's VPN service
Keezel partners with 3 world class VPN providers, PureVPN, proXPN, and Le VPN to offer you the best service at a super competitive price.

Premium service
Our premium Indiegogo perks all come with at least one year of this service, which gives you access to more than 1250 servers in over 160 countries. Premium gives you maximum speeds that allows full-HD streaming. 


After the campaign, the Keezel Premium service will retail for $5 per month and you will be able to go back to the free basic plan at any time, for any reason.

Basic service
The basic service comes with access to significantly fewer servers and lower speeds - enough for regular browsing, emailing, banking etc, but not for streaming HD video.

Works with all your devices 
Simply connect to your personal Keezel WiFi and you are good to go! You don't need to install any software. Now all your devices can enjoy increased privacy, security, and online freedom. Even those without screens.

Stretch Goals

 

Stretch Goal #1: Keezel to Keezel (reached!)
Keezel to Keezel allows you to directly connect your Keezel with another one anywhere in the world. Leave one at home and connect to it while you’re travelling. Or, for example, give one to your uncle abroad, connect to it and use the Internet as if you are there. See below.

 

 



Stretch Goal #2: Keezel app gallery (reached!)
A place where developers can create apps for the Keezel community, such as TOR, shared media storage, home automation/security, and more!

If we reach our stretch goal of $175,000, we are going to build an environment where people can create, share and download apps for the keezel community.

 
 
Perks
 

You can still upgrade your Keezel order to lifelong here on Indiegogo so that you can enjoy your Keezel with premium service for the rest of your life! (not transferable to others)

If you want to order new Keezels, go visit our website where they are still available for pre-order:

 

Meet the team


The founders, Aike Müller and Friso Schmid, started work on Keezel in 2013. Since then, we have built a team with a healthy mix of geekiness and entrepreneurial drive. Our team members have been creating software and hardware for more than 15 years. Before Keezel, we have worked at PWC, Capgemini, Accenture, Philips, AMD and Intel. 

 

Founders showing off Keezel's glossiness

 

Check out this video showing our team visiting Keezel's plastics factory in Shenzhen, China.

FAQ

 

Usability 

Q: Does my device work with Keezel?
A: Keezel works with every device that uses "regular" WiFi (802.11 family of standards) for internet connection. This means it works with smartphones, tablets, laptops, media players, smart TV's. Your brand is not important, as long as it can use WiFi internet.

Q: Does Keezel work without the premium service?
A: Keezel also works without the premium VPN service. You can choose to use our basic service, which offers the same high level of encryption, but will operate at lower speeds and with less locations to choose from.

Q: Can I use my premium service on more than one Keezel?
A: You can use your premium service (connect to worldwide locations at high speeds) on one of your Keezels at the same time. If you want to use two Keezels simultaneously with high speeds, you'll need premium service for both of them.

Q: Can I watch all movies, TV shows and sports games that I want with Keezel?
A: Keezel does not ‘have’ or ‘offer’ online content. With Keezel, however, you can circumvent censorship and geographic restrictions by connecting to the country of your choice. Now you can use the internet as if you are there. For example: You are in Europe and want to watch the TV show you started at home in the US. It turns out to be unavailable in Europe. With Keezel you simply select the US and you can continue where you left off. 

Q: Does Keezel work everywhere, even when my government restricts access?
A: No, everywhere is just too much to ask :) First of all, you'll need a WiFi network for your Keezel to connect to. It will work in the vast majority of situations, but on rare occasions internet can still be restricted. Technically it is possible for network administrators to block many ports making connections difficult. However, we will make sure Keezel works in as many situations as possible. In addition, for VPN to work, your Keezel must be able to reach VPN servers, which some countries try and block. It can be a cat and mouse game, but our VPN partners are among the best in the world to help in offering server availability and top performance. 


Buying & Shipping

Q: Where can I get it?
A: Keezel is currently shipping but also still available for pre-order on our website:

 

Q: How about shipping fees, duties and taxes?
A: Shipping, handling, fees, duties and taxes are added during the checkout process and depending on your country are between 10 USD and 40 USD. (For early backers: we used special shipping perks before. If you need help getting a shipping perk send us an email at support@keezel.co)


Q: How will you know my shipping address?
A: In the current checkout process you can leave your shipping address. For earlier backers: you should have received an email from us with instructions on getting a shipping perk. If you have not seen this or need help, please contact us at support@keezel.co. 

Q: When will my Keezel ship?
Keezels is currently shipping! If you order a Keezel now (available on our website at https://keezel.co), you can expect your Keezel to ship within 6-8 weeks.


Privacy & Security

Q: You are talking about privacy & security, what is the difference?
A: Protecting your privacy means that other people can’t see what you are doing online. For example: when you use your smartphone on a WiFi network at work, in a hotel or in a coffee shop, others can see what you are doing and communicating. Providing security means that Keezel makes it difficult for malicious hackers, phishers and other intruders to steal your passwords, credit card information, your identity, etc. 


Technical 

Q: What is Keezel VPN connection like?
A: Keezel works with some of the best VPN providers in the world (LeVPN, PureVPN, ProXPN). Keezel combines these great networks and chooses the best available connection in the region you have selected, every time you connect! This way you'll get the most out of your connection.

Q: What are the advantages of Keezel compared to VPN software?
A: Keezel works without installing software on your devices. Keezel is more secure because your device is never connected to the internet without an encrypted connection. Regular VPN software solutions always bear a risk before the connection is established and of information leakage in a side channel. Keezel also works with multiple devices simultaneously and on devices that don't allow software installation, such as screenless media players or corporate laptops.

Q: Can I use my own VPN service with Keezel?
A: We believe that the Keezel service is the best VPN solution available. We want to keep it as simple as possible. There is no option to configure other VPN services. However, we are cool with people who want to flash their own OS on their Keezel.


Other

Q: Why won't Keezel to Keezel (stretch goal 1) be included in the basic service?
A: We will have to keep a service running so the Keezels can connect each other, therefore we can’t afford to include it in the basic service.

Q: Does Keezel to Keezel (stretch goal 1) require both devices to have an internet connection?
A: Yes. With Keezel to Keezel both devices need an internet connection to establish a connection. 

Q: I'd like to blog or write a bigger story about Keezel. Where can I find more material or a press kit?
A: Great! You can find our press page (press kit, media kit) with a press release, photos, video and more information right here: https://www.keezel.co/press

Q: Will you be able to pull this off?
A: We are currently shipping Keezels to our customers. Right now Keezels have been used in over 100 countries. We are working hard to get all Keezels delivered.


Other questions or inquiries? Contact support@keezel.co
story_txt:
Keezels are available and shipping at https://keezel.co

 
If you haven't received your Keezel yet, please send an email to support@keezel.co
 
Meet Keezel 
 

The world's first portable, one-button-only internet encryption device.

Keezel uses VPN technology to secure your Internet connection and thus greatly improves your online privacy & security. With Keezel, your data and all other confidential & sensitive information is protected from hackers, online snoopers, your ISP, network admins, and/or government surveillance.

 
 

 
It also lets you enjoy complete online freedom, which means you get to experience the same internet & online content whether you’re at home chilling on your sofa or away on business working on that big presentation.The Keezel works on any WiFi network and with all your favorite WiFi-capable devices, including Apple TV, Roku, Chromecast, Sonos etc. 
 



Keezel in the press 


Dangers of public WiFi

Using the Keezel
 

Free WiFi is everywhere and people love it. Nevertheless, every time you connect to WiFi you expose yourself to identity theft and data leakage. Also, did you know that your colleagues at work can see when you are chatting on Facebook on your phone when on the company network? 

Simply connect to your personal Keezel WiFi and you are good to go! You don't need to install any software. Now all your devices can enjoy increased privacy, security, and online freedom. Even those without screens such as your Chromecast, Roku, Sonos etc. 

Keezel protects your privacy, security and clients' information, while using the Internet in coffee shops, hotels and airports. It encrypts your connection on all connected devices without you having to install a thing. 

Episodes of your favorite show may all of sudden be unavailable when travelling. Or you might want to watch a sports game or a race and find that you can’t access it from your country or region. To fix this, all you need to do is connect your Keezel to a server in the country of your choice and enjoy the Internet as if you are actually there. Keezel is also useful for circumventing online censorship of Facebook, Twitter and other websites.  

The Keezel’s powerful battery has a capacity of 8000+ mAh, which is almost four times the capacity of an iPhone 6s. Use your Keezel to charge other devices on the go.
 

How it works
 


The Keezel was designed with simplicity in mind. We want to make good encryption available to just about everyone. The device whips up a secure connection for you in just 3 steps, and can be easily configured via an intuitive web app that can be accessed from any browser on any device. 
 

 
Here's a video showing you how easy it is to set up a secure connection. 
 

 

The technology behind Keezel  
Your Keezel connects to WiFi networks, like the one in your favorite coffee shop and then, sitting in between your devices and that open network, creates another secure hotspot. Just For You.  

The device works with a technology called Virtual Private Network. Our VPN software uses an encryption algorithm similar to what big companies and government organisations use to protect their data. It doesn't require installation on your laptop or phone. 
  
Keezel's VPN serviceKeezel partners with 3 world class VPN providers, PureVPN, proXPN, and Le VPN to offer you the best service at a super competitive price.Premium serviceOur premium Indiegogo perks all come with at least one year of this service, which gives you access to more than 1250 servers in over 160 countries. Premium gives you maximum speeds that allows full-HD streaming. 
    
After the campaign, the Keezel Premium service will retail for $5 per month and you will be able to go back to the free basic plan at any time, for any reason.Basic serviceThe basic service comes with access to significantly fewer servers and lower speeds - enough for regular browsing, emailing, banking etc, but not for streaming HD video.Works with all your devices Simply connect to your personal Keezel WiFi and you are good to go! You don't need to install any software. Now all your devices can enjoy increased privacy, security, and online freedom. Even those without screens.


  

Stretch Goals
 
Stretch Goal #1: Keezel to Keezel (reached!)Keezel to Keezel allows you to directly connect your Keezel with another one anywhere in the world. Leave one at home and connect to it while you’re travelling. Or, for example, give one to your uncle abroad, connect to it and use the Internet as if you are there. See below.
 
 



Stretch Goal #2: Keezel app gallery (reached!)A place where developers can create apps for the Keezel community, such as TOR, shared media storage, home automation/security, and more!
If we reach our stretch goal of $175,000, we are going to build an environment where people can create, share and download apps for the keezel community.
  


Perks 

You can still upgrade your Keezel order to lifelong here on Indiegogo so that you can enjoy your Keezel with premium service for the rest of your life! (not transferable to others)
If you want to order new Keezels, go visit our website where they are still available for pre-order:


 

Meet the team

The founders, Aike Müller and Friso Schmid, started work on Keezel in 2013. Since then, we have built a team with a healthy mix of geekiness and entrepreneurial drive. Our team members have been creating software and hardware for more than 15 years. Before Keezel, we have worked at PWC, Capgemini, Accenture, Philips, AMD and Intel. 
 

Founders showing off Keezel's glossiness 

Check out this video showing our team visiting Keezel's plastics factory in Shenzhen, China.



FAQ
 
Usability 
Q: Does my device work with Keezel?A: Keezel works with every device that uses "regular" WiFi (802.11 family of standards) for internet connection. This means it works with smartphones, tablets, laptops, media players, smart TV's. Your brand is not important, as long as it can use WiFi internet.Q: Does Keezel work without the premium service?A: Keezel also works without the premium VPN service. You can choose to use our basic service, which offers the same high level of encryption, but will operate at lower speeds and with less locations to choose from.Q: Can I use my premium service on more than one Keezel?A: You can use your premium service (connect to worldwide locations at high speeds) on one of your Keezels at the same time. If you want to use two Keezels simultaneously with high speeds, you'll need premium service for both of them.Q: Can I watch all movies, TV shows and sports games that I want with Keezel?A: Keezel does not ‘have’ or ‘offer’ online content. With Keezel, however, you can circumvent censorship and geographic restrictions by connecting to the country of your choice. Now you can use the internet as if you are there. For example: You are in Europe and want to watch the TV show you started at home in the US. It turns out to be unavailable in Europe. With Keezel you simply select the US and you can continue where you left off. Q: Does Keezel work everywhere, even when my government restricts access?A: No, everywhere is just too much to ask :) First of all, you'll need a WiFi network for your Keezel to connect to. It will work in the vast majority of situations, but on rare occasions internet can still be restricted. Technically it is possible for network administrators to block many ports making connections difficult. However, we will make sure Keezel works in as many situations as possible. In addition, for VPN to work, your Keezel must be able to reach VPN servers, which some countries try and block. It can be a cat and mouse game, but our VPN partners are among the best in the world to help in offering server availability and top performance. Buying & Shipping

Q: Where can I get it?A: Keezel is currently shipping but also still available for pre-order on our website:

 
Q: How about shipping fees, duties and taxes?A: Shipping, handling, fees, duties and taxes are added during the checkout process and depending on your country are between 10 USD and 40 USD. (For early backers: we used special shipping perks before. If you need help getting a shipping perk send us an email at support@keezel.co)
Q: How will you know my shipping address?A: In the current checkout process you can leave your shipping address. For earlier backers: you should have received an email from us with instructions on getting a shipping perk. If you have not seen this or need help, please contact us at support@keezel.co. Q: When will my Keezel ship?Keezels is currently shipping! If you order a Keezel now (available on our website at https://keezel.co), you can expect your Keezel to ship within 6-8 weeks.
Privacy & Security
Q: You are talking about privacy & security, what is the difference?A: Protecting your privacy means that other people can’t see what you are doing online. Technical

Keezel combines these great networks and chooses the best available connection in the region you have selected, every time you connect! This way you'll get the most out of your connection.Q: What are the advantages of Keezel compared to VPN software?A: Keezel works without installing software on your devices. Keezel is more secure because your device is never connected to the internet without an encrypted connection. Regular VPN software solutions always bear a risk before the connection is established and of information leakage in a side channel. Keezel also works with multiple devices simultaneously and on devices that don't allow software installation, such as screenless media players or corporate laptops.Q: Can I use my own VPN service with Keezel?A: We believe that the Keezel service is the best VPN solution available. We want to keep it as simple as possible. There is no option to configure other VPN services. However, we are cool with people who want to flash their own OS on their Keezel.
Other
Q: Why won't Keezel to Keezel (stretch goal 1) be included in the basic service?A: We will have to keep a service running so the Keezels can connect each other, therefore we can’t afford to include it in the basic service.Q: Does Keezel to Keezel (stretch goal 1) require both devices to have an internet connection?A: Yes. With Keezel to Keezel both devices need an internet connection to establish a connection. Q: I'd like to blog or write a bigger story about Keezel. Where can I find more material or a press kit?A: Great! You can find our press page (press kit, media kit) with a press release, photos, video and more information right here: https://www.keezel.co/pressQ: Will you be able to pull this off?A: We are currently shipping Keezels to our customers. Right now Keezels have been used in over 100 countries. We are working hard to get all Keezels delivered.
Other questions or inquiries? Contact support@keezel.co

story:
UPDATE: Join us in a celebratory (if mildly disturbing) dance of joy for hitting our funding goal with our new music video, "Europeans Do It Better"!



What is Eucopia and why does it exist?

We think a lot of Americans would be happier with a little touch of European joie de vivre in their lives. And there's an incredible richness of excellent design being produced in Europe. But those items are hard to find in the U.S., and thanks to the high price of international shipping, even harder to buy. Every month, Eucopia brings you everything you need to add some European flavor to day-to-day living.

What's in the box?

That's a surprise.

OK, what kinds of things are in the box?

Beautiful, useful, and interesting things from Europe. That could mean anything from pitchers to pencils, from tumblers to toothpaste. Each box is organized around a certain theme, like "Morning" or "Summer" or "Denmark". Our test Beta Box gives you some idea of what kinds of things we're talking about. And we can tell you what the theme of our first box is...

What exactly does "from Europe" mean?

Designed in Europe, always. Made in Europe as often as possible. Just as in North America, at the moment, certain categories of products are not made on a wide scale in Europe itself. Given the choice between the huge variety of European-designed products and the much smaller selection of European-made ones, we made the choice that we think makes for a better, more fun box. But we believe in the future of European craft and manufacturing, and we're always looking to include as many Europe-made objects as possible.

How much does the box cost and how much stuff do I get?

Our regular monthly subscription includes three to five items for $49 ($40 for Indiegogo backers). Our Eucopia Mini subscription includes one item per month for $15 ($12 through Indiegogo). That per-month price goes down if you pay upfront for a three-month or one-year subscription .

When will I get my box?

The first Eucopia box ships in October 2015. Subsequent boxes ship every month.

Do you ship to customers outside the U.S.?

No. Sorry. We ship to U.S. customers only. It's just too expensive otherwise. And if you're in Europe, you're already surrounded by this stuff. You don't need us.

Who is behind this?

I'm Jason Toon and I founded Eucopia. For eight years, I was the head writer at Woot.com, the original daily-deal site. I defined our weird brand voice and developed it as we grew from an improbable startup to a subsidiary of Amazon. Now I write for Woot's spiritual successor, Meh.com, and some other startups that have interesting things to say. 

Along the way, I've also learned a few things about how to make buying and selling interesting. I believe retail is a mostly untapped vein of expression and communication, a way to not only tell stories but to bring them to life in the form of physical objects. That's what each month's Eucopia box will do.

What are you going to do with this money?

Buy some great stuff from Europe and send it to people in cute boxes with an interesting little mini-magazine inside. Any money beyond that will be used to help us find more and better stuff for future boxes.

How could this all go wrong?

Transcontinental importing can be tricky. Really cool, fun boxes don't package themselves. And maintaining a high standard for the products while keeping prices affordable will be a challenge. But we're not new to ecommerce. And we're talking to potential partners who have experience in handling problems like these. We're certain that a first-rate Eucopia box will be on your doorstep in October.

Are you hiring?

That depends on how this Indiegogo campaign goes, among other things. But if you're an experienced EU-based design/homegoods buyer, let's talk. 

Or if you have some other idea about how you could help Eucopia out, let us know. We don't have much money yet, but it doesn't cost anything to listen.

Is Eucopia looking for products?

Always! European designers, makers, manufacturers: please get in touch. We'd love to introduce your products to a design-savvy U.S. audience hungry for what you have to offer. 

Are you serious about that $12,000 perk?

Totally. The European Design Grand Tour includes airfare and accommodations; tours and meetings with designers and makers; and probably some dinners and drinks, if you can tolerate our company. We'll work with you to design an itinerary that reflects your tastes and preferences. Come to Europe with us! It'll be fantastic!

Please share this with anyone who loves European living, good design, and pleasant surprises! Thanks!

story:
reolink.com
 
 

 

Featured On

 

There's no installation, no cords, no wiring, and no drilling! You can set Reolink Argus on a shelf, a table, a tree, or other flat surfaces, mount the camera to the wall, put it under the ceiling, or place it anywhere you want, like in the monitoring place that has no network cables and no power outlets. You can move it from room to room, and use it for watching a home, keeping an eye on the elderly, babies, kids, nannies, checking on pets, etc.

Innovative Design (Skins and Mounts)


The camera itself is well-designed, and you can add more personalities and possibilities with Reolink Argus skins, mounts and more accessories. All now are available on Reolink. 

You can also win the skins and mounts in our Facebook FOR FREE:

Blend, wrap, curl or hang to make your Reolink Argus fit in perfectly your baby's room.

An ideal durable full suit (3 colors) for any outdoor and indoor environment, stylish or rugged.

The powerful cutting-edge 360° wall mount easily snaps on Reolink Argus with magnetic mounting. And you can twist the camera in any direction, even upside down. Move your Reolink Argus from one place to another whenever you wish.

 

Reolink Argus is a standalone product and also an all-in-one security solution with a Full HD camera, a smart sensor, and alarms. It is battery-operated and features WiFi support. Generally, the camera will go into a standby mode and it will wake up immediately via motion detection and live view from a phone.  

  • Wake Up When Motion Is Detected
    The smart PIR movement sensor will detect if anything's wrong and whenever motion detection is triggered, the camera will wake up at once, capture the event and guarantee that you know it immediately. When the PIR sensor detects everything is sound and safe, the camera will go into a standby mode, which uses little battery power.

  • Send Smart & Accurate Alerts in Real Time
    When motion is detected, the camera will inform you in real time with alerts.

  • Live View from Anywhere, Anytime
    You can also get live view of the camera from your phone anytime and anywhere. Even when you are on the go and even thousands of miles away from home, just a tap on your phone and the camera will wake up at once for live streaming. You can see clearly what's happening.

  • Listen and Talk Back
    On the live view, you can not only see clearly what's happening, but also listen and even talk back. Welcome your kids home, tell your dog to get off the couch, and even warn verbally any uninvited!

 

Why Reolink Argus?

Traditional wireless security cameras only solve the "messy cabling" issue. But for monitoring an area without cords and power outlets, there has to be an 100% wire-free battery-powered security camera!

“Inspired by a customer, who was frustrated by running wires to a power outlet to monitor his baby, we decided to create a wire-free battery-powered camera.” Said Colin Liu, the CEO of Reolink. “As a father of two kids, I’ve also been thinking about keeping an eye on my own children without dealing with the hassle of wires, as well as covering the whole area of the baby’s room. That’s why Reolink Argus was created.”

After a long-term hardworking of the team, now Reolink Argus is well developed. You can use it in any place for wire-free surveillance and protection, like

  • Temporary construction site watch
  • Keeping eyes on the kids/pets
  • Watching over your grandma/grandpa
  • Surveillance around the house
  • Leaving for an extended vacation
  • Security for rentals
  • Surveillance in the front/back yard

 

Weatherproof -- Never Quit

Weatherproof design makes it work in a wide variety of harsh weather conditions, including rain, snow, intense cold and heat. The IP-65 certified weatherproof camera braves it all, and has no limited placements. You can put it outside or inside.

 

Tech Specs

Perks

 

Shipping

We ship the products worldwide with FREE Shipping.

 

There are no additional customs charges shipping to these countries: US, UK, Canada, Germany, France, Belgium, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Spain, Italy, Portugal, Ireland, Austria, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, and Sweden.

We are not responsible for any extra fees from customs shipping to the countries and regions not listed above.

 

The first shipment will sent out to customers who ordered from the first day of our campaign to May 1st (PDT), and for those who ordered after May 1st, you will get your order shipped out in late June.

Once your order is shipped, you will receive our shipping notification email with the tracking number.

 

By backing now, you will get up to 20% off the original price, you will receive the product(s) earlier than others, and you will get the up-to-date exclusive updates and information about the products as well as other first-class products.

 

What's in the Box

Reolink Event

 

Test Videos By Reolink Argus

 

Sample Video in Day Time

 

Sample Videos in Night Time

 

Project Timeline

Thanks for all your support!
Reolink Argus is now into mass production.

 

Meet the Team

Established in 2009, Reolink has been devoted to cutting-edge security camera technology, and has a lot of experience in security camera solutions. "Innovator" and "innovative products" are 2 big value to our team. We strive to develop innovative and progressive security camera products that meet customers' needs.

We have a R;D team with professional experience of years to rigorously research, design and test the hardware, firmware and software. The team possesses best technology integration and development capabilities.

In addition to our core team, we've assembled an incredible group of engineers, designers, and industry experts who are collaborating with us to create the best products possible. At Reolink, we firmly believe security matters most and it should be for everyone. That’s why we make our security products professional, reliable, affordable, simple, and DIY style.

 

Contact Us

General Enquiry & Support Help: support@reolink.com

Press and Sample Review: contact@reolink.com

 

Follow Us at
