  • $10,000 Contribution Design your own line

Wow! How amazing is that? What a true believer you are and what a reward you will receive for your outstanding support and faith that you have in us and our project. Our heartfelt gratitude will first be expressed with a “thank you” card signed by or entire staff, welcoming you to our organization because, with this Perk, you now are a part of it. You see, you receive everything that the $5,000.00 level rewards, plus we added an extra shirt and sweatshirt for sharing with a friend or loved one. Our research strongly suggests, and it’s our sincere belief, that MagnaHang is a product that will be enjoyed by “the masses”.  In appreciation for your most generous contribution, we invite you to help design your own line of MagnaHangs to be offered under your name through all our sales channels. Your line will be graced with your name or the name of your choosing, and will embody your personal story about how your Perks impacted our company. A portion of the profits from the sales of your line will go to the charity of your choice. So your contribution is truly making a difference on many different levels. Thank you again for all your support from “Team MagnaHang”. We believe this product will be a “history changer” in the decorating industry.

Estimated delivery: Feb 2014


The Impact


The product can be used in the traditional sense for decorating at Christmastime. The MagnaHang can be used on artificial trees, since these have metal stems in their construction, or also on live trees with the use of an additional Backer Magnet provided with each MagnaHang unit. The product can also be used to hang ornaments onto garland instead of using traditional bare-wire hooks. MagnaHangs also have uses in a variety of alternative ways to provide additional decorating ideas for consumers, to include but not limited to; 

• Walls – Since most walls contain studs with either nails or screws embedded under the drywall, the product can be applied to walls without damaging tape, nails or tacks. In addition, the brass rod can be bent and angled to personalize the “presentation” of the decoration so that it hangs either perpendicular or on an angle from the wall.

•  Doorways – In the construction of many commercial buildings, metal is used in the construction of doorways. This makes MagnaHang particularly attractive to commercial building use such as office buildings, restaurants, retail shops, and others who decorate their businesses for holidays and special events.

•  Ceilings – In both commercial and residential structures, the MagnaHang can be used to decorate from ceilings as well. In typical construction of homes, the heads of metal nails used in securing the ceiling drywall enable the easy and secure placement of MagnaHang without damaging the contact surface.

• Commercial applications - Many office buildings and other commercial settings utilize dropped ceilings where the MagnaHangs can be used to attach to the metal channels that facilitate the dropped ceiling construction. Using an optional extension pole, placement positioning and removal of MagnaHangs can be easily accomplished without the need and added time and risk of using a ladder.

•  Kitchen – Many consumers who enjoy entertaining also like to decorate their kitchen areas since guests typically gather there for holiday dinners and parties.  The kitchen offers many surfaces where MagnaHang can be used, such as on refrigerators and along range ventilation hoods and window treatments.

•  Fabric – Since MagnaHang can be enhanced with an additional Backer Magnet, the product can be attached to drapery, curtains, tablecloths, lampshades and other fabrics in the home, college dorm room, restaurant etc.

•  Glass –MagnaHang can be “attached” to certain glass surfaces, such as windows in exterior walls and doors as if glued to the surface.  This can be accomplished by having two MagnaHangs “attached” to each other through the glass.  Or, if the MagnaHang is wanted on only one side of the glass, the Backer Magnet provides the needed polar balance.

•  Plants – Many homes and offices use large potted plants for accents and decoration. The MagnaHang can also be used to hang additional decorations during the holiday season.

•  Recreational Vehicles – RV owners can especially benefit from MagnaHang as a solution for temporarily installing seasonal lighting and decorations. MagnaHang is also an ideal tool for quick and easy installation of low voltage lighting on the outside of RV’s, to include Christmas lights and themed lighting.

•  Other Holiday Applications – MagnaHang can be used with other holiday and celebratory events that are traditional times for decorating. In the United States, holidays such as Halloween, Valentine’s Day, St. Patrick’s Day, Independence Day and Thanksgiving are traditional observances when American’s tend to decorate.

•  Celebratory Event Applications - Decorators, event planners, event venues, and restaurateurs, bar owners, and homeowners and renters alike will appreciate MagnaHang for decorating their events with an even more festive appearance. Events such as weddings, graduations, birthdays, anniversaries, Super Bowl parties as well as corporate meetings all serve as occasions where seasonal or event-specific colors can be easily facilitated by use of the MagnaHang. Most everyone appreciates decorations, but most of us dread the task of decorating; MagnaHang changes all of that dread to enjoyment as they are applied to any object where a magnetic connection can be made

• Advertising Applications - The MagnaHang can also be used to by companies for advertising or display purposes. For example, no more droopy and falling vinyl banners!  A few MagnaHangs used in-line will perfectly present a banner, temporarily or for the long term.   MagnaHang can display business cards, signs, advertising cards, banners or other objects in a new and attractive way.  Companies looking for a new and creative way to show customer appreciation can do so by having its own logo custom imprinted onto ornaments, such as a holiday ball.  Market studies have revealed that, regardless of the theme, MagnaHangs frequently remain left in plain sight where they are enjoyed year-round.

WHAT'S NEXT?

Contract with the barrel fabricators, anodizers and engravers, such that they can ramp up and hire employees to fabricate barrels 

Create a considerable inventory by ordering materials, and bench-top hand presses to fabricate product.

Hire and train fabricators, product fulfillment workers, and customer service staff.

Contract with social media experts to market MagnaHang throughout 2014.

Contract with professional website developer to ensure it is user friendly and functional.

Contract with direct marketing firm to market MagnaHang throughout 2014

Develop future designs to keep the product relevant and fresh.

Invest in creating packaging for retail displays for QUALITY retailers (i.e Hallmark stores, fine jewelers, etc.)

Finish development of "place and retrieve" tool for improved ease of use so that MagnaHangs can be used in high places without the risks associated with climbing a ladder. MagnaHang's extendable placement pole is already in development and is soon to be released.

Watch for opportunities where MagnaHang’s assets can be directed toward helping struggling individuals and worthwhile organizations. The possibilities to improve the quality of lives are endless.

MARKET ANALYSIS

An informal market analysis was conducted by MagnaHang’s inventor, John Glover. Said analysis included showing prototypes to family, friends, and business colleagues as well as interviewing over 1,000 prospective customers at a New Jersey mall. The feedback was a resounding “where can we buy this?!!”

Participants of the test market who used MagnaHang at their homes have commented that they are easy to use, especially “since there are no hooks, tape, glue or nails to damage walls.” One evaluator reported back, “my kids love this product and so does my wife”. Another evaluator said; “I like them enough to leave ‘em up all year.” In the businesses where MagnaHang was donated for test marketing, they were found to still be in place, and in view, over a full year later. And such was the result without prompting by the inventor who provided the prototypes.

Further, John Glover, inventor of MagnaHang met with four (4) marketing firms, two of which are of the most prominent in the industry. One industry expert indicated, in essence, “let me market them and I’ll show you $350M in sales during the first year”. A second industry expert, who also has a considerable reputation, expressed the same enthusiasm, but estimated first year sales to be a more conservative $120M. Finally, another industry expert and multimillion dollar businessman (manufacturing and fulfillment provider) said; “if this product has a problem, it will be that it will be too popular, everyone is going to want it, and managing the growth will have to be one of the main focuses.

MagnaHang’s owners are dedicated to a business strategy that will ensure the product is offered globally, but manufactured only in the United States.  While its primary purpose is to bring beauty and joy to all who take advantage of its unique features, we anticipate a great degree of satisfaction will be achieved with the creation of American jobs that are fueled by MagnaHang’s domestic AND global sales.

Since the company is new and very small, the cost of materials and supplies to produce the MagnaHang unit is high given the smaller orders of materials. In addition, due to a lack of adequate operating financing, the company is limited in its options for production quantities and thus higher sourcing costs for those materials. 

TEST MARKETING

Establishing an initial market will determine local brand awareness recognition efforts. Such efforts will also begin to establish the test market required by the large companies that have expressed interest in the product.

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY PROTECTION

Utility patents are currently in “patent pending” status. Said patents have been filed by Volpe and Koenig, P.C. of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, which is one of the nation’s leading patent firms.

COMPETITIVE MANUFACTURING

Similar to other products, it is very difficult to compete with offshore manufacturing on cost. The company believes that it will be able to compete with other low cost decorations because of its patent pending design and be able to show that MagnaHangs are a new and distinctive way to decorate for the holidays. They actually enhance the beauty and functionality of the already existing ornament market.  Further, each MagnaHang is laser inscribed to validate its authenticity as a quality product and that it is manufactured in the USA.

EQUIPMENT COSTS

Few dollars are needed for capital investment initially, as MAGNAHANGS are hand manufactured. However, as sales volume warrants, automated equipment is available that can increase capacity. Please see link to “ www.Ciemmeo.com ” to view a video of such equipment. Estimated cost of each unit is $50K.

LONG TERM CAPITAL

With adequate financing, will be responsibly allocate funds to ensure growth both strategically and efficiency to maximize product while lowing our cost to maintain long term growth and profitability.

IN SUMMARY

MagnaHang, as a company, has come a long way from concept to finished product.  The test market and industry response has been extremely favorable.  All that is needed to bring this product and its potential to life are "seed funds" sufficient to enable us to officially partner with designated vendors and barrel manufacturers to fulfill orders placed as a result of social media, catalogs and other proven forms of marketing.  Every indication points to the products success; adequate funding, combined with our unfailing commitment, will ensure it.  To all who share our vision and contribute to the dream, we offer our sincere and heartfelt appreciation.

                 

How to contact us:

Call Michele Esposito directly 609-576-1070 Executive Assistant

Some folks just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Help us make some noise about MagnaHang through your social media contacts.
  • https://www.facebook.com/Magnahang

  • http://instagram.com/magnahang1

  • http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=magnahang

  • https://twitter.com/magnahang
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Visit our website  www.MagnaHang.net

WATCH AND PREPARE YOURSELF TO BE AMAZED. Decorate
the world with MagnaHang – the REVOLUTIONARY new tool for decorating with
ornaments, garland, ribbon, streamers and more.MagnaHang ™
is a patent pending magnetic hanging apparatus that can be used to hang objects
in various fashionable occasions, the primary of which being holiday ornaments.
The product is a versatile hanger that
is magnetically attractive, and can be applied to any area that contains metal
including: drywall and paneling screws, nails, metal corners, door frames,
walls, ceilings, and so much more. With
the application of the additional Backer Magnet, MagnaHang can be applied to
non-metallic items such as: lampshades, curtains, table cloths, glass in
windows and doors, and pretty much whatever your creativity allows.PRODUCT / TEAM MEMBERS
John Glover – Former
small businessman, entrepreneur-inventor, patent holder and majority owner of
MagnaHang. Age 42. John resides in
Wildwood, New Jersey with his wife Celeste where they enjoy life with their
young daughter.
Scott Reese – He concurrently serves as the Strategic
Planner for MagnaHang. Age 56. As frequent flyer
of the United States, Scott lives in Vacaville, California with his wife Jeanie
where they raised their three children.Michele Esposito - Currently, as small business owner with 25 years of Retail Management & 10 years of  Information Technology Sales.  Michele is our Executive Assistant and lives with her family in Mays Landing, NJ. Age 53. MagnaHang’s
initial marketing will be directed towards the display of holiday decorations
and ornaments. The product can be used
for decorating Christmas trees as well as applying holiday decorations around
the home, office, or business in a wide variety of areas. MagnaHangs are safer than traditional ornament
hooks because they are more visible and will not embed themselves in carpet, as
what occurs with traditional ornament hooks that pose choking hazards to
infants, children and animals. A wide
variety of alternate, non-holiday uses for MagnaHang have been identified,
which will be marketed as well. These
applications include corporate branding items such as “365” decorations, easy
and invisible temporary hanging of privacy screens, room dividers, signs,
advertising banners and low-voltage accent lighting and more. Other
year-round applications for MagnaHang include drying flowers, hanging vines for
plants, or for creating elegant ways to hang easily misplaced items such as:
keys, jewelry or eyeglasses. MagnaHang is a new way of decorating and
displaying items that are quick and easy to remove, relocate, and store. 
Restaurants,
bars, retail stores, professional offices, hospitals, cultural halls, casinos,
department stores and classrooms can all be seasonally decorated with ease and
safety. Even better, no ladder is required
to place or retrieve MagnaHangs from high ceilings. This optional extension pole is in the development stages and is anticipated to be released soon.  MagnaHang is an elegant
tool designed to hang ornaments, ornamental advertising, product promotions,
warning signs, directional aid signs, decorations, picture frames, cards,
balloons, garland, lights, fabrics, paper advertisements, electrical cords,
posters, wreathes and so much more. 
The
MagnaHang name and invention has been filed for patent and trademark
protection. The inventor of the
MagnaHang, John Glover, cultivated the idea with the desire to create and
develop a better, more attractive way to hang ornaments on the Christmas tree. In doing so, he found a method for hanging
ornaments, as well as other items, that provided additional
applications such as on walls, in doorways, and other places where a magnetic
connection can be utilized. The primary
product application is for hanging holiday decorative ornaments, especially for
Christmas and other holiday decorations. 
Each
MagnaHang is made using a beaded brass rod that is attached to a barrel
that contains an embedded magnet. At the
opposite end, the wire hooks into the ornament or other objects to
be displayed. In between are decorative beads and collars to beautify the
device.  In the first application, the object to be displayed will most
likely be a Christmas ball or similar ornament. The MagnaHang is also provided with an
additional “Backer Magnet" to increase the weight capacity, or to
establish a magnetic connection as with hanging on fabric, glass windows,
synthetic plants or “real” and artificial Christmas trees. Each MagnaHang is approximately 3 ½ inches long, and the " Shortys" are approximately two (2.0) inches long.  The bendable brass shaft is beaded
with typically 3-8 beads of varying styles and colors, depending upon the ball,
globe or ornament color being attached to it, or the season for which the
MagnaHang is intended (i.e. reds and pinks for Valentine’s Day, red’s and
greens for Christmas, etc.)FUNDING

help MagnaHang proliferate to both domestic and global customers.

Estimated
delivery: Feb 2014The Impact
The product can be used in the
traditional sense for decorating at Christmastime. The MagnaHang can be used on
artificial trees, since these have metal stems in their construction, or also
on live trees with the use of an additional Backer Magnet provided with each
MagnaHang unit. The product can also be used to hang ornaments onto garland
instead of using traditional bare-wire hooks. MagnaHangs also have uses in a
variety of alternative ways to provide additional decorating ideas for
consumers, to include but not limited to; • Walls – Since most
walls contain studs with either nails or screws embedded under the drywall, the
product can be applied to walls without damaging tape, nails or tacks. In
addition, the brass rod can be bent and angled to personalize the
“presentation” of the decoration so that it hangs either perpendicular or on an
angle from the wall.
•  Doorways – In the
construction of many commercial buildings, metal is used in the construction of
doorways. This makes MagnaHang particularly attractive to commercial building
use such as office buildings, restaurants, retail shops, and others who
decorate their businesses for holidays and special events. 
•  Ceilings – In both
commercial and residential structures, the MagnaHang can be used to decorate
from ceilings as well. In typical construction of homes, the heads of metal
nails used in securing the ceiling drywall enable the easy and secure placement
of MagnaHang without damaging the contact surface. 
• Commercial applications - Many
office buildings and other commercial settings utilize dropped ceilings where
the MagnaHangs can be used to attach to the metal channels that facilitate the
dropped ceiling construction. Using an optional extension pole, placement
positioning and removal of MagnaHangs can be easily accomplished without the
need and added time and risk of using a ladder. 
•  Kitchen – Many
consumers who enjoy entertaining also like to decorate their kitchen areas
since guests typically gather there for holiday dinners and parties.  The
kitchen offers many surfaces where MagnaHang can be used, such as on
refrigerators and along range ventilation hoods and window treatments. 
•  Fabric – Since
MagnaHang can be enhanced with an additional Backer Magnet, the product can be
attached to drapery, curtains, tablecloths, lampshades and other fabrics in the
home, college dorm room, restaurant etc. 
•  Glass –MagnaHang can
be “attached” to certain glass surfaces, such as windows in exterior walls and
doors as if glued to the surface.  This can be accomplished by having two
MagnaHangs “attached” to each other through the glass.  Or, if the
MagnaHang is wanted on only one side of the glass, the Backer Magnet provides
the needed polar balance.
•  Plants – Many homes
and offices use large potted plants for accents and decoration. The MagnaHang
can also be used to hang additional decorations during the holiday season. 
•  Recreational Vehicles
– RV owners can especially benefit from MagnaHang as a solution for temporarily
installing seasonal lighting and decorations. MagnaHang is also an ideal tool
for quick and easy installation of low voltage lighting on the outside of RV’s,
to include Christmas lights and themed lighting. 
•  Other Holiday Applications
– MagnaHang can be used with other holiday and celebratory events that are
traditional times for decorating. In the United States, holidays such as
Halloween, Valentine’s Day, St. Patrick’s Day, Independence Day and
Thanksgiving are traditional observances when American’s tend to decorate. 
•  Celebratory Event
Applications - Decorators, event planners, event venues, and restaurateurs,
bar owners, and homeowners and renters alike will appreciate MagnaHang for
decorating their events with an even more festive appearance. Events such as
weddings, graduations, birthdays, anniversaries, Super Bowl parties as well as
corporate meetings all serve as occasions where seasonal or event-specific
colors can be easily facilitated by use of the MagnaHang. Most everyone
appreciates decorations, but most of us dread the task of decorating; MagnaHang
changes all of that dread to enjoyment as they are applied to any object where
a magnetic connection can be made
• Advertising Applications - The
MagnaHang can also be used to by companies for advertising or display purposes.
For example, no more droopy and falling
vinyl banners!  A few MagnaHangs
used in-line will perfectly present a banner, temporarily or for the long term.
  MagnaHang can display business cards, signs, advertising cards, banners
or other objects in a new and attractive way.  Companies looking for a new and creative way to
show customer appreciation can do so by having its own logo custom imprinted
onto ornaments, such as a holiday ball.  Market studies have revealed that, regardless
of the theme, MagnaHangs frequently remain left in plain sight where they are
enjoyed year-round.

WHAT'S NEXT? 
Contract with the barrel fabricators, anodizers and engravers, such that they
can ramp up and hire employees to fabricate barrels  
Create a
considerable inventory by ordering materials, and bench-top hand presses to
fabricate product. Hire and
train fabricators, product fulfillment workers, and customer service staff. 
Contract
with social media experts to market MagnaHang throughout 2014. 
Contract
with professional website developer to ensure it is user friendly and
functional.Contract with direct marketing firm to market MagnaHang throughout 2014
Develop
future designs to keep the product relevant and fresh.
Invest in
creating packaging for retail displays for QUALITY retailers (i.e Hallmark
stores, fine jewelers, etc.) 
Finish development of "place and retrieve" tool for improved ease of use so that
MagnaHangs can be used in high places without the risks associated with
climbing a ladder. MagnaHang's extendable placement pole is already in
development and is soon to be released. 
Watch for
opportunities where MagnaHang’s assets can be directed toward helping
struggling individuals and worthwhile organizations. The possibilities to improve the quality of
lives are endless. 
MARKET ANALYSIS
An informal market
analysis was conducted by MagnaHang’s inventor, John Glover. Said analysis
included showing prototypes to family, friends, and business colleagues as well
as interviewing over 1,000 prospective customers at a New Jersey mall. The feedback was a resounding “where can we
buy this?!!” Participants of the test market who used MagnaHang at their homes have
commented that they are easy to use, especially “since there are no hooks,
tape, glue or nails to damage walls.” One evaluator reported back, “my kids
love this product and so does my wife”. Another
evaluator said; “I like them enough to leave ‘em up all year.” In the businesses where MagnaHang was donated
for test marketing, they were found to still be in place, and in view, over a
full year later. And such was the result
without prompting by the inventor who provided the prototypes. Further, John Glover, inventor of MagnaHang met with four (4) marketing
firms, two of which are of the most prominent in the industry. One industry
expert indicated, in essence, “let me market them and I’ll show you $350M in
sales during the first year”. A second
industry expert, who also has a considerable reputation, expressed the same
enthusiasm, but estimated first year sales to be a more conservative $120M. Finally, another industry expert and
multimillion dollar businessman (manufacturing and fulfillment provider) said;
“if this product has a problem, it will be that it will be too popular,
everyone is going to want it, and managing the growth will have to be one of
the main focuses. MagnaHang’s owners are dedicated to a business strategy that
will ensure the product is offered globally, but manufactured only in the
United States.  While its primary purpose
is to bring beauty and joy to all who take advantage of its unique features, we
anticipate a great degree of satisfaction will be achieved with the creation of
American jobs that are fueled by MagnaHang’s domestic AND global sales. 
Since the company is
new and very small, the cost of materials and supplies to produce the MagnaHang
unit is high given the smaller orders of materials. In addition, due to a lack
of adequate operating financing, the company is limited in its options for
production quantities and thus higher sourcing costs for those materials. TEST MARKETING 
Establishing an
initial market will determine local brand awareness recognition efforts. Such efforts will also begin to establish the
test market required by the large companies that have expressed interest in the
product. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY PROTECTION 
Utility patents are
currently in “patent pending” status. Said
patents have been filed by Volpe and Koenig, P.C. of Philadelphia,
Pennsylvania, which is one of the nation’s leading patent firms. COMPETITIVE MANUFACTURING 
Similar to other products,
it is very difficult to compete with offshore manufacturing on cost. The
company believes that it will be able to compete with other low cost
decorations because of its patent pending design and be able to show that MagnaHangs
are a new and distinctive way to decorate for the holidays. They actually enhance the beauty and functionality of the already existing ornament market.  Further, each MagnaHang is laser inscribed to
validate its authenticity as a quality product and that it is manufactured in
the USA.EQUIPMENT COSTS 
Few dollars are
needed for capital investment initially, as MAGNAHANGS are hand manufactured. However, as sales volume warrants, automated
equipment is available that can increase capacity. Please see link to “ www.Ciemmeo.com
” to view a video of such equipment. Estimated cost of each unit is $50K.LONG TERM CAPITAL
With adequate
financing, will be responsibly allocate funds to ensure growth both strategically and efficiency to maximize product while lowing our cost to maintain long term growth and profitability. IN SUMMARY
MagnaHang, as a company, has come a long way from concept to finished product.  The test market and industry response has been extremely favorable.  All that is needed to bring this product and its potential to life are "seed funds" sufficient to enable us to officially partner with designated vendors and barrel manufacturers to fulfill orders placed as a result of social media, catalogs and other proven forms of marketing.  Every indication points to the products success; adequate funding, combined with our unfailing commitment, will ensure it.  To all who share our vision and contribute to the dream, we offer our sincere and heartfelt appreciation.                  How to contact us: Call Michele Esposito directly 609-576-1070 Executive Assistant
Some folks just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:Help us make some noise about MagnaHang through your social media contacts.

https://www.facebook.com/Magnahang
http://instagram.com/magnahang1
http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=magnahang
https://twitter.com/magnahang


Use the Indiegogo share tools!Visit our website  www.MagnaHang.net

story:
Nimble is a gesture control device that fits comfortably on the wearer’s fingertips. This gesture control technology turns the 15 feet in front of any screen into a highly interactive control area, in which your fingers can be used to magically control a screen, presentation or game. Sub-millimeter accuracy paired with incredibly low latency makes Nimble the ideal gesture control system, and the hardware expansions allow for up to eight users, which is more than any competitor.

As featured on:

"Nimble Gives You control of Your Computer from Your Fingertips" 
    

TECHINASIA - "Indian undergrads create a highly accurate gesture motion device"

       

Finalist for Who’s Got Game Innovation Showdown 2014

Nimble does not require you to clean the room, use plain flooring, or shake your hands for a long time in the air to start tracking. Even if someone passes between you and the sensor, Nimble immediately retrieves and re-tracks your fingers automatically. Currently, Nimble is supported on Windows and will soon be compatible with iOS, Android and Linux by the time of shipment.

Key Features and Uses

Nimble has an exceptional mix of features that create an unprecedented and unique gesture control experience.


Nimble allows users to engage in a series of everyday tasks and entertainment, but it also supports all types of presentations and even CAD modeling.


Gaming: Nimble allows you to experience gaming like never before. The highly-sensitive gesture control technology is equipped to make first-person shooter games more realistic than ever. The team at Intugine has adapted Nimble to work with many popular apps, such as Fruit Ninja and Angry Birds to allow you to control the action with the flick of a finger. Nimble is currently developing technology to sync with virtual reality games and headsets like Oculus Rift. 



Everyday Tasks: Nimble can easily be integrated into your everyday life. From controlling Netflix with a swipe of your hand, to changing the music or dimming the lights. Nimble can be programmed to connect with an endless number of other gadgets and technologies to make everyday interactions extraordinary. We will provide an application for home automation where your PC will act as a Bluetooth/Wifi hub, and all your smart devices can be paired with your PC.



Presentations: Don’t settle with being tethered to a podium or lugging around bulky remotes. Enable yourself to express your thoughts and points, while still controlling your computer, from anywhere in the room. Nimble can be programmed to control all parts of a presentation.  With Nimble, you have the freedom to command the room during presentations.



Computer-aided Design: Nimble is even ideal for professionals and programs that facilitate CAD modeling because of good accuracy, fast response, and a sense of scale. All these features are only possible with a technology using computer vision.


How To Use Nimble

Using Nimble is incredibly simple, only requiring three easy steps for the user. 


Product Specs

Whether you're a casual or serious gamer, a tech enthusiast, a developer, or just a person who loves cool new gadgets, Nimble is sure to provide an exciting new way to interact with your screen. 

All of the following gestures can be performed in the air with the swipe of a finger from as far as 15 feet away from the USB sensor:

  • Browse digital photos or change songs with a finger swipe
  • Pinch to zoom
  • Left/right finger movements to fast forward and rewind video
  • Up/down finger movement to control volume
  • Simple tap to pause/play
  • Trace fingers in “G” to open Google, “F” to open Facebook and “X” to close applications 
  • Control any cursor and click by moving fingers and tapping 
  • Unique user interfaces include rotating fingers like a virtual knob to change volume and screen brightness
  • Dashboards can be swiped down and programmed to house favorite apps and files

MORE ABOUT THE SOFTWARE

The soul of this device is its software. It has been developed over many years, studying the science of gesture and motion sensing. The software uses a USB sensor to calculate the position of Nimble. The smart algorithms can locate, track and follow many Nimbles simultaneously. Nimble is currently supported by Windows but will support iOS, Android and Linux by the time of its release.

  • Environment Mapping: The environment mapping algorithms eliminate any noise or disturbance from surroundings.
  • Gesture recognition: User-defined gestures can easily be programmed and stored on the platform. Examples include: using your signature as a password or moving a finger in the letter "G" for opening Google.

Out-of-box, Nimble will support all of the following:



Games: Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, Virtual Cop (shooting), Counter-Strike (shooting), Need for Speed (racing), Cut the Rope, Bowling, 2048, Subway Surfer, FIFA Shoot 

Apps and sites: YouTube, Google Search, Media Players (VLC, windows mediaplayer, win amp and other major players), Google Earth, Netflix, Windows Image Viewer, Paint 

Utility: Presentations on Powerpoint and Prezi, basic Facebook browsing, and PDF reader

WHAT COMES IN A PACK?

The Nimble system will be sold in a package that contains two rings, a USB sensor and software that provides complete gesture control. Backers can also buy extra Nimble rings for multiplayer experiences.





How does Nimble works?
Nimble does real time tracking of your finger using the technology of Computer Vision. This enables it to work with high accuracy and almost zero lag without compromising with the working range.

When will I get to choose the color and model of my Nimble?
Following the end of the campaign, backers would be contacted to confirm their color choices and size of Nimble.

Am I supposed to manually add shipping?
Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 for Asian countries and $20 elsewhere for the to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.

When are you going to be shipping my Nimble? 

Indiegogo is not like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to Nimble you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make the final product.

Estimated national and international shipping date for developer version is January 2015 and the consumer version will be shipped by second quarter of 2015 with a lot of fun applications.


I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?

We will be contacting all our contributors at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your Nimble shipped.


Is Nimble waterproof?

Nimble is splashproof.


How long will the battery last and how do I charge it?

The battery inside Nimble will last for two days on normal usage of upto 6 hrs daily. The batteries provided will be rechargeable and come with a charger. We are trying different techniques and designs to make the charger as compact, sleek and hassle free as possible.

Utility: Presentations on Powerpoint and Prezi, basic Facebook browsing, and PDF reader





WHAT COMES IN A PACK?
The Nimble system will be sold in a package that contains two rings, a USB sensor and software that provides complete gesture control. Backers can also buy extra Nimble rings for multiplayer experiences.











How does Nimble works?
Nimble does real time tracking of your finger using the technology of Computer Vision. This enables it to work with high accuracy and almost zero lag without compromising with the working range.


When will I get to choose the color and model of my Nimble?

Following the end of the campaign, backers would be contacted to confirm their color choices and size of Nimble.


Am I supposed to manually add shipping?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 for Asian countries and $20 elsewhere for the to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.



When are you going to be shipping my Nimble? 
Indiegogo is not like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to Nimble you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make the final product.
Estimated national and international shipping date for developer version is January 2015 and the consumer version will be shipped by second quarter of 2015 with a lot of fun applications.


I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?
We will be contacting all our contributors at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your Nimble shipped.

Is Nimble waterproof?
Nimble is splashproof.

How long will the battery last and how do I charge it?
The battery inside Nimble will last for two days on normal usage of upto 6 hrs daily. The batteries provided will be rechargeable and come with a charger. We are trying different techniques and designs to make the charger as compact, sleek and hassle free as possible.

story:
Talking about us

 

 

 Bluenero is perfectly shaped to match your interior and to be happy home for your fish 

 

Made of the finest quality stainless steel and premium acrylic, Bluenero's classic and compact design is a nice addition at your home or in office. Industry leading CREE LED stripe creates ideal conditions for your fish and boosts the growth of corals or plants. 

 

Bluenero is designed both for marine and freshwater types of fishes

 

Whether you love Bettas or Firefish, Bluenero shelters them both!  

 

Full spectrum CREE LED stripe creates ideal growth conditions for any types of corals and plants

 

Now you have a full control over your Aquarium from any corner of the world

 

You can check on your fish anytime from the App. Bluenero's built-in HD Camera will never let you miss your little wonders. 

 

Bluenero's 7 Step Premium filter essentially reduces noise level making your fish keeping experience truly relaxing

 

    

 

 

 

Bluenero Family Dimensions and Capacity

 

Bluenero comes in 4 sizes, with 8 gallons as Mini, 16 gallons as the standard, 26 gallons XL and 36 XXL versions. You can easily keep both freshwater and saltwater fishes 

Choose the best one for you  ❤️

We have some striking Stretch Goals for you
 

Unlock the Stretch Goals during Campaign, and find impressive add ons and gifts for you and your fish! What should you do? Just follow us on social networks and share our Campaign page with your people, let them know about Bluenero! Scroll down to find the links.  

 

Meet the Team: how we got here

A team of dedicated fish keepers and professional aquarists stand behind Bluenero's technology, giving a new twist to aquarium maintenance and fish keeping experience.

 

Vahe started to work on this idea a year ago, when he got his first Clownfish with friends for the office. While enjoying the process of fish keeping, they noticed the difficulties and shortcomings of a their Aquarium; limited space, water purity issues, missed to feed on time etc. So they gathered a team of professionals, passed advanced "trainings" on how to keep the fish, and started working on the idea. The first prototype was a result of joined hard work, many useful feedbacks from fish keepers around the world and some serious R&D. 

 

"Indiegogo is a great platform to shout out about your invention, and to match your product to the market's needs." says Vahe, the CEO of Bluenero. 

Bluenero Prototype Demonstration

 

F.A.Q

 What is the capacity of Bluenero? 

Bluenero comes in 2 sizes, 16 gallons and 26 gallons.

I have Bettas, can I keep them in Bluenero?

Sure! Bluenero is designed equally for saltwater and freshwater fishes , but you should do your own research regarding the capacity for certain kind of fish. w

How can I set the App to feed my fish for a week?

Bluenero App is very simple. You just need to connect to the App via Bluetooth( for the 1st time) or Wi-Fi  and choose Feeder bar. You can also set the right temperature of water with Temperature bar in red.

If I order now when will I get my Bluenero?

Estimated delivery | September-October 2019.  We know that waiting is not exciting but our team has done solid research and posted realistic delivery timeline for such complicated and innovative product. We believe that it may even affect our pre-order quantity as getting it before Christmas would sound much juicier but not realistic.

How do I change water ?

We took care of this issue as well, on the right side of Bluenero (Behind the Stainless Steel wall)  there's a special valve to drain water from Bluenero.

What kind of food do Bluenero support ? 

Currently Bluenero autofeeder supports only dry food , we're working on this feature and may upgrade it in the future

Do you offer Warranty ? 

Yes, we offer 6 months Limited warranty against factory defects. 

Where Bluenero will be manufactured ? 

As core part of Bluenero team is located in Armenia it's more convenient to manufacture product in Republic of  Armenia and have full control over quality and assembling.

Where Bluenero,Inc. is located ?

​Bluenero is US based entity ( Delaware Corporation )  and the team is located in Armenia &  Ukraine.

story:
When our nearly 17 year old Shiba Inu - who has a tough time walking at all - started begging to go outside just so that he could drink from the cold outdoor water bowl instead of his indoor bowl... We realized we'd been painfully oblivious to something very obvious

If you wouldn't drink out of a lukewarm bowl that's been sitting on the floor gathering pet drool and bacteria for hours... Why would you want your dog or cat to? They're members of our family after all.

When Tachi, our Shiba Inu, started going to the trouble of begging to go outside just to drink cold water - when he has another convenient bowl inside and very close to the door - we realized something. If we prefer cold water, why wouldn't our pets? The thing we hadn't realized is how much more our pets might prefer cold water. That's a lot of trouble for a 17 year old dog that struggles to walk to go to just to get a cool drink.

So we decided pet bowls should be something your or I would want to drink out of: Filtered, refrigerated, and beautiful.

(Our refrigerated and filtered pet fountains are patent pending)

---

As you can imagine, refrigerating and filtering water in such a small package, keeping a gorgeous design, and making it all affordable is very difficult to do. (Not to mention having it all as quiet as any fountain)

But we managed to use the latest, cutting edge, energy saving, compact refrigeration technology to get the job done!

 

We created three different designs. One is our more affordable design made of polymer, but still with activated carbon filtration for water quality you would drink, and refrigeration your pet will love:

 

And we have two gorgeous designs intended to enhance the decor of your home, while also providing crystal clear filtered water, all at wonderfully chilled temperatures.

We have one design with a rustic look:

 

And one design with a beautiful modern stainless steel and copper design:

 

All including the same activated charcoal/carbon filter technology used in drinking water filters, such as Brita filtration:

 

The pets we've tried the fountains on so far love them. And we can't wait for your pet to fall in love with one as well!

Our Glacial Water Pet Fountains will be a tremendous addition to your home and will be great for the health and happiness of your dog or cat!

We've designed the fountains so that we can begin manufacturing them locally right away. We can deliver the first 100 orders in 3-6 weeks!

story:
THE WHAT

 

Scentee Machina is the diffuser reinvented to a more simpler, sexier and technologically mature design. At last, you can now control when the smell goes off, which smell to go off and much more, all from your phone.

 

MEDIA

We have been featured in

We were live at CES®︎ 2018 from January 9~12.

 

Why did we invent this?

Diffusers have always been this not very beautiful misconception of smell stored in a jar that you have no control over whatsoever. You only get to choose 1 smell, you can’t control when it goes off, you have to manually refill it, and it is embarrassing to have it in public.

 

We at Scentee are all about the smell experience. Back in 2013 we launched a successful campaign at a Japanese crowdfunding site, and got our first smart gadget "Scentee Balloon" off. It hit the world by a storm, successfully selling over 20,000 units.

For our next step, we wanted to try a "product" that can be used in every house. We looked at the objects around us, and found something that was hidden in plain site. The diffuser”. We created over 100 prototypes, and each time, our focus was on how to make the simplest, yet sexy design, that people will like whatever point in time they were in.

 

Our goal was clear, we wanted the simplest functional design. It had to be sexy and timeless. Some of the designs were very amazing on paper, but when we made prototypes of them, they weren't functional. Together with our manufacturing partner, we produced prototype over prototype, every time taking inspiration from a different life scene, until we reached what we thought was the ultimate design.

This design, the Scentee Machina, is a base that can be put on any flat surface, and detachable perfume parts. The base is connected with the internet, meaning you can program it the way you like. It’s the beginning of the smell revolution.

 

Where can it be used?

 

Bedroom

 

The living room

 

In your relaxation space

 

 In the bathroom

 

 

Spec of Quattro

 

 

Four 50ml fragrance bottles attached.
Fragrance bottle is removable from the device and also easily changeable.

  • Selection of fragrance
  • On / Off control
  • Timer setting
  • AI for Quattro
  • Weight sensor
  • Wifi 
  • AC adapter with Micro USB  ※No battery attached

All control is by smartphone app

Bottle is not refillable
Scentee Fragrance is only available

Material of bottle is glass and copper

 

Spec of Uno

 

One 50ml fragrance bottles attached.
Fragrance bottle is removable from the device and also easily changeable.

  • On / Off control
  • Timer setting
  • AI for Uno
  • Weight sensor
  • Wifi 
  • AC adapter with Micro USB  ※No battery attached

All control is by smartphone app

Bottle is not refillable
Scentee Fragrance is only available

Material of bottle is glass and copper

 

 

How it works

 

Fragrances

 

Smartphone App

Unlock the full potential of you Scentee Machina with our easy to use app. Switch the device on/off from any place, even away from home. With the timer feature, choose when the smells are triggered, choose amount, choose which smell goes when (for Quattro), integrate with your calendar to prepare the house before you come back home. Also, Scentee Machina's AI will learn from your usage history, and will suggest your favorite fragrance.

 

Main functions

 

Lisk and issues

We have been working with our manufacturing partner for over 5 years, and have delivered B2C products (Scentee Balloon), and B2B products to world renown brands at as much as 10,000 unit/month. So in this sense, we have extreme confidence in delivering on a mass scale.

Our concern is keeping the quality level where we want, and making sure the app integration works well with most of the phones out there. We will be flying in to the manufacturer's factory every week to check on progress. We also have partnered with a big software testing firm in Japan to make sure the app will be up to standard.

 

Available countries

  • United States
  • Canada
  • China
  • HongKong
  • Japan
  • European Union
  • United Kingdom
  • Germany

story:
Our goal is simple: to make the absolute best air purifier on the market. That means top-notch performance, design and technology, all at a price every family can afford.

 

Mila was built by three dads who wanted clean air for their kids but saw major flaws in the air purifiers that dominated the market. So they did what nobody else thought to do — fix the problems.

After years of research, engineering, and feedback from real families, we’re thrilled to introduce you to our labor of love. She’s packed with unique features and abilities that make her the most genius purifier around:  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Let’s face it, today’s air purifiers are outdated appliances wrapped in sketchy marketing.  

 

Most still have 3 antiquated speeds - like a blender circa 1984. Mila is different. She’s intuitive, honest, and is made with more thoughtfulness than grandmas's apple pie. 

 

 

 

 

 

The biggest problem with air purifiers is that you don’t know if they’re actually doing anything. There’s no proof you can see.

 

Mila solves that. Simply adjust the fan speed to your desired air quality and Mila shows you the estimated time to achieve it. It’s as intuitive as setting your thermostat.

 

 

 

 

 

 

She looks great in any room, amiright?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With Mila, you don’t have to worry about whether you have the right size purifier for every room.

 

Mila is the first purifier with spatial awareness to give you the same level of performance, whether she’s placed in a 150 sqft nursery or a 400 sqft family room.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

She’s the first purifier to detect room presence so she knows to quiet down when you enter the room and deep clean when you’re gone.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The science of air quality is complicated. But Mila talks to you in plain language to fill you in on what’s going on, in terms (and emojis) you can understand.
 

 

 

Mila is the first purifier to include a life-saving carbon monoxide detector. 

 

Did you know that carbon monoxide poisoning sends 20,000+ individuals to the ER each year in the US alone? That’s why Mila is the first purifier to include a carbon monoxide sensor to protect against malfunctioning furnaces and space heaters.  

 

 

 

She also monitors room humidity and warns you if you’re at risk of mold.

 

And if the outside air quality drops, Mila has you covered. She watches the outdoor forecast and adjusts automatically to ensure you’re consistently protected indoors. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mila packs 45 sqft of certified HEPA, the gold standard in ultrafine particle filtration. 

 

A lot of companies try to confuse you with big words: HEPA-type, HEPA-like, HEPA-grade, 99%-HEPA, patented nanotech, ionizes, neutralizes, destroys, vaporizes, etc. (Pro Tip: this is all b.s. made up by some marketing guy named Bob.)

Certified HEPA is the only proven technology and the only material we trust at MIla. It's the ONLY filtration technology guaranteed to remove 99.97% of airborne particles 0.3 micrometers (µm) in diameter including: smoke, allergens, house dust, dust mites, pet dander, mold spores, fungi, PM2.5, and PM10.  

 

 

 

 

She also comes with up to 1.5lb of heavy-duty granular activated carbon, the gold standard in filtering harmful VOCs, odors and smelly cats.

 

Other manufacturers cheat and call a few ounces of carbon dust a “carbon filter.” However, filtration of gases depends on the weight and depth of activated carbon. 

Mila’s patent-pending Dual-Flow filter allows her to hold an optional 1 lb of granular active carbon in a 3-inch bed, giving you best-in-class filtration for household odors and harmful VOCs from paints, carpets, and pressed woods.

 

 

 

 

Mila’s patent pending “Dual Flow” filter design solves a long-standing problem found in air purifiers.

 

Though HEPA and granular activated carbon are the filtration gold standards, sandwiching them together in a purifier dramatically decreases airflow. Manufacturers cheat to work around this and preserve their CADR rating by sprinkling a few ounces of carbon dust in a prefilter and calling it a "carbon filter." But filtration of gases depends on the weight and depth of activated carbon. That “carbon filter” gets spent in a matter of days, if not hours.

Mila’s Dual Flow design solves this. By using a novel, parallel-flow filter design, Mila is able to combine a primary filter of 45 sq ft of HEPA with a secondary filter of 1 lb of heavy duty granular activated carbon without the traditional performance hit.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other air purifiers are priced like Ferraris and perform like golf carts. 

 

Mila cleans the air more efficiently, for less $$ — making great air quality accessible for everyone. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Despite her tiny size, Mila is a powerhouse. She delivers a stellar 411 CADR m3/hr. (Translation: She dominates purifiers twice her size and price).

 

See how long it takes Mila to clean each of these rooms in a real-world setting. This assumes that there is poor outdoor air quality, at a constant 75 AQI, so Mila needs to first clean the room AND maintain it from outside air infiltration.

In this situation, Mila can provide an 11x protection factor from the air outdoors in under 40 minutes in a 350 sq ft living room - the equivalent of wearing a 3M mask.   

 

 

 

 

See how she stacks up.  

 

Mila has the other guys beat across the board, from performance to price. 

 

 

 

 

Most air purifiers include one filter that tries to do a little bit of everything (but isn’t good at anything).

 

Whether you’re battling allergies, pet odors, urban smog, or home renovation dust and chemicals, Mila has you covered.

 

 

 

 

 

An aerospace-grade control system (really) and 8 magic sensors. 

 

That’s right, Mila is built on rocket science: Her control system is designed on the same principles that guide jet efficiencies and is light years ahead of the market. Mila’s algorithms combine the physics of air flow and air filtration with real-time data from 8 built-in air quality sensors (thanks to Kevin, our resident rocket scientist).

These precision sensors contribute to Mila’s state-of-the-art control system, measuring everything from micro-particles (as tiny as 0.01 microns wide) to volatile organic compounds and humidity. You can breathe extra easy knowing these 8 super sensors have your back:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At Mila we feel incredibly lucky to be able to make products that have such a meaningful impact on the health and wellbeing of the people we love. 

 

We take that responsibility seriously. That's why we provide an industry-leading guarantee, including:

  •  Money-Back Guarantee: If you don’t love Mila, you can return her within 30 days for a full refund, minus shipping and handling.

  •  One-Year Warranty: Should something happen with your Mila, no worries—you’re covered.

  •  The Mila Promise: Honestly clean air from an honest company.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Height: 370 mm (14.5")
  • Width: 300 mm (12")
  • Power: 56W
  • Voltage: 100-240
  • Weight: 6.8 kg (15 lbs)
  • CADR: 245 - 447m3/hr (242 cfm)
  • Ultrafine Particle Filter: 4.2 sq m (45 sq ft) of Certified HEPA (H11-H14)
  • Odor & VOC Filter: 0.5kg (1lb) of Granular Activated Carbon (GAC)
  • Filter Life: Each Mila filter can last 3 to 6 months depending on use and environment. For example, pet owners and people in high pollution areas can expect filters to last closer to 3 months versus 6 months in areas with low to moderate pollution. (For those of you interested in seeing the science behind this, we will share a long-term filter life study with backers once complete.) 
  • Sensors: Particulate (PM1, PM2.5, PM10), VOC, Carbon Dioxide (C02), Carbon Monoxide (CO), Temperature, Humidity, Room Presence, Differential Pressure.
  • Connectivity: Wifi, Bluetooth, Over-The-Air Updates, iOS App, Android App.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We've been blown away by everyone's feedback. Thank you!❤️ 

 

I’ve been looking for a quality air purifier for months and this one blew me away with the combination of price & features. -- Mila for the win. ❤️ 

 

There’s nothing on the market like this product. It’s a much-needed advancement in air-cleaning tech. -- Thank you!

 

I have chronic sinusitis and a few of my main allergens are dust, dust mites, mold, and some pollens. The allergy filter sounds like a godsend. -- We've been waiting for you. 

 

I saw myself on that couch of yours.-- We see you.

We want to be fully transparent on our timeline and are committed to updating as we have more information. 

 

 

 

 

 

Video 1 - Mila introduces Mila ❤️. 

 

 
 

 

 
 
 

Built by three dads who wanted better for their families—and yours.

 

As fathers living in Shanghai, we got up close and personal with the impacts of urban air pollution. Between chronic respiratory illnesses and weekends cooped up indoors, we saw firsthand how the smog affected both the physical and mental wellbeing of our families—and decided to do something about it.

And as you may have guessed, we named the company after one of our own children so that we would be constantly reminded of our commitment to our families, and our customers’ families. 

 

Because nothing is as essential as the air we breathe - but most of us feel it's beyond our control. 

 

We are vigilant about what our kids eat and drink but have no idea what’s in the air they breathe. We need to take it seriously.

  • Air pollution from burning fossil fuels has emerged as the world's single largest environmental health risk. 
  • The effects of dirty air on the human body are slow moving and scientists are only now starting to fully understand them. 
  • In 2012 scientists classified airborne particulate as a group 1 carcinogen. It's like lead…no amount is healthy.
  • Yes, it's a problem in your community too. 250 counties in the U.S. have more than 90 days of crappy air quality each year. And our home in sunny California has 9 of the 10 cities with the worst air quality in the US.
     

And our homes are no oasis ...they’re basically just boxes full of even crappier air. In fact, your house can be up to 5 times more polluted than outdoors. And if you’re like most people, you spend the vast majority of your time there.

Today’s air purifiers aren’t even close to solving the problem. They’re outdated appliances wrapped in sketchy marketing. So yeah, you don’t just need an air purifier. You need the best air purifier you can get your hands on. You need Mila.
story_txt:
Our goal is simple: to make the absolute best air purifier on the market. That means top-notch performance, design and technology, all at a price every family can afford. Mila was built by three dads who wanted clean air for their kids but saw major flaws in the air purifiers that dominated the market. So they did what nobody else thought to do — fix the problems.After years of research, engineering, and feedback from real families, we’re thrilled to introduce you to our labor of love. She’s packed with unique features and abilities that make her the most genius purifier around:          
 Let’s face it, today’s air purifiers are outdated appliances wrapped in sketchy marketing.   Most still have 3 antiquated speeds - like a blender circa 1984. Mila is different. She’s intuitive, honest, and is made with more thoughtfulness than grandmas's apple pie.      The biggest problem with air purifiers is that you don’t know if they’re actually doing anything. There’s no proof you can see. Mila solves that. Simply adjust the fan speed to your desired air quality and Mila shows you the estimated time to achieve it. It’s as intuitive as setting your thermostat. 
       She looks great in any room, amiright?        With Mila, you don’t have to worry about whether you have the right size purifier for every room. Mila is the first purifier with spatial awareness to give you the same level of performance, whether she’s placed in a 150 sqft nursery or a 400 sqft family room.        
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She’s the first purifier to detect room presence so she knows to quiet down when you enter the room and deep clean when you’re gone.          
The science of air quality is complicated. But Mila talks to you in plain language to fill you in on what’s going on, in terms (and emojis) you can understand.  The friendly Mila bot keeps you updated on the statusof your air throughout the day.
 
 
 
 

And Mila beautifully illustrates the air qualitythroughout your home. 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mila is the first purifier to include a life-saving carbon monoxide detector.  Did you know that carbon monoxide poisoning sends 20,000+ individuals to the ER each year in the US alone? That’s why Mila is the first purifier to include a carbon monoxide sensor to protect against malfunctioning furnaces and space heaters.      She also monitors room humidity and warns you if you’re at risk of mold. And if the outside air quality drops, Mila has you covered. She watches the outdoor forecast and adjusts automatically to ensure you’re consistently protected indoors.         Mila packs 45 sqft of certified HEPA, the gold standard in ultrafine particle filtration.  A lot of companies try to confuse you with big words: HEPA-type, HEPA-like, HEPA-grade, 99%-HEPA, patented nanotech, ionizes, neutralizes, destroys, vaporizes, etc. (Pro Tip: this is all b.s. made up by some marketing guy named Bob.)Certified HEPA is the only proven technology and the only material we trust at MIla. It's the ONLY filtration technology guaranteed to remove 99.97% of airborne particles 0.3 micrometers (µm) in diameter including: smoke, allergens, house dust, dust mites, pet dander, mold spores, fungi, PM2.5, and PM10.      She also comes with up to 1.5lb of heavy-duty granular activated carbon, the gold standard in filtering harmful VOCs, odors and smelly cats. Other manufacturers cheat and call a few ounces of carbon dust a “carbon filter.” However, filtration of gases depends on the weight and depth of activated carbon. Mila’s patent-pending Dual-Flow filter allows her to hold an optional 1 lb of granular active carbon in a 3-inch bed, giving you best-in-class filtration for household odors and harmful VOCs from paints, carpets, and pressed woods.    Mila’s patent pending “Dual Flow” filter design solves a long-standing problem found in air purifiers. Though HEPA and granular activated carbon are the filtration gold standards, sandwiching them together in a purifier dramatically decreases airflow. Manufacturers cheat to work around this and preserve their CADR rating by sprinkling a few ounces of carbon dust in a prefilter and calling it a "carbon filter." But filtration of gases depends on the weight and depth of activated carbon. That “carbon filter” gets spent in a matter of days, if not hours.Mila’s Dual Flow design solves this. By using a novel, parallel-flow filter design, Mila is able to combine a primary filter of 45 sq ft of HEPA with a secondary filter of 1 lb of heavy duty granular activated carbon without the traditional performance hit.      
 Other air purifiers are priced like Ferraris and perform like golf carts.  Mila cleans the air more efficiently, for less $$ — making great air quality accessible for everyone.         
 Despite her tiny size, Mila is a powerhouse. She delivers a stellar 411 CADR m3/hr. (Translation: She dominates purifiers twice her size and price). See how long it takes Mila to clean each of these rooms in a real-world setting. This assumes that there is poor outdoor air quality, at a constant 75 AQI, so Mila needs to first clean the room AND maintain it from outside air infiltration.In this situation, Mila can provide an 11x protection factor from the air outdoors in under 40 minutes in a 350 sq ft living room - the equivalent of wearing a 3M mask.        See how she stacks up.   Mila has the other guys beat across the board, from performance to price.  
     Most air purifiers include one filter that tries to do a little bit of everything (but isn’t good at anything). Whether you’re battling allergies, pet odors, urban smog, or home renovation dust and chemicals, Mila has you covered.      
 An aerospace-grade control system (really) and 8 magic sensors.  That’s right, Mila is built on rocket science: Her control system is designed on the same principles that guide jet efficiencies and is light years ahead of the market. Mila’s algorithms combine the physics of air flow and air filtration with real-time data from 8 built-in air quality sensors (thanks to Kevin, our resident rocket scientist).These precision sensors contribute to Mila’s state-of-the-art control system, measuring everything from micro-particles (as tiny as 0.01 microns wide) to volatile organic compounds and humidity. You can breathe extra easy knowing these 8 super sensors have your back:        
 At Mila we feel incredibly lucky to be able to make products that have such a meaningful impact on the health and wellbeing of the people we love.  We take that responsibility seriously. That's why we provide an industry-leading guarantee, including:
 Money-Back Guarantee: If you don’t love Mila, you can return her within 30 days for a full refund, minus shipping and handling.
 One-Year Warranty: Should something happen with your Mila, no worries—you’re covered.
 The Mila Promise: Honestly clean air from an honest company.
     
 
Be one of the first to bring Mila home. 
  Any sales taxes are the responsibility of individual backers.     
 
 

Height: 370 mm (14.5")

Width: 300 mm (12")

Power: 56W

Voltage: 100-240

Weight: 6.8 kg (15 lbs)

CADR: 245 - 447m3/hr (242 cfm)

Ultrafine Particle Filter: 4.2 sq m (45 sq ft) of Certified HEPA (H11-H14)

Odor & VOC Filter: 0.5kg (1lb) of Granular Activated Carbon (GAC)

Filter Life: Each Mila filter can last 3 to 6 months depending on use and environment. For example, pet owners and people in high pollution areas can expect filters to last closer to 3 months versus 6 months in areas with low to moderate pollution. (For those of you interested in seeing the science behind this, we will share a long-term filter life study with backers once complete.) 

Sensors: Particulate (PM1, PM2.5, PM10), VOC, Carbon Dioxide (C02), Carbon Monoxide (CO), Temperature, Humidity, Room Presence, Differential Pressure.

Connectivity: Wifi, Bluetooth, Over-The-Air Updates, iOS App, Android App.

story:
Every day millions of tons of waste is produced globally.  Most of it ends up in landfill, but some of it is illegally dumped in forests or into the sea.  

 


It impacts our land, our waterways and no matter where it is dumped, it creates emissions which have an impact on the air we breathe, while slowly destroying the ozone layer above us.

Of all the waste we produce, tires and plastics are our biggest problem globally.  They take hundreds, if not thousands of years to break down. 

And while we are all about recycling, the statistics for what ends up in our landfills is staggering.  

In the United States 100 billion plastic bags are dumped every year, or 11,500,000 per hour!

In New Zealand 1 billion plastic bags are dumped each year, or 40,000 per hour!

And that’s just plastic bags.

In the United States 32 million tons of plastic waste was generated in 2011, but only 8 per cent was recovered for recycling. Largely this is because there are approximately 7 grades of plastic and only 2 are capable of being re-cycled. The rest is dumped and goes to landfill.

 

Tires are as much of a problem. It is estimated that on average every person disposes of 1 tire annually. That’s more than 316 million per year in the United States, and 4 million per year in New Zealand. Almost all of them are chipped and landfilled.

But what if we looked at tires and plastics differently?  What if we saw them as a resource, a potential source of fuel, something we could create renewable energy from?


What Have We Been Doing?

We are a small team that, for the better part of three years have been dedicated to researching the waste and recycling industry.

We searched the globe looking at technologies and seeing how they performed. Assessing their ability to process various waste streams, generate electricity efficiently and all with little to no emissions ensuring they fit our clean, renewable image. We knew there had to be a better, cleaner and more sustainable alternative to landfill. And the good news – there is.

Waste conversion technology has existed in some form or another for many years.  Local governments have been given clear directives to start dealing with our waste better, and are interested in the technology on offer.  So why don’t we have hundreds of these in operation?

The main reason is the huge gap that exists between the technology developers, and the market.  For a start they barely speak each other’s language.  On one side you have the developers, focusing on their technology.  And on the other side the market, consisting of Local Government and industry, who very much want to be disposing of our waste in more sustainable ways, but lack the time and resources to bring one of these projects to life.

So we set out to bridge that gap, to be the solutions provider in the middle, the passionate individuals that are required to get everyone working together.  Our role has largely been to get the two talking, but also to be solving the issues that make one of these projects come alive, like locking down the waste resource, negotiating power purchase agreements with energy companies, looking for potential sites, ensuring environmental permissions are obtained and finding stakeholders to be involved in the projects.

Initially we set out to try and solve all waste issues, however we realised that we needed to start somewhere and our focus turned to plastics and tires because of the huge problems they are causing globally.

 


What We Want To Do

'Unfortunately, the traditional waste-handling sector does not invest in new technology. Companies developing new technologies must find a way to fight this inertia whilst convincing the investment community that those same waste handlers will adopt the new technologies once they are proven.....One important way to fight big business and the oil lobby is to actually build plants using alternative technologies and prove them wrong and that our technologies can do it better both economically and environmentally.' - Waste Management News

We identified two initial projects. One based in California, and the other in New Zealand, and we have been working hard to make them happen. The clients are ready, the technology is ready and the waste streams have been identified.  The projects are fairly advanced but what they require now is further funding in order to complete them.   

So that we can bring them both to fruition at once, we are looking to raise a further $200,000.   This would allow us to finalise the work required to bring them to contract stage and see them developed.  Part of this is being able to engage with external contractors on the unique engineering for each site, updating our Feasibility Study and financial modelling, finalizing the waste & electricity contracts and the legal work required on the contract with the clients and stakeholders.

There is a huge desire globally for the projects that we are offering.  We have done a lot of work to get to where we are now, and the only difference between launching one or five is the resource required to bring them to fruition. So any further funds raised will go directly towards getting the pipeline of projects that we have off the ground, and in the quickest timeframe possible. 

 

 

How It Works. 

The process converts the tire and plastic waste into other sustainable products such as fuel oil, and in the case of tires, carbon black and steel recovery which are used in manufacturing.

Shredding the Tires.

The end fuel oil can be used to run generators to create electricity, or be further refined to create a green diesel for use in vehicles.

One project will process a minimum 10,000 tons of waste tires (equivalent to 1 million car tires) and plastics per year, which will create enough green diesel to fuel 2500 vehicles or enough renewable energy to power 2000 homes.

This technology process is Eco-friendly removing any of the nasty ingredients that occur in tires and plastics with virtually zero emissions. The technology is EPA approved, and meets the strictest air quality tests globally.

Once the tires or plastics have been through the system there is nothing left, everything is 100% used.


The Current Environment. 

Big waste management companies have monopolised and controlled the market, from collection through to disposal at landfill. For them the single focus has been on maximising profits with little regard for the environment.  Investment in landfill has meant alternative disposal solutions have been pushed to one side, by the existing waste management companies. This has made it difficult for the small technology companies to bring their solutions to market. But by combining forces, using their engineering skills coupled with our commercial skills we have been able to work together to begin seeing these projects come to life.

However big is not necessarily better.  In the past, waste conversion projects have needed to be large-scale for the economics of the project to work.  This has meant huge amounts of waste have been required in order to see them fully realised.  The pre-existing waste management companies have been reluctant to let any of this go as it directly affected their bottom line.  However over the last couple of years as technologies have improved, the scale of the projects has been brought into alignment.

Think globally act locally.

We are all about smaller, regional projects for several reasons.  Small projects make a huge difference to our communities.  Regional projects create local jobs, waste is dealt with at source so lessening the need for it to be transported large distances, therefore less damage to the environment through added vehicle emissions. Electricity is generated locally without the need for it to be transported through often at capacity transmission lines.  This has a huge impact on the sale price, making electricity much more affordable.  Therefore its not just the environment that these projects bring about positive change to.

Educating the decision makers.

While our governments have understood that change in the way we deal with our waste is necessary, one of the biggest problems they/we faced was the long-term contracts they had signed with the large waste management companies.  This has meant that change has been gradual, as they have sought to regain control of our waste and where it is going.  Working with them, helping them to see that alternatives are available has been a big part of our work to date.

 

  

Why We Are Appealing To You.

When we first looked at Crowdfunding, we knew this was the way to really make these projects happen, to give them the launching pad they truly deserved. We knew that the spirit of the Indiegogo community was where it was at.

Renewable energy projects make the world better for everyone. Full stop. From household’s knowing that their waste was going somewhere more sustainable than landfill, the renewable energy that is generated, to the hundreds of new jobs created from building and operating these plants, and each employee knowing they are working for something sustainable and worthwhile.

We absolutely know that getting these projects out to the world can have such a big impact, why not give everyone the opportunity to support this and help make it happen.



How The Funds Will Be Used.

We need your help to finalize our Projects.

Here is how we will invest the funding we receive:

1) Update Our Feasibility Study: We have a comprehensive Feasibility Study that we have completed.  There is some updating and expansion to the financial modelling that is required, plus final auditing by our accountants to satisfy the stakeholders. 

2) Stakeholder Negotiations:  We are in final negotiations with our stakeholders which requires engaging with the legal team.

3) Legal Work: As well as the legal work that is required above, we also need to engage lawyers to draw up contracts.

3) Bridging The Gap:  Pre-project costs such as the planning and decision making process.  Time related costs i.e the timeframes involved in getting this tech to market, keeping the momentum up and the cost of staying in front of the decision makers.  All of this has taken time and money.  We have been 100% self-funded to date, but that little bit of extra support from you guys, the Indiegogo community, will really help bring these projects to life, and quickly.

We are nearly there! With your support we expect to have the first contract signed by December, and work on the first project to be underway by February 2014. We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and would love it if you would share us with your friends too!

The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestones is $200,000. We hope you are able to help us deliver these projects which will bring financial and environmental benefits to our communities. 


Our Awesome Perks.


Keep that junk mail at bay with this cool sticker.



What better way to say Thank You or Happy Birthday, than with one of these beautiful cards.



A super cool tote, designed especially for our project!


An awesome limited edition t-shirt, designed especially for our project!



Everyone needs a hoodie! How cool is this one? Limited edition and designed especially for our project!



Our Team.

Pacific Renewables is a truly International team. Founded in Auckland, New Zealand, our team features experts in different fields, located in NZ, Australia, U.S.A, Poland & China. 

We each have a real passion for waste conversion – and of course the environment.  Collectively we have over 25 years' experience in our industry, and are arguably world leaders in our field.   

In short, we are getting behind this technology and building these projects because we really want to see our waste used in more sustainable ways.  What better way than to create clean, renewable energy from it.  It is crazy that this kind of technology has been around for many years, but has lacked a team of people passionate enough to bring it to fruition.

We have made it our mission to work together to bring Waste Conversion projects to communities the world over.
